T02D1659:245a-1: shr'i sarba buddha sa ma yo gi d'a ki n'i
T02D1659:245a-2: m'a y'a shamb'a ra ta ntra rtho da ro t'i
T02D1659:245a-3: k'a n'a ma / bod skad du dpal sangs rgyas
T02D1659:245a-4: thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro sgyu
T02D1659:245a-5: ma bde mchog gi rgyud kyi don rnam par bshad
T02D1659:245a-7: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo ;
T02D1659:245a-8: / dpal ldan rigs sku ye shes kun gyi bdag nyid rin po che //
T02D1659:245a-9: thams cad 'byung gnas gnyen gyur ma 'dres las mdzad nyi ma'i 'od //
T02D1659:245a-10: gnyis med rdo rje 'chang ba las byung brgya rtsa nyi shu brgyad //
T02D1659:245a-11: dkyil 'khor las spros grangs med rigs kyi lha rnams
T02D1659:245a-12: rgyal gyur cig / rgyud rgyal sangs rgyas thams cad
T02D1659:245a-13: mnyam sbyor mkha' 'gro sgyu ma yin //
T02D1659:245a-14: dngos po de nyid gsal byed dgongs mdzad rnams rton rjes 'jug la //
T02D1659:245a-15: mtshon byed rtog pa bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis legs pa'i don bsdus bcu yi gzhung //
T02D1659:245a-16: phyi ma rtog bsdus la sogs gsung gi tshogs rnams
T02D1659:245a-17: rgyal 'gyur cig / dus gsum rgyal ba'i thugs 'dzin
T02D1659:245a-18: rjes 'gro rdo rje gsang ba'i bdag / sprul pas
T02D1659:245a-19: don mdzad gsang ba'i sgo 'byed 'dzam gling nyi ma
T02D1659:245a-20: rgyal // nyin mtshungs dbyer med dgongs pa'i tshogs dgrol sangs rgyas gnyis par grags //
T02D1659:245a-21: mgon mchog brgyud pa rnam sa la phyag 'tshal dgra
T02D1659:245a-22: yi tshogs las rgyal gyur cig / bstan pa'i snying
T02D1659:245a-23: po dri med rgyud rnams kun gyi rtsa ba'i rgyal
T02D1659:245a-24: // yan lag lnga yi tshul ldan rgya mtsho las byung rin po che //
T02D1659:245a-25: tshig zur du ma'i sgron sbar chos rtags phyag rgya bzhis bsgrubs te //
T02D1659:245a-26: bla ma'i gsung bzhin 'gro la phan phyir rab tu bshad par bya //
T02D1659:245a-27: rgyal ba kun gyi bdag nyid rdo rje 'chang //
T02D1659:245a-28: bskal pa bzang po'i thog mar rab sprul nas //
T02D1659:245a-29: snod bcud brtan g-yo dngos po dag bya'i phyir //
T02D1659:245a-30: thugs rjes sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor snang bar mdzad //
T02D1659:245a-31: skal ldan rjes 'jug lha tshogs gzung bya'i phyir //
T02D1659:245a-32: sngon byung ston pa'i dgongs mdzad rjes mthun par //
T02D1659:245a-33: mtshon cha'i rgyud don gsal bar bstan dgongs nas //
T02D1659:245a-34: ri rab rtse mor dkyil 'khor rnam sprul zhing //
T02D1659:245a-35: dang po'i rgyud chen la sogs rim bzhin du //
T02D1659:245a-36: dag pa'i rnal 'byor la sogs rim bzhin bshad //
T02D1659:245a-37: gsang ba'i bdag po la sogs skal ldan gyis //
T02D1659:245b-0: rgyal ba'i thugs kyi @245b dgongs pa rgya mtsho'i bcud //
T02D1659:245b-1: rgyas 'bring bsdus pa'i sgo nas dbye mdzad cing //
T02D1659:245b-2: dgongs don so so'i las gzhung mthun pa bzhin //
T02D1659:245b-3: legs bsdus mtshon byed tshig gi gzhung bkod de //
T02D1659:245b-4: rgyal ba'i dgongs don yun ring gnas pa thabs //
T02D1659:245b-5: sprul sku nyi mas 'dzam gling gsal mdzad nas //
T02D1659:245b-6: sde snod gsum gyis 'dzam gling 'dul ba'i dus //
T02D1659:245b-7: blo dman 'phags pa'i lam la bkod byas kyang //
T02D1659:245b-8: rang gi de nyid nges don gsal ma mthong //
T02D1659:245b-9: ma 'ongs blo mchog grol bar bya ba'i phyir //
T02D1659:245b-10: sprul ba'i byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mchog / dgongs pa'i dbang gis rmongs pa 'dul pa'i tshul //
T02D1659:245b-11: dkyil 'khor 'phrul ba'i 'khor lo rab snang mdzad //
T02D1659:245b-12: mgon po rnams kyi rjes su bslab bya ste //
T02D1659:245b-13: dpal ldan sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor gzhug / gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rim gyis bsgrub don gsal //
T02D1659:245b-14: gdul bya dag pa'i tshogs rnams grol bar mdzad //
T02D1659:245b-15: yun ring gsang ba'i theg pa gnas bya'i phyir //
T02D1659:245b-16: sprul pa'i byang sems sme khro rgyal po la //
T02D1659:245b-17: gsang ba dam pa'i man ngag rab bkrol zhing //
T02D1659:245b-18: rnal 'byor don phyir rab tu gdams pa mdzad //
T02D1659:245b-19: sprul pa'i sku 'das phyi ma'i dus zhig tshe //
T02D1659:245b-20: rgyal ba'i bka' gsang 'dzam gling gnas su shar //
T02D1659:245b-21: rgyal po'i khab tu spyan drangs mchod byas te //
T02D1659:245b-22: dga' zhing gus bstod legs bltas brda ma 'jal //
T02D1659:245b-23: thugs rjes 'brel shugs gsang sngags 'dzin par grang //
T02D1659:245b-24: dam par gzung ste glags bam gzigs par zhus //
T02D1659:245b-25: sgyu 'phrul thig le stong ba'i dkyil 'khor gzhung //
T02D1659:245b-26: grub thob lhag pa'i lha yis lung bstan mdzad //
T02D1659:245b-27: rdo rje theg pa'i gzhung lugs sna tshogs mtha' //
T02D1659:245b-28: dam pa rnams kyis gdams dag ji bzhin pa //
T02D1659:245b-29: mi 'gal legs par bsdus shing rab bkrol te /
T02D1659:245b-30: 'grel dang bsdus don sgrub thams mang du bstan //
T02D1659:245b-31: rgyal ba kun gyis rgyud mang bshad mdzad cing ;
T02D1659:245b-32: / rjes mthun rnam par bshad pas 'di ci dgos //
T02D1659:245b-33: dam pa'i gzhung lugs rnam pa bkod rtogs dka'i don //
T02D1659:245b-34: rgya che'i don mang tshig nyung bsdus pa dang //
T02D1659:245b-35: cung zhig gsal bar byas te dam pa'i gzhung //
T02D1659:245b-36: 'di la nyes pa'i skyon sogs ci zhig yod //
T02D1659:246a-2: tshe thung brtson zhe na rang gi grub mtha' can //
T02D1659:246a-3: las rnams kun la 'jug cing don med pa //
T02D1659:246a-4: rjes su gzung phyir bka' yi gsang don dgrol //
T02D1659:246a-5: gang zhig dgos 'brel yan lag ma tshang ba //
T02D1659:246a-6: de ni legs par brtsams pa ma yin te //
T02D1659:246a-7: gang zhig bshad pa'i yan lag zur nyams pa //
T02D1659:246a-8: des ni rgyud don gsal bar ston mi nus //
T02D1659:246a-9: gang zhig lta bsgom spyod pa rmongs pa la //
T02D1659:246a-10: des ni yang dag bden don mi mthong ste //
T02D1659:246a-11: gang zhig lam gnyis sgrub pa'i yan lag bral //
T02D1659:246a-12: des ni legs bshad 'bras bu 'grub mi 'gyur //
T02D1659:246a-13: brjod bya nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam par bzhugs //
T02D1659:246a-14: bskal ba bzang po'i rdo rje sems dpa' dpal //
T02D1659:246a-15: thabs dang shes rab bde ba chen po'i sku //
T02D1659:246a-16: sangs rgyas mnyam sbyor mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde //
T02D1659:246a-17: rgyud don ston pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul //
T02D1659:246a-18: sku gsum gnyis med rtog pa'i ngo bor bzhugs //
T02D1659:246a-19: brjod pa gzhung tshogs tshig gi tshogs rnams te //
T02D1659:246a-20: rtsa rgyud chen po'i don tshogs rnams bsdus pa //
T02D1659:246a-21: phyi ma'i phyi ma phyi ma la sogs kyis //
T02D1659:246a-22: gsal bar ston pa'i rtog pa bcu bdag nyid //
T02D1659:246a-23: rgyud bzhi'i gzhung tshad khri las brgya stong lhag / bshad rgyud la sogs grangs kyi 'bum sder grags //
T02D1659:246a-24: de ltar bstan kyang las su bya ba la //
T02D1659:246a-25: dgos med skyes bu 'jug par mi 'gyur te //
T02D1659:246a-26: las rnams bsdus bsgrub bya ba gang yang rung //
T02D1659:246a-27: bstan bcos la sogs bshad pa'i rgyud dag la //
T02D1659:246a-28: ji srid dgos pa'i gtan tshigs ma smras par //
T02D1659:246a-29: de srid skyes bu gang zhig 'jug par byed //
T02D1659:246a-30: dgos pa bdag gzhan dkyil 'khor du zhugs shing //
T02D1659:246a-31: de nyid lam zhugs 'jig rten las bsgrub pa'o //
T02D1659:246a-32: yang dgos phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub ste //
T02D1659:246a-33: tshogs gnyis thabs shes las byung 'bras bu'o //
T02D1659:246a-34: 'brel ba dang po mtshon bya mtshon byed tshul //
T02D1659:246a-35: gnyis pa rgyu 'bras thabs dang thabs byung tshul //
T02D1659:246a-36: khyad par dgos don rgya mtsho 'khrugs 'dra la //
T02D1659:246a-37: sgrub thabs yan lag tshang bas bdud rtsi bton //
T02D1659:246a-38: rin chen snod bzang legs bcas 'gro la spel //
T02D1659:246a-39: nad mang zug rngu rab sel bde la bkod //
T02D1659:246b-0: yan lag dpe @246b don nyes pa'i skyon bsal zhing //
T02D1659:246b-1: lung dang man ngag gtan tshigs mthun pas bsgrub //
T02D1659:246b-2: dpe yi 'thad pa gnas skabs dbye bas bdun //
T02D1659:246b-3: don tshogs bshad pa'i yan lag rnam pa lnga //
T02D1659:246b-4: nyes pa'i skyon tshogs rnam pa brgyad du bstan //
T02D1659:246b-5: rgyud lung mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i rjes 'gro rnams //
T02D1659:246b-6: man ngag sbas pa gsum 'byin brdas dgrol zhing //
T02D1659:246b-7: gtan tshigs khyad par tshad mas legs bsgrubs te //
T02D1659:246b-8: shin tu brtag dka' nor bu rin chen gzugs //
T02D1659:246b-9: yan lag kun gyi sgo nas gtan la dbab //
T02D1659:246b-10: de dag rnal 'byor don snang gsal byed pa //
T02D1659:246b-11: rnal 'byor tshig gis rnam par dgrol bya ste //
T02D1659:246b-12: mu stegs sogs sbas gsang ba'i brda don ni //
T02D1659:246b-13: sgra tshad rtog ge'i sgo nas shes pa min //
T02D1659:246b-14: de ltar dang po'i sangs rgyas rgyud las kyang //
T02D1659:246b-15: gsang sngags rgyud don shin tu rtogs dka' ba //
T02D1659:246b-16: bshad rgyud cha mthun sogs kyis bsgrub byas te //
T02D1659:246b-17: de nyid brgyud pa'i gdams ngag lags btsal bas //
T02D1659:246b-18: des pa'i klong bskyed thag bcad rtogs par bya //
T02D1659:246b-19: de don ma 'ongs 'gro ba blo ldan pa //
T02D1659:246b-20: sgrub thabs bsdus don 'grel sogs 'thad pa yis //
T02D1659:246b-21: legs brtsams rnam par bsdus byas nga yi bka' //
T02D1659:246b-22: yun ring gnas phyir gus par gzung bar gyis //
T02D1659:246b-23: zhes pas rtogs dka' bshad gsal 'gal ba gang //
T02D1659:246b-24: gzhan yang rjes su 'jug pa bskul ba'i phyir //
T02D1659:246b-25: tshig gi thigs pas don gyi rgya mtsho gsal //
T02D1659:246b-26: de nyid rab tu sbyar ba'i sgra bzhin du //
T02D1659:246b-27: rnam par bshad pa 'gal ba ci zhig yod //
T02D1659:246b-28: de ni sgo nas 'jug pa'i rnal 'byor pas //
T02D1659:246b-29: tshegs med chung dus chen po'i don 'grub ste //
T02D1659:246b-30: nor bu rin chen legs par mchod pa bzhin //
T02D1659:246b-31: dang ba'i dad pas rab brtson blang bar gyis //
T02D1659:246b-32: bsdus pa'i don ni rnam pa gnyis yin te //
T02D1659:246b-33: mtshon byed mtshon bya rgyud kyi sgo nas so //
T02D1659:246b-34: re zhig tshig gi rjes su dpyad bya ste //
T02D1659:246b-35: zhes pa phyogs gcig bsdus pa'i rgyud 'di la //
T02D1659:246b-36: dang po gleng gzhi 'brel tshul gleng bslang don //
T02D1659:246b-37: mtshan gyi sgo nas rgyud don mdor bsdus shing //
T02D1659:246b-38: yongs su shes bya'i dngos po 'bring du bstan //
T02D1659:246b-39: rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi le'u gsum rnams bsdus //
T02D1659:246b-40: gnyis pas lta ba spyi yi mtshan nyid dang //
T02D1659:247a-1: gtan tshigs spyod lam bzhi yi chos //
T02D1659:247a-2: gzhi lam 'bras bu kun gyi phan yon te //
T02D1659:247a-3: rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi bzhi pa bsdus pa yin //
T02D1659:247a-4: gsum pas grub pa spyi yi mtshan nyid dang //
T02D1659:247a-5: don dang thabs dang khyad par phan yon te //
T02D1659:247a-6: thun mong mchog gi dbye ba gnyis su bstan //
T02D1659:247a-7: des ni lnga pa'i tshig don bsdus pa'o //
T02D1659:247a-8: bzhi pas spyod pa spyi yi mtshan nyid dang //
T02D1659:247a-9: gang zag bzhi yi sgo nas bdag gi don //
T02D1659:247a-10: gzhan gyi don dang 'bras bu phan yon can //
T02D1659:247a-11: rjes 'jug spyod pas lam gyi chos yin la //
T02D1659:247a-12: mthar phyin rgyal ba'i mdzad bcas 'bras bu'ang bstan //
T02D1659:247a-13: drug pa'i tshig don rnam par bsdus pa'o //
T02D1659:247a-14: lnga pas rdor sems rnam snang he ru ka / gar dbang nyi ma rta mchog rol pa yis //
T02D1659:247a-15: dbugs dbyung rngub pa bsdus pa'i sgo rnams nas //
T02D1659:247a-16: khyad par gleng gzhi sngon byung dgongs mdzad dang //
T02D1659:247a-17: rjes 'jug ting 'dzin nyams su blang ba'i thabs //
T02D1659:247a-18: rtog pa drug gi tshig don bsdus te bstan //
T02D1659:247a-19: drug pas tshogs 'khor bshad par zhal bzhes shing //
T02D1659:247a-20: lha yi mtshan nyid sngon du 'gro ba dang //
T02D1659:247a-21: bsod nams ye shes tshogs 'khor rjes su 'gro //
T02D1659:247a-22: slob ma'i bya ba phrin las 'bras bu bsdu //
T02D1659:247a-23: zhor la rten gyi mtshan nyid dam tshig dang //
T02D1659:247a-24: bcu gsum pa yi tshig don bsdus pa yin //
T02D1659:247a-25: bdun pas gzugs brnyan mdor bstan 'dod pa yi //
T02D1659:247a-26: phun tshogs dkyil 'khor cho ga 'jug pa'i las //
T02D1659:247a-27: dbang bskur rdzas kyi mtshan ma so so'i rgya //
T02D1659:247a-28: rjes 'jug zhar la 'phros tshogs bsdus pa yin //
T02D1659:247a-29: brgyad pas mchod pa mdor bstan rgyas pa'i lam //
T02D1659:247a-30: phyag 'tshal phyag rgya'i sgo nas mchod pa dang //
T02D1659:247a-31: mchod pa'i phyag rgya'i sgo nas mchod pa ste //
T02D1659:247a-32: rtog pa kun gyi cho ga'i yan lag yin //
T02D1659:247a-33: dgu pas phyag rgya nyi shu rtsa bdun tshogs //
T02D1659:247a-34: bsgrub bya'i cho ga kun gyi yan lag yin //
T02D1659:247a-35: dang po'i phyag rgya chen pos rgyas btab pa //
T02D1659:247a-36: ting 'dzin sgrub pa kun gyi yan lag yin //
T02D1659:247a-37: gnyis pa dam tshig phyag rgyas brtan bya ba //
T02D1659:247a-38: dam tshig ting nge 'dzin phrin las yan lag yin //
T02D1659:247a-39: gsum pa bdag sogs byin gyis brlabs pa ste //
T02D1659:247a-40: ting 'dzin dam tshig dbang gi yan lag yin //
T02D1659:247b-0: bzhi pa sbyor ba bzhi yi sngon @247b 'gro ba //
T02D1659:247b-1: lta ba ting 'dzin bsgrub pa'i yan lag yin //
T02D1659:247b-2: lnga pa sbyor ba sna tshogs bya ba ste //
T02D1659:247b-3: tshogs dang phrin las bskyod pa'i yan lag go //
T02D1659:247b-4: drug pa bzhin gyi 'gyur bas gnas bya ba //
T02D1659:247b-5: mchod bstod bsgrub pa phrin las yan lag go //
T02D1659:247b-6: bdun pa so so'i 'jug pa'i cha lugs rgya //
T02D1659:247b-7: mchod bstod spyod pa'i rim pa'i yan lag go //
T02D1659:247b-8: brgyad pa so so'i lta stangs 'gyur ba'i spyan //
T02D1659:247b-9: sgrub pa phrin las kun gyi yan lag go //
T02D1659:247b-10: dgu pa lce la chos kyi snying po'i tshogs //
T02D1659:247b-11: rgyas gdab bzlas brjod cho ga'i yan lag go //
T02D1659:247b-12: bcu pa glu 'gyur skad kyi bye brag ste //
T02D1659:247b-13: mchod cing bstod pa'i las kyi bye brag go //
T02D1659:247b-14: bcu gcig so so'i las bzhi bya ba dag //
T02D1659:247b-15: mchod bstod phrin las rtsom pa'i yan lag go //
T02D1659:247b-16: bcu gnyis gar thabs sna tshogs las bya ba //
T02D1659:247b-17: sgrub pa tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i yan lag go //
T02D1659:247b-18: bcu gsum rdo rje glu yi bye brag rnams //
T02D1659:247b-19: mchod cing gsol 'debs bskul ba'i yan lag go //
T02D1659:247b-20: bcu bzhi mchod pa lnga yi rdzas bsham pa //
T02D1659:247b-21: tshogs bsags gzugs brnyan bsgrub pa'i yan lag go //
T02D1659:247b-22: bco lnga mgron mnyes par chad zhi ba'i las //
T02D1659:247b-23: dkyil 'khor sgrub tshogs phrin las yan lag go //
T02D1659:247b-24: bcu drug lha dang slob ma dbang bskur ba //
T02D1659:247b-25: ting 'dzin dbang bskur ba yi yan lag go //
T02D1659:247b-26: bcu bdun dngos grub shis par bya ba'i las //
T02D1659:247b-27: sgrub tshogs bdag don phrin las yan lag go //
T02D1659:247b-28: bco brgyad yi ge'i mtshan mas mnyes bya ba //
T02D1659:247b-29: tshogs bsrung bsgrub pa dbang gi yan lag go //
T02D1659:247b-30: bcu dgu rnal 'byor don rtogs mtshon pa ste //
T02D1659:247b-31: dbang dang dam tshig tshogs bsgrub spyod pa yin //
T02D1659:247b-32: nyi shu zag med mngon shes sgrub pa'i thabs //
T02D1659:247b-33: bsgrub pa phrin las dkyil 'khor mtshan rtags so //
T02D1659:247b-34: nyi shu gcig pa sra sre yo ga'i ltas //
T02D1659:247b-35: bsgrub pa phrin las dbang gi yan lag go //
T02D1659:247b-36: nyi shu gnyis pa bdag gzhan bsrung ba'i las //
T02D1659:247b-37: bsgrub pa'i phrin las rtsom pa'i yan lag go //
T02D1659:247b-38: nyi shu gsum bzhi lnga dang drug pa ni //
T02D1659:247b-39: phrin las phyogs gcig dag pa'i yan lag yin //
T02D1659:247b-40: nyi shu bdun pa dngos grub las dbang byed //
T02D1659:247b-41: tshogs dang bsgrub pa kun gyi yan lag go //
T02D1659:248a-1: pa bcu bzhi pa nas bzhi bcu'i bar //
T02D1659:248a-2: rtog pa nyi shu rtsa bdun bsdus pa yin //
T02D1659:248a-3: bcu pa bsdus don 'bras bu phan yon de //
T02D1659:248a-4: bshad par dam bca' don bzhin bshad pa la //
T02D1659:248a-5: sbyor ldan gar gyi phyag rgya dgrol ba dang //
T02D1659:248a-6: dkyil 'khor bsgom pa'i don bzhin bsgrub pa dang ;
T02D1659:248a-7: / phan yon 'bras bu yon tan mdzad par bcas //
T02D1659:248a-8: rang nyid mchod cing phyag rgyas gdab pa'i thabs //
T02D1659:248a-9: dgyes shing yi rang mngon par bstod pa ste //
T02D1659:248a-10: mtha' ma rtogs pa gnyis dag bsdus pa'o //
T02D1659:248a-11: 'brel tshul gleng gzhi rgyu ste thog mar bstan //
T02D1659:248a-12: gleng bslang rkyen te de yi rjes la'o //
T02D1659:248a-13: rtogs sla'i don du mdor bsdus 'bring du byas //
T02D1659:248a-14: rgyud don ston pa gnyis med brjod bya'i tshul //
T02D1659:248a-15: lta ba phan yon shes bya gzhi yi chos //
T02D1659:248a-16: lnga pa'i khyad par gleng gzhi dag dang 'brel //
T02D1659:248a-17: de yi don bzhin bsgrubs pas gsum pa ste //
T02D1659:248a-18: de dang rjes mthun spyod pas bzhi pa'o ;
T02D1659:248a-19: / dgongs mdzad dang mthun rjes su dpyad dgongs pas //
T02D1659:248a-20: ting 'dzin rim par lnga pa byung ba yin //
T02D1659:248a-21: sngon 'gro tshogs dbang dam tshig brtan pas drug / de yang gzugs brnyan la brten bdun pa'o //
T02D1659:248a-22: kun gyi yan lag mchod pa'i las yin brgyad //
T02D1659:248a-23: phyag rgya nyi shu bdun gyi kha skong dgu / de ltar lam la spyod pa byas pa'i mthus //
T02D1659:248a-24: mthar phyin 'bras bu la sogs bcu pas bstan //
T02D1659:248a-25: mtshon bya don gyi 'brel tshul rnam pa gnyis //
T02D1659:248a-26: bdag don sgrub dang gzhan don spyod pa'o //
T02D1659:248a-27: gang zhig sngon 'gro phun sum tshogs ldan pas //
T02D1659:248a-28: shes bya dngos dngos gnas lta shes byas la //
T02D1659:248a-29: gnas mchog phun sum tshogs pa gzhir ldan par //
T02D1659:248a-30: gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor dbang dang dam tshig dang //
T02D1659:248a-31: ting 'dzin phrin las spyod pa'i bye brag dang //
T02D1659:248a-32: tshogs kyi 'khor lo bsgrub pa'i rim pa dag / bdag gzhan don gyi dbye ba'i rnam grangs kyis ;
T02D1659:248a-33: / rim pa gnyis su sbyar zhing shes par bya //
T02D1659:248a-34: lam gnyis nyams su blangs shing goms byas pa //
T02D1659:248a-35: 'bras bu mdzad bcas yon tan snang ba yin //
T02D1659:248a-36: khyung chen mkha' lding spyi rgya rlabs kyis bcad //
T02D1659:248a-37: ngang pa'i rgyal po mi 'khor don la 'bebs //
T02D1659:248b-0: seng ge mchongs pas snor mtshams @248b 'phen sdud shes //
T02D1659:248b-1: rus sbal nus 'gros yan lag 'bru la dbab //
T02D1659:248b-2: gna' bu brag gnas mi 'tsham 'tsham par bstan //
T02D1659:248b-3: bya lag gzan snyog gces ka dgongs pa 'dzin //
T02D1659:248b-4: rin chen sgron mas tshig zur du ma sbar //
T02D1659:248b-5: dpe don mthun pas le'u mtshams gtan la dbab //
T02D1659:248b-6: zab dang rgya chen don gyi bye brag la //
T02D1659:248b-7: thun mong khyad par mtshan nyid gsang sngags gzhung //
T02D1659:248b-8: dman pa dbyibs tshogs gsang sngags don gyi gzhung //
T02D1659:248b-9: mthar thug chos kyi don du shes par bya //
T02D1659:248b-10: nyes pa'i skyon tshogs zhar la bshad pa ste //
T02D1659:248b-11: rgyud lung mi 'gal mthun gsal nges shes bskyed //
T02D1659:248b-12: man ngag tshig don yi ge sbas pa 'byin //
T02D1659:248b-13: gtan tshigs brgal lan sgro 'dogs gcod par byed //
T02D1659:248b-14: de la spyir theg pa chen po gsang sngags kyi rgyud mtha' dag bsdu na /
T02D1659:248b-17: dang po ni rgyud dang thabs dang 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid can no //
T02D1659:248b-18: de dag kyang 'gro ba thams cad sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin du gnas pa dang /
T02D1659:248b-19: zag pa med pa'i smin pa dang /
T02D1659:248b-20: grol ba'i rgyud kyis bsdus pa'i lam la spyod pa dang /
T02D1659:248b-21: bdag gzhan la snang ba'i sku dang ye shes yon tan mdzad pa dang bcas pa'o //
T02D1659:248b-22: gnyis pa'i tshig ni bya ba'i rgyud dang //
T02D1659:248b-26: de la bskyed rdzogs rnam pa gsum gyis phye ste //
T02D1659:248b-27: dang po rgyud kyi rnam grangs bco brgyad du gsungs pa la /
T02D1659:248b-28: 'di nyid sku'i rgyud thams cad kyi gzhi dang rtsa bar 'gyur pa ste /
T02D1659:248b-29: de dag gi mtshan nyid dang dbye ba rgyas par
T02D1659:248b-30: ni dpal phreng ba dam pa'i 'grel par bstan pas
T02D1659:248b-32: da ni rgyud kyi don la 'jug par bya ste /
T02D1659:248b-33: mtshon bya'i don ji lta ba bzhin mtshon pa'i sgo nas rnam par bshad pa la //
T02D1659:248b-34: dang por phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyu ma tshogs na
T02D1659:248b-35: gzhi med de ston pa la sogs pa gleng gzhi'i
T02D1659:248b-36: don bstan pa'i phyir gsungs te /
T02D1659:248b-37: sems dpa' sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos //
T02D1659:248b-38: rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog / gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na //
T02D1659:248b-39: thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs /
T02D1659:249a-0: bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi bu dgang yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas khyed rnams @249a * //
T02D1659:249a-1: kyis dam pa'i chos rnams bsdu bar bya ste /
T02D1659:249a-2: bka' thams cad kyi dang por 'di skad bdag gis
T02D1659:249a-3: thos pa dus gcig na zhes pa la sogs pa'i
T02D1659:249a-5: zhabs su yi rang zhing bstod pa thogs shig ces gsungs pa la //
T02D1659:249a-6: 'dir sdud pa po gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje ma smos pa ci'i phyir zhe na /
T02D1659:249a-8: rdo rje 'chang chen po'i dgongs mdzad rgya cher slob
T02D1659:249a-9: pa'i rim pa rtsa ba'i rgyud rtog pa bzhi bcu
T02D1659:249a-10: rtsa gnyis par rgyas par gsungs pa dang /
T02D1659:249a-11: rdo rje 'chang chen po'i mi gnas pa'i mya ngan
T02D1659:249a-12: las 'das pa chen po'i rang bzhin du rtag tu
T02D1659:249a-13: bzhugs te / bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi //
T02D1659:249a-15: des na rgyud gzhan las ni gleng gzhi dang brjod bya so sor bstan la //
T02D1659:249a-16: 'dir ni gnyis su med pa'i sgo nas sangs rgyas
T02D1659:249a-17: rigs drug gi mtshan gyis don gyis gleng gzhi bstan
T02D1659:249a-18: te de nyid ni brjod bya'i don du gnas so
T02D1659:249a-19: // 'o na yongs su shes par bya ba'i dngos
T02D1659:249a-20: po dang khyad par med pas logs su gzhag mi
T02D1659:249a-22: de ltar yin yang gzhan yang cha mthun pa'am /
T02D1659:249a-23: thog mar rgyu bkod pa'i tshul gyis rtsa ba'i rgyud bsdus pa'o //
T02D1659:249a-24: de la lung gzhan dang sgo mthun pa'i tshul du ni //
T02D1659:249a-30: de'i phyir rtsa ba'i rgyud las /
T02D1659:249a-31: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na //
T02D1659:249a-32: bcom ldan 'das sku gsum gnyis su med pa'i sangs
T02D1659:249a-33: rgyas rdo rje 'chang chen po de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D1659:249a-34: dang / rdo rje dang padma dang rin po che
T02D1659:249a-35: dang rgya gram kun gyi bdag nyid dam pa thams
T02D1659:249a-36: cad kyi 'byung gnas su gyur pa zhes bya ba
T02D1659:249a-37: la sogs pa'i tshig rgya chen pos ston pa'i rang
T02D1659:249a-38: bzhin gyi de kho na nyid dang /
T02D1659:249a-40: yon tan gyi snang ba dang /
T02D1659:249a-41: phrin las rgya chen po'i sgo nas gzhan las khyad par du gyur ba dang /
T02D1659:249a-44: de nyid las mi gzhan par 'phrul ba dang /
T02D1659:249a-45: tha dad rang rgyud pa'i 'khor phal po che dang /
T02D1659:249a-46: thugs kyi dkyil 'khor sdud pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs dang /
T02D1659:249a-47: gsung gi sdud pa po byang chub sems dpa' gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje dang //
T02D1659:249b-0: 'phrul pa dang @249b bshad pa'i dus rnam pa gnyis kyi mtshan nyid rgya cher bstan to //
T02D1659:249b-2: gzhung gzhan mi 'gal ba bsgrub pa'i phyir //
T02D1659:249b-3: ston pa gnas dang 'khor tshogs dang //
T02D1659:249b-4: sdud pa dus kyi bye brag gis //
T02D1659:249b-5: thun mong gleng gzhi rnam par bstan //
T02D1659:249b-7: gsang sngags khyad par gyi don du sangs rgyas drug
T02D1659:249b-8: gi mtshan gyi sgo nas phun sum tshogs pa'i don
T02D1659:249b-9: ston te / rtog pa bsdus pa las /
T02D1659:249b-10: sems dpa' sangs rgyas kun dngos ni //
T02D1659:249b-11: rdzogs sangs rgyas phyir rnam snang mdzad //
T02D1659:249b-12: rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal chen po //
T02D1659:249b-13: ye shes rdo rje 'dzin mchog phyir //
T02D1659:249b-14: gsang ba khrag 'thung zhes bya ste //
T02D1659:249b-15: phyag rgya chen po grub pa'i lha //
T02D1659:249b-17: dam tshig dam pa shes ldan byed //
T02D1659:249b-18: dgyes pa nyi ma dam pa ste //
T02D1659:249b-19: sbyin pa la sogs mchog grub 'gyur //
T02D1659:249b-20: thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs //
T02D1659:249b-21: rdo rje rta mchog las nyid bdag /
T02D1659:249b-23: rtog pa bdun pa las kyang /
T02D1659:249b-24: sangs rgyas drug gi mtshan gyis ni //
T02D1659:249b-25: khyad par gleng gzhi'i don gsal byed //
T02D1659:249b-27: de yang rnam par snang zhing ye shes gsal ba'i
T02D1659:249b-28: bdag nyid kyis gnyis su med pa'i sems dpa' mdzad
T02D1659:249b-29: pa khyad par can gyi las kyis phun sum tshogs
T02D1659:249b-30: pa gnyis mnga' bas sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos nyid
T02D1659:249b-31: do // de nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyi bye brag ni rdo rje sems dpa' dang /
T02D1659:249b-32: bde ba chen po'i sku mchog tu gyur pa zhes bya ste /
T02D1659:249b-33: don rtags gnyis kyi sgo nas rdo rje sems dpa' ni bde ba'i mchog tu gyur ba'o //
T02D1659:249b-34: ye ge gsum gyis rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum ston cing /
T02D1659:249b-35: de mtshon par byed pa ni bha ga gru gsum pa gsang ba'i gnas kyi dbyibs so //
T02D1659:249b-36: de nyid ni chags pa'i mtha' thams cad dang bral zhing //
T02D1659:249b-37: chags pa chen po'i bdag nyid rtog pa'i dri ma
T02D1659:249b-38: dang bral zhing dag par byed pas na mchog tu
T02D1659:249b-39: gyur pa ste // padma gar gyi dbang phyug gi rang bzhin no //
T02D1659:249b-40: bde ba byang chub sems kyi mtshan nyid dgyes pa'i
T02D1659:249b-41: longs spyod thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas su gyur ba
T02D1659:249b-42: yon tan gyi bkod pa ste nyi ma'o //
T02D1659:249b-43: rta mchog ni phrin las kun gyi bdag nyid de /
T02D1659:249b-45: sdud pa po'i bdag nyid dang /
T02D1659:250a-0: dus kun du rang gi mtshan @250a * //
T02D1659:250a-2: gdul bya'i don du rtag tu bzhugs pa'o //
T02D1659:250a-3: gsang sngags kyi g-yo ba'i rten dang /
T02D1659:250a-4: gsang ba'i brten pa gnyis su med par gnas pa'i ye shes chen po'i rang bzhin te sems dpa'o //
T02D1659:250a-5: de nyid sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin rlung lnga'i dngos por bzhugs te /
T02D1659:250a-6: gzhan gyis mi shigs pa'i las mdzad pas rdo rje lta bur gnas shing /
T02D1659:250a-7: rang gi de kho na nyid nyams su myong ba'i sems dpa' chen po bde ba'i ros rgyas pas //
T02D1659:250a-8: de ni zag pa med pa'i lam ste mchog tu gyur pa'o //
T02D1659:250a-9: gsang ba'i don sngags gsum gyi rnam pa 'byung 'jug gnas pa'i sgo nas 'phro 'dus las mdzad de /
T02D1659:250a-10: mchog tu gyur pa'i rtsa gsum dgang zhing bde ba
T02D1659:250a-11: chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyis dgyes pas na chos
T02D1659:250a-12: thams cad kyi bdag nyid du rtag tu bzhugs so
T02D1659:250a-13: // de yang rtog pa bdun pa las //
T02D1659:250a-14: gnyis med ye shes sems dpa' che //
T02D1659:250a-15: sangs rgyas kun bdag g-yo ba lnga //
T02D1659:250a-16: rdo rje sems dpa' bde chen rgyal //
T02D1659:250a-17: zag pa med pa'i lam mchog rgyas //
T02D1659:250a-19: mchog gyur rtsa gsum bde chen dgyes //
T02D1659:250a-20: kun gyi bdag nyid de bzhin nyid //
T02D1659:250a-21: chos rnams thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas //
T02D1659:250a-23: dbyibs kyi sgro nas thabs dang shes rab gnyis su
T02D1659:250a-24: med pa'i mtshon bya sems dpa'i rang bzhin de nyid
T02D1659:250a-25: 'byung lnga 'khor lo'i rnam par sangs rgyas kun gyi
T02D1659:250a-27: rdo rje sems dpa'i mtshan ma'i yi ge'i rnam pa dang /
T02D1659:250a-28: bde ba chen po gnyis su med pa'i mchog tha dad med cing /
T02D1659:250a-29: gsang ba'i gnas rdo rje dbyings phyug ma'i phyag rgya dang /
T02D1659:250a-30: rin po che 'bar ba ka ta sbyar bas rlung
T02D1659:250a-31: dang me'i rkyen gyis bde ba'i mchog gis bskul te
T02D1659:250a-32: skad cig ma bzhi las dga' ba bcu drug tu
T02D1659:250a-34: chos thams cad snang stong gnyis su med pa'i ngo bo la bde ba chen po'i rgyas btang ste ;
T02D1659:250a-35: sku gsum gnyis su med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid du rtag tu bzhugs so //
T02D1659:250a-36: de yang rtog pa bdun pa las /
T02D1659:250a-37: gnyis med sems dpa' sangs rgyas mchog /'byung khams 'khor lo'i rnam par gnas //
T02D1659:250b-0: yi ge gnyis med bde chen mchog / rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin @250b nyid ;
T02D1659:250b-1: / gsang ba'i phyag rgya rab sbyor nas //
T02D1659:250b-2: bde mchog rkyen gyis bskul bya ste //
T02D1659:250b-3: dga' bzhi bcu drug gnas spro zhing //
T02D1659:250b-4: thams cad bde ba chen po'i sku //
T02D1659:250b-6: chos kyi tshul du sems dpa' rang byung gi ye
T02D1659:250b-7: shes chen po rtog pa'i dri ma thams cad dang
T02D1659:250b-8: bral ba de nyid ni sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos
T02D1659:250b-9: nyid do // de yang yul dang yul can gnyis
T02D1659:250b-10: su med pa'i tshul du bde ba chen po'i skur
T02D1659:250b-11: nyid do // bzhugs shing // zag pa med pa'i ye shes las grub pas 'bral ba med do //
T02D1659:250b-12: chos thams cad kyi de kho na nyid sku nyams su bstar ba'o //
T02D1659:250b-13: de'i don dngos po kun la gnas kyang tog pa'i dri mas bsgrib cing rang gsang du gnas la /
T02D1659:250b-14: mtshan nyid kyi theg pas dka' ba spyad kyang ma
T02D1659:250b-15: rtogs pas snang ba shin tu lkog tu gyur pa
T02D1659:250b-17: de la spyod pa'i theg pa chen po gsang sngags
T02D1659:250b-18: kyi lam pa dag ni sku gsum gnyis su med
T02D1659:250b-19: pa'i 'bras bu mchog dang ldan zhing /
T02D1659:250b-20: bde ba chen po'i ros dgyes te chos thams cad kyi bdag nyid du rtag tu bzhugs pa'o //
T02D1659:250b-21: de yang rtog pa bdun pa las /
T02D1659:250b-22: snang ba nyid ni stong pa'i dngos //
T02D1659:250b-23: de nyid bde ba chen po yis //
T02D1659:250b-24: de nyid sems dpa' sangs rgyas dngos //
T02D1659:250b-25: de nyid chos rnams kun gyi dbyings //
T02D1659:250b-26: bde chen rdo rje sems dpa' ni //
T02D1659:250b-27: snang khyab gsal ba'i tshul du bzhugs //
T02D1659:250b-29: de dag ni brjod bya'i don dang de 'byung ba'i rgyu gnyi ga yin te /
T02D1659:250b-30: gleng gzhi phun sum tshogs pa'o //
T02D1659:250b-31: gzhan yang rkyen med par ni rgyu tshogs pas kyang mi 'byung ste //
T02D1659:250b-32: pri ka ta'i me tog gi 'bras bu bzhin no //
T02D1659:250b-33: de nas sangs rgyas gnyis kyi mtshan gyi sgo nas
T02D1659:250b-34: gleng bslang ba'i le'i gnyis pa bsdu bar bya ba'i
T02D1659:250b-35: phyir // 'di ni rang byung bcom ldan 'das //
T02D1659:250b-36: gcig pur rab tu che ba'i lha //
T02D1659:250b-38: rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i phyi nang gi dngos
T02D1659:250b-39: po dag las rang gi de kho na nyid don
T02D1659:250b-40: dam pa dang / kun rdzob kyi chos su dran
T02D1659:250b-41: cing rtogs pa mngon du gyur ba'i phyogs bcu'i sangs
T02D1659:250b-42: rgyas kyis kyang rang gi de kho na nyid don
T02D1659:250b-43: dam pa dang / dam pa dang / kun rdzob kyi chos ston to //
T02D1659:250b-45: de nas sku gsum gnyis su med pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje 'chang chen po'i byin rlabs las /
T02D1659:251a-0: 'od zer gyi snang bas stong gsum la sogs pa'i gnas @251a * //
T02D1659:251a-2: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rnams bskul zhing /
T02D1659:251a-3: rgyud yongs su dag pa'i 'gro ba thams cad bsdus nas /
T02D1659:251a-4: de dag gi mdun du dkyil 'khor gyi rim pa sna tshogs sprul zhing 'khod pa las /
T02D1659:251a-6: 'byung ba las gyur pa'i brtan g-yo dang /
T02D1659:251a-7: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang sprul pa'i tshogs rnams kyis
T02D1659:251a-8: dpal sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba
T02D1659:251a-9: mkha' 'gro ma sgyu ma bde ba mchog gi don
T02D1659:251a-10: / bden pa gnyis su med pa'i mtshan nyid ston te gzugs kyi 'phrul ba sna tshogs dang /
T02D1659:251a-11: sgra'i 'phrul pa sna tshogs snang ba mdzad do //
T02D1659:251a-12: de'i tshe 'khor gyi tshogs rnams rtog pa skyes te /
T02D1659:251a-13: sna tshogs rab tu bkod pa'i mchod pa'i tshogs dang /
T02D1659:251a-14: sna tshogs rnam par bsgyur ba'i bstod pas gtso bo'i
T02D1659:251a-15: dkyil 'khor mnyes par mdzad nas lan mang du bskor
T02D1659:251a-17: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na
T02D1659:251a-18: rdo rje la sogs pa sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis
T02D1659:251a-19: yang dang yang du gsol ba btab cing gleng bslang
T02D1659:251a-20: ngo zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshig don rgya cher
T02D1659:251a-21: gsungs so // tshig gi don 'di ni nye ba
T02D1659:251a-22: mngon sum pa'i tshig ste snang srid kyi dngos po
T02D1659:251a-23: dbang po'i snang ba dag go //
T02D1659:251a-24: de nyid dbyings skye ba med pa stong pa nyid
T02D1659:251a-25: las rang byung ste yon tan gyi rnam par 'phrul
T02D1659:251a-26: pa 'byung ba chen po lnga dang 'gro ba lnga
T02D1659:251a-27: dang phung po lnga la sogs pa so so'i mtshan
T02D1659:251a-28: nyid 'dzin pa dang spyi'i rnam pa'i sgo nas mi
T02D1659:251a-29: mthun pa'i mtshan rtog gnas su dag pa'i bcom ldan
T02D1659:251a-30: 'das sangs rgyas drug gi spyod yul du snang ba'o
T02D1659:251a-31: // de nyid gsal bar byed pa'i rang byung gi
T02D1659:251a-32: ye shes chen po gnyis can gyi dri ma thams
T02D1659:251a-33: cad dang bral ba'i snang stong zung du 'jug pa'i
T02D1659:251a-34: tshul bde ba chen po'i sku gcig pu ni dngos

T02D1659:261a-42: bdag nyid sangs rgyas thams cad dang /
T02D1659:261a-43: dpa' bo thams cad bdag yin no //
T02D1659:261a-44: de bas bdag nyid lhar sbyor bas //
T02D1659:261a-45: bdag nyid rab tu bsgrub par bya //
T02D1659:261a-47: 'brel ba'i tshul du mjug bsdu ba'i phyir //
T02D1659:261b-0: tshig dang po gnyis kyis ni @261b gzhi'i mtshan nyid bstan te /
T02D1659:261b-1: dngos rtogs kyis sangs rgyas gnyis kyi don dam pa'i mtshan nyid dang /
T02D1659:261b-2: kun rdzob kyi rnam pa dang /
T02D1659:261b-3: dpa' bo byang chub kyi sems bde ba chen po'i
T02D1659:261b-4: sku ni chos thams cad kyi gnas lugs yin pas
T02D1659:261b-6: de nyid tshul gsum gyis rtogs par byas nas /
T02D1659:261b-7: de'i rjes su tshig gnyis kyis ni lam gyi yan lag ste /
T02D1659:261b-8: ting nge 'dzin la sogs pas bdag nyid lhar sbyor zhing bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D1659:261b-9: de nyid goms shing mngon du gyur ba'i 'bras bu ni //
T02D1659:261b-10: de yis sangs rgyas thams cad dang //
T02D1659:261b-11: dpa' bo rnams kyang thams cad dang //
T02D1659:261b-12: rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad du //
T02D1659:261b-15: nges pa'i don rdo rje theg pa'i sgo nas sangs rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs thams cad dang /
T02D1659:261b-16: dpa' bo 'khor gyi sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgor zhugs pa'i tshogs dang /
T02D1659:261b-17: rig 'dzin gyi bye brag bzhin du gnas pa'i rdo
T02D1659:261b-18: rje 'dzin pa dag bsgoms shing bsgrub pa'i stobs kyis
T02D1659:261b-19: tshe 'di la sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin dang /
T02D1659:261b-20: dpa' bo rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rnam pa gsal bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1659:261b-21: de nyid kyis sgrub pas ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'i
T02D1659:261b-22: rim gyis sangs rgyas kyi rnam pa yang gsal bar
T02D1659:261b-24: 'di ni phyi dus sangs rgyas yin //
T02D1659:261b-28: de gnas rim bzhin goms pa'i mthus //
T02D1659:261b-29: nges pa'i don gyis sangs rgyas che //
T02D1659:261b-30: bde chen sku gsum gnyis med 'grub //
T02D1659:261b-32: des ni le'u bcu pa bsdus te /
T02D1659:261b-33: rin po che'i dpes bstan to //
T02D1659:261b-34: de ltar gsungs pa de dag kyang bsdud pa po'i rang dga'i tshig ma yin te /
T02D1659:261b-35: yid ches pa'i khungs bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas de skad ces gsungs so zhes te /
T02D1659:261b-36: sngon byung 'phrul ba'i 'khor los dus rnam pa drug tu gdul bya'i rgyud grol bar mdzad nas //
T02D1659:261b-37: rjes su 'jug pa po dag gzung bar bya ba'i phyir //
T02D1659:261b-38: ri rab kyi rtse mor sku gsum gnyis su med pa'i rdo rje sems dpas rgyud bshad pa'o //
T02D1659:262a-0: dpal sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro ma sgyu @262a * //
T02D1659:262a-2: de kho na nyid snang ba dam pa'i yul la
T02D1659:262a-3: 'jug pa ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i rtog pa ste
T02D1659:262a-5: gdul bya rgyas pa la dga' ba rnams kyi don tu //
T02D1659:262a-6: ston pa'i dgongs mdzad rgya chen po'i tshul du rtsa ba'i rgyud chen po gsungs nas /
T02D1659:262a-7: yang bsdus pa la dga' ba dang /
T02D1659:262a-8: rtog pa mi 'dra ba rnam par gcad pa'i don
T02D1659:262a-9: du rdo rje'i tshig dgongs pa du ma dang ldan
T02D1659:262a-10: pa brda'i don gyis rnam par bshad pa bsdus pa'i
T02D1659:262a-12: 'dir ni shes par bya ba dang /
T02D1659:262a-14: 'bras bu mthong ba'i de kho na nyid gsum gyi don snang zhing gsal bar mdzad pa dang /
T02D1659:262a-15: dam pa sangs rgyas rnams kyi yul la 'jug pa'i
T02D1659:262a-16: thabs gsal zhing rgyas 'debs pa'i mtshan nyid can gang
T02D1659:262a-17: yin pa de nyid la rtog pa zhes bya'o //
T02D1659:262a-18: de yang rtog pa bdun pa las /
T02D1659:262a-19: shes bya lam sgrub 'bras bu'i chos //
T02D1659:262a-20: bden gnyis mtshungs gnas de nyid gsum //
T02D1659:262a-21: snang gsal dam pa rnams kyi yul //
T02D1659:262a-22: phyag rgya rtog pa'i rang tshul can /
T02D1659:262a-24: yang rtog pa bsdus pa las /
T02D1659:262a-25: rnam par mi rtog chos dag las //
T02D1659:262a-26: sems can don du yongs su rtog / des na rtog pa zhes bya ste //
T02D1659:262a-27: rtog pa yongs su dag phyir ro //
T02D1659:262a-29: le'u dang po'o don rnam par bshad pa'o /
T02D1659:262a-31: // / gang zhig dmigs su med pa stong phrag gis
T02D1659:262a-32: ni lam du 'jug cing rin po che brtag par
T02D1659:262a-33: mi nus la / de nyid kyi bstan bcos dang
T02D1659:262a-34: phan yon mi shes pa dag kyang de la 'jug
T02D1659:262a-36: ; de ltar spyi dang rang gi mtshan nyid dang
T02D1659:262a-37: rang gi rang bzhin ma rtogs pa dag gis ni
T02D1659:262a-38: yang dag pa'i don mi mthong zhing /
T02D1659:262a-39: so so'i phan yon mi shes pas na ci'i phyir 'jug par byed /
T02D1659:262a-40: de'i phyir le'u gnyis par shes par bya ba'i gzhi lta ba'i bye brag dang //
T02D1659:262a-41: de'i zhar la phan yon bstan to //
T02D1659:262a-42: de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las /
T02D1659:262a-43: phyogs rnams ma lus rnam par rtags shing //
T02D1659:262a-44: rang bzhin ngo bo las grol bas //
T02D1659:262a-45: rags pa'i dri ma kun spyod de /
T02D1659:262a-46: rnam grol phra ba'i lta rmongs 'gyur //
T02D1659:262a-47: kye ma'i rang nyid ma mthong ba //
T02D1659:262a-48: gzhan gang mthong zhing shes par 'gyur//
T02D1659:262b-1: de la dang po lta ba spyi'i mtshan nyid ni /
T02D1659:262b-3: rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs //
T02D1659:262b-4: sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba //
T02D1659:262b-5: mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog / thabs dang
T02D1659:262b-6: shes rab gnyis su med pa'i mtshan nyid bde ba
T02D1659:262b-7: chen po'i sku 'di ni rnal 'byor gyi bdag nyid
T02D1659:262b-8: can te / gnyis can du rtog pa'i mtshan ma
T02D1659:262b-9: bdud la sogs pa'i tshogs rnams rang gi ngang gis
T02D1659:262b-10: can te / bcom zhing // legs pa'i yon tan
T02D1659:262b-11: gyi bkod pa thams cad la mnga' brnyes pas yon
T02D1659:262b-12: tan gyi bye brag gzhan med de rang bzhin lhun
T02D1659:262b-14: rtogs pas mngon du gyur ba'i tshul du bzhugs shing //
T02D1659:262b-15: don rtags gnyis kyi tshul gyis rdo rje sems dpa' thog ma dang tha ma med par bzhugs shing //
T02D1659:262b-16: sku gsung thugs las 'das te rang gi de kho
T02D1659:262b-17: na nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gsung thugs rdo
T02D1659:262b-18: rje la gnas nas sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam
T02D1659:262b-19: par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i ngang tshul las
T02D1659:262b-20: gnas so // de yang rtog pa bsdus pa las /
T02D1659:262b-21: sems dpa' thog ma tha ma med //
T02D1659:262b-22: rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che //
T02D1659:262b-23: kun du bzang po kun gyi bdag / rdo rje snying po gtso bo'i gtso//
T02D1659:262b-24: gdod ma tha ma med phyir yang /
T02D1659:262b-25: dam pa'i dang po zhes 'dod de //
T02D1659:262b-26: 'khor lo kun gyi gtso phyir na /
T02D1659:262b-27: dam pa dam pa'i dbang phyug yin //
T02D1659:262b-29: sangs rgyas gnyis kyi tshul du bzhugs so //
T02D1659:262b-30: de yang kun rdzob phyogs gcig gi sgo nas /
T02D1659:262b-32: sku mchog mtshan dang dpe byad dang //
T02D1659:262b-33: yon tan ma 'gags gsal snang zhing //
T02D1659:262b-34: dkyil 'khor dbang la sogs par ldan //
T02D1659:262b-35: gsung thugs phrin las gsal bar snang //
T02D1659:262b-38: dus gsum sgrib pa mi mnga' ba'i //
T02D1659:262b-39: mgon rnams bde chen gnas bzhugs te //
T02D1659:262b-40: gsal ba'i stobs dang mi 'jigs tshogs //
T02D1659:262b-41: bdag gzhan gnyis med sna tshogs snang //
T02D1659:262b-43: de dag gi don dam pa ni stong pa nyid
T02D1659:262b-44: rang bzhin gyis gnas pa dmigs pa'i mtshan ma thams
T02D1659:262b-45: cad las dben pa zhi ba chen pa'i dbyings so
T02D1659:263a-1: su med pa'i bde ba chen po'i ye shes mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i sku'i //
T02D1659:263a-2: de ltar gnas skabs kyi dbang du na bden pa gsum du bshad cing //
T02D1659:263a-3: rang gi mtshan nyid la gang du mi phye'o //
T02D1659:263a-5: thams cad ma lus phyag rgya yi //
T02D1659:263a-6: thams cad ma lus bde mchog gi //
T02D1659:263a-7: zhes te gong du gsungs so //
T02D1659:263a-8: don de nyid kyi lta bas thag chod nas bsgom pas nyams su blangs nas 'grub pa'i phyir /
T02D1659:263a-9: rdo rje sems dpar bdag sbyor na //
T02D1659:263a-10: dbab pa thams cad rab tu 'grub //
T02D1659:263a-12: phyag rgya gsum gyi sgo nas gnyis su med par
T02D1659:263a-13: sbyor na mchog tu gur ba'i don phyin ci ma
T02D1659:263a-14: log pa'i rnam pa dag 'grub par 'gyur te /
T02D1659:263a-15: rang gi de kho na nyid las shar ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1659:263a-16: de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las /
T02D1659:263a-17: thams cad bde chen rdo rje sems //
T02D1659:263a-18: ma 'gags rol pa phyag rgya'i sku //
T02D1659:263a-19: kun rdzob snang zhing dngo sems pa'i /
T02D1659:263a-20: don dam las 'da' sgyu ma'i dbyings //
T02D1659:263a-21: rang bzhin gsal bar sbyor byas pas //
T02D1659:263a-22: dbab pa thams cad rab tu 'grub /
T02D1659:263a-24: de nyis rtogs par bya ba'i thabs ni //
T02D1659:263a-25: sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba //
T02D1659:263a-26: rnal 'byor dbang phyug bde ba che //
T02D1659:263a-27: gang zhig la dang por sangs rgyas thams cad dang
T02D1659:263a-28: mnyam par sbyor ba ni dbyings ye shes kyi 'brel
T02D1659:263a-29: tshul te le'u dgu pa las /
T02D1659:263a-30: thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de //
T02D1659:263a-31: nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med //
T02D1659:263a-32: khams gsum dag ni ma lus pa //
T02D1659:263a-33: thams cad sgyu ma lta bu ste //
T02D1659:263a-34: ji ltar sgyu ma thams cad du //
T02D1659:263a-35: mi mthong ba dang ni reg par 'gyur //
T02D1659:263a-36: dmigs su yod pa ma yin te /
T02D1659:263a-37: de bzhin 'gro ba kun gyi tshul //
T02D1659:263a-39: yang yod pa ma yin med pa min //
T02D1659:263a-40: dbu mar yang ni dmigs su med //
T02D1659:263a-41: shes rab pha rol phyin sbyor ba //
T02D1659:263a-42: sangs rgyas byang chub rab bsgrub pa'o //
T02D1659:263a-44: don de dag rnal 'byor dam pa'i mtshan nyid de //
T02D1659:263a-45: dbang phyug phun sum tshogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1659:263a-46: de yang thabs kyi sgo nas dang /
T02D1659:263a-47: shes rab kyi sgo nas dang /
T02D1659:263a-48: gnyis su med pa'i sgo nas rtogs par bya ba ste /
T02D1659:263a-49: de yang rtog pa bdun pa las /
T02D1659:263b-0: @263b thabs kyi sgo nas bde ba che //
T02D1659:263b-1: thig le phra mo las 'das shing //
T02D1659:263b-2: rlung gi gnas la gnas mi mdzad //
T02D1659:263b-3: gsang sngags kyi ni dmigs bral ba'i //
T02D1659:263b-4: shes rab las la brten pa'i mthus //
T02D1659:263b-6: rang gi gnas sam gzhan du spros //
T02D1659:263b-7: rtsa sogs dman pa dbyibs las 'das //
T02D1659:263b-8: gnyis med phyag rgya chen po'i ngang //
T02D1659:263b-9: snang ba nyid na stong pa ste //
T02D1659:263b-10: stong pa nyid na snang ba yin //
T02D1659:263b-11: dbang po drug gi yul la rol //
T02D1659:263b-14: de bas bde ba nyid kyis ni //
T02D1659:263b-15: sangs rgyas bde ba kun 'thob bo //
T02D1659:263b-17: rgyu bde ba'i sgo nas lam bde bar bsgrubs te /
T02D1659:263b-18: 'bras bu bde ba chen po'i skur 'grub pa'o //
T02D1659:263b-19: de yang rtog pa bdun pa las //
T02D1659:263b-20: chos rnams mngon sum bde chen po //
T02D1659:263b-21: gzugs brnyan rab 'bring tha ma med //
T02D1659:263b-22: snang stong bde ba'i rgyas btab pas //
T02D1659:263b-23: dmigs pa kun las rnam par grol //
T02D1659:263b-25: mngon sum du chos thams cad la bde stong gnyis su med pa'i rgyas gdab pa'o //
T02D1659:263b-26: 'dis ni rtogs pa'i yon tan yang bstan to //
T02D1659:263b-27: da ni lus dag gi dka' ba spyad mi dgos par bstan te /
T02D1659:263b-28: sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor bas //
T02D1659:263b-29: rnal 'byor dbang phyug bde chen po //
T02D1659:263b-30: 'di la khrus dang bsdam mi dgos //
T02D1659:263b-31: dka' thub dka' ba spyad mi dgos //
T02D1659:263b-32: rang gi rtog pas bcings pa'i bram ze dang /
T02D1659:263b-33: nyan thos la sogs pa'i khrus dang bza' bsrung gi spyod pa dang /
T02D1659:263b-34: sdom pa dang sbyang pa'i yan lag bcu gnyis kyi dka' thub dang /
T02D1659:263b-35: me lnga bsten pa dang dbyu gu gsum pa dang
T02D1659:263b-36: khye'u'i dka' thub dang ba lang gi dka' thub la
T02D1659:263b-37: sogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas
T02D1659:263b-38: lam rnam pa ldar dka' ba spyad mi dgos te
T02D1659:263b-39: sogs pa dang / / gnyis med kyi don la
T02D1659:263b-40: gnas na spyod lam kun gyis tshogs gnyis rdzogs par
T02D1659:263b-41: sogs pa dang / / 'gyur ro // des na /
T02D1659:263b-42: dka' thub sdom pa med pa dang /
T02D1659:263b-43: bde ba dang ni dga' bas 'grub //
T02D1659:263b-44: de bas ji ltar 'dod spyad cing //
T02D1659:263b-45: kun za de bzhin thams cad spyod //
T02D1659:263b-46: spyod pa ci dgar 'dod par byed //
T02D1659:263b-47: g-yo ba dag kyang ci dgar byed //
T02D1659:264a-1: ma pa'i gzhung du spyod pa'i rim pa dag ched du gnyer zhing dgag pa med de /
T02D1659:264a-2: bram ze dang mu stegs la sogs pas dben pa'i
T02D1659:264a-3: spyod pa gang yang rung bas sems bde ba dang
T02D1659:264a-4: / lus dga' ba'i sgo nas 'grub ste /
T02D1659:264a-5: des ni sdig pa ma sbyangs pas kyang mnyam pa'i don bsgrubs na 'grub par 'og nas gsungs so //
T02D1659:264a-6: de nyid rtog pa bdun pa las kyang //
T02D1659:264a-7: gang la ji ltar spyod kyang rung //
T02D1659:264a-8: gnyis med bde chen grogs su 'gyur //
T02D1659:264a-10: de yang gang zag las dang po pa dang /
T02D1659:264a-11: ye shes la cung zad dpang ba dang /
T02D1659:264a-12: yang dag par dbang ba dang /
T02D1659:264a-13: shin tu rnam par grol ba'i sgo nas shes par bya'o //
T02D1659:264a-14: ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin sems can gyi don du
T02D1659:264a-15: 'gyur na kha na ma tho ba med par ngan
T02D1659:264a-16: pa'i las la spyad kyang nyes par mi 'gyur zhing
T02D1659:264a-17: // kun zas te dam zas bcu'i rnam par dag
T02D1659:264a-18: gnyis su med pa'i don dang ldan pas longs spyad
T02D1659:264a-19: pas dngos grub 'grub pa'i yan lag tu 'gro'o //
T02D1659:264a-20: de bzhin du thams cad ni thun mong dang khyad par gyi dam tshig ma lus pa'i tshogs so //
T02D1659:264a-21: de bzhin du lus ngag gi sgo nas spyod pa ci dga' dang /
T02D1659:264a-22: sems kyi sgo nas g-yo ba ci dga' ste dgag pa dang sgrub pa med do //
T02D1659:264a-23: des ni theg pa dman pa dang /
T02D1659:264a-24: so so'i skye bo'i mtha' bkag par 'gyur ro //
T02D1659:264a-25: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa las kyang //
T02D1659:264a-26: sngags pa seng ge bzhin du rgyu //
T02D1659:264a-27: 'di la mi bya ba dag dang //
T02D1659:264a-28: mi bza' ba ni gang yang med //
T02D1659:264a-29: 'dod pa'i longs spyod kun gyis brgyan //
T02D1659:264a-31: de ltar na chos thams cad bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin du gnas pa las //
T02D1659:264a-32: ma rtogs pa'i sems can kha cig 'khrul ba'i dbang
T02D1659:264a-33: gis sdug bsngal gsum dang brgyad kyi rgyu dang 'bras
T02D1659:264a-34: bu de nyid la spyod de /
T02D1659:264a-35: de yang rtog pa bdun pa las /
T02D1659:264a-36: rang gi rang bzhin ma rtogs shing //
T02D1659:264a-38: yul drug rang rgyud brtags pa yis //
T02D1659:264a-39: sna tshogs gnyis kyi chos su snang //
T02D1659:264a-40: mi mthun bde sdug gnas la spyod //
T02D1659:264a-41: chos brgyad mtshan mas g-yengs gyur cing //
T02D1659:264a-42: nyon mongs yan lag dang bcas pas //
T02D1659:264a-43: 'gro drug gnas rnams so sor snang //
T02D1659:264b-0: sdug bsngal gsum @264b dang brgyad kyis gdungs /
T02D1659:264b-1: las kyi 'brel pas dngos la chags //
T02D1659:264b-3: yang log par blo gros 'khrul ba'i gang zag kha
T02D1659:264b-4: cig mu stegs kyi lam dang nyan thos kyi lam
T02D1659:264b-5: dang byang chub sems dpa'i lam la spyod de /
T02D1659:264b-6: rang gi de kho na nyid las nams shing bde ba chen po'i ro ma myong bar gnas te /
T02D1659:264b-7: de nyid la snying rje chen pos gzung bar bya'o //
T02D1659:264b-8: de yang rtog pa bdun pa las //
T02D1659:264b-9: kye ma'o log par rtog pa yi //
T02D1659:264b-10: kha cig lam ngan log zhugs pa //
T02D1659:264b-12: 'bras bu'i dngos las 'khrul rgyu dag 'jig rten 'dir yang sdug bsngal te //
T02D1659:264b-13: khyi dang ba lang dbyi gu gsum //
T02D1659:264b-14: me lnga sogs kyis lus gdungs te /
T02D1659:264b-15: tshe zad ngan song gsum du 'gro //
T02D1659:264b-16: rigs ngan dman pa'i lam zhugs pas //
T02D1659:264b-17: bde 'dod de nyid lam las go la /
T02D1659:264b-19: phyir zhing sdug bsngal kun 'byung gnas //
T02D1659:264b-20: 'gog lam mngon par sgom byed cing //
T02D1659:264b-21: 'phags pa'i lam la rgyab kyis phyogs //

T02D1659:264b-24: rkyen rtogs dgra bcom sa 'dod pas //
T02D1659:264b-25: rten 'brel la spyod de nyid spong //
T02D1659:264b-26: nyon mongs las dang sdug bsngal gyis //
T02D1659:264b-27: rang bzhin rmongs pas de spyod pa //
T02D1659:264b-29: thams cad ma rig las byung ba //
T02D1659:264b-30: de nyid rgyu gzhan gang las byung //
T02D1659:264b-31: thams cad rang byung ye shes yin //
T02D1659:264b-32: kye ma'i dgra bcom sa 'dod pas //
T02D1659:264b-33: rgyun zhugs lan cig 'ong ba dang //
T02D1659:264b-34: mi ldog spod sogs dka' ba yis //
T02D1659:264b-35: dgra bcom lam zhugs grol mi 'gyur //
T02D1659:264b-36: yang dag bden pa'i don med par //
T02D1659:264b-37: kun du brtags par gnyis 'dzin pa //
T02D1659:264b-38: bskal pa mang por dka' spyad kyang //
T02D1659:264b-39: yang dag sangs rgyas thob mi 'gyur //
T02D1659:264b-40: kye ma'o nges don ma rnyed pas //
T02D1659:264b-41: lam gzhan g-yengs pas tshi chad de //
T02D1659:264b-42: gyad kyi nor bzhin kun du chol //
T02D1659:264b-44: kye ma 'di dag snying re rje //
T02D1659:264b-45: bde chen gnas las 'di ltar gyur //
T02D1659:264b-46: sdug bsngal 'di gzhan gang las byung //
T02D1659:265a-2: nam zhig rang byung ye shes 'char //
T02D1659:265a-3: nam zhig bde ba chen pos brgyan //
T02D1659:265a-5: 'o na de dag gis theg pa chen po'i lam du zhugs na mi 'grub bam zhe na /
T02D1659:265a-6: gang zhig rang gi lta ba rnam par gtong zhing
T02D1659:265a-7: shes rab dang snying rjes gzhi bzung nas byang chub
T02D1659:265a-8: kyi sems dang ldan pas ni 'jug tu rung zhing
T02D1659:265a-10: lngas pa dang ni 'dug pa dang /
T02D1659:265a-11: 'chag gam ji ltar gnas kyang rung //
T02D1659:265a-12: dgod dam rab tu smra yang rung //
T02D1659:265a-13: gang na ji ltar gnas kyang rung //
T02D1659:265a-15: de yang rtog pa bdun pa las //
T02D1659:265a-16: skye bo gzung 'dzin rags pa'i rgyun //
T02D1659:265a-17: rtog pa langs pa kun du 'khor //
T02D1659:265a-18: mu stegs spyod bcas 'gro byed cing //
T02D1659:265a-19: sdug bsngal rmongs chogs sdug bsngal bsgrubs //
T02D1659:265a-20: yul drug 'gog cing gnas byed pa'i //
T02D1659:265a-21: blo dman gol ba'i lam la zhe na /
T02D1659:265a-22: ji ltar gnas pa'i rang rgyal ba //
T02D1659:265a-23: gcig tshugs mang pos dgra bcom lam //
T02D1659:265a-24: dgod pa'i sgo nas bram ze'i smrang //
T02D1659:265a-25: smra byed byang chub sems dpa' yin //
T02D1659:265a-26: de dag rtog gnas lam ldog cing //
T02D1659:265a-29: 'o na de dag gis tshogs ma bsags gzugs brnyan du ma bsgrubs par 'grub bam zhe na /
T02D1659:265a-30: dkyil 'khor dag tu ma zhugs shing //
T02D1659:265a-31: sgrub pa kun ldang ldan pa'ang rung //
T02D1659:265a-32: rang gi lhar ni bdag sbyor na //
T02D1659:265a-34: thog mar bla ma dam pa la brten te /
T02D1659:265a-35: gzugs brnyan gyis dkyil 'khor du dbang thob cing dam tshig dang ldan pas //
T02D1659:265a-36: gdams dag la chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mngon
T02D1659:265a-37: du byas na sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor la ma brten
T02D1659:265a-38: pa dang / sngon du sdig pa'i las spyad pas
T02D1659:265a-39: kyang rang gi lha gnyis su med pa'i don dang
T02D1659:265a-40: sbyar na lus ngag gi tshogs bsags kyang 'grub par
T02D1659:265a-41: pa dang / 'gyur ba'o // da ni lta ba rtogs pa'i phan yon gyi mjug bsdu ba'i phyir //
T02D1659:265a-43: thams cad 'grub par byed pas na //
T02D1659:265a-44: ngan zos ngan spyod thams cad kyis //
T02D1659:265a-45: nyes pa dag tu yongs mi 'gyur //
T02D1659:265b-0: lta ba mchog la 'jug sbyor ba'i sku drug lhun grub rnal @265b 'byor pas //
T02D1659:265b-1: dngos bcas chos tshogs rnam grol rgyar //
T02D1659:265b-2: thams cad rab tu 'grub byed cing //
T02D1659:265b-3: ngan pa'i spyod pa rnam dag chos //
T02D1659:265b-5: rma bya'i gzi mdongs gsal ba ltar //
T02D1659:265b-6: rang bzhin ngo bos rnam par dag /
T02D1659:265b-8: de dag ni lta ba rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'o //
T02D1659:265b-9: da ni de'i zhar la lam dang 'bras bu'i chos dag gi phan yon bstan te /
T02D1659:265b-10: de yang so so'i gnas skabs su ni khyad par gyi mtshan nyid yin la /
T02D1659:265b-11: 'dir ni shes par bya ba'i yul bsdu ba dang /
T02D1659:265b-12: yon tan gyi sgo nas 'jug par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1659:265b-13: dang por mchog bsgrub par bya ba'i sgo nas ni //
T02D1659:265b-14: bskal pa bya bar mi 'thob pa //
T02D1659:265b-15: sangs rgyas dam pa thams cad de //
T02D1659:265b-16: phyag rgya'i cho ga gang dag gis //
T02D1659:265b-18: mchog tu gyur ba'i dngos grub gang zhig sku drug
T02D1659:265b-19: lhun gyis grub pa rnam pa de nyid ni nges
T02D1659:265b-20: pa'i don gyi sangs rgyas dam pa ste /
T02D1659:265b-21: theg pa dman pas bskal ba be bar bsgrubs kyang 'thob par mi 'gyur ro //
T02D1659:265b-22: gang zhig rgyu rkyen ma shes pas ni 'bras bu sgrub pa'i thabs dang bral ba'o //
T02D1659:265b-23: thabs khyad par can gyi sgo nas bsnyen sgrub yan
T02D1659:265b-24: lag bzhi'i phyag rgya'i cho gas dkyil 'khor gang yang
T02D1659:265b-25: rung bar bsgrubs na phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub
T02D1659:265b-28: bdag nyid sgrub par byed pa'i mchog / de ni bdag gis brtag par bya //
T02D1659:265b-30: yon tan thams cad kyis 'byung gnas sku gsum mam
T02D1659:265b-31: drug gi bdag nyid de ni rang gi mtshan nyid
T02D1659:265b-32: de / nam zhig ye shes kyis gsal bar byas
T02D1659:265b-33: na rang gi rgyud la skye zhing 'grub ste de
T02D1659:265b-34: ni rang gi rgyud la brtag par bya'o //
T02D1659:265b-35: de yang rtog pa bdun pa las //
T02D1659:265b-36: bsnyen sgrub yan lag bzhi yi don //
T02D1659:265b-37: sangs rgyas dam pa 'grub byed pa //
T02D1659:265b-38: de nyid phyag rgya'i cho ga yis //
T02D1659:265b-39: rang nyid dkyil 'khor bdag por blta //
T02D1659:265b-40: rig 'dzin lam gyi bye brag las //
T02D1659:265b-41: mchog gi dngos grub skye bar 'gyur //
T02D1659:265b-43: thun mong gi dngos grub bsgrub pa'i sgo nas /
T02D1659:265b-44: sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba //
T02D1659:266a-0: mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog / rdo rje @266a * //
T02D1659:266a-2: cha lugs ji bzhin bsgyur ba yis //
T02D1659:266a-4: mchog gi dngos grub la sbyor bar byed pa'i yan
T02D1659:266a-5: lag tu 'jig rten gyi las tshogs dang thun mong
T02D1659:266a-6: gi dngos grub bsgrub par bya ste /
T02D1659:266a-8: rten dang sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpar sbyor zhing /
T02D1659:266a-9: le'u dgu pa'i bsrung ba'i cho ga la sogs pa'i
T02D1659:266a-10: phyag rgya'i las rnams dang las gzhan dag ni gnod
T02D1659:266a-11: par byed pa'i 'byung po bsal zhing bsrung ba dang
T02D1659:266a-12: byin gyis brlab pa dang ldan pas rten dang rdzas
T02D1659:266a-13: kyi sgo nas cha lugs ji bzhin du rang rang
T02D1659:266a-14: gi las dang mthun par bsgyur ro //
T02D1659:266a-15: des ci zhig sgrub ce na /
T02D1659:266a-16: thams cad ma lus phyag rgya'i bdag / bsod nams chung yang 'grub par 'gyur //
T02D1659:266a-18: 'jig rten gyi 'gro ba phal pa la yod pa'i stobs dang rang rang gi las rnams dang /
T02D1659:266a-19: thun mong du lha'i rgyal po dang klu'i rgyal po
T02D1659:266a-20: la sogs pa'i rgyud la mnga' ba'i mngon par shes
T02D1659:266a-21: pa lnga dang / rin po che sna bdun dang /
T02D1659:266a-22: chu la mi 'bying bar 'gro ba dang nam mkha' la skas bzhin 'dzeg pa dang /
T02D1659:266a-23: ri brags la thogs pa med par 'gro ba dang /
T02D1659:266a-24: sa 'og gi gter dang gser 'gyur gyi rtsi dang /
T02D1659:266a-25: bum pa bzang po dang ral gri dang dril bu
T02D1659:266a-26: dang mig sman dang bcud kyis len dang rkang mgyogs
T02D1659:266a-27: la sogs pa'i las rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi le'u lnga
T02D1659:266a-28: pa las gsungs pa'i thams cad sna tshogs phyag rgya'i
T02D1659:266a-29: bdag nyid thun mong gi dngos grub rnams sngon du
T02D1659:266a-30: sdig pa can gyi gang zag tshogs ma bsags shing

T02D1659:266a-32: na gzhan gyis lta smos kyang ci dgos zhes pa'o

T02D1659:266a-34: cha lugs ji bzhin bsgyur byas te //

T02D1659:266a-36: lam gyi grogs su bsgrub par bya //

T02D1659:266a-39: mtshan bcas kyi tshogs dang rang bzhin med pa'i don rtse gcig pas ni de nyid gsal bas /
T02D1659:266a-40: rgya 'di grub pa tsam gyis ni //
T02D1659:266b-0: sangs @266b rgyas thams cad byin gyis rlob //
T02D1659:266b-1: shin tu byin gyis brlabs nas ni //
T02D1659:266b-4: phyag rgya gnyis kyi sgo nas goms par bsgoms pas
T02D1659:266b-5: phyag rgya gnyis kyi rnam pa gsal ba'i byin gyis
T02D1659:266b-6: brlabs pa'o // de las phyag rgya bzhi dang /
T02D1659:266b-7: sngags dang phyag rgya gzhan dag dang rang gi de
T02D1659:266b-8: kho na nyid kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis sangs rgyas
T02D1659:266b-10: de yang rtog pa bsdus pa las /
T02D1659:266b-11: ting 'dzin la sogs rnam bzhi yis //
T02D1659:266b-12: gang zhig bskyed pa yong bsgoms na //
T02D1659:266b-13: bsgom na thams cad bdag nyid du //
T02D1659:266b-15: sems dpa'i byin gyis brlabs sbyor yang //
T02D1659:266b-16: rang byin brlab 'di grub mchog ste //
T02D1659:266b-17: de nyid nyin te grub pa ni //
T02D1659:266b-18: rdo rje sems dpa' nyid 'thob bo //
T02D1659:266b-21: sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor bas //
T02D1659:266b-22: sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam par 'gyur //
T02D1659:266b-23: sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam pa'i phyir //
T02D1659:266b-25: chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid ji ltar gnas pa'i
T02D1659:266b-26: ngo bo la rang gi rig pa ye shes kyis
T02D1659:266b-27: phyag rgya gnyis kyi tshul du sbyor bas phyogs dus
T02D1659:266b-28: kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang skal ba mnyam par
T02D1659:266b-29: 'gyur ro // des ni bdag gi rgyud la sku dang ye shes gsal zhing grub par bstan to //
T02D1659:266b-30: de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las /
T02D1659:266b-31: bde chen sgyu ma'i sangs rgyas las //
T02D1659:266b-32: rang gi ye shes kyis 'jug cing //
T02D1659:266b-33: phyag rgya gnyis kyi snyoms 'jug gis //
T02D1659:266b-36: des ni le'u lnga pa'i rjes 'jug gi bya ba dang /
T02D1659:266b-37: dgu pa'i phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i bsgom pa'i rim pa'i don ston par byed do //
T02D1659:266b-38: gang dag lam du 'jug pa'i gzhir gyur pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi gnas te ;

T02D1659:266b-40: rnam pa kun du mchod byed la //

T02D1659:266b-42: mthong zhing mchod pa byas par 'gyur //

T02D1659:267a-2: sku gsung thugs kyi phyag rgya dang ldan pa gsum po 'dir bzhugs te /
T02D1659:267a-3: mthong zhing rnam pa kun du mchod na /
T02D1659:267a-4: de yis sangs rgyas thams cad mthong zhing mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro //
T02D1659:267a-5: de yang rtog pa bsdus pa las /
T02D1659:267a-6: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs lha'i //
T02D1659:267a-7: dkyil 'khor mthong zhing mchod byas pa'i //
T02D1659:267a-8: bsod nams rtag pa'i ci 'dra ba //
T02D1659:267a-9: gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor de bzhin no //

T02D1659:267a-12: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi zab pa dang rgya che ba 'grub ste /
T02D1659:267a-13: 'di dang sangs rgyas thams cad la //

T02D1659:267a-15: dkyil 'khor dag tu ma zhugs pa'ang //
T02D1659:267a-16: bden pa dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur //

T02D1659:267a-20: cad dga' ba'i bzhin gyis bltas nas /
T02D1659:267a-21: reg bya'i bde ba sbyor te bsod nams dang ye
T02D1659:267a-22: shes kyi tshogs kyi bye brag gi sgo nas mthong
T02D1659:267a-23: ba dang reg pa'i mtshan mas 'grub par 'gyur te

T02D1659:267a-37: sangs rgyas dngos grub thams cad 'grub //

T02D1659:267a-44: nang gi dbang bskur reg pa yis //
T02D1659:267a-45: smin pa'i lam la rab tu gnas //
T02D1659:267b-0: gsang ba'i don @267b bshad thos byas pas //
T02D1659:267b-1: las kyi phyag rgya'i gnas la sbyor //

T02D1659:271a-44: mnyam pa gar dbang phyug / longs spyod rdzogs sku
T02D1659:271a-45: nyi ma ste // sprul pa'i sgo nas rta mchog go //
T02D1659:271a-46: bde chen rdo rje sems dpa'i sku //
T02D1659:271a-47: sangs rgyas drug gi rang bzhin no //
T02D1659:271b-0: gnyis med lhun @271b gyis grub pa'i sku //
T02D1659:271b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa snang mdzad mchog / thub pa chen po'i don bzhin bstan //
T02D1659:271b-4: rdo rje 'dul ba he ru ka / khro rnams khro ba'i mchog gis so //
T02D1659:271b-5: dag mdzad padma gar dbang phyug / chags bral chags pa'i tshul gyis bzhugs //
T02D1659:271b-6: rin chen rigs drug nyi ma mchog / mkha' la rin chen char chen 'bebs //
T02D1659:271b-7: las kun mdzad nyid rta mchog ste //
T02D1659:271b-8: sna tshogs rdo rje 'khor lo bskor //
T02D1659:271b-9: rigs rnams kun gyi bdag nyid ni //
T02D1659:271b-10: drug pa rdo rje 'chang chen mchog / ces pa dang /
T02D1659:271b-11: ye shes ni rtog pa bsdus pa las /
T02D1659:271b-12: me long khrag 'thung rgyal po ste //
T02D1659:271b-13: mnyam pa nyid la gar dbang mchog / so sor kun rtog nyi ma yin //
T02D1659:271b-14: bya ba la ni rta mchog ste //
T02D1659:271b-15: chos kyi dbyings la sangs rgyas ni //
T02D1659:271b-16: thub chen rnam par snang mdzad do //
T02D1659:271b-17: ye shes lnga yi bdag nyid ni //
T02D1659:271b-18: 'dod chags chen po bde ba che //
T02D1659:271b-20: phrin las ni rtog pa bdun pa las /
T02D1659:271b-22: 'dul mdzad rnam snang srid gnas bzhugs //
T02D1659:271b-23: zhe sdang ru tra sogs 'joms phyir //
T02D1659:271b-24: drag po he ru ka dang ldan //
T02D1659:271b-25: gti mug sgro skur mtha' bral mdzad //
T02D1659:271b-27: srid zhen las chags zhugs pa rnams //
T02D1659:271b-29: le lo nga rgyal phrag dog sogs //
T02D1659:271b-30: mthu yis gnon pa'i rta mchog dpal //
T02D1659:271b-31: nyon mongs spyi yi lam gnas pa //
T02D1659:271b-32: dbugs 'byin rdo rje sems dpa'i sku //
T02D1659:271b-33: zhes pa the tshom med do //
T02D1659:271b-34: sgrub pa'i thabs ni don de dag nyams su blangs pa ste //
T02D1659:271b-35: bsnyen sgrub yan lag bzhi'i sgo nas sbyor ba bzhi
T02D1659:271b-36: dang ldan pas rig ma la brten te nyams su
T02D1659:271b-37: blang ba'o // las dang po pa'i dbang du 'od kyi rig ma la brten te /
T02D1659:271b-39: de yi dam tshig de byung ba //
T02D1659:271b-40: sdug bsngal dam tshig bdag rjes 'brang //
T02D1659:271b-41: shin tu sbyor dang skyor chen po //
T02D1659:271b-42: thams cad bdag nyid dam tshig mchog / sbyor ba'i
T02D1659:271b-43: yan lag bzhi ni sbyor ba dang rjes su sbyor
T02D1659:271b-44: ba dang shin tu sbyor ba dang sbyor ba chen
T02D1659:271b-45: po'o // ye shes rnam pa lnga'i rang bzhin byang
T02D1659:272a-0: chub kyi sems rnam pa lnga mtshon par @272a *
T02D1659:272a-1: po'o // // byed pa ni mngon par byad chub pa lnga ste 'od kyi dam tshig go //
T02D1659:272a-2: de las byung ba ni rgyu'i rdo rje 'chang chen po dang /
T02D1659:272a-3: de dang rjes su mthun pa'i gtso bo drug go //
T02D1659:272a-4: de'i rjes su ye shes kyi yul rigs dang mthun
T02D1659:272a-5: pa'i yul 'od kyi snang ba la myu gu la
T02D1659:272a-6: grib ma 'khor ba'i tshul du bskyed /
T02D1659:272a-8: mtshan ma'i bye brag gis sku gsal bar grub nas /

T02D1659:272a-10: phyag rgya bzhi dang ldan pas rol par mdzad cing /
T02D1659:272a-11: byang chub kyi sems kyi 'od zer gyis dkyil 'khor
T02D1659:272a-12: mchod pa ni bdag rjes su 'brang ba ste rjes
T02D1659:272a-13: su sbyor ba'o // de la 'od zer gyis 'gro ba spyad ba dang /
T02D1659:272a-15: rten dang brten pa'i dkyil 'khor bskyed pa ni shin tu sbyor ba'o //
T02D1659:272a-16: dkyil 'khor rgyas pa rnams kyi skye mched drug dang
T02D1659:272a-17: gnas bzhi byin gyis brlab cing dbang bskur ba'i 'bras
T02D1659:272a-18: bu bsam pa ni sbyor ba chen po ste /

T02D1659:272a-20: 'khor gyi bdag nyid du bsgom zhing de la gnas
T02D1659:272a-22: de yang rtog pa bdun pa las /

T02D1659:272a-24: sbyor ba zhes ni bya bar bshad //
T02D1659:272a-25: yum ldan byin brlabs rol pas mchod //
T02D1659:272a-26: bzhugs pa rjes su sbyor ba'o //
T02D1659:272a-27: dga' mdzad dkyil 'khor rdzogs byas nas //
T02D1659:272a-29: phyin brlabs dbang bskur las rdzogs pa //
T02D1659:272a-30: sbyor ba chen po zhes bya'o //
T02D1659:272a-33: gcig bzhin du ni gcig spyod pa //
T02D1659:272a-34: lhan cig spyod pa'i rjes spyod sdug / sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba //
T02D1659:272a-36: 'di ltar tshogs kyi sgrub pa dang /
T02D1659:272a-40: mngon par shes pa bsgrub pa dang /
T02D1659:272a-42: phyag rgya chen po'i bsgrub pa dag la ni /
T02D1659:272a-46: dpa' bo gcig pas bsnyen sgrub bzhi'i sgo nas 'jug par bya'o //
T02D1659:272a-47: des ci zhig tu 'gyur zhe na /
T02D1659:272a-48: sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha'
T02D1659:272b-0: @272b 'gro ma'i mthu dang gzi brjid mchog tu 'bar
T02D1659:272b-1: bar 'gyur ro // de yang rtog pa bdun pa las /
T02D1659:272b-2: dang po'i las can rnal 'byor pas //
T02D1659:272b-3: bsod nams ye shes tshogs bsags te //
T02D1659:272b-4: 'od kyi rig ma la brten nas //
T02D1659:272b-5: sbyor ba bzhi dang ldan pas 'grub //
T02D1659:272b-6: bsnyen dang nye ba'i bsnyen pa dang //
T02D1659:272b-7: sgrub dang sgrub chen tshul bzhin bya //
T02D1659:272b-8: bsnyen pa las la 'jug pa ste //

T02D1659:272b-10: lhan cig spyong ba sgrub pa'i las //

T02D1659:272b-13: sgrub pa rnam bdun las la 'jug /
T02D1659:272b-14: tshogs sgrub phyag rgya'i sgrub pa dang //
T02D1659:272b-15: rdzas dang sman dang mngon shes dang //
T02D1659:272b-16: rig 'dzin sgrub pa phyag rgya che //
T02D1659:272b-17: dkyil 'khor bsdus pa'i lam dag gam //
T02D1659:272b-19: dpa' bo gcig las 'jug par bya //
T02D1659:272b-21: gang zag mchog tu gyur pas ni dbang po yul

T02D1659:272b-23: / thams cad dga' ba ma lus pa'i //
T02D1659:272b-24: phyag rgya thams cad bde ba che //
T02D1659:272b-25: rtag pa padma lha mo yi //

T02D1659:272b-44: mig la sangs rgyas rnam snang mdzad //

T02D1659:273a-10: brtan g-yo'i dngos po rnam par 'phrul //

T02D1659:273a-13: brtan g-yo'i dngos po rnam par 'phrul //
T02D1659:273a-14: kun khyab stong pa'i ye shes che //

T02D1659:273a-17: brtan g-yo'i dngos po rnam par 'phrul //

T02D1659:273a-40: phyag rgya rol ba'i tshul gyis ni //

T02D1659:273a-42: rdo rje sems dpa' che ba'i lha //
T02D1659:273a-43: bsnyen sgrub yan lag bzhi'i sgo nas phyag rgya dang rol pa'i tshul du spyod pa'o //

T02D1659:274a-34: bdag gzhan don du 'gyur ba'i las //

T02D1659:284a-37: rin chen bum pa bzang po mdzes /
T02D1659:284a-38: cha rigs nyi shu rtsa bdun ldan //
T02D1659:284a-39: dkyil 'khor re'u mig dgu pa yis //
T02D1659:284a-40: gnas dgur mchod pa'i rgyan bcas dgram //
T02D1659:284a-41: bsnyen sgrub bzhi yi rim pa yis //
T02D1659:284a-42: rang rig lha yi gsang sngags la //
T02D1659:284a-43: sbyor ba spel te brjod byas na //
T02D1659:284a-45: na ma: aartha siddhi gha ga na lo tsa na
T02D1659:284a-46: ma ma siddha ku ru ku ra h'um h'um phat
T02D1659:284a-47: sv'a h'a // bdun phrag nyi shu rtsa dgu yis //
T02D1659:284b-0: las la sbyor zhing dngos grub @284b blang ;
T02D1659:284b-1: ; bum pa bzang sogs las rnams kun //
T02D1659:284b-4: de ltar na las chen po dag kyang 'grub na gzhan ni lta ci smos te /
T02D1659:284b-5: tshangs pa 'jug sel dbang chen gyi //
T02D1659:284b-6: mchog gi dbang phyug dam pa dag / kun nas phyogs te myur sbyin na //
T02D1659:284b-7: longs spyod gzhan lta smos ci dgos //
T02D1659:284b-8: khams gsum kun gyi bdag po tshangs pa chen po dang /
T02D1659:284b-9: lha rnams kyi slob dpon 'jug sel dang /
T02D1659:284b-10: 'dod khams kyi bdag po dbang phyug chen po dang /
T02D1659:284b-11: sa steng gi bdag po sbyin bdag gi mchog ste dbang po dang /
T02D1659:284b-12: gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi bdag po dga' rab dbang phyug dam pa'o //
T02D1659:284b-13: 'dod par bya ba'i 'bras bu ni mchog gi las la spyod pa ste /
T02D1659:284b-14: de yis mi sbyin ci yang med //
T02D1659:284b-15: sangs rgyas don du bya ba kun //
T02D1659:284b-16: mi bya ba ni gang yang med //
T02D1659:284b-17: sbyin pa dang ni byed pa'ang yin //
T02D1659:284b-18: de kho na nyid kyi don la gnas shing bsnyen
T02D1659:284b-19: sgrub kyi yan lag ldan pa'i spyod pa 'dis ni
T02D1659:284b-20: rnam par grol ba'i 'bras bu skyed cing thams cad
T02D1659:284b-21: 'grub po // mchog gi dngos grub kyi don du
T02D1659:284b-22: thams cad la longs spyod de gzhan la yang sbyin
T02D1659:284b-24: ji ltar de dag 'grub bam zhe na /
T02D1659:284b-25: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yang //
T02D1659:284b-26: phyogs nas kyang ni sbyin byed na //
T02D1659:284b-27: las mchog dag ni rab 'byam dang //
T02D1659:284b-28: dngos grub gzhan lta ci zhig smos /
T02D1659:284b-29: 'jig rten pa'i lha klu mthu bo che dang /
T02D1659:284b-30: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i 'phags pa nyan thos dang /
T02D1659:284b-32: byang chub sems dpa' dag gis kyang 'grub par mi
T02D1659:284b-33: nus pa'i sangs rgyas kyi che ba'i yon tan las
T02D1659:284b-34: byung ba dag rnal 'byor pas 'grub par byed de
T02D1659:284b-35: / ci de kho na nyid kyi rang bzhin shes pa las byung ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1659:284b-36: de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las /
T02D1659:284b-37: zag med ye shes las byung ba'i //
T02D1659:284b-38: bde ba chen po'i gnas sbyor ba //
T02D1659:284b-39: de yis mi 'grub gang yang med //
T02D1659:284b-40: sangs rgyas byang chub dka' ba min //
T02D1659:284b-41: rang nyid byang chub sems sbyor bas //
T02D1659:284b-42: rang gi rang bzhin 'grub phyir ro //
T02D1659:284b-45: lta dman so so'i rgyud 'grub min //
T02D1659:284b-47: de dag spyod pa'i phan yon bdag gi don du //
T02D1659:284b-48: dngos grub mchog ni gdon mi za //
T02D1659:285a-2: gang zhig 'dod pas bya ba'i 'bras bu las mchog
T02D1659:285a-3: tu gyur pa de ni bde ba chen po'i sku
T02D1659:285a-5: ji ltar na lam dang 'bras bu thams cad kyi mthar phyin pa ste /
T02D1659:285a-6: nyid kyi che ba'i yon tan zag pa med pa'i
T02D1659:285a-7: ye shes la snang bas mi mthun pa'i bdud rnams
T02D1659:285a-8: sde dang bcas pa 'dul bar mdzad pas so //
T02D1659:285a-9: de yang gzhan gyi don du ni /
T02D1659:285a-10: sangs rgyas kun gyi grub chen po //
T02D1659:285a-12: de nyid rtsa ba'i rgyud las /
T02D1659:285a-13: dpal ldan dngos grub mthar phyin rgyal //
T02D1659:285a-14: sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul rgyas pa'i tshogs //
T02D1659:285a-15: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor mdzad cing //
T02D1659:285a-16: bya ba thams cad ma lus grub //
T02D1659:285a-19: sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba //
T02D1659:285a-20: mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog gis //
T02D1659:285a-21: sangs rgyas kun gyi rdzu 'phrul che //
T02D1659:285a-22: rnam par 'phrul pa rab tu 'jug / le'u gnyis
T02D1659:285a-23: pa'i lta ba'i don bzhin du shes shing rtogs par
T02D1659:285a-24: byas nas lnga ba'i sgo nas yid ches par 'jug
T02D1659:285a-26: gsum pas phyag rgya chen po'i lam sgrub cing /
T02D1659:285a-27: bzhi pas don bzhin du spyod na /
T02D1659:285a-28: sku drug lhan grub kyi snang ba las byung ba'i sangs rgyas kun gyi rdzu 'phrul chen po ni /
T02D1659:285a-29: rigs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po drug la sogs par 'phrul cing /
T02D1659:285a-30: de la dbugs dbyung ba grangs med pa'i snang ba'i sngo nas sems can gyi don mdzad pa'o //
T02D1659:285a-31: gzhan yang mdzad pa sna tshogs kyis sems can gyi don spyod pa la /
T02D1659:285a-32: mtshan nyid kyi theg pa la slob pas 'dul ba'i lam pa dag gi phyir /
T02D1659:285a-33: la lar byang chub sems chen pos //
T02D1659:285a-34: la lar spyod dang mthun par 'gro //
T02D1659:285a-35: zhes pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gsum gsungs te /
T02D1659:285a-36: gang zhig dus la lar thugs rje chen pos gzhi bzung ste /
T02D1659:285a-37: byang chub mchog tu thugs rin po che rnam pa gnyis bskyed cing sbyangs pa dang /
T02D1659:285a-38: dus la lar bzod nams kyi tshogs mang pos gzhi bzung ste /
T02D1659:285a-39: lam rnam pa lnga sbyang ba'i phyir pha rol tu
T02D1659:285a-40: phyin pa'i tshogs dang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos
T02D1659:285a-41: sum cu rtsa bdun la spyod pa dang /
T02D1659:285a-42: dus la lar dga' ldan gyi gnas su byang chub
T02D1659:285a-43: sems dpa' dam pa tog dkar por gyur nas lha
T02D1659:285a-44: rnams las mngon par mtho ba'i gnas su bzhugs te
T02D1659:285a-45: / 'od zer spros shing ting nge 'dzin gyi snang
T02D1659:285b-0: @285b pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la sogs pa
T02D1659:285b-2: dus la lar sngon gyi smon lam dang /
T02D1659:285b-3: 'phrul gyi thugs rje chen po mtshungs pa'i dbang gis
T02D1659:285b-4: phyogs bcu nas bskul ba'i sgra gsan nas nyid kyi
T02D1659:285b-5: sku glang po che'i gzugs kyis btsun mo sgyu 'phrul
T02D1659:285b-6: chen po'i lhums su zhugs nas 'khor rnams la chos

T02D1659:285b-15: dus la lar byang chub kyi shing drung du rtse

T02D1659:285b-25: / dang / mdzad pa dang / / dus la

T02D1659:285b-27: gyis gdul bya le lo can gzung ba dang /

T02D1659:285b-29: gzhan yang sprul pa'i dbang du byas na cig car
T02D1659:285b-30: stong gsum gyi 'jig rten rnams la thugs rje chen
T02D1659:285b-31: po'i mdzad pas don spyod do //

T02D1659:285b-33: yul la lar mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshul gyis don mdzad pa'o //
T02D1659:285b-34: de dag gi don ni rgya che ba'i sde snod dag las rgyas par gsungs so //
T02D1659:285b-35: gang zag dbang po khyad par du gyur pa dag la gsang sngags kyi theg pas don spyod do //

T02D1659:286a-6: la lar dkyil 'khor grangs med tshogs //
T02D1659:286a-7: la lar dpa' bo gcig par snang //
T02D1659:286a-8: la lar snod bcud bkod mdzad cing //
T02D1659:286a-9: la lar snod bcud stongs par byed //
T02D1659:286a-10: la lar zhi khri'i gzugs spro zhing //
T02D1659:286a-11: la lar dkyil 'khor sdud par mdzad //

T02D1659:286a-13: tshogs kyi sgo nas don bzhin du dbugs 'byin par

T02D1659:286a-15: la lar rtog pa thams cad mchog / grub pa'i dbang phyug bla na med //
T02D1659:286a-16: phung po dang khams dang skye mchod kyi bye brag ji lta ba bzhin du /
T02D1659:286a-17: drang ba dang nges pa'i don gnyis las brtsams te
T02D1659:286a-18: theg pa rim pa mang du spros shing gsungs so

T02D1659:286a-20: lta dman byis pa 'dren don du //
T02D1659:286a-21: rtog pa dman pa'i lam bstan te //
T02D1659:286a-22: gnas ngan dka' spyad zhan pa'i shugs //
T02D1659:286a-23: 'khor ba'i ngan song gnas mi mthong //
T02D1659:286a-24: rtog pa'i sgrib tshogs gnas mtha' yis //
T02D1659:286a-25: rnam grol ye shes mthong mi 'gyur //
T02D1659:286a-26: cung zhig rnam grol las gzung ba'o //
T02D1659:286a-27: shes rab snying rje gnas mos pa'o //
T02D1659:286a-28: grol mdzad theg pa mtha' yas sgo //
T02D1659:286a-29: rnam thar sa la rab sbyor mdzad //
T02D1659:286a-30: bya dang spyod pa la mos pa //
T02D1659:286a-31: gsang sngags don spyod theg chen mchog / rang gi ye shes gnas 'jug cing //
T02D1659:286a-32: sngags spyod rgya chen lhar sbyor ba //
T02D1659:286a-33: 'jig rgyan bya ba rab sgrub ste //
T02D1659:286a-34: gdags pa'i 'bras can gyis mthar phyin //
T02D1659:286a-35: rab sbyangs shes rab blo mchog la /
T02D1659:286a-36: gsang ba zab mo'i tshul bstan te //
T02D1659:286a-37: rang gi bde chen dbang phyug mchog / sna tshogs bkod pa grol bar snang //
T02D1659:286a-39: yang mdzad pa rgya chen po'i sgo nas //
T02D1659:286a-40: de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog / sangs rgyas kun bdag bde mchog gis //
T02D1659:286a-41: 'dul ba'i thabs su nges pa'i gar //
T02D1659:286a-42: rnam par 'phrul pas dgyes shing rol //
T02D1659:286a-43: mngon du nyams su myong bas grub pa'i yon tan
T02D1659:286a-44: gyi mdzad pa mtha' yas pa'i sgo nas gzhan du

T02D1659:286b-1: ba'i thabs sna tshogs rnam par grol bas nges pa'i
T02D1659:286b-2: don bstan cing spyod par mdzad do //

T02D1659:286b-4: sku dang gsung thugs yon tan dang /
T02D1659:286b-5: sna tshogs las byung phrin las kyis //
T02D1659:286b-6: 'dul ba'i thabs su nges pa'i gar //
T02D1659:286b-7: thams cad don la rnam par grol //
T02D1659:286b-9: gang spyod pa'i sgo nas 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid la bdag don lhun gyis grub pa'i tshul ni //
T02D1659:286b-10: dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog / brtan pa
T02D1659:286b-11: dbang phyug chen po'i bdag / gzugs dang tshe dang
T02D1659:286b-12: kha dog stobs // dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' bzhin //
T02D1659:286b-13: lam la rnam par spyod pa'i mthus //
T02D1659:286b-14: dngos grub chen po'i mchog 'grub ste /
T02D1659:286b-15: rtag tu rang gi rgyud la gnas pa'i dbang phyug brgyad dang /
T02D1659:286b-18: 'gro ba dag gis bsnyen bya zhing //
T02D1659:286b-19: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis mchod //
T02D1659:286b-20: lha mo kun gyi dpal ldan mchog / rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu 'grub //
T02D1659:286b-21: dpal sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor pa'i dngos grub thob pa 'di la /
T02D1659:286b-22: khams gsum gyi skye 'gro kun dga' ba'i sgo nas bsnyen bkur byed de //
T02D1659:286b-23: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis ni mchod par mdzad cing lha mo kun gyi gtso bor 'gyur te /
T02D1659:286b-24: rdo rje sems dpa' bzhin no //
T02D1659:286b-25: gzhan yang 'bras bu yon tan dang bcas pa'i bsgo nas gzhan don mthar phyin pa'i tshul ni //
T02D1659:286b-26: sems can khams ni du ma dag / ma lus par ni phyag rgyas 'debs //
T02D1659:286b-27: lha dang byang chub dka' ba rnams //
T02D1659:286b-28: brtan par sems can dag la sbyin //
T02D1659:286b-29: rnam par shes pa dang ldan pa'i phung po'i tshogs dang ldan zhing //
T02D1659:286b-30: byed pa med la rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i chos can dag ni sems can gyi khams so //
T02D1659:286b-31: de dag ma lus pa rnams la sku gsung thugs
T02D1659:286b-32: kyi phyag rgyas 'debs shing lha'i dngos gru ba dang
T02D1659:286b-33: / bla na med pa'i byang chub dag brtan par sems can la sbyin par mdzad do //

T02D1659:287b-5: rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs //
