T02D1659:287b-7: mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog //
T02D1659:287b-8: nye bar mngon sum par snang ba'i dbang po drug
T02D1659:287b-9: gi spod yul 'di dag rang byung gi ye shes
T02D1659:287b-10: chen po'i snang ba yin te /
T02D1659:287b-11: de nyid la rang gi ye shes chen pos rnam
T02D1659:287b-12: par sbyor bas rtogs pa mngon du gyur na che
T02D1659:287b-13: ba'i yon tan thams cad la mnga' brnyes nas /
T02D1659:287b-14: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i skur snang zhing
T02D1659:287b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin no
T02D1659:287b-16: // de nyid kyi tshul ci zhig ce na /
T02D1659:287b-17: gang zhig sangs rgyas gnyis kyi rnam pa'i sgo nas
T02D1659:287b-18: thams cad la mnyam par sbyor zhing mkha' 'gro sgyu
T02D1659:287b-19: ma bde ba'i mchog gi dang tshul can no //
T02D1659:287b-20: sa ma yo ga'i sgras thams cad mtshon pa'i dbyings can te /
T02D1659:287b-21: sen dha ba'i sgra bzhin no //
T02D1659:287b-22: mkha' 'gro'i rnam pa'i gnas skabs lngar 'jug par byed de /
T02D1659:287b-23: ye shes shugs kyis mkha' la 'gro ba dang /
T02D1659:287b-24: rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis mkha' la 'gro ba dang /
T02D1659:287b-25: grub pas mkha' la 'gro ba dang /
T02D1659:287b-26: rang bzhin gyis mkha' la 'gro ba dang /
T02D1659:287b-27: las kyis mkha' la 'gro ba ste /
T02D1659:287b-28: de dag thams cad kyang bde ba mchog gi rang bzhin no //
T02D1659:287b-29: de las sku rnam pa drug gi tshul du snang ste /
T02D1659:287b-30: yang dag grub pa gcig pu nyid //
T02D1659:287b-31: ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du sbyar //
T02D1659:287b-32: chos thams cad dbyings skye ba med pa rang gi
T02D1659:287b-33: mtshan nyid yang dag pa'i tshul rnam par gnas pa
T02D1659:287b-34: de nyid ji bzhin pa'i ngo bo shes par bya
T02D1659:287b-35: ste / shes rab rnam pa gsum gyi sgo nas
T02D1659:287b-36: rtogs shing grub pa la gnyis su med pa'i don
T02D1659:287b-37: gyis gcig pu nyid du gnas pa'o //
T02D1659:287b-38: de nyid las rang nyid kyi che ba'i yon tan mi zad pa'i snang ba dang /
T02D1659:287b-39: gzhan gyi rgyud la snang ba'i don grub pa'i tshul du //
T02D1659:287b-40: mi ltar 'dod pa bzhin du sku rnam pa gnyis
T02D1659:287b-41: kyi snang ba sna tshogs kyis rnam par sbyar ro
T02D1659:287b-42: // de nas sku sgrug lhun gyis grub pa'i mtshan
T02D1659:287b-43: nyid de bsdus pa'i don gyis gnyis su med pa'i
T02D1659:287b-44: // sku dang / rnam par 'phul ba'i sku dang /
T02D1659:288a-1: chen po'i sku dang gsum du'ang sbyar te /
T02D1659:288a-2: de dag sku gsum spyi'i mtshan nyid bstan pa zhes kyang bya'o //
T02D1659:288a-3: de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las /
T02D1659:288a-4: sku dang ye shes gnas sbyor ba'i //
T02D1659:288a-6: de nyid rdo rje sems dpa' ste //
T02D1659:288a-7: sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid yin //
T02D1659:288a-9: rtog pa bdun pa las kyang //
T02D1659:288a-10: yang dag grub pa gcig pu nyid /
T02D1659:288a-11: sangs rgyas bde chen kun 'dus pa //
T02D1659:288a-12: rnal 'byor zab mo sku gsum rdzogs //
T02D1659:288a-13: mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog bde //
T02D1659:288a-15: da ni ston pa'i mdzad pa las dgongs pa'i don bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1659:288a-16: rtog pa'i cho ga thams cad la //
T02D1659:288a-17: grub pa'i dam pa mchog gi mchog / gzhi las 'khrul ba'i 'gro ba dang //
T02D1659:288a-18: lam las 'khrul pa'i mu stegs pa la sogs pa'i rtog pa'i lta ba'i ri bo lnga dang /
T02D1659:288a-21: ri bo drug cu rtsa gnyis dang /
T02D1659:288a-25: ri bo gnyis kyi mtshan ma de dag gnyen po'i rtog pas bcom zhing //
T02D1659:288a-26: de la brten te 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub dang /
T02D1659:288a-27: thun mong gi dngos grub kyi sgo nas mchog gi dngos grub kyi lam la sbyor ba'i phyir //
T02D1659:288a-28: grub pa dam pa mchog gam /
T02D1659:288a-29: mchog gi mchog bstan par mdzad do //
T02D1659:288a-30: de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las /
T02D1659:288a-31: rtog pa de nyid gzhom pa'i phyir //
T02D1659:288a-32: sna tshogs dkyil 'khor lha rnams dang /
T02D1659:288a-33: sna tshogs rgyud don gsungs mdzad cing //
T02D1659:288a-34: mchog gi dngos grub mchog la sbyor //
T02D1659:288a-36: de yang thugs rje skye ba'i yul dang mthun par sprul ba'i tshul ni /
T02D1659:288a-37: sna tshogs las kyi sbyor ba yis //
T02D1659:288a-38: cho ga sna tshogs 'dod pa yis //
T02D1659:288a-39: sems can rnams ni 'dul ba dang /
T02D1659:288a-40: bde ba thams cad bsgrub pa'i phyir //
T02D1659:288a-41: de dag gdul bya sems can gyi //
T02D1659:288a-42: rnam par rtog pa mtha' yas te //
T02D1659:288a-43: gcig dang gnyis dang gsum dang bzhi dang lnga dang drug nas bzung ste /
T02D1659:288a-44: grangs med pa'i bar du gnas pas //
T02D1659:288a-45: de dag 'dul zhing bde ba la dgod pa'i phyir //
T02D1659:288a-46: sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las sna tshogs kyi
T02D1659:288a-47: sgo nas las kyi sbyor ba so sor bstan cing
T02D1659:288a-48: // dge slong grol ba'i rgyal mtshan la sogs pa'i
T02D1659:288b-0: nyon mongs pa'i spyi'i lam la gnas pa dag @288b
T02D1659:288b-2: de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las /
T02D1659:288b-3: nyon mongs rnam par rtog pa'i tshogs //
T02D1659:288b-4: gcig nas bzung ste grangs med par //
T02D1659:288b-5: spyi yi lam pa gdul don tu //
T02D1659:288b-6: rigs bdag sku la sna tshogs ston //
T02D1659:288b-7: cho ga sna tshogs bye brag gis //
T02D1659:288b-8: bde chen rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gnas //
T02D1659:288b-10: ;'o na thugs rje chen po'i mtshan nyid dang po ji ltar zhe na /
T02D1659:288b-11: bcom ldan rnal 'byor de nyid ni //
T02D1659:288b-12: sangs rgyas thams cad rnam 'phrul bas //
T02D1659:288b-13: sems can kun don rnam sprul na //
T02D1659:288b-15: de yang sku'i sgo nas 'phrul pa dang /
T02D1659:288b-16: ye shes kyi sgo nas 'phul pa dang ;
T02D1659:288b-17: rigs kyis sgo nas 'phrul pa dang /
T02D1659:288b-18: gdul bya'i sgo nas 'phrul pa dang /
T02D1659:288b-19: de dag thams cad mthun pa'i sgo nas 'phrul pa dang /
T02D1659:288b-20: mi mthun pa'i sgo nas 'phrul ba'o //
T02D1659:288b-21: de yang rtsa ba'i rgud las //
T02D1659:288b-22: bcom ldan rnal 'byor te nyid las //
T02D1659:288b-23: sangs rgyas thams cad rnam 'phrul mdzad//
T02D1659:288b-24: sku dang ye shes rigs dang ni //
T02D1659:288b-25: phrin las mthun dang mi mthun tshogs //
T02D1659:288b-26: dkyil 'khor gcig la'ang sna tshogs skur //
T02D1659:288b-27: rnam 'phrul rang gi bya ba yis //
T02D1659:288b-28: sems can kun don rnam 'phrul zhing //
T02D1659:288b-29: zag med ye shes de bzhin nyid //
T02D1659:288b-31: de dag gis ni sngon 'byung gi dus su dkyil
T02D1659:288b-32: 'khor rnam par 'phrul zhing don mdzad pa'i mtshan nyid
T02D1659:288b-33: bstan pa'o // da ni rjes 'jug gi dbang du
T02D1659:288b-34: byas te le'u gnyis pa nas 'byung ba bzhin du
T02D1659:288b-35: shes pas de nyid kyi don la 'jug cing sgrub
T02D1659:288b-36: bstan pa'o // pa'i phyir // ting nge 'dzin bsgom
T02D1659:288b-37: pa'i rim pas tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor la spyod par
T02D1659:288b-38: bstan pa'o // pa'i phyir // bya ste / dang por rab 'bring gi dus su ni //
T02D1659:288b-39: nyin re'am yang na zla re'am //
T02D1659:288b-40: yang na de bzhin lo rer ni //
T02D1659:288b-41: ji bzhin byin gyis brlabs nas kyang //
T02D1659:288b-42: sangs rgyas bde mchog gar bya'o //
T02D1659:288b-43: dang por rdo rje sems dpa'i gsang ba'i don rnam par bkod pa las gsungs pa bzhin du /
T02D1659:288b-44: 'gro ba thams cad la snying rje chen po'i blos dmigs te /
T02D1659:288b-45: bdag dang gzhan sgrol bar dam bcas nas lus ngag yid gsum sbyor zhing nus mthu bskyed do //
T02D1659:288b-46: sgo gsum byin gyis brlab cing gsal bar byas nas 'phags pa la tshogs bsags pa dang /
T02D1659:289a-0: sems can la tshogs bsags pa @289a * //
T02D1659:289a-2: srung ba'i 'khor lo dang gzhi'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
T02D1659:289a-5: dmigs pa gsum gyi ting nge 'dzin rjes su 'gro
T02D1659:289a-6: ba'i rnam 'byor la sogs pas dus rab 'brid tha
T02D1659:289a-7: ma gsum gyis go nas phyag rgya'i rig ma byin
T02D1659:289a-9: gnyis su med pa'i bde bas 'phags pa mchod cing
T02D1659:289a-10: sems can gyi don byas nas bde ba'i ye shes
T02D1659:289a-11: gzung bar bya'o // de yang rtog pa bdun pa las //
T02D1659:289a-12: g-yon phyogs gnas las tshul bzhin du //
T02D1659:289a-13: ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du sbyar //
T02D1659:289a-14: gar mkhan tshul 'dra sgyu ma'i rgya //
T02D1659:289a-15: de yang 'ja' tshon bzhin du gsal //
T02D1659:289a-16: 'dod chags ye shes gsal ba'i phyir //
T02D1659:289a-18: thim pas rgyal mor byin brlabs nas //
T02D1659:289a-19: ye shes dam tshig chen po yis //
T02D1659:289a-20: bde mchog sgyu ma'i brdas mtshon te /
T02D1659:289a-21: padmo rin chen ldan byas nas //
T02D1659:289a-22: dbyings kyi bde chen byung ba na //
T02D1659:289a-23: rang rig ye shes de la 'od //
T02D1659:289a-24: ji bzhin mkha' la gsal ba dag / dri med nyi ma'i 'od pas 'tsher //
T02D1659:289a-25: byang chub sems de kun du dag / khams gsum rab tu 'das nas kyang //
T02D1659:289a-26: ma lus nye bar khyab byas nas //
T02D1659:289a-27: 'dod par bya ba rab tu mnyes//
T02D1659:289a-29: de dag dngos grub chen po bas //
T02D1659:289a-30: ji ltar 'dod pa'i nan tan bya //
T02D1659:289a-32: de la tshogs bsags pa'i rten ni //
T02D1659:289a-33: khams kyi rang bzhin thams cad dang //
T02D1659:289a-34: de bzhin srog dang rtsa las byung //
T02D1659:289a-35: rang gi lha yi cha lugs su //
T02D1659:289a-36: sgrub pa'i phyag rgya rab tu bya ;
T02D1659:289a-37: ; dang po rgya chen po las khyad par gyi
T02D1659:289a-38: sgo nas ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor la 'jug
T02D1659:289a-39: pa po dag gis dmigs pa'i don gsal zing grub
T02D1659:289a-41: gser dngul zangs lcags la sogs pa rin po cha'i khams las byas pa'am //
T02D1659:289a-42: srog chags ki rgyu las byung ba rva dang ba so dang rus pa las byas pa'am /
T02D1659:289a-43: rtsi shing gi rgyu las byung ba'am //
T02D1659:289a-44: rang gi lha'i cha lugs dang mthun pa'i sku dang /
T02D1659:289a-45: phyag mtshan dang dbu rgyan la sogs pa'i sgrub pa'i phyag rgya rab tu bya zhes pa'o //
T02D1659:289a-46: yang zab mo'i dbang du byas te /
T02D1659:289b-0: thams cad dang shes rab gnyis su med pa rnam pa gsum gyi @289b sgo nas //
T02D1659:289b-1: rlung rnam pa gsum dang 'khor lo bzhi dang dbang
T02D1659:289b-2: po drug gi snang ba dag ni khams kyi ngo
T02D1659:289b-3: bo yin la / de la yi ge rnam pa gsum gyi 'phro 'du dang /
T02D1659:289b-5: dbang po yul gyi 'phro 'du dag ni srog rta las byung ba'o //
T02D1659:289b-6: de ltar thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i
T02D1659:289b-7: rang gi lha'i cha lugs su bsgrub pa'i phyag rgya
T02D1659:289b-8: rab tu gnas par bya'o zhes so //
T02D1659:289b-9: de nyid la 'jug pa'i tshul gyis //
T02D1659:289b-10: dkyil 'khor gang dang gang bsten pa //
T02D1659:289b-11: sna tshogs phyag rgya'i mchod pa yis //
T02D1659:289b-12: slob ma'i tshogs kun de dang der //
T02D1659:289b-13: mchod pa byas nas de sgrub po ;
T02D1659:289b-14: / rigs drug gi dkyil 'khor gang yang rung bar
T02D1659:289b-15: dbang dang dam tshig thob pa'i lha de nyid lhag
T02D1659:289b-16: pa'i lha ste / de'i dkyil 'khor la ting nge 'dzin gyis gsal bar gnas shing /
T02D1659:289b-17: sna tshogs kyi phyag rgya las 'phrul ba'i mchod pa'i tshogs rnams kyis dkyil 'khor mchod de bsgrub par bya'o//
T02D1659:289b-18: de dag gis ni ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor
T02D1659:289b-19: gsal ba'i sgo nas tshogs bsags shing bsgrub par bya

T02D1659:289b-22: rang gi ting 'dzin gsal ba yis //
T02D1659:289b-23: bsod nams ye shes tshogs bsags te /
T02D1659:289b-24: de nyid sgrub pa'i las kyis ni //
T02D1659:289b-25: bde chen mtshan ma med pa'i sku /
T02D1659:289b-27: de ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor de
T02D1659:289b-28: nyid las rang gi dkyil 'khor dang mthun par rgya
T02D1659:289b-29: chen por sprul ba'i tshul bstan te //
T02D1659:289b-30: de las gzhan yang rtog kun gyis //
T02D1659:289b-31: sangs rgyas thams cad rnam 'phrul ba //
T02D1659:289b-32: ci rigs pa ni sprul byas pa'i //
T02D1659:289b-33: gtam dag rab tu bshad par bya /
T02D1659:289b-34: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo thams chad dang /
T02D1659:289b-35: rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud thams cad dang 'di las rnam par spros te /
T02D1659:289b-36: thams cad kyi spyi'i bdag nyid du gnas pa dang /
T02D1659:289b-37: yang khyad par du rigs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po drug gi bdag nyid du gnas pa dang /
T02D1659:289b-38: de las kyang khyad par du rang nyid kyi rigs bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor gcig dang /
T02D1659:289b-40: rnam par 'gyur ba'i dkyil 'khor bcu dang /
T02D1659:289b-41: rim pa bzhin du bstan pa'i dkyil 'khor nyi shu dang /
T02D1659:290a-1: 'khor sum cu rtsa drug gi byung tshul bsgrub par
T02D1659:290a-2: bya ba'i rim pa dang bcas par rtsa ba'i rgyud
T02D1659:290a-4: 'dir ni bsdus pa tsam zhig gis lo rgyus bshad par bya'o /
T02D1659:290a-5: de ltar dkyil 'khor sna tshogs su snang ba yang
T02D1659:290a-6: sangs rgyas drug gi rnam par 'phrul ba yin la
T02D1659:290a-7: / de nyid ni rdo rje sems dpa'i snag ba ste //
T02D1659:290a-8: de nyid ni sangs rgyas drug gi dbugs dbyung gi mtshan nyid do //
T02D1659:290a-10: sems dpa' sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos //
T02D1659:290a-11: rdo rje sems pa'i bde ba'i mchog //
T02D1659:290a-12: gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na /
T02D1659:290a-13: thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs //
T02D1659:290a-14: 'dod chags chen po'i sgo nas nyon mongs pa spyi'i lam la gnas pa dag //
T02D1659:290a-15: rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid kyis 'dul bar mdzad pa'i mtshan nyid ni /
T02D1659:290a-16: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ste sangs rgyas drug gi rnam par can ni //
T02D1659:290a-17: de dag gi rang bzhin ni //
T02D1659:290a-19: rtag pa dam pa brten pa ste //
T02D1659:290a-20: rtag tu da ltar byung ba bzhin //
T02D1659:290a-21: ngo bo nyid ni 'da' bar dka' //
T02D1659:290a-22: sku drug lhun grub kyi sangs rgyas 'di nyid ni
T02D1659:290a-23: rnal 'byor chen po'i mtshan nyid can te bcom ldan

T02D1659:290a-25: bzhin gyis gnas shing 'gro ba'i don du bzhugs te
T02D1659:290a-26: bde ba chen po'i sku ni rang bzhin gyis ma
T02D1659:290a-27: 'gags par bde ba chen po rtag pa chen po'i
T02D1659:290a-28: dbyings su gnas pa dang gnyis su med pa'i sku
T02D1659:290a-29: ni gnyis med mnyam pa'i rnam par rtag par gnas
T02D1659:290a-30: 'das so // pa dang / ngo bo nyid kyi
T02D1659:290a-31: sku ni thams cad la khyab pa'i tshul gyis rtag
T02D1659:290a-33: ye shes kyi sku ni gsal ba rtse gcig pa dang bcas pas rtag par gnas pa dang /
T02D1659:290a-34: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ni yon tan thams cad
T02D1659:290a-35: kyis brgyan pa'i rten gyi sgo nas rtag par gnas
T02D1659:290a-36: pa dang / sprul ba'i sku ni rgyun mi 'chad par 'byung ba'i sgo nas rtag par gnas pa'o //
T02D1659:290a-37: des na rtag pa dam pa brtan pa'o //
T02D1659:290a-38: de ltar sku drug gi rnam pa'i tshul gyis gnas pas na dam pa brtan pa'o //
T02D1659:290a-39: de nyid mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa
T02D1659:290a-40: la bzhugs pas na rtag tu da ltar byung ba
T02D1659:290a-41: bzhin du mi 'gyur b'a ngo bo nyid du gnas
T02D1659:290a-43: de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las /
T02D1659:290b-0: sku drug lhun @290b grub rtag pa yis //
T02D1659:290b-1: rang bzhin do bo la gnas te //
T02D1659:290b-2: dus gsum 'gyur ba med par bzhugs //

T02D1659:290b-5: cho ga sna tshogs 'dod rnams la /
T02D1659:290b-6: las kyi sbyor ba sna tshogs kyis //
T02D1659:290b-7: sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin la sogs //
T02D1659:290b-8: 'dul ba'i phyir ni byas pa yin //
T02D1659:290b-9: gang zag bsdus pa la dga' ba dang /
T02D1659:290b-10: shin tu yang rgyas pa la dga' ba rnams la
T02D1659:290b-11: phan par bya ba'i phyir cho ga sna tshogs kyi
T02D1659:290b-12: sgo nas lha bsgom pa'i rim pa mi 'dra ba
T02D1659:290b-13: dang / sngags dang phyag rgya mi 'dra ba dang sgrub pa'i rim pa dang /
T02D1659:290b-14: phrin las kyi rim pa mi 'dra ba'i las kyi sbyor ba sna tshogs bsten te //
T02D1659:290b-15: de dag ni sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pa la
T02D1659:290b-16: sogs pa'i skul kun rdzob tu 'gro ba 'dul ba'i
T02D1659:290b-18: de yang rtog pa bdun pa las //
T02D1659:290b-19: ji lta ji ltar 'dul gyur pa /
T02D1659:290b-20: de lta de ltar 'gro ba la /
T02D1659:290b-21: 'dul ba'i thabs ni sna tshogs kyis//

T02D1659:290b-24: da ni phan yon bstan pa'i phyir //
T02D1659:290b-25: sangs rgyas la sogs brtan g-yo kun //
T02D1659:290b-27: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1659:290b-28: phi nang snod bcud kyi dngos po di dag rten dang brten pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin de ;
T02D1659:290b-29: rdo rje 'chang chen po'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1659:290b-30: gzhan dag ni go sla ba'i phyir ma bshad do //
T02D1659:290b-31: dpal rdo rje sems dpas dbugs dbyung ba'i rnam par bshad pa'o //
T02D1659:290b-32: da ni chags pa'i mtha' dang bral ba ni zhi
T02D1659:290b-33: ba phogs gcig pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam
T02D1659:290b-35: blo chung zhing shes rab zhan pa'i skye 'gro mtha'
T02D1659:290b-36: dag dang bskal pa gzung dka' ba'i dus su sangs
T02D1659:290b-37: rgyas stobs mchog seng ge'i bstan pa la //
T02D1659:290b-38: dge slong bzod pa can zhes bya ba byung ste /
T02D1659:290b-39: des yang dag pa'i don phyin ci log tu spyod
T02D1659:290b-40: pa'i dbang gis drag po mun pa'i tshogs zhes bya
T02D1659:290b-41: ba chung ma nyi shu'i tshogs dang bcas pa byung
T02D1659:290b-42: ngo // de dag gdul ba'i don du dpal rdo
T02D1659:290b-43: rje sems dpa' nyid las sangs rgyas rnam par snag
T02D1659:290b-44: mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo snang zhing dbugs
T02D1659:290b-46: de'i ltar byung ba'i dus ni //
T02D1659:290b-47: 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba //
T02D1659:291a-0: bdag nyid chen po rtag pa @291a * //
T02D1659:291a-2: ; gdul bya dang 'dul byed gnyis ka'i don du gsungs te /
T02D1659:291a-3: 'das pa'i dus ni bskal pa gzung dka'i dus su sangs rgyas stobs mchog seng ge'i bstan pa la /
T02D1659:291a-4: drag po'i mun pa'i tshogs can byung ba'i gnyen por
T02D1659:291a-5: sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor sngon
T02D1659:291a-7: rgyu gang las byung zhe na /
T02D1659:291a-8: bdag nyid chen por rtag pa'i lta ba 'dzin pas
T02D1659:291a-9: 'khor ba dag la sku gsung thugs rtag pa'i sgo
T02D1659:291a-11: de las spyi'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1659:291a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la //
T02D1659:291a-13: 'gro ba'i tshul du sngon byung ba //
T02D1659:291a-14: rkyen gang gis byung zhe na /
T02D1659:291a-15: don log par spyod pa dang /
T02D1659:291a-16: log par rtogs pa rnam pa gnyis kyi sgo nas so //
T02D1659:291a-17: tshul ni nyon mongs pa spyi dang /
T02D1659:291a-18: khyad par gyi lam la gnas pa'i 'gro ba'i tshul dang /
T02D1659:291a-19: de 'joms par byed pa'i gnyen po'i tshul lo //
T02D1659:291a-20: yang thugs rje skyed pa'i yul de nyid ji lta bu zhe na /
T02D1659:291a-21: de tshe sems can thams cad ni //
T02D1659:291a-22: shin tu stong pa nyid la brtson //
T02D1659:291a-23: 'gog pa'i chos nyid la sbyor bas //
T02D1659:291a-25: bskal pa gzung dka'i tshe na sems can snying stobs chung ba dang /
T02D1659:291a-27: dbang po dman pa dag las kyi dbang gis phyogs
T02D1659:291a-28: gcig tu smin nas zhi ba phyogs gcig pa'i mya
T02D1659:291a-29: ngan las 'das pas rang gi don bsgrub pa'i phyir
T02D1659:291a-30: / rgyu'i sgo nas shin tu stong pa nyid kyi lta ba la brtson pa dang /
T02D1659:291a-31: lam gyi sgo nas 'gog pa'i chos nyid la sbyor
T02D1659:291a-32: bas 'bras bu'i sgo nas 'gags shing yongs su mya
T02D1659:291a-34: phung po lhag bcas dang lhag med kyi tshul du
T02D1659:291a-35: 'khor ba'i dngos po thams cad spangs te dgra bcom
T02D1659:291a-37: de la thugs rje chen po skyes pa'i tshul ni /
T02D1659:291a-39: rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs //
T02D1659:291a-40: 'gro ba thams cad rnam sbyang phyir //
T02D1659:291a-41: sangs rgyas sprul pa kun du bskyed //
T02D1659:291a-42: 'khor ba las grol bar 'dod pa'i lta ba dman
T02D1659:291a-43: pa de dag rnam par sbyong ba'i don du dpal
T02D1659:291a-44: rdo rje sems dpa' nyid kyi sku'i rnam par 'phrul
T02D1659:291a-45: pa las / chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi
T02D1659:291a-46: rang bzhin bcom ldan 'das dpal rnam par snang mdzad
T02D1659:291b-0: kyi rigs bsdus @291b pa'i dkyil 'khor gcig dang /
T02D1659:291b-2: rnam par 'gyur ba'i dkyil 'khor bcu dang /
T02D1659:291b-3: rim pa bzhin du bstan pa'i dkyil 'khor nyi shu dang /
T02D1659:291b-4: rgya cher sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor sum cu rtsa drug dang /
T02D1659:291b-5: bkod pa'i rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor lnga bcu rtsa brgyad
T02D1659:291b-6: de spyi'i grangs kyi dkyil 'khor bdun brgya bcu gsum
T02D1659:291b-7: la rdo rje sems dpa' dkyil 'khor bdun cu rtsa
T02D1659:291b-8: gcig // rnam par snang mdzad dang /
T02D1659:291b-10: padma gar gyi dbang phyug dang /
T02D1659:291b-11: rdo rje nyi ma rnams la ni mtshungs par dkyil
T02D1659:291b-12: 'khor brgya nyi shu rtsa brgyad du shes par byas
T02D1659:291b-13: la / rta mchog rol pa la ni dkyil 'khor brgya sum cur shes par bya ste /
T02D1659:291b-14: de dag gi grangs dang dbye ba rgya cher bstan
T02D1659:291b-15: pa ni rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi le'u bdun pa dang
T02D1659:291b-22: 'dir ni cung zhig bsdus pa'i rgyud yin pas de dag spro bar mi bya'o //
T02D1659:291b-23: des na sangs rgyas sprul pa kun du bskyed //
T02D1659:291b-25: dkyil 'khor rgyas par bstan pa de dag las /
T02D1659:291b-26: sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor gang gi gnyen por byung zhe na /
T02D1659:291b-27: de nyid 'gags pa'i gnyen por ro //
T02D1659:291b-28: de nyid tshul ji ltar zhe na /
T02D1659:291b-29: zhi ba phyogs gcig pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa bsgrub pa'o //
T02D1659:291b-30: de dag par bya ba'i phyir de kho na nyid kyi don bstan te /
T02D1659:291b-31: stong pa ma yin mi stong min //
T02D1659:291b-32: dbu mar yang ni mi dmigs te //
T02D1659:291b-33: mu stegs kyis brtags pa nyi tshe ba la sogs pa'i lta ba bsgrubs pa'i stong pa dang /
T02D1659:291b-34: nyan thos kyis brtags pa'i gang zag gis stong zhing
T02D1659:291b-35: zhi ba phyogs gcig pa'i mtha' la gnas pa dang
T02D1659:291b-36: / mdo sde pas brtags pa'i rgyu 'bras kyi mtha'
T02D1659:291b-37: chad pas bsgrubs pa'i rang gi lta bas rnam par
T02D1659:291b-39: rang rgyal bas bsgrubs pa'i ma rig pa bkag nas
T02D1659:291b-40: chos kyi khams kyi phyogs gcig bdag med pa'i ngo
T02D1659:291b-41: bo stong pa nyid du 'dod pa dag ni don
T02D1659:291b-42: bzhin du gnas pa ma yin te /
T02D1659:291b-43: thun mong gi mngon sum pa dbang po drug gi yul du snang ba dang /
T02D1659:291b-44: khyad par gyi mngon sum gsal bar nyams su myong ba dang 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1659:292a-0: 'o na stong pa nyid chad par lta ba la sogs pa'i lta ba @292a * //
T02D1659:292a-1: bkag pas rtag pa ther zug par gnas pa zhig gam zhe na /
T02D1659:292a-2: de nyid ni so so'i skye bo'i rtog pa'i lta
T02D1659:292a-3: ba ste gzung 'dzin gyi rnam pas gnyis su brtags
T02D1659:292a-5: de'i phyir sku drug lhun gyis grub pa'i ngo bo
T02D1659:292a-6: de yod par bden pas stong pa ma yin la
T02D1659:292a-7: / de nyid rtog pa'i mtha' dang bral ba'i mi stong pa yang ma yin zhes pa'o //
T02D1659:292a-8: 'o na mtha' rnam pa gnyis dang bral ba'i lta bas dbu ma'i don bsgrubs te /
T02D1659:292a-9: byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'bras bu dang bcas pa la spyod dam zhe na /
T02D1659:292a-10: de yang zag pa med pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs
T02D1659:292a-11: las byung ba bya ba'i don du kun gyis ni
T02D1659:292a-12: rang gi de nyid gsal bar byed pa ste /
T02D1659:292a-13: lus ngag gi spyod pa rnam par bsgrubs pa las
T02D1659:292a-14: byung ba bsod nams kyi tshogs bsags pa'i yan lag
T02D1659:292a-15: de dag ni gzhan gyis bskyed pa grogs su 'gyur
T02D1659:292a-16: ba'o // ye shes kyi tshogs de ni yang rang
T02D1659:292a-17: gi rang bzhin gsal bar ston pa'i sgo nas mthong
T02D1659:292a-18: ba'o // ba zhig na / 'dir ni de mthong ba'i thabs med de /
T02D1659:292a-19: mu bzhi skye 'gog dang gcig dang du bral la
T02D1659:292a-20: sogs pa'i gtan tshogs dag ni rjes su dpag pa'i
T02D1659:292a-21: sgo nas gzhal bar byed de //
T02D1659:292a-22: de nyid ni yid dpyod kyi shes pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1659:292a-24: mngon sum sgyu ma'i dpe brgyad la rag las te /
T02D1659:292a-25: de tsam gyi sgo nas ni nyams su myong ba'i
T02D1659:292a-26: don med par bde ba chen po'i sku mtshon par
T02D1659:292a-27: mi nus so // de yang bla ma dam pa'i
T02D1659:292a-28: gdams ngag gis mtshon zhing rang gi mtshan nyid thabs
T02D1659:292a-30: shes rab la brten pa dang /
T02D1659:292a-31: phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i sgo nas gsal
T02D1659:292a-32: bar nyams su myong zhing yid ches pa'i phyir ro
T02D1659:292a-33: // yang gang zhig mtha' la ltos nas /
T02D1659:292a-34: dbus grub pa las mtha' ma grub pa'i phyir dbus kyang 'grub pa med de //
T02D1659:292a-35: thams cad rang byung gi ye shes chen po'i snang
T02D1659:292a-36: ba gnyis su med pa'i bde bas khyab par gnas
T02D1659:292a-37: pa'i phyir / dbu mar yang ni mi dmigs so //
T02D1659:292a-38: de nyid gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir //
T02D1659:292a-39: shes rab pha rol phyin sbyor ba //
T02D1659:292a-40: thabs kyis snying rje'i bdag nyid rnams //
T02D1659:292a-41: de bas de nyid snying rje'i thabs //
T02D1659:292a-42: shes rab pha rol phyin par gsal //
T02D1659:292a-43: chos thams cad ji ltar sangs rgyas pa'i don la
T02D1659:292b-0: phyag rgya @292b gsum gyi sgo nas pha rol tu
T02D1659:292b-2: bde ba chen po'i sku dang gnyis su med pa
T02D1659:292b-3: las thabs kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par 'phrul ba'i sku
T02D1659:292b-4: snying rje chen po'i bdag nyid can rnam par ston
T02D1659:292b-5: pa'o // de bas na de nyid la snying rje
T02D1659:292b-6: chen po'i thabs kyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa'i shes
T02D1659:292b-7: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis su med
T02D1659:292b-9: sku gsum gnyis med kyi tshul du gsal ba'o //
T02D1659:292b-10: de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las /
T02D1659:292b-11: lta dman rnams kyi stong nyid dang //
T02D1659:292b-12: brtag pa'i ri bo gzhom pa'i phyir //
T02D1659:292b-13: chos kun dbu ma tsam sgo nas //
T02D1659:292b-14: de 'jug don phyin bstan par mdzad //
T02D1659:292b-15: drang ba'i lam la spyod byas pas ;
T02D1659:292b-17: phyag rgya gsum la sbyor ba'i mthus //
T02D1659:292b-18: lhun grub snang gsal rang bzhin med //
T02D1659:292b-19: shes rab pha rol phyin don las //
T02D1659:292b-20: thugs rje thabs kyi dkyil 'khor gsal //
T02D1659:292b-22: 'o na don de nyid ston par mi mdzad cing dkyil 'khor sgom pa'i rim pa dang /
T02D1659:292b-23: sna tshogs bshad pa'i bye brag rtog pa sna tshogs bstan pa ci las dgongs she na /
T02D1659:292b-24: 'jug pa po'i gang zag dbang po dang khams kyi
T02D1659:292b-25: bye brag sna tshogs pa rnams tha mel ba'i rnam
T02D1659:292b-26: par rtog pa las bzlog ste /
T02D1659:292b-27: rtog pa'i sgo nas mi rtog pa'i don bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1659:292b-28: rtog pa med pa'i chos rnams la //
T02D1659:292b-29: sems can don du yongs brtags la //
T02D1659:292b-30: rnam par mi rtog la mos pas //
T02D1659:292b-31: thams cad rtog pas brtag par bya //
T02D1659:292b-32: de yang tshig dang pos ni rang bzhin bstan to //
T02D1659:292b-33: tshig gnyis pas ni dgos pa'i mtshan nyid bstan to //
T02D1659:292b-34: gsum pas ni lam la gzhug par bstan to ;
T02D1659:292b-35: ; bzhi pas ni gnyen po'i nges tshig bstan te /
T02D1659:292b-36: de dag ci'i phyir bstan zhe na /
T02D1659:292b-37: rtog pa zhes pa'i nges tshig tu sbyar ro //
T02D1659:292b-38: de'i don ni rtog pa bdun pa las bstan te gong du bshad zin to //
T02D1659:292b-39: da ni dkyil 'khor thams cad du lha ma nyes
T02D1659:292b-40: par bya ba'i phyir bstod pa'i glu gsungs pa las
T02D1659:292b-41: dang por yon tan brjod pa ni /
T02D1659:292b-42: brag ca yi ni sgra 'dra ba //
T02D1659:292b-43: chos kyi tshig tu de 'gyur te //
T02D1659:292b-44: de las theg pa chen po yi //
T02D1659:292b-45: yon tan yang dag rgyas pa glu //
T02D1659:292b-46: dkyil 'khor gyi ni lha rnams la //
T02D1659:292b-47: nyid kyi yon tan gyi sgo nas tshigs su bcad
T02D1659:292b-48: pa dag brag ca'i rnam pa bzhin du sgra mthar
T02D1659:293a-2: chos kyi de kho na nyid dam tshig gsum ston pa'i tshig tu de 'gyur te /
T02D1659:293a-3: de nyid las de kho na nyid mtshon par byed
T02D1659:293a-4: pa'i theg pa chen po'i glu yang dag pa'i yon
T02D1659:293a-5: tan thams cad rgyas par byed pa 'di ltar dmigs
T02D1659:293a-11: 'bras bu chen pos gzhan las khyad par du gyur pa'i don rjod par byed pa'o //
T02D1659:293a-12: des ni sgra'i mtshan nyid dang /
T02D1659:293a-13: don gyi mtshan nyid bstan to //
T02D1659:293a-14: des gang zhig la bstod ce na /
T02D1659:293a-15: dus gsum pa yi dam tshig gsum //
T02D1659:293a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bstod ;
T02D1659:293a-17: ; mi 'da' ba'i don gyis na dam tshig ste /
T02D1659:293a-18: dus gsum du mi 'gyur zhing rtag par bzhugs pa'i
T02D1659:293a-19: sku gsum gnyis med kyi sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs
T02D1659:293a-20: pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid du gyur pa la
T02D1659:293a-21: bstod pa'o // de la dang por de bzhin gshegs
T02D1659:293a-22: pa'i rigs chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes las byung
T02D1659:293a-23: bstod pa'o // ba / sku'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgo
T02D1659:293a-24: nas don mnyam pa nyid las ma g-yos kyang thugs
T02D1659:293a-25: rje rgyun mi 'chad par ston pa'i phyir /
T02D1659:293a-26: mnyam med mi g-yo mnyam nyid mchog gi chos nyid can //
T02D1659:293a-27: thugs rje'i bdag nyid 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal sel bar mdzad //
T02D1659:293a-28: yon tan mtha' yas dngos grub thams cad sbyin mdzad pa //
T02D1659:293a-29: dri med mi g-yo mnyam med dam pa'i mchog chos can //
T02D1659:293a-30: 'di ltar snang ba'i chos thams cad ni don chos nyid mnyam pa nyid kyi sku ste /
T02D1659:293a-31: yon tan thams cad 'byung ba'i sten gnas su gyur ba'o //
T02D1659:293a-32: de nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi sgo nas ni ngo bo nyid kyi sku zhes bya ba /
T02D1659:293a-33: gsal ba'i sgo nas ni ye shes kyi sku zhes bya ste //
T02D1659:293a-34: de gnyis gnyis su med pa'i sgo nas ni chos kyi sku'o //
T02D1659:293a-35: de la ni mtshan ma'i rnam par rtog pa gang
T02D1659:293a-36: gis kyang g-yo bar mi nus pas mnyam med mi
T02D1659:293a-37: g-yo zhes bya'o // 'di ltar snang ba'i longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku mtshan dang dpe byed dang /
T02D1659:293a-38: stobs dang mi 'jigs pas brgyan pa la ni mnyam nyid mchog gi chos nyid can zhes so //
T02D1659:293a-39: sprul pa'i sku mtshan dang dpe byad dang ldan pa
T02D1659:293a-40: dang mtshan dang mi ldan pa'i rnam pas thugs rje
T02D1659:293a-41: chen po'i bdag nyid 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad
T02D1659:293a-42: sna tshogs kyi sgo nas sel bar mdzad pa dang
T02D1659:293b-0: / yon tan mtha' yas @293b pa'i dngos grub thams cad 'gro ba la sbyin par mdzad pa'o //
T02D1659:293b-1: de ltar na sku drug po 'di dag ni dri
T02D1659:293b-2: med mi g-yo mnyam med dam pa'i chos mchog can
T02D1659:293b-3: no // da ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor
T02D1659:293b-4: gyi rnam pa me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi
T02D1659:293b-5: rang bzhin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs
T02D1659:293b-6: kyi sgo nas mchod pa'i dpe dang bral bar bstan
T02D1659:293b-7: no // pa'i phyir // yon tan shin tu phra ba'i cha la'ang tshad med de /
T02D1659:293b-8: dpe ni nam mkha' dang yang bskrun du yod pa min //
T02D1659:293b-9: dngos grub mtha' yas mnyam med dpe dang bral ba rnams //
T02D1659:293b-10: sems can khams la dngos grub mchog rnams nges par stsol//
T02D1659:293b-11: bde bar gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi rnam pa ni ye shes rnam pa drug gi bdag nyid de /
T02D1659:293b-12: de dag ni shin tu phra zhing rtogs par dka' bas na tshad gzung du med de //
T02D1659:293b-13: dpe ni nam mkha'i khams kyis khyab pa tsam gyis kyang bskrun du yod pa ma yin pas na /
T02D1659:293b-14: dngos grub mtha' yas ba 'byung ba'i gnas su gyur pa'o //
T02D1659:293b-15: de lta bu'i chos gang yang mtshungs shing mnyam pa
T02D1659:293b-16: med pa'i dpe dang bral ba de las sems can
T02D1659:293b-17: gyi don du dngos grub kyi mchog bde bar gshegs
T02D1659:293b-18: pa'i sku dang ye shes mi slu bar sbyin par
T02D1659:293b-19: mdzad do // rin po che'i rigs mnyam pa nyid
T02D1659:293b-20: kyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin yon tan gyi dkyil
T02D1659:293b-21: 'khor gyi snang bas smon lam dang thugs rje chen
T02D1659:293b-22: po'i sgo nas snang ba ni /
T02D1659:293b-23: rtag tu dri ma med pa'i thugs rje'i shugs las byung //
T02D1659:293b-24: smon lam grub pa 'gag pa med pa'i chos nyid can //
T02D1659:293b-25: 'gro ba'i don sgrub rab tu brtson pa mtha' yas pa //
T02D1659:293b-26: thugs rje chen po bdag nyid rtag tu rnam par snang //
T02D1659:293b-27: bskal pa mang por dka' ba spyad nas sgrib pa'i tshogs thams cad bsal zhing //
T02D1659:293b-28: tshogs gnyis bsags pa'i mthus thugs rje chen po dang ldan par gyur pa dang /
T02D1659:293b-29: lam sbyang ba'i dus su sems can gyi khams la
T02D1659:293b-30: dmigs te smon lam rgya chen po btab pa'i mthus
T02D1659:293b-31: de dang mthun pa'i mdzad pa gdul bya'i rgyud la
T02D1659:293b-32: snang ste phrin las mtha' yas pas 'gro ba'i don
T02D1659:293b-34: yon tan gyi ngo bor sbyor bas thugs rje chen po'i bdag nyid rtag tu rnam par snang ba'o //
T02D1659:294a-0: yang padma'i rigs so so kun du rtog pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin @294a * //
T02D1659:294a-1: gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyis don dam pa'i dngos grub mchog mtshon pa'i phyir //
T02D1659:294a-2: tshad med tshad dang bral ba shin tu rdzogs pa yi //
T02D1659:294a-3: bde bar gshegs pa'i go 'phang dam pa brnyes gyur kyang /
T02D1659:294a-4: khams gsum rnams la dngos gru mchog stsol mdzad pa yi //
T02D1659:294a-5: thugs rje'i spyod pa mi g-yo 'gag par yod mi 'gyur //
T02D1659:294a-6: lam mchog tu gyur pa la zhugs pa'i nus pa'i mthus 'bras bu mchog tu gyur pa brnyes te /
T02D1659:294a-7: rang gi mdzad pa mthar phyin te bzhugs kyang 'gro
T02D1659:294a-8: ba'i don du thugs rje chen po dri ma med
T02D1659:294a-9: pas gzigs te don mdzad pa'o //
T02D1659:294a-10: yang las kyi rigs bya ba grub pa'i ye shes
T02D1659:294a-11: kyi rang bzhin gyi las kyi dkyil 'khor gyis dngos
T02D1659:294a-12: grub myur bar ston pa la sogs pa'i phyir //
T02D1659:294a-13: ae ma ho shin tu bzang po'i chos nyid mchog dang ldan //
T02D1659:294a-14: mchog sbyin rnams kyi nang nas go 'phang mchog brnyes pas //
T02D1659:294a-15: khams gsum rnams la rtag tu dngos grub mchog stsol mdzad //
T02D1659:294a-16: mgon po dus gsum sgrib pa med par rab mkhyen pa //
T02D1659:294a-17: dam tshig don gsum dngos grub dam pa bdag la stsol //
T02D1659:294a-18: thar pa mchog tu gyur pa'i lam gyi nang na
T02D1659:294a-19: mchog tu gyur pa ni 'di nyid kyi sgo nas
T02D1659:294a-20: / mchog tu gyur pa'i 'bras bu skye ba gcig

T02D1659:294a-37: zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gnyis gsungs te /

T02D1659:294a-39: rgyas thams cad kyi bdag nyid rdo rje 'chang chen
T02D1659:294a-40: po'i sku dang ye shes kyi rigs la sogs pa'i
T02D1659:294b-0: yon @294b tan rgya chen po rjod par byed pa
T02D1659:294b-1: ste / lan cig tsam brjod pas kyang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dngos grub 'grub par byed na /
T02D1659:294b-2: rang nyid rigs kyi dkyil 'khor du bsgoms shing //
T02D1659:294b-3: don bzhin du bsam pa dang ldan pas dam tshig
T02D1659:294b-4: gsum gyi sgo nas brjod na smos kyang ci dgos
T02D1659:294b-5: zhes pa'o // 'bru'i don ni go sla bas ma bshad do //
T02D1659:294b-6: de dag ni ston pa'i dgongs mdzad yon tan gyi bstod pa dang bcas pas bstan pa'o //
T02D1659:294b-7: da ni rjes 'jug gi dbang du byas te bsgom
T02D1659:294b-8: zhing bsgrubs pa las byung ba'i dngos grub kyi tshul
T02D1659:294b-9: bstan te / sku ni lta bas mi ngoms pa //
T02D1659:294b-10: thams cad bdag nyid bstan nas kyang //
T02D1659:294b-11: legs so zhes ni grub pa yi //
T02D1659:294b-12: mchog rnams kun ni rab sbyin mdzad //
T02D1659:294b-13: rang gi dkyil 'khor mtshan dang dpe byad kyis brgyan
T02D1659:294b-14: pa lta bas mi ngoms pa'i yon tan gyi tshogs
T02D1659:294b-15: bstan te / legs so zhes pa la sogs pa'i
T02D1659:294b-16: gsung sgrogs shing lung ston pa dang dngos grub kyi
T02D1659:294b-18: de nyid tshul ji ltar zhe na /
T02D1659:294b-19: thams cad bdag nyid grub dga' dang /
T02D1659:294b-20: bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs //
T02D1659:294b-21: sangs rgyas grub pa'i mchog kun dang /
T02D1659:294b-22: rnal 'byor dam pa'ang sbyin par mdzad //
T02D1659:294b-23: 'jig rten pa'i thun mong gi dngos grub thams cad
T02D1659:294b-24: kyi bdag nyid ji ltar grub pa dga' ba bzhin
T02D1659:294b-25: du 'byung zhing // bsam pa'i las thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /
T02D1659:294b-26: mchog gi dngos grub sangs rgyas kyi sku dang /
T02D1659:294b-27: thugs bde ba chen po'i ye shes rnal 'byor dam pa'ang sbyin par mdzad pa'o //
T02D1659:294b-28: de dag gis ni 'bras bu la brod pa bskyed
T02D1659:294b-29: pa'i tshul du rjes su 'jug pa po'i gang zag
T02D1659:294b-30: gis gzhung bzhin du bsgrubs pa'i dngos grub thob pa'i
T02D1659:294b-32: da ni nyams su blang ba'i thabs bstan te /
T02D1659:294b-33: de nas de yi sgrub pa dang /
T02D1659:294b-34: shin tu rtag pa'i dngos grub dag / gang gis srid pa 'di nyid la /
T02D1659:294b-35: dngos grub shin tu rtag thob bshad ;
T02D1659:294b-36: ; de nas thung ngu'i sgra de ma thag tu
T02D1659:294b-37: 'gyur la ring po'i sgras bkra shis kyi tshig tu
T02D1659:294b-38: 'gyur te / de ma thag tu sgrub pa'i bkra shis kyi don to //
T02D1659:294b-39: dngos grub rnam pa gnyis las byung ba'i 'bras bu'o //
T02D1659:295a-0: de 'grub par byed pa'i thabs ni bsnyen sgrub yan lag bzhi la sogs pa'i cho ga'i @295a * //
T02D1659:295a-2: des ni srid pa 'di nyid la phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub la spyod par byed pa'o //
T02D1659:295a-3: bsnyen sgrub kyi rjes su 'gro ba'i cho ga ni /
T02D1659:295a-4: rdo rje se gol gtogs pa yis //
T02D1659:295a-5: sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bya //
T02D1659:295a-6: thal mo legs par sbyar ba yis //
T02D1659:295a-7: thal mo lan gsum rnam par brdab //
T02D1659:295a-8: sbyor ba dang ldan pas lce lag byin gyis brlabs
T02D1659:295a-9: pa la sogs pa sngon du 'gro ba'i tshul gyis
T02D1659:295a-10: / rdo rje se gol lan gsum gtogs shing badzra
T02D1659:295a-11: sa m'a dza:'i sngags brjod pas ni ye shes kyi
T02D1659:295a-12: dkyil 'khor rnams bsdus shing byon par 'gyur la /
T02D1659:295a-13: slar gshegs su gsol ba'i dus su dgyes pa'i thal
T02D1659:295a-14: mo lan gsum brdab cing badzra tu shya ho zhes
T02D1659:295a-15: pas dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams gshegs su gsol ba'o
T02D1659:295a-16: // de ltar ye shes kyi lha rnams gshegs pa'i
T02D1659:295a-17: rjes la dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor dag kyang rim
T02D1659:295a-18: pa bzhin du bdag la bsdus te /
T02D1659:295a-19: de nyid kyang n'a da'i tshul du spos me'i du
T02D1659:295a-20: ba yal ba ltar rnam par mi rtog pa'i de
T02D1659:295a-21: bzhin nyid la gzhag par bya'o //
T02D1659:295a-22: de las slar rigs kyi lhar bsgoms nas /
T02D1659:295a-23: dbang bskur zhing byin gyis brlabs te /
T02D1659:295a-24: go cha dang go chings kyis bsrungs shing thun mtshams kyi mthar ldang bar bya ba'o //
T02D1659:295a-25: de nyid kyi spyod lam ni /
T02D1659:295a-26: dbang po gang dang gang las gyur //
T02D1659:295a-27: de dag de yi ngo bor bya //
T02D1659:295a-28: rnal 'byor pa rang nyid spyod lam rnam pa bzhir ting nge 'dzin las mi mnyam par bya'o //
T02D1659:295a-29: mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems kyis mtshan bcas dang mtshan
T02D1659:295a-30: med kyi sgo nas dbang po drug gi snang ba
T02D1659:295a-31: dag / thabs dang shes rab yab yum gyi sku
T02D1659:295a-32: dang / dbyings dang ye shes zung du 'brel ba'i tshul gyis mnyam par sbyor zhing gnas par bya'o //
T02D1659:295a-33: de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las /
T02D1659:295a-34: mig la sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad ces pa la sogs pa dang /
T02D1659:295a-35: yang rtog pa bdun pa las //
T02D1659:295a-36: dbang po yul du snang ba dag / bde ba'i ye shes rnam par spyod //
T02D1659:295a-37: mtshan bcas mtshan ma med pa yi //
T02D1659:295a-38: rim pa gnyis kyi sgo nas 'jug / rang gi ye shes gnas sbyor zhing //
T02D1659:295a-39: mtshan rtog kun las rnam par grol //
T02D1659:295a-41: da ni bsgom bzlas kyi cho ga bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1659:295a-42: shin tu mnyam gzhag sbyor ba yis //
T02D1659:295b-0: @295b sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor zhing //
T02D1659:295b-1: ji ltar mos pa'i chags pa dang //
T02D1659:295b-2: sha ta pa la sogs pa yis //
T02D1659:295b-3: ci nas yongs su mi skyo bar //
T02D1659:295b-4: rtag tu tshad med bzlas par bya //
T02D1659:295b-5: mtshan bcas dang mtshan med kyi rim pa gnyis kyi sgo nas mnyam par gzhag cing //
T02D1659:295b-6: de nyid la sbyor ba'i tshul gyis dngos rtogs kyi
T02D1659:295b-7: sangs rgyas gnyis kyi sgo nas mnyam par spyir te
T02D1659:295b-8: / rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gang yang rung ba'i sgo
T02D1659:295b-9: nas ji ltar mos pa'i glu dang sil snyan dang
T02D1659:295b-10: bro gar gyi phyag rgyas chags pa'i tshul du mngon
T02D1659:295b-11: / par spyod cing // sha ta pa'i glu dang sha ta dza ko ha'i glu dang /
T02D1659:295b-12: tso sha panytsa ma'i glu dang ni ri danta ka'i glu dang /
T02D1659:295b-13: ri ta si ta'i glu dang /
T02D1659:295b-14: su rna pi pa ri'i glu rnams blangs te /
T02D1659:295b-15: thun mtshams kyi bar skabs dag tu bzlas brjod gnyis
T02D1659:295b-16: sam thig le gnyis sam phra mo gnyis sam rnam
T02D1659:295b-17: dag gnyis kyi rnam pa gang yang rung ba dag
T02D1659:295b-18: ji srid mi skyo ba'i bar du byas te /
T02D1659:295b-19: rtags rnam pa lnga mi gsal gyi bar du rtag tu gnas par bya'o //
T02D1659:295b-20: de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las //
T02D1659:295b-21: bsgom dang bzlas sogs cho ga yi //
T02D1659:295b-22: mtshan snyags gsal bar ma gyur par //
T02D1659:295b-23: shin tu mnyam gzhag sbyor gnas te /
T02D1659:295b-24: rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gsal bar bya //
T02D1659:295b-26: de nyid nyams su blangs pa'i rim pa rgyas par ni /
T02D1659:295b-27: dpal rnam par snang mdzad kyi gsang ba'i don rnam par bkod pa las shes par bya'o //
T02D1659:295b-28: de nyid kun du mi nyams par bya ba'i phyir //
T02D1659:295b-29: kun du bkug nas thams cad du //
T02D1659:295b-30: sangs rgyas kun gyi gnas bsgoms pas //
T02D1659:295b-31: bdag nyid rtag tu rnam pa kun //
T02D1659:295b-32: sangs rgyas kun du dngos grub pa //
T02D1659:295b-33: rab tu mthong zhing dngos grub thob //
T02D1659:295b-34: dus dang rnam pa thams cad du bdag nyid rtag
T02D1659:295b-35: tu sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par bsgoms nas
T02D1659:295b-36: / dngos grub rab dang 'bring thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D1659:295b-37: de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las /
T02D1659:295b-38: kun du kun nas thams cad du //
T02D1659:295b-39: sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid kyi //
T02D1659:295b-40: sangs rgyas kun gyi gnas bsgoms pas //
T02D1659:295b-41: sangs rgyas kun dang phrad par 'gyur //
T02D1659:295b-43: de dag nyams su blangs pa'i phan yon ni nges
T02D1659:295b-44: pa'i theg pa'i gzhung du spyad pa po dag gis
T02D1659:296a-2: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rigs 'dzin pa'i gnas rnams tshe
T02D1659:296a-3: 'di nyid kyis 'grub par 'gyur ba'i phyir tshigs su
T02D1659:296a-4: bcad pa gcig gsungs pa yin no //
T02D1659:296a-5: da ni rjes su bstod pa'i phan yon bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1659:296a-6: sangs rgyas kun gyi yon tan bsngags pa rgya che ba ;
T02D1659:296a-7: ; bstod pa'i rgyal po mchog 'di lan cig glur blangs pas //
T02D1659:296a-8: zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gsum gsungs pa yin te /
T02D1659:296a-9: bde bar gshegs pa'i sku dang /
T02D1659:296a-11: mtshan ma'i sgo nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon
T02D1659:296a-12: tan rgya chen por ston par byed pa'i glu 'di
T02D1659:296a-13: lan cig tsam blangs pas kyang dngos grub mi zad
T02D1659:296a-15: chos thams cad la dbang sgyur zhing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'grub pa dang /
T02D1659:296a-16: sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor la sogs pas sems can gyi rgyud rnam par grol bar mdzad do //
T02D1659:296a-17: dpal rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbugs dbyung ba'i don rnam par bshad pa'o //
T02D1659:296a-18: da ni gdul bya zhe sdang la spyod pa dag gi rgyu'i lam pa dang /
T02D1659:296a-20: 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid can dag thun mong dang khyad
T02D1659:296a-21: par gyi don du rnam par gdul ba'i phyir thugs
T02D1659:296a-22: rnam par mi rtog pa me long lta bu'i ye
T02D1659:296a-23: shes la snang ga rdo rje rigs kyi dkyil 'khor
T02D1659:296a-24: gyi sgo nas dpal he ru ka'i dkyil 'khor du
T02D1659:296a-25: bstan te dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir //
T02D1659:296a-26: 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba //
T02D1659:296a-27: bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi //
T02D1659:296a-28: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D1659:296a-29: de yang dang por ni dus bstan te /
T02D1659:296a-30: 'das pa'i dus kyi bskal pa drug 'dzin gyi dus
T02D1659:296a-31: su sangs rgyas dpa' bo'i zla ba zhes bya ba
T02D1659:296a-33: de'i bstan pa la slob dpon chos kyi 'khor lo
T02D1659:296a-34: la slob ma dge sbyong nag po zhes bya ba
T02D1659:296a-35: zhig yod de / des yang dag pa'i don phyin
T02D1659:296a-36: ci log tu spyad pa'i dbang gis ngan song gsum
T02D1659:296a-37: zhig yod de / du skyes shing / de las
T02D1659:296a-38: thar nas bdud ma trang ru tra zhes bya bar
T02D1659:296a-39: zhig yod de / du skyes shing / gyur te / 'jig rten gsum po 'jig par byed cing //
T02D1659:296a-41: bstan pa dag kyang 'jig par byed do //
T02D1659:296a-42: de 'dul ba'i gnyen por dpal he ru ka'i dkyil 'khor sngon du byung zhes pa'o //
T02D1659:296b-0: rtag par @296b ther zug pa'i sgo nas 'khrul bar spyad pas na ru dra nag po byung la /
T02D1659:296b-1: sku gsum rtag pa'i ngo bo las ni dpal he ru ka'i ngo bo byung ba'o //
T02D1659:296b-2: de yang spyi'i mtshan nyid ni /
T02D1659:296b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab las //
T02D1659:296b-4: 'gro ba'i tshul ni sngon byung ba //
T02D1659:296b-5: zhes pas gdul bya dang 'dul byed gnyis ka la sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D1659:296b-6: yang thugs rje skye ba'i yul ru dra'i mtshan nyid ni /
T02D1659:296b-7: de tshe sems can thams cad ni //
T02D1659:296b-8: shin tu khro gtum gdug pa yis //
T02D1659:296b-10: rgyu'i lam la gnas nas nyon mongs pa zhe sdang
T02D1659:296b-11: gi sgo nas log par spyad pa'i dbang gis thun
T02D1659:296b-13: khyad par gyi lam pa dag lus shin tu khro ba dang /
T02D1659:296b-14: ngag shin tu gtum pa dang /
T02D1659:296b-15: yid shin tu gdug pa'i dbang gis 'o dod 'bod pa'i dmyal bar ltung bar gyur to //
T02D1659:296b-16: de las thar nas snga ma'i rgyu rkyen dang 'bras
T02D1659:296b-17: bu rig pa'i rnam pa zad cing rgyu mthun pa'i
T02D1659:296b-18: 'bras bu rnam par smin pa'i mthus /
T02D1659:296b-19: bdud ma trang ru tra ru gyur pa de nyid bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1659:296b-20: de nas 'phos nas sems can de //
T02D1659:296b-21: bag chags kyis ni mtshams sbyor bas //
T02D1659:296b-22: shin tu gdug pa chen por 'gyur //
T02D1659:296b-23: blo ni bdud kyis byin brlabs nas //
T02D1659:296b-24: drag po'i las rnam par smin pa'i dbang gis drag po'i gzugs su byung ste /
T02D1659:296b-25: yang drag po'i las kyis myos par gyur nas gdug
T02D1659:296b-26: pa chen po'i sbyor bas sems can la 'tshe bar
T02D1659:296b-27: byed do // ji lta bu'i sgom pa'i sgo nas she na /
T02D1659:296b-28: rims dang dug dang dbyig dug dang //
T02D1659:296b-29: phra men ma dang gnod sbyin gdon //
T02D1659:296b-30: bdud dang rnam par log 'dren nyid //
T02D1659:296b-31: shin tu gdug pa chen por 'gyur //
T02D1659:296b-32: kha rlangs ngan pa las byung ba'i sbyor bas sems
T02D1659:296b-33: can gyi tshe srog rmongs par byed pa'i rims nyin
T02D1659:296b-34: gcig pa dang / nyin gnyis pa nas bzung ste /
T02D1659:296b-35: sna tshogs pa'i bar du snang ba dang /
T02D1659:296b-36: dri rlangs ngan pa las byung ba'i dug gi sbyor ba lta ba dang /
T02D1659:296b-37: reg pas gzhan gyi srog 'phrog pa dang /
T02D1659:296b-38: rin po che'i tshul gyis gzhan slu bar byed do //
T02D1659:296b-39: rnam par 'joms pa dang phra men gyi sbyor sngags dang /
T02D1659:296b-40: lus kyi sprul pa sna tshogs par 'phro ba dang /
T02D1659:296b-41: gzhan yang gnod sbyin pho mo dang /
T02D1659:297a-0: bdud dang log 'dren la sogs pa'i gdug pa chen po'i tshogs @297a * //
T02D1659:297a-1: rnams myur du dbyung zhing gnas thams cad du khyab par byed pa'o //
T02D1659:297a-3: gnas gsum po ni 'jig byed cing //
T02D1659:297a-4: sgrub pa po rnams la yang za //

T02D1659:297a-6: bstan pa dag kyang 'jig par byed //
