T02D1659:297a-9: rnams rim pa bzhin du skyabs su 'gro ba'i tshul
T02D1659:297a-10: bstan te / de nas dbang por bcas pa'i lha //
T02D1659:297a-11: tshangs pa'i drung du nye bar dong //
T02D1659:297a-12: zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gnyis gsungs te /
T02D1659:297a-13: ri rab kyi rtse mo na gnas pa'i lha'i dbang
T02D1659:297a-14: po brgya byin dang nye dbang sum cu rtsa gnyis
T02D1659:297a-15: dang bcas pa rnams tshangs pa la skyabs su dong
T02D1659:297a-16: ngo // tshangs pa nyid kyis kyang skyabs mdzad par mi nus te /
T02D1659:297a-17: dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams khyab 'jug chen po'i drung du nye bar dong ngo //
T02D1659:297a-18: de dag gis kyang skyabs mdzad par ma nus te /
T02D1659:297a-19: lha chen po mig gsum pa la skyabs su dong ngo //
T02D1659:297a-20: de dag gis kyang skyabs mdzad par ma nus te /
T02D1659:297a-21: rdo rje 'chang chen po la skyabs su gsol lo zhes pa dang /
T02D1659:297a-22: de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las /
T02D1659:297a-23: de nas ru tra de nyid kyis mkha' 'gro dang /
T02D1659:297a-24: phra men gyi tshogs chen po bsdus te sbyor ba sna tshogs kyi sgo nas rbod gtong byed cing /
T02D1659:297a-25: sngon gyi las la grub pa'i mtshon cha sna tshos
T02D1659:297a-26: dang drag po'i gsang sngags kyis rgyal chen rigs bzhi'i
T02D1659:297a-27: lha rnams bcom nas sa steng gi ya thog tu
T02D1659:297a-28: song ste / rtsub 'gyur gyi tshal na gnas shing
T02D1659:297a-29: sbyor ba sna tshogs kyi sgo nas rnam par rgyal
T02D1659:297a-30: ba'i khang bzangs na yang rgol bar brtsams so zhes
T02D1659:297a-31: pa la sogs pa'i tshig rgya cher gsungs so //
T02D1659:297a-32: yang rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor bas /
T02D1659:297a-33: sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu ba'i phyir //
T02D1659:297a-34: de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can //
T02D1659:297a-35: rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis //
T02D1659:297a-36: zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gnyis su gsungs te /
T02D1659:297a-37: rdo rje 'chang chen po'i sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor
T02D1659:297a-38: ba dang ldan pas rdo rje se gol gyi sgras
T02D1659:297a-39: sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar mdzad de /
T02D1659:297a-40: dpung pa gnyis ni rdo rje bcing pa'i tshul du bsnol te /
T02D1659:297a-41: rdo rje se gol la gtogs pa'i sgras thams cad snyan gsan dbab pa ni /
T02D1659:297a-42: ci se go la gcig tsam gtogs pa'i sgras sangs
T02D1659:297b-0: rgyas thams @297b cad bsdu bar nus sam zhe na
T02D1659:297b-1: / sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba las byung ba yin pas khyad par gyi mthu dang ldan te /
T02D1659:297b-2: de yi bka' tsam gyis skrag nas //
T02D1659:297b-4: sangs rgyas thams cad gshegs gyur na //
T02D1659:297b-5: gzhan lta smos kyang ci zhig dgos //
T02D1659:297b-7: de ltar spyod la spyan drangs pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams
T02D1659:297b-8: kyis 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas par gang bar til
T02D1659:297b-9: gyi gang bu til 'brus bcer ba bzhin du bzhugs
T02D1659:297b-10: pa'i tshul du bstan pa'i phyir //
T02D1659:297b-11: rdo rje se go la gtogs pa yis //
T02D1659:297b-12: 'jig rten kham ni ma lus par //
T02D1659:297b-14: kun gyis til 'bru bzhin du rgyas //
T02D1659:297b-16: yang de dag gis gdan 'joms chen po'i bka' bgros mdzad nas /
T02D1659:297b-17: thugs rje chen po'i mdzad pa bstan par dgongs te /
T02D1659:297b-18: shin tu gdug cing gtum pa la //
T02D1659:297b-19: zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te //
T02D1659:297b-20: shes rab thabs kyi ngo bo yi ;
T02D1659:297b-21: ; khro bor de bzhin gshegs kun mdzad //
T02D1659:297b-22: ru tra nag po la sogs pa'i khro bo'i gzugs
T02D1659:297b-23: can de dag la zhi ba'i skus 'dul bar mi
T02D1659:297b-24: 'gyur te / shes rab dbyings kyi mtshan nyid dang /
T02D1659:297b-25: thabs snying rje chen po'i rgyu las de bzhin gshegs
T02D1659:297b-26: pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus pa'i rkyen gyis 'bras
T02D1659:297b-27: bu'i khro bo'i dkyil 'khor du snang bar mdzad pa'o
T02D1659:297b-28: // 'o na zhi ba'i skus mi 'dul ba khro bo'i skus kyang gdul bar nus sam zhe na /
T02D1659:297b-29: khro bo'i tshul can khros pas kyang //
T02D1659:297b-30: 'jig rten gsum dag sreg byed na //
T02D1659:297b-31: sangs rgyas thams cad khros pa yis //
T02D1659:297b-32: khams gsum ma lus smos ci dgos //
T02D1659:297b-33: nyon mongs pa rang ka mar 'dzin cing spyod pa'i
T02D1659:297b-34: khro bo rang rgyud pa dag gis kyang sa 'og
T02D1659:297b-35: sa steng sa bla'i 'jig rten gsum dag kyang sreg
T02D1659:297b-36: par nus na / dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams
T02D1659:297b-37: cad gcig tu 'dus pa'i rang bzhin rdo rje 'chang
T02D1659:297b-38: chen po'i skus ni bcas bcos rnam pa gnyis kyi
T02D1659:297b-39: tshul gyis khro bo'i cha lugs su bsgyur te /
T02D1659:297b-40: khams gsum ma lus pa rnams kyang skad cig tsam
T02D1659:297b-41: la sreg par byed pa ni smos kyang ci dgos
T02D1659:297b-42: zhes pa'o // de dag gis ni sngon byung ston
T02D1659:297b-43: pa'i dgongs mdzad gsang ba bla na med pa'i tshul
T02D1659:298a-0: zhes pa'o // bstan te // rjes su 'jug pa'i rnal 'byor pas kyang @298a * //
T02D1659:298a-1: mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i gnas skabs su de bzhin bslab par bya'o //
T02D1659:298a-2: da ni sngon byung gi mtshan nyid dang rjes su
T02D1659:298a-3: 'jug pa'i rnal 'byor pas bya ba dag thun mong
T02D1659:298a-4: du bstan pa las dang por lha bskyed pa'o //
T02D1659:298a-5: de nas sne yi rtse mo la //
T02D1659:298a-6: yid ni yang dag brtan par gzung //
T02D1659:298a-7: sna yi dbugs ring dro ba la //
T02D1659:298a-8: rgyal ba'i phyag rgya'i sbyor ba byung //
T02D1659:298a-9: gnas skabs gsum gyi bye brag gis //
T02D1659:298a-10: phyi nang gsang ba gsum gyi sna'i rtse mo la
T02D1659:298a-11: yid rtse gcig pa brtan pa'i rnam pa yang dag
T02D1659:298a-12: par gzung ste // yi ge h'um ring po tshig
T02D1659:298a-13: drag can drod rnam pa gsum dang bcas pa las
T02D1659:298a-14: bdud bzhi las rgyal ba'i rdo rje 'chang chen po'i
T02D1659:298a-15: thabs shes rab sbyor ba'i phyag rgyas dpal he ru
T02D1659:298a-16: ka'i sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba rnam par 'phrul
T02D1659:298a-18: da ni 'bras bu mdzad pa'i mtshan nyid las dang por gtso bor cha lugs bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1659:298a-19: bcom ldan de nyid rnal 'byor pa //
T02D1659:298a-20: rdo rje khro bor gyur nas phyung //
T02D1659:298a-21: dpal ldan rdo rje he ru ka //
T02D1659:298a-23: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba dang /
T02D1659:298a-24: thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa las rdo
T02D1659:298a-25: rje khro bo chen po'i skur ba bsgyur zhing phung
T02D1659:298a-26: ngo // de nyid ji ltar zhe na //
T02D1659:298a-27: yon tan gyi tshogs thams cad kyi dpal dang ldan
T02D1659:298a-28: zhing sku gsung thugs gnyis su med pa'i rdo rje
T02D1659:298a-29: 'chang chen pos mi mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad bcom
T02D1659:298a-30: zhing // rnam thar sgo gsum gyi mtshan nyid kyis
T02D1659:298a-31: dgyes chags phrin las kyi bdag nyid du gyur pa
T02D1659:298a-32: don ye shes lnga'i mtshan las /
T02D1659:298a-33: 'bar ba chen po'i me'i dkyil 'khor gyis thams cad bsregs shing rlog par mdzad pa'o //
T02D1659:298a-34: gzhan yang sku mdog dang 'od zer la sogs pa'i sgo nas //
T02D1659:298a-35: sems dpa' sngon po 'bar ba'i dang //
T02D1659:298a-37: 'jig pa chen po'i dus ltar drag //
T02D1659:298a-38: dur khrod kyi ni me dang 'dra //
T02D1659:298a-39: thugs ye shes rnam pa lnga dang ldan pas /
T02D1659:298a-40: rin po che bee d'urya sngon po'i kha dog la
T02D1659:298a-41: 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dmar po 'bar ba sa chags
T02D1659:298a-42: pa gnyis dang ma bral ba'i rtags mtshon pa snod
T02D1659:298a-43: kyi 'jig rten 'jig pa'i dus kyi tshe /
T02D1659:298b-0: me la sogs pas @298b sna tshogs 'joms pa bzhin du drag po'i skur gnas te /
T02D1659:298b-1: dur khrod kyi me dang 'dra ba'o //
T02D1659:298b-2: gzhan yang khro bo'i cha lugs dang rgyan chas kyi rnam par brjid pa ni /
T02D1659:298b-4: thod pa mang po dbu rgyan can //
T02D1659:298b-5: 'jig pa chen po'i dus ltar drag / dur khrod bzhin du rab tu 'jigs //
T02D1659:298b-6: khro la sogs pa'i tshul ldan pa //
T02D1659:298b-7: zhal rnams sna tshogs 'gyur pa dang //
T02D1659:298b-8: smin ma khro gnyer bcas par bsgyur //
T02D1659:298b-9: bar ba'i lta bas gar byas pas //
T02D1659:298b-10: dpal chen po'i sku la rang nyid kyi yon tan snang ba las grub cing /
T02D1659:298b-11: gzhan 'dul ba'i don du byung ba'i rngams brjid sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /
T02D1659:298b-12: khro rtags drug cu rtsa gcig dang /
T02D1659:298b-13: gar rnam pa dgu'i mtshan mas brgyan te /
T02D1659:298b-14: rdo rje 'bar ba'i skra gyen du brdzes shing /
T02D1659:298b-15: spyan ming nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor bzhin du 'bar ba las 'od 'phro ba //
T02D1659:298b-16: thod pa'i phreng ba la sogs pa dbu rgyan rgyan cha sna tshogs kyis mtshan pa /
T02D1659:298b-17: dur khrod kyi chas chen po brgyad kyis brgyan pas 'jigs pa chen po'i dus ltar drag cing //
T02D1659:298b-18: dur khrod bzhin du rab tu 'jigs pa'i zhal bzhi
T02D1659:298b-19: khro ba la sogs pa'i tshul gyis sna tshogs par
T02D1659:298b-23: zhi ba'i tshul du rab tu gnas la //
T02D1659:298b-24: smin ma'i rtse mo gyen du bteg cing dga' ba'i
T02D1659:298b-25: rang bzhin gyis gnas la stobs bcu'i sgo nas khro
T02D1659:298b-27: 'bar ba'i gar thabs rnam pa bzhis bskyod cing gnas pa'o //
T02D1659:298b-28: de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las /
T02D1659:298b-31: zhal g-yas zhi ba'i rang bzhin dkar //
T02D1659:298b-32: dbus ma mthing nag drag po'i zhal //
T02D1659:298b-33: g-yon pa rmongs byed ser po ste //
T02D1659:298b-34: rgyab ma chags mdzad dmar po'o //
T02D1659:298b-35: smin mtshams khro gnyer glog bzhin 'gyu ;
T02D1659:298b-36: ; spyan dmar mche gtsigs 'jigs pa'i zhal //
T02D1659:298b-37: dbu skra sma ra ser nag mdzes //
T02D1659:298b-38: spu rnams rdo rje gyen du 'khyil //
T02D1659:298b-39: sgeg pa dpa' bo 'jigs su rung //
T02D1659:298b-40: dgod dang gshe dang 'jigs par byed /
T02D1659:298b-41: snying rje rngam dang zhi ba yi //
T02D1659:299a-3: gtso bo'i phrin las kyi mdzad pa ni //
T02D1659:299a-4: gu lung dbang chen nye dbang bcas //
T02D1659:299a-5: nyi zla gshin rje tshangs par bcas //
T02D1659:299a-6: gnas gsum dag ni 'bar byas nas //
T02D1659:299a-7: thal ba bzhin du rab tu bshig //
T02D1659:299a-8: dbang phyug chen po gu lang gi gzugs kyis 'dod chags kyi lam la gnas pa dang /
T02D1659:299a-9: lha'i dbang po sa steng gi dbang po ste //
T02D1659:299a-10: nga rgyal gyi lam la gnas pa dang /
T02D1659:299a-11: dga' rab dbang phyug gis thams cad gsal bas nyi
T02D1659:299a-12: zla zhes grags pa phrag dog la gnas pa dang
T02D1659:299a-13: / khyab 'jug khro bas gshin rje lta bu zhe sdang la gnas pa dang /
T02D1659:299a-14: tshangs pa gti mug gi lam pa dag bcom ste /
T02D1659:299a-15: gnas gsum po'i tshogs rnams bsreg cing thal ba bzhin du gzhig par mdzad do //
T02D1659:299a-16: ci gang du 'di dag phyogs re 'dul ba'i don
T02D1659:299a-17: du bstan pa las 'dir kun 'dul bar mdzad ce
T02D1659:299a-18: na // shas che ba'i dbang du dgongs pa dang gcig gis cha shas las byung ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1659:299a-19: yang phyag mtshan gyi sgo nas /
T02D1659:299a-20: rdo rje rdo rje kha t'vam ga / dril bu'i sgra ni gsil ba yi //
T02D1659:299a-21: thams cad phab nas slar yang ni //
T02D1659:299a-23: 'dir ni phyag dang po gnyis kyi mtshan ma smos te /
T02D1659:299a-24: lhag ma dag ni le'u dgu pa'i gnas skabs nas ston to //
T02D1659:299a-25: de dag gsal bar ni rtsa ba'i rgyud las bstan te /
T02D1659:299a-26: g-yas g-yon dang pos rdo rje dang //
T02D1659:299a-27: rdo rje kha tv'am dril bur bcas //
T02D1659:299a-29: pags pa rlung gi tshul gyis bskor //
T02D1659:299a-30: gsum pa gyis na mda' dang gzhu //
T02D1659:299a-31: g-yas kyi bzhi pas dung khrag 'dzin //
T02D1659:299a-32: g-yon gyi bzhi pas thod pa bzung //
T02D1659:299a-33: snying rje chen pos bkang ba'o //
T02D1659:299a-35: yang gnas skabs la lar ni zhal gcig phyag bzhi
T02D1659:299a-36: pa la sogs pa'i rnam pas snang bar mdzad de
T02D1659:299a-37: / de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las /
T02D1659:299a-38: la lar zhal gcig phyag bzhi la //
T02D1659:299a-39: g-yas gnyis rdo rje dung khrag 'dzin //
T02D1659:299a-40: g-yon gnyis thod pa zhags par bcas //
T02D1659:299a-41: rdo rje kha tv'am se ral kha //
T02D1659:299a-42: la lar rdo rje bha ndha dmar //
T02D1659:299a-43: kha tv'am ga la rgyab brten bcas /
T02D1659:299a-45: de ltar rdo rje 'chang chen po las byung ba'i
T02D1659:299b-0: he ru ka de nyid sku mdog @299b dang zhal
T02D1659:299b-1: la sogs pa'i mtshan ma dang /
T02D1659:299b-3: phyag mtshan gyi rnam pa dag gsal bar bstan pa'i rjes la /
T02D1659:299b-4: cha lugs dang rgyan gyi mtshan nyid /
T02D1659:299b-5: dur khrod bzhin du rab tu 'jigs //
T02D1659:299b-6: zhes pa'i don ni rtsa ba'i rgyud las /
T02D1659:299b-7: glang chen stag gi pags pa yis //
T02D1659:299b-8: stod smad sku yin pa zar man pas //
T02D1659:299b-9: klu rgyal thod pa'i phreng ba yis //
T02D1659:299b-10: sku yi gnas brgyad rnam spras shing //
T02D1659:299b-11: lha chen dpa' bo'i g-yang gzhi dag /
T02D1659:299b-12: tsham dam chen po'i na bzar gsol //
T02D1659:299b-13: sku la thal bas byugs pa las //
T02D1659:299b-14: khrag dang zhag gi ri mos mtshan //
T02D1659:299b-15: phyag rgya lnga yi mtshan pa las ;
T02D1659:299b-16: ; snyan gong nyi zla rin chen phrang //
T02D1659:299b-18: de ltar 'bar ba chen po'i sku 'jigs pa'i chu lugs rnam par 'gyur ba'i tshul gyis //
T02D1659:299b-19: bud dregs byed dang lha chen po'i tshogs thams cad dbang du byas te drag po'i tshogs btul nas /
T02D1659:299b-20: sha khrag rus pa kun gsol zhing 'khor ba na gnas pa dag kyang brgyal bar mdzad de //
T02D1659:299b-21: de ltar thal bar gyur pa dag thugs rje chen
T02D1659:299b-22: pos mi gtong zhing rnam par shes pa slar gzung
T02D1659:299b-23: bar byas so // ci dga' ba sna tshogs kyi las grub par byed de //
T02D1659:299b-24: gong du lha chen po rnams kyis rnam par bstan cing //
T02D1659:299b-25: yang de nyid dang mi 'dra ba'i rnam pa gzhan ston pa dang /
T02D1659:299b-26: yang de dag gi skyabs mdzad cing /
T02D1659:299b-27: de dag sgrog par byed ce na /
T02D1659:299b-28: 'gal ba med de de'i rang bzhin du gnas pa dang /
T02D1659:299b-29: de 'dul ba'i rnam pa dang mthun par 'phrul ba dang /
T02D1659:299b-30: de bzhin gyis nyen pa'i sdug bsngal la skad cig
T02D1659:299b-31: tsam gyis bde bar gnas pa'i skyabs mdzad pa dang
T02D1659:299b-32: / yang de dang de nyid gnyis ka rnam par
T02D1659:299b-33: grol zhing byang chub chen po'i gnas su bkod pa
T02D1659:299b-34: la nyes pa'i skyon ci zhig yod /
T02D1659:299b-35: che ba'i yon tan gyi khyad par las snang ba'i mtshan ma'o //
T02D1659:299b-36: de yang shes rab dang bral ba'i thabs mi srid
T02D1659:299b-37: de 'od kyi snang ba dang bcas pa'i myu gu
T02D1659:299b-38: las grib ma skye ba'i tshul du yum bskyed cing
T02D1659:299b-40: de yi 'bar ba'i nyi ma las //
T02D1659:299b-41: byung ba'i grib ma mi bzad pa //
T02D1659:299b-42: bskyed nas ma lus bdud la sogs //
T02D1659:299b-43: gdug pa rnams kyi khrag za nus //
T02D1659:299b-44: de yang de'i don yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las /
T02D1659:300a-2: kro dhi shva ri 'jo sgeg stabs //
T02D1659:300a-3: sku mdog sngo skya nam mkha'i lus //
T02D1659:300a-4: se ral kha yi tshul dag tu //
T02D1659:300a-5: kha tv'am ga la rgyab brten bcas //
T02D1659:300a-6: lag pa g-yon pas thod pa thogs //
T02D1659:300a-7: g-yas pas ba dan gsum pa'i phyag / rin chen 'bar ba'i rgyan gyis mtshan //
T02D1659:300a-8: phyung nas byin gyis rlob mdzad de //
T02D1659:300a-9: thabs dang shes rab ldan par gyur //
T02D1659:300a-10: dregs byed bdud la sogs pa yi //
T02D1659:300a-11: 'byung po thams cad rmongs mdzad de //
T02D1659:300a-12: gdug pa'i tshogs kyi sha dang khrag //
T02D1659:300a-13: ma lus yud tsam cig la gsol //
T02D1659:300a-15: de dag kyang ston pa'i dgongs mdzad kyi dbang du ni kho na ltar snang ba yin la //
T02D1659:300a-16: rjes su 'jug pa'i dbang du ni sbyor ba'i yan lag dang /
T02D1659:300a-17: rjes su sbyor ba'i yan lag gis rgyas par bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1659:300a-18: da ni shin tu sbyor ba'i rim pas 'khor bskyed pa'i phyir //
T02D1659:300a-19: rgyal po de ni de dag dang //
T02D1659:300a-20: lhan cig dur khrod rnam par rol //
T02D1659:300a-21: thams cad rdo rjer mnyam sbyor ba //
T02D1659:300a-23: dpal he ru ka ni chos bdun gyi bdag nyid dang ldan pas rgyal po chen po lta bu'o //
T02D1659:300a-24: 'khor gyi lha mo dag ni de nyid kyi sku
T02D1659:300a-25: dang ye shes dang yon tan gyi snang ba las
T02D1659:300a-26: byung bas / de dag dang lhan cig tu gnas shing dur khrod brgyad du rnam par rol lo //
T02D1659:300a-27: de dag kyang gang zhe na /
T02D1659:300a-28: goo r'i ma la la sogs pa'i ma mo chen mo brgyad dang /
T02D1659:300a-29: mda' 'dzin ma la sogs pa'i phrin las kyi lha mo bzhi dang /
T02D1659:300a-30: me tog ma la sogs pa'i mchod pa'i lha mo bzhi dang ;
T02D1659:300a-31: rta mgrin 'phang mtho ma la sogs pa'i sgo ma bzhi ste /
T02D1659:300a-32: lha mo nyi shu thams cad sku gsung thugs rdo
T02D1659:300a-33: rje'i ngo bor mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro'i dkyil
T02D1659:300a-35: de dag gi phrin las ci zhig mdzad ce na //
T02D1659:300a-36: shin tu gdug cing khro drag pa'i ;
T02D1659:300a-37: ; sems can khams ni rnam sbyangs nas //
T02D1659:300a-38: dag pa'i sangs rgyas zhing khams su //
T02D1659:300a-39: sangs rgyas byang chub dag la bkod //
T02D1659:300a-40: bdud ma trang ma ru tra la sogs pa'i nyon
T02D1659:300a-41: mongs pa spyi dang khyad par gyi lam la gnas
T02D1659:300a-42: pa dag gi sems can gyi khams rnam par sbyor
T02D1659:300b-0: zhing / @300b sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la bkod pa'o //
T02D1659:300b-1: de yang ji ltar zhe na /
T02D1659:300b-2: ngag pa'i sangs rgyas zhing la sbyor ba ste dpal
T02D1659:300b-3: he ru kas ni zhe sdang las skyes pa'i nyon
T02D1659:300b-4: mongs pa spyi'i lam pa dag 'dul bar mdzad pa
T02D1659:300b-5: dang / lha mo goo r'i mas zhi ba'i sgo
T02D1659:300b-6: nas thugs kyi phrin las kyis sems can zhe sdang
T02D1659:300b-7: gi khams la gnas pa dag rnam par sbyong zhing
T02D1659:300b-8: dang / // rdo rje'i rigs dag pa'i sangs rgyas
T02D1659:300b-9: kyi zhing khams su me long lta bu'i ye shes
T02D1659:300b-10: kyi rang bzhin sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la rab
T02D1659:300b-11: dang / // tu 'god pa'o // ha mo gzhan
T02D1659:300b-12: yang des 'gro ste tsoo r'i mas nga rgyal gyi
T02D1659:300b-13: lam la gnas pa rnam par sbyang ba dang /
T02D1659:300b-14: pra mo has 'dod chags kyi lam la gnas pa rnam par sbyang ba dang /
T02D1659:300b-15: bee ta l'is phrag dog gi lam la gnas pa rnam par sbyang ba dang /
T02D1659:300b-16: pu kka s'is gti mug gi lam la gnas pa rnam par sbyang ba dang /
T02D1659:300b-17: tsanda l'is nyon mongs pa spyi'i lam la gnas pa rnam par sbyang ba dang /
T02D1659:300b-18: gha sma r'is log par lta ba la gnas pa rnam par sbyang ba dang /
T02D1659:300b-19: sma sha n'is the tshom dang yid gnyis kyi rnam par rtog pa dag sbyong bar mdzad pa'o //
T02D1659:300b-20: yang mdzad pa rgya che po'i sgo nas //
T02D1659:300b-21: khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i phyir //
T02D1659:300b-22: rdo rje 'dod khro la sogs kyis //
T02D1659:300b-23: rtog pa bla med thams cad kyis //
T02D1659:300b-24: nam mkha' dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i //
T02D1659:300b-25: sems can khams ni rnam par sbyangs //
T02D1659:300b-26: dpal he ru ka la khro bo chen po bcus bskor ba'i dkyil 'khor dang /
T02D1659:300b-27: khro bo re res rigs kyi dkyil 'khor mdzad pa'i
T02D1659:300b-28: dkyil 'khor grangs med pa'i rnam par spros te sems
T02D1659:300b-29: can gyi rgyud sbyong bar mdzad pa'o //
T02D1659:300b-30: rjes su sgrub pa'i rim pa ni dpal he ru
T02D1659:300b-31: ka'i gsang ba'i don rnam par bkod pa las shes
T02D1659:300b-32: par bya'o // dpal he ru ka'i dbugs dbyung ba'i don rnam par bshad pa'o //
T02D1659:300b-33: da ni gti mug gi rgyu dang rkyen dang 'bras
T02D1659:300b-34: bu'i lam la nyon mongs pa spyi dang khyad par
T02D1659:300b-35: gyi mtshan nyid rtag chad kyi mtha' can log par
T02D1659:300b-36: lta ba la gnas pa rnams gdul ba'i don du
T02D1659:300b-37: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes la snang zhing /
T02D1659:300b-38: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung padma'i rigs
T02D1659:300b-39: dpal padma gar gyi dbang phyug gi dkyil 'khor gyis
T02D1659:301a-2: dang por dgongs mdzad kyi dus bstan te /
T02D1659:301a-3: 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba //
T02D1659:301a-4: bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi //
T02D1659:301a-5: 'das pa'i tshe bskal ba bcud ldan gyi dus su sangs rgyas padma'i dpal 'jig rten du byung ngo //
T02D1659:301a-6: de'i bstan pa la dge slong rgyal ba'i mchog ces
T02D1659:301a-7: bya bas bka'i don phyin ci log tu spyad de
T02D1659:301a-8: / rtag chad kyi mtha' la gnas shing /
T02D1659:301a-9: log pa'i lta ba dang ldan pas ngan song rnam
T02D1659:301a-10: gsum du 'khor zhing sdug bsngal nyams su myong ngo
T02D1659:301a-11: // de las thar nas dregs byed mtha' la gnas
T02D1659:301a-12: pa zhes bya ba nyon mongs pa'i lam la zhen
T02D1659:301a-13: cing rang gi lta ba 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
T02D1659:301a-14: de 'dul ba'i gnyen por rdo rje 'chang chen po
T02D1659:301a-15: nyid kyi sku las dpal padma gar gyi dbang phyug
T02D1659:301a-16: rnam par 'phrul ba'i gar thabs dang bcas pa'i dkyil
T02D1659:301a-17: 'khor chen po rnam par byung ngo //
T02D1659:301a-19: rang gi lta ba rtag par 'dzin pa'i rgyu dang
T02D1659:301a-20: rkyen gyis ni gdul bya'i rnam pa thun mong dang
T02D1659:301a-21: khyad par gyi tshogs snang zhing /
T02D1659:301a-22: sku gsum rtag pa'i sgo nas 'dul byed kyi bde bar gshegs pa byung ngo //
T02D1659:301a-23: des na gdul bya 'dul byed spyi'i mtshan nyid ni /
T02D1659:301a-24: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab las /
T02D1659:301a-25: 'gro ba'i don ni sngon byung ba //
T02D1659:301a-26: bka'i don phyin ci log tu spyad pa'i dus thugs
T02D1659:301a-27: rje chen po skye ba'i yul 'gro ba'i tshul du
T02D1659:301a-29: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab ji bzhin par spyad
T02D1659:301a-30: pa'i mthus thugs rje chen po'i mtshan nyid de dang
T02D1659:301a-32: de la thugs rje skye ba'i yul gyi mtshan nyid ni /
T02D1659:301a-33: de tshe sems can thams cad ni //
T02D1659:301a-34: log par lta ba gnas par 'gyur //
T02D1659:301a-35: shin tu lta ba ngan pa yis //
T02D1659:301a-37: bskal pa bcu ldan gyi dus kyi tshe de nyid
T02D1659:301a-38: na las kyi dbang gis skye 'gro ma lus pa
T02D1659:301a-39: thams cad nyon mongs pa gti mug gi lam la
T02D1659:301a-40: gnas shing log par lta bas kun du rmongs te
T02D1659:301a-41: / rtag chad kyi mtha' la gnas pa dang /
T02D1659:301a-42: de dag gi nang nas kyang dge slong rgyal ba mchog dang /
T02D1659:301a-43: de'i rjes su 'brang ba dag ste de dag gi
T02D1659:301a-44: rgyu dang rkyen dang 'bras bu'i rnam pa dag gzigs
T02D1659:301b-0: @301b pa'o ; / rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das //
T02D1659:301b-1: byang chub sems ni rnam sbyong phyir //
T02D1659:301b-2: padmo chags par sbyor ba yis //
T02D1659:301b-3: rdo rje chos su gnas par gyur //
T02D1659:301b-4: rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid kyis gsung gi rnam par 'phrul pa ni padma'i rigs te /
T02D1659:301b-5: gang zhig rang bzhin byang chub kyi sems rnam par
T02D1659:301b-6: dag pa'i ngo bo las gzhan 'dul ba'i thabs su
T02D1659:301b-7: rdo rje chos su snang ste /
T02D1659:301b-8: ji ltar zhi na rtsa ba'i rgyud las /
T02D1659:301b-9: sku mdog dkar la dmar zhad chags //
T02D1659:301b-10: zhal mang brgya phyed phyag gis mdzes ;
T02D1659:301b-11: ; g-yas kyi padma rdo rje dang //
T02D1659:301b-12: 'khor lo rin chen dbyug sogs kyis //
T02D1659:301b-13: mtshan zhing g-yon pa'i phyag dag gis //
T02D1659:301b-15: mtshan sogs dpe byad bzang pos mdzes //
T02D1659:301b-17: rin chen la sogs rgyan phreng tshogs ;
T02D1659:301b-18: ; dar gyi gos rgyan cod pan dpyangs //
T02D1659:301b-19: bkra shis skyil krung legs bzhugs shing //
T02D1659:301b-20: bsnyems bcas chags pa'i tshul du gzigs //
T02D1659:301b-22: de yang rjes su 'jug pa'i dbang du ni /
T02D1659:301b-23: padma chags par sbyor ba'i tshul du yang //
T02D1659:301b-25: byin rlabs rigs kyi dbu rgyan gyis //
T02D1659:301b-26: rgyu yi mgon po rdo rje 'chang //
T02D1659:301b-27: dpal ldan padma gar dbang phyug / cha lugs mtshan ma rgyan gsal gyur //
T02D1659:301b-29: ci skabs 'dir sangs rgyas snang ba mtha' yas la
T02D1659:301b-30: rdo rje chos la sogs pa ming gi bye brag
T02D1659:301b-32: de ni rang bzhin gyi bye brag chos zhes bya
T02D1659:301b-33: ba phrin las kyi sgo nas spyan ras gzigs kyi
T02D1659:301b-34: dbang phyug ces bya ba dang /
T02D1659:301b-35: phrin las sna tshogs kyi 'bras bu'i sgo nas padma gar gyi dbang phyug ces so //
T02D1659:301b-36: de nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid ni /
T02D1659:301b-38: chags pa'i nyes pas mi gos pa //
T02D1659:301b-39: de bzhin bag chags khams gsum gyi //
T02D1659:301b-40: nyes pa sna tshogs rnam par dag / dper na padma'i dkyil 'khor ni //
T02D1659:301b-41: 'dam rdzab las skyes shing de dag gi dri mas ma gos pa bzhin du //
T02D1659:302a-0: gsung padma'i rigs kyi rnam par 'phrul pa byang chub sems kyi ngo bo rnam @302a * //
T02D1659:302a-1: par dag pa las byung ba'i sku 'di yang khams
T02D1659:302a-2: gsum gyi nyes pa sna tshogs las rnam par grol
T02D1659:302a-3: ba'o // des na chags pa rnam pa gnyis dang
T02D1659:302a-4: ma bral ba'i tshul gyis spyod cing gnas pas na
T02D1659:302a-6: de yang thabs kyi zhags pa'i rtsa ba'i rgyud las /
T02D1659:302a-8: de ltar 'khor ba spangs spyod min //
T02D1659:302a-9: mtha' gnyis las grol rnam spyod pa //
T02D1659:302a-10: kun du snang ba mtha' yas sku //
T02D1659:302a-11: gsang ba theg chen bla med gzhung //
T02D1659:302a-12: de nyid dkyil 'khor rnam gsal ston //
T02D1659:302a-14: de nyid kyi phrin las kyi mtshan nyid ni /
T02D1659:302a-15: 'di ni kun du gzigs pas na //
T02D1659:302a-16: rgyal ba'ang dbang phyug nyid du 'gyur //
T02D1659:302a-17: dpal ldan spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang //
T02D1659:302a-18: rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs //
T02D1659:302a-19: gdul bya'i las ji lta ba bzhin du dbang po
T02D1659:302a-20: dang skye mched kyi bye brag rgya cher gzigs nas
T02D1659:302a-21: / mthun pa'i sku gsung thugs kyi phrin las kyis gzhan gyi don mdzad par dgongs nas /
T02D1659:302a-22: nyid kyi yon tan rnam par bkod pas bdud rnams bcom zhing /
T02D1659:302a-23: dbang phyug brgyad dang ldan pas thugs rje chen po rtse gcig pa dang ldan te /
T02D1659:302a-24: dus dang rnam pa thams cad du kun du gzigs par mdzad pa ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste /
T02D1659:302a-25: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid yin pa'o //
T02D1659:302a-27: 'dod chags thams cad dag pas na //
T02D1659:302a-28: mchog sbyin dam pa bcom ldan 'das //
T02D1659:302a-29: phyin ci log gi rtog pa las byung ba'i 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams la /
T02D1659:302a-30: la las de nyid la spyad pas grol bar 'dod pa dang /
T02D1659:302a-31: la las spangs pas grol bar 'dod pa dang /
T02D1659:302a-32: la las sbyangs pas grol bar 'dod pa ni /
T02D1659:302a-33: rnam par dag pa ma yin te /
T02D1659:302a-34: de dag ma spangs par dag pa'i rang bzhin du
T02D1659:302a-35: mkhyen pa ni gsang ba bla na med pa'i don
T02D1659:302a-36: te / de nyid la spyod pa'i sgo nas dngos
T02D1659:302a-37: grub mchog sbyin zhing dam pa grub par mdzad pas
T02D1659:302a-39: yang phrin las sna tshogs kyi 'bras bu'i sgo nas /
T02D1659:302a-40: 'dul ba'i thabs ni sna tshogs kyis //
T02D1659:302a-41: sna tshogs pa ni 'dul bar mos //
T02D1659:302a-42: kun tu spyan ras gzigs dbang rgyal //
T02D1659:302b-0: padmo @302b gar gyi dbang phyag gyur //
T02D1659:302b-1: 'gro ba'i tshul du 'dul ba'i don du gzugs kyi
T02D1659:302b-2: cha lugs sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i zhal phyag mang
T02D1659:302b-3: po dang / sku las snang ba'i gzugs brnyan mang por ston pa'o //
T02D1659:302b-4: de yang le'u dgu pa las /
T02D1659:302b-5: gar thabs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis //
T02D1659:302b-6: yongs su bsgyur zhing gar byas pas //
T02D1659:302b-8: phyag ni brgyad rnams 'khor lo bskor //
T02D1659:302b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa kun la sogs pa'i gzugs mchog
T02D1659:302b-11: sna tshogs 'dzin zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs so
T02D1659:302b-12: // des na gang zhig kun du gzigs pa'i ngang
T02D1659:302b-13: tshul dang ldan pa de la de skad ces bya'o
T02D1659:302b-14: // // de ltar phrin las sna tshogs kyi ngo
T02D1659:302b-15: bo de gang las byung zhing ji lta bu zhe
T02D1659:302b-16: // // na / padmo sgyu ma rgyal po mnyam sbyor ba //
T02D1659:302b-17: mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog des //
T02D1659:302b-18: dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med pa'i ngo bo
T02D1659:302b-19: thabs dang shes rab las byung ba de nyid ni
T02D1659:302b-20: sku gsum gnyis su med pa'i mtshan nyid can no
T02D1659:302b-21: // de nyid kyi snang ba padma'i rigs kyi lha'i
T02D1659:302b-22: dkyil 'khor rnams ni mkha' 'gro sgyu ma chog go
T02D1659:302b-23: // // yang phrin las sna tshogs kyi sgo nas mdzad pa rgya chen po bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1659:302b-24: dpal padma gar dbang la sogs pa //
T02D1659:302b-25: rtog pa bla med thams cad kyis //
T02D1659:302b-26: nam mkha'i dbyings kyis mtha' klas pa //
T02D1659:302b-27: sems can khams ni rnam par sbyangs //
T02D1659:302b-28: gang zhig rang gi lta ba sna tshogs kyi rtog
T02D1659:302b-29: pa la spyod pa'i 'gro ba ni grangs med de
T02D1659:302b-30: / de dag gi don du sngon byung ba'i dkyil 'khor dang /
T02D1659:302b-31: rjes 'jug gi sgrub pa'i rim pa mang por bstan zhing gsungs te /
T02D1659:302b-32: rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa grangs mang du
T02D1659:302b-33: snang ba dag kyang dpal ldan padma gar gyi dbang
T02D1659:302b-34: phyug yab yum gyi snang ba yin te /
T02D1659:302b-35: de nyid kyang dpal rdo rje 'chang chen po'i byin gyi rlabs las byung ba'o //
T02D1659:302b-36: de lta bu'i skus skye 'gro ji snyed du rnam par sbyong zhing /
T02D1659:302b-37: sgo gzhan gyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas pas
T02D1659:302b-38: sems can gyi khams ni rnam par sbyong bar mdzad
T02D1659:302b-39: do // de dag rnal 'byor bas nyams su blang
T02D1659:302b-40: ba'i rim pa ni dpal padma gar gyi dbang phyug
T02D1659:302b-41: gi gsang ba'i don rnam par bkod pa las shes
T02D1659:303a-1: ; dpal padma gar gyi dbang phyug gi dbugs dbyur ba'i don rnam par bshad pa'o //
T02D1659:303a-2: da ni sred cing zhen pa dang gdug cing rngam
T02D1659:303a-3: pas shin tu 'jungs par gyur ba'i nyon mongs pa
T02D1659:303a-4: spyi dang khyad par gyi 'gro ba dag rjes su
T02D1659:303a-5: gzung ba'i phyir / so sor rtog pa'i ye shes
T02D1659:303a-6: las snang zhing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
T02D1659:303a-7: yon tan rin po che'i rigs dpal rdo rje nyi
T02D1659:303a-8: mas dbugs dbyung ba'i tshul bstan te /
T02D1659:303a-9: de las dang po dgongs mdzad kyi dus ni /
T02D1659:303a-10: 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba //
T02D1659:303a-11: bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi //
T02D1659:303a-12: bskal ba mi gnas pa'i dus su sangs rgyas nyi
T02D1659:303a-13: ma'i dpal zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo
T02D1659:303a-14: // de'i bstan pa la dge slong 'byor ba can zhes bya bas bka'i don log par spyad de /
T02D1659:303a-15: nyon mongs pa'i chu bos g-yengs nas ngan song rnam pa gsum du 'khor zhing /
T02D1659:303a-16: de las thar nas dregs byed 'jungs pa can zhes bya bar skyes so //
T02D1659:303a-17: de 'dul ba'i gnyen por rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid kyi sku las /
T02D1659:303a-18: dpal rdo rje nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs gsungs so zhes pa'o //
T02D1659:303a-20: bdag nyid chen po rtag pa las so //
T02D1659:303a-21: de yang spyi'i mtshan nyid ni //
T02D1659:303a-22: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab las //
T02D1659:303a-23: 'gro ba'i tshul ni sngon byung ba //
T02D1659:303a-24: gdul bya dang 'dul byed kyi spyi'i mtshan nyid de
T02D1659:303a-25: bstan pa'i don log par spyad pa dang ji bzhin
T02D1659:303a-26: par spyad pa'i dbang gis las dang thugs rje 'brel
T02D1659:303a-27: bar gyur ba'o // de la thugs rje skye ba'i yul gyi mtshan nyid ji lta bu zhe na /
T02D1659:303a-28: de tshe sems can thams cad ni //
T02D1659:303a-29: shin tu gdug cing bskam par gyur //
T02D1659:303a-30: zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gnyis gsungs so //
T02D1659:303a-31: bskal pa mi gnas pa de nyid kyi tshe na
T02D1659:303a-32: bdud dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis blo
T02D1659:303a-33: bslad pa'i 'gro ba thun mong dang /
T02D1659:303a-34: khyad par tshogs rnams lus shin tu gdug cing ngag
T02D1659:303a-35: shin tu bskam pa dang sems shin tu 'jungs par
T02D1659:303a-36: gyur pas / yi dags gshin rje'i dmyal bar ltung zhing yun ring du gnas so //
T02D1659:303a-37: de nyid las zad pa'i dbang gis grol nas mi'i
T02D1659:303b-0: gnas su shin tu dbul zhing @303b phongs pa dang
T02D1659:303b-1: / bkres shing skom pa'i sdug bsngal gyis gdungs te /
T02D1659:303b-2: phan tshun gcig gis gcig gsod par byed do //
T02D1659:303b-3: de'i las zad nas yi dags kyi srin po dregs byed 'jungs pa can zhes bya bar gyur nas /
T02D1659:303b-4: skye 'gro thams cad kyi tshe srog 'phrog cing 'jig rten gyi khams phung bar byas so //
T02D1659:303b-5: de gdul ba'i gnyen por thugs rje chen po'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1659:303b-6: shin tu gdug pa sbyang ba'i phyir //
T02D1659:303b-8: dam pa'i don gyi nor chen po //
T02D1659:303b-9: rdo rje nyi ma byung bar gyur //
T02D1659:303b-10: gzhan gyis 'dul bar mi 'gyur ba'i dregs byed kyi
T02D1659:303b-11: tshogs sde dang bcas pa de dag sgo kun du
T02D1659:303b-12: sbyang ba'i phyir / dpal rdo rje sems dpa' zag
T02D1659:303b-13: pa med pa'i yon tan gyi rin po che'i tshogs
T02D1659:303b-14: thams cad dang ldan pa'i sku dpal rdo rje nyi
T02D1659:303b-16: de nyid ji lta bu zhe na rtsa ba'i rgyud las /
T02D1659:303b-17: gser gyi ri le nyi shar bzhin //
T02D1659:303b-18: zhal bzhi phyag bzhi rnam mdzes pa //
T02D1659:303b-19: g-yas na mda' dang ral gri 'dzin //
T02D1659:303b-20: g-yon gzhu nyi dkyil rdo rjes mtshan //
T02D1659:303b-22: 'dzum bcas g-yon mig gyen du bteg / ces pa dang /
T02D1659:303b-23: yang zhi bas mi 'dul ba la khro bo'i skur yang snang ste /
T02D1659:303b-24: la lar cung zhig khros pa las //
T02D1659:303b-25: byi ru dmar po'i mdangs ldan sku //
T02D1659:303b-26: zhabs gnyis skyil krung legs bzhugs shing //
T02D1659:303b-27: snga ma'i rgyan gyis mdzes byas pa'o //
T02D1659:303b-29: de lta bu'i sku yum dang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor
T02D1659:303b-30: du bcas pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi mdangs dang
T02D1659:303b-31: ldan pa 'gro ba'i don du phung bar mdzad pa'o
T02D1659:303b-32: // da ni rang bzhin gyi mdzad pa bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1659:303b-33: nam mkha'i snying po thams cad phyogs //
T02D1659:303b-34: kun gyi re ba yongs rdzogs mdzad //
T02D1659:303b-35: bud med la sogs rin chen mchog / mkha' la rin chen thams cad 'bebs ;
T02D1659:303b-36: ; gang zhig rang bzhin dang yon tan dang phrin
T02D1659:303b-37: las kyi rnam pa dag dang ldan pa de nyid
T02D1659:303b-38: la ni de dang mthun pa'i mtshan btags te bcom
T02D1659:303b-39: ldan 'das rin chen 'byung ldan nyid la nam mkha'i
T02D1659:303b-40: snying po dang / rdo rje rin chen dang /
T02D1659:304a-2: de nyid kyis dbang bskur ba'i ngo bo nyid dang /
T02D1659:304a-3: gter gyis re ba rdzogs par mdzad pa dang /
T02D1659:304a-4: rin po che'i rgyal mtshan gyi gzugs can dang /
T02D1659:304a-5: mchod pa rnam par 'phrul ba la sogs pa'i tshul du lha mo dag gi rnam par 'phrul pas /
T02D1659:304a-6: nam mkha'i snying po bzhin du gnas thams cad du
T02D1659:304a-7: khyab par mdzad cing phyogs kun gyi re ba dag
T02D1659:304a-8: ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par
T02D1659:304a-9: mdzad do // ji lta bu'i rnam pas she na /
T02D1659:304a-10: btsun mo rin po che dang /
T02D1659:304a-12: dmag mi rin po che dang /
T02D1659:304a-13: rta rgyal rin po che dang /
T02D1659:304a-14: glang po rin po che dang /
T02D1659:304a-16: nor bu rin po che la sogs pa'i rdzas rnams nam mkha' las char bzhin 'bebs pa'o //
T02D1659:304a-17: de lta bu zhi bas mi 'dul ba dag la
T02D1659:304a-18: khro bor bsgyur zhing phrin las lhag pa'i sgo nas
T02D1659:304a-20: shin tu gdug cing khro ba la //
T02D1659:304a-21: zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te //
T02D1659:304a-22: shes rab thabs kyi nyi mas ni //
T02D1659:304a-23: rab tu gdungs pa kun sgrub pas //
T02D1659:304a-24: 'jungs pa yi dags kyi srin po gshin rje'i tshogs
T02D1659:304a-25: dang bcas pa de dag ni thabs gzhan gyis gdul
T02D1659:304a-27: mthun pa'i gnyen pos khros pa'i sku bstan cing nyi
T02D1659:304a-28: ma 'bum gyi gzi brjid dang bcas pa'i thabs dang
T02D1659:304a-29: shes rab thugs rje chen po dang ldan pas 'gro
T02D1659:304a-30: ba'i gdung ba thams cad gcod cing skems par mdzad
T02D1659:304a-31: pa'o // de yang ji ltar zhe na /
T02D1659:304a-32: bya ba dang ni bzlog pa dang //
T02D1659:304a-33: dbrog pas kyang khyad par du //
T02D1659:304a-34: brgyal bar byas nas gnas gsum gyi //
T02D1659:304a-35: nor gyi tshogs kun sdud par byed //
T02D1659:304a-36: mda' la sogs pa'i mtshon cha la la dag 'khrul
T02D1659:304a-37: 'khor la sogs pa la brten te 'phangs shing dge
T02D1659:304a-38: ba'i las la gzud pa dang /
T02D1659:304a-39: 'khor lo la sogs pa'i mtshon cha dag la gab
T02D1659:304a-40: pas 'phangs shing sdig pa'i las la bzlog pa dang
T02D1659:304a-41: / zhags pa la sogs pas slar yang drangs te mthu dang rdzu 'phrul thams cad dbrog pa dang /
T02D1659:304a-42: khyad par gyi phrin las kyis mi mthun pa'i rgol
T02D1659:304a-43: ba thams cad bcom zhing khams gsum las rgyal bar
T02D1659:304a-44: byas te / nor gyi tshogs rnams sdud par mdzad pa'o //
T02D1659:304a-45: de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las /
T02D1659:304a-46: rdo rje nyi ma rgyal chen pos //
T02D1659:304b-0: rang @304b gi 'od kyi snang ba'i tshogs //
T02D1659:304b-1: phyogs rnams kun du gsal mdzad cing //
T02D1659:304b-2: rab tu gdung ba sel bar mdzad //
T02D1659:304b-3: dge ba'i bya ba la gzud cing //
T02D1659:304b-4: mi dge lam las bzlog pa dang //
T02D1659:304b-5: yon tan thams cad 'phrog mdzad de //
T02D1659:304b-6: khams gsum kun las rgyal bar mdzad //
T02D1659:304b-7: slar nyid yon tan che ba'i mthus //
T02D1659:304b-8: de 'dod kun la sbyin par mdzad //
T02D1659:304b-10: da ni phrin las rgya chen po'i mtshan nyid bstan te /
T02D1659:304b-11: 'jig rten gsum rgyal la sogs kyi //
T02D1659:304b-12: rtog pa bla med thams cad kyis //
T02D1659:304b-13: nam mkha' dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i //
T02D1659:304b-14: sems can khams ni rab tu bkrol ;
T02D1659:304b-15: ; gang zhig 'jig rten gsum 'joms pa'i mthu dang ldan pa de la de skad ces bya ste /
T02D1659:304b-16: de nyid rdo rje nyi ma'o //
T02D1659:304b-17: de las byung ba'i dkyil 'khor mi 'dra ba rnam
T02D1659:304b-18: pa sna tshogs pas 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa ste
T02D1659:304b-19: / khyad par gyi phrin las ji lta ba'i rnam pas mthar phyin pa'i mtshan nyid do ;
T02D1659:304b-20: ; de dag ni sngon byung ba'i dgongs mdzad bstan te /
T02D1659:304b-21: de dang rjes su mthun pa'i sgo nas rjes su 'jug pa'i bya ba'i rnam par yang snang ste /
T02D1659:304b-22: 'di ni thun mong du bstan pa yin no //
T02D1659:304b-23: de dag gi sgrub pa'i rim pa ni dpal rdo
T02D1659:304b-24: rje nyi ma'i gsang ba'i don rnam par bkod pa
T02D1659:304b-26: dpal rdo rje nyi ma dbugs dbyung ba'i don rnam par bshad pa'o //
T02D1659:304b-27: de ni sems can phrag dog gi lam la gnas
T02D1659:304b-28: shing rang gi lta bas bsnyems pa'i nga rgyal dang
T02D1659:304b-29: bcas pa la lo'i las can yang dag pa'i lam
T02D1659:304b-30: la ma gus pa'i lha chen po dregs byed kyi
T02D1659:304b-31: tshogs la sogs pa'i spyi'i lam pa rnams dang /
T02D1659:304b-32: khyad par dregs byed sna tshogs 'phrul pa can sde dang bcas pa dag 'dul ba'i phyir /
T02D1659:304b-33: bya ba grub pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyi
T02D1659:304b-34: snang ba can de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
T02D1659:304b-35: phrin las rgya chen po'i bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das
T02D1659:304b-36: dpal rta mchog rol ba'i dkyil 'khor 'phrul ba'i tshul
T02D1659:304b-37: bstan te / dang por dgongs mdzad kyi dus ni /
T02D1659:304b-38: 'dus pa'i dus ni sngon byung ba //
T02D1659:304b-39: bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi //
T02D1659:304b-40: bskal ba gzi chen snang ba zhes bya ba'i dus
T02D1659:304b-41: su sangs rgyas rnga sgra zhes bya ba 'jig rten
T02D1659:305a-0: du byung ngo // de'i bstan pa la dge bsnyen zla ba zhes bya @305a * //
T02D1659:305a-1: bas bka'i don log par spyad de ngan song gsum du yun ring du 'khor ro //
T02D1659:305a-2: de las thar nas dregs byed sna tshogs 'phrul ba
T02D1659:305a-3: can zhes bya ba chung ma'i tshogs dang bcas pa
T02D1659:305a-4: byung nas / lha chen po dag gi nyon mongs skyed par byed do //
T02D1659:305a-5: de 'dul ba'i gnyen por rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid kyi sku las /
T02D1659:305a-6: rta mchog rol pa'i dkyil 'khor sngon byung zhes pa'o //
T02D1659:305a-8: mi mthun pa dang gnyen po'i sgo nas rtag pa gnyis las so //
T02D1659:305a-9: de dag gi spyi'i tshul ni /
T02D1659:305a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la //
T02D1659:305a-11: 'gor ba'i tshul ni sngon byung ba //
T02D1659:305a-12: bka'i don phyin ci log tu spyad pa'i rkyen dang /
T02D1659:305a-13: ji bzhin par rtog pa'i mthus //
T02D1659:305a-14: gdul bya 'dul byed gnyis kyi mtshan nyid 'gro ba'i tshul du byung zhes so //
T02D1659:305a-15: de la thugs rje skye ba'i yul gyi mtshan nyid ni /
T02D1659:305a-16: de tshe sems can thams cad ni //
T02D1659:305a-18: shin tu brtson 'grus chung ba yis //
T02D1659:305a-19: mnar med pa yi dmyal bar ltung //
T02D1659:305a-20: bskal pa gzi chen snang ba'i dus de nyid na
T02D1659:305a-21: sems can thams cad le lo dang snyom las kyi
T02D1659:305a-22: dbang gis rang nyid brtson 'grus dang bral zhing /
T02D1659:305a-23: gzhan la brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dag la yang smod par byed do //
T02D1659:305a-24: de'i rgyus ngan song la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal nyams
T02D1659:305a-25: su myong zhing de las grol nas dregs byed sna
T02D1659:305a-26: tshogs 'phrul pa la sogs pa'i tshogs su gnas pa'o
T02D1659:305a-27: // de 'dul ba'i gnyen por thugs rje chen po'i mtshan nyid ni //
T02D1659:305a-29: rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs //
T02D1659:305a-30: drag shul sbyor ba'i tshul dag tu //
T02D1659:305a-31: rta mchog dpal ni byung bar 'gyur //
T02D1659:305a-32: pha rol gnon pa'i mthu rtsal dang ldan pa'i rta mchog dpal gyi dkyil 'khor 'byung bar bstan te /
T02D1659:305a-33: de yang tshul ji ltar zhe na /
T02D1659:305a-35: zhal bzhi pa la phyag brgyad pa //
T02D1659:305a-36: de bzhin zhabs kyang rnam pa bzhi //
T02D1659:305a-37: zhal rnams dmar dang nag po dang //
T02D1659:305a-38: dkar zhing rta mgo ljang gu ston //
T02D1659:305a-39: sku yi kha dog ljang gu dang //
T02D1659:305a-40: phyag rnams dmar la zhabs nag po //
T02D1659:305a-41: g-yas pas ba dan gsum pa bsgreng //
T02D1659:305a-42: sna tshogs rdo rje ral gri mda' //
T02D1659:305b-0: @305b g-yon pa khu tshur sna tshogs dang //
T02D1659:305b-1: mdung dang dbyug pa gzhu 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1659:305b-2: g-yas pas gru gsum dpal mo mnan //
T02D1659:305b-3: gnyis pas gros ma dga' ma'o //
T02D1659:305b-4: g-yon pas mig gsum khyab 'jug dang //
T02D1659:305b-5: gnyis pas tshangs pa dga' rab gnon //
T02D1659:305b-6: khro rtags drug cu rtsa gcig dang ;
T02D1659:305b-7: ;'bar ba chen po'i rgyan gyis mdzes //
T02D1659:305b-9: da ni mdzad pa sna tshogs kyi sgo nas ngo mthon du las spyod pa'i phyir //
T02D1659:305b-10: thams cad dag par mos pa yis //
T02D1659:305b-11: sdig byed stobs kyis ngo mthon du //
T02D1659:305b-12: pha rol gnon pa'i rtsa lag gis //
T02D1659:305b-13: shin tu gdug cing khro gtum pa'o ;
T02D1659:305b-14: ; sems can rnam pa mang po'i khams //
T02D1659:305b-15: 'jig rten thams cad rab tu 'jig / gang zhig
T02D1659:305b-16: byams pa dang snying rje'i chus brlan zhing 'gro ba
T02D1659:305b-17: thams cad bu gcig pa ltar dgongs pas /
T02D1659:305b-18: thams cad rnam par dag pa'i phyir zhe sdang gis bsad pa dang /
T02D1659:305b-19: gti mug gis dman pa'i rtog pa dang bral te /
T02D1659:305b-20: sdig pa med pa'i mthu dang rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis ngo mthon du las mdzad cing /
T02D1659:305b-21: dregs byed sna tshogs 'phrul pa la sogs pa pha
T02D1659:305b-22: rol po dag gnon pa la sogs pa'i mthu dang
T02D1659:305b-24: sha khrag kun gsol ba dang /
T02D1659:305b-25: lha chen po dag gis so /
T02D1659:305b-26: so'i nga rgyal zhi bar byas te /
T02D1659:305b-27: gti mug can gyi mchog tu gyur pa tshangs pa dang /
T02D1659:305b-28: 'dod chags can gyi mchog tu gyur pa dbang phyug chen po dang /
T02D1659:305b-29: zhe sdang can gyi mchog tu gyur pa khyab 'jug dang /
T02D1659:305b-30: nga rgyal can gyi mchog tu gyur pa brgya byin dang /
T02D1659:305b-31: phrag dog can gyi mchog tu gyur ba dga' rab
T02D1659:305b-32: dbang phyug rnams 'khor g-yog sde ris dang bcas pa
T02D1659:305b-34: yang mthun pa'i spyod pas thams cad gdul ba'i phyir /
T02D1659:305b-35: byi ba rkun po chom po yis //
T02D1659:305b-36: thams cad rnam par sbyong bar byed //
T02D1659:305b-37: brid pa dang ni sgyu dag dang /
T02D1659:305b-38: ngo 'thon stobs kyis de bzhin du //
T02D1659:305b-39: dgra cha lnga yis brgal nas ni //
T02D1659:305b-40: de tshe 'jig rten gsum las rgyal //
T02D1659:305b-41: gnas skabs la lar byi thabs kyis tshul gyis gzhan
T02D1659:305b-42: gyi chung ma la spyod cing 'jig rten gsum las
T02D1659:306a-0: yang gnas skabs la lar rkun po'i tshul du yon tan @306a * //
T02D1659:306a-1: la sogs pa'i snod du nor gyi rnam pa bsdu bar mdzad pa dang /
T02D1659:306a-2: chom po'i tshul du mngon sum du 'phrog pa dang /
T02D1659:306a-3: dor thabs kyi tshul du brid pa dang /
T02D1659:306a-4: mig 'phrul gyi tshul du sgyu ma las spyad pas 'gro ba thams cad rnam par sbyong zhing /
T02D1659:306a-5: dgra cha lngas brgal nas 'jig rten gsum las rgyal bar byed pa'o //
T02D1659:306a-6: de la dgra cha lnga ni le'u dgu pa'i phyag rgya nyi shu pa las bshad de /
T02D1659:306a-8: de bzhin lag pas 'phangs pa dang //
T02D1659:306a-9: 'phangs nas slad du bzung ba dang //
T02D1659:306a-10: stobs su 'gyed pa lnga yin te //
T02D1659:306a-11: rang byung rnams kyi dgra cha'i dpyad ;
T02D1659:306a-12: ; phyag rgya lnga la rab tu gnas //
T02D1659:306a-14: de lta bu'i mdzad pa de phyogs gcig pa yin nam zhe na /
T02D1659:306a-17: gang zhig skye ba gnas bzhi'i tshul du snang ba dag ni skye 'gro'i gnas so //
T02D1659:306a-18: de las byung ba'i 'gro ba rigs drug gi sems can rnams so //
T02D1659:306a-19: de dag gi mtha' thams cad ma lus par bsdus shing rtog pa mtha' dag rnams btul zhing //
T02D1659:306a-20: rang rang gi 'bras bu grub par byas pa'o //
T02D1659:306a-22: gdul ba'i thabs rnams sna tshogs kyis //
T02D1659:306a-23: rang gi rgyal srid rtag tu skyong ;
T02D1659:306a-24: ; g-yem pa rnams la g-yem par 'gyur //
T02D1659:306a-25: khro ba rnams la khro ba'i mchog / zhi ba
T02D1659:306a-26: rnams la zhi ba'i mchog / drag shul can la
T02D1659:306a-27: drag pos gnon // gang zhig 'dod chags kyi lam
T02D1659:306a-28: la zhen pa rnams 'dul ba'i don du ni zhal
T02D1659:306a-30: khro ba zhe sdang gi rgyud la gnas pa rnams
T02D1659:306a-31: 'dul ba'i don du ni g-yon pa nag por bstan
T02D1659:306a-32: pa dang / zhi ba gti mug gi lam la
T02D1659:306a-33: gnas pa rnams 'dul ba'i don du ni g-yas pa
T02D1659:306a-35: nga rgyal dang phrag dog gi lam la gnas pa
T02D1659:306a-36: drag shul can rnams 'dul ba'i don du ni rta
T02D1659:306a-37: mgo ljang gu khro gnyer can du bstan pa'o //
T02D1659:306a-38: da ni lha chen po rnams zhabs kyis mnan nas chung ma rnams lngar bsdus pa'i phyir //
T02D1659:306a-39: tshigs su bcad pa gsungs pa las /
T02D1659:306a-40: dbang phyug dam pa ma h'a de ba 'dod pa'i
T02D1659:306a-41: longs spyod thams cad la mnga' mdzad pa de nyid
T02D1659:306b-0: zhabs @306b kyis mnan nas lha mo dka' thub bzlog
T02D1659:306b-1: ma lha chen po'i mig nas sprul pa mo 'gugs
T02D1659:306b-3: khyab 'jug 'khor lo nag po mthu dang rdzu 'phrul
T02D1659:306b-4: gyi mchog dang ldan pa mnan cing lha mo ru
T02D1659:306b-5: mig ma snying las sprul pa mo bkug ste longs
T02D1659:306b-6: spyod pa dang / skye dgu'i bdag mo tshangs pa
T02D1659:306b-7: mnan te lha mo sgrol ma zhi ba mo sbyor
T02D1659:306b-8: ba las byung ba dgug cing longs spyod pa dang
T02D1659:306b-9: spyod pa dang / / 'dod pa'i lha dga' rab
T02D1659:306b-10: dbang phyug mnan nas mdangs las sbrul pa'i lha mo
T02D1659:306b-11: dga' sdug ma'i dbang phyug ma 'gugs shing longs spyod
T02D1659:306b-12: spyod pa dang / / pa'o // de yang rtog pa dgu pa las //
T02D1659:306b-13: rab kyi rtsal gyis gnon pa'i stobs kyis ngo mthon dbang phyug gnon //
T02D1659:306b-14: sbyor chen hu lu hu lu mig gsum pa las gsum drug drongs //
T02D1659:306b-15: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D1659:306b-16: da ni phrin las kun gyi bdag nyid yin par bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1659:306b-17: tshig rkang pa drug gsungs pa las /
T02D1659:306b-18: phrin las thams cad mthar phyin par mdzad pa ni
T02D1659:306b-19: rdo rje rta mchog gi dkyil 'khor gyi sgo nas
T02D1659:306b-20: te / de nyid ni rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin yin zhes pa'o //
T02D1659:306b-21: de dag gi phrin las bya ba'i thabs ni //
T02D1659:306b-22: thabs dang rtsal gyis bsgrub pa yis //
T02D1659:306b-23: drag shul sbyor bas bsgrubs nas ni //
T02D1659:306b-24: khams gsum rgyal srid ma lus pa //
T02D1659:306b-25: rdo rje 'dzin pa de thob nas //
T02D1659:306b-26: byang chub sems ni mtha' yas mchog / drag shul sbyor bas sgrub par byed //
T02D1659:306b-27: rta mchog ni las khyad par gyi dkyil 'khor te /
T02D1659:306b-28: zhi ba'i dus su sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bor gnas pa dang /
T02D1659:306b-29: dbang gi dus su padma gar gyi dbang phyug gi dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bor gnas pa dang /
T02D1659:306b-30: rgyas pa'i dus su rdo rje nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bor gnas pa dang /
T02D1659:306b-31: drag po'i dus su dpal he ru ka'i dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bor gnas pa dang /
T02D1659:306b-32: rigs thams cad kyi bdag nyid kyi dus su dpal
T02D1659:306b-33: rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bor gnas
T02D1659:306b-34: pas na / phrin las thams cad kyi bdag nyid can te /
T02D1659:306b-35: khams gsum gyi rgyal srid ma lus pa dang /

T02D1659:307b-23: rang byung rnams kyi gtam gyi rtags //

T02D1659:308a-0: // 'phrul @308a * // pa dag ji ltar snad ba ni //

T02D1659:308a-6: rje 'chang chen po de nyid kyis sna tshogs rnam

T02D1659:310a-46: dpal rdo rje nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ji ltar snang ba ni dpal rdo rje 'chang chen po las /
