T02D1659:313b-37: rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi lha //
T02D1659:313b-38: de nas rnam par 'phul bar mdzad //
T02D1659:313b-39: rigs bsdus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbang du lha nyis
T02D1659:313b-40: brgya drug cu rnams dang rigs so so'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1659:313b-41: gyi rim pa'i dbang du lha brgya nyi shu rtsa
T02D1659:313b-42: brgyad dang / rigs so so'i dkyil 'khor dang kha
T02D1659:313b-43: yar ba'i sgo nas lha nyi shu rtsa gcig dang
T02D1659:313b-44: brgyad dang / / rta mchog gi lha mo gnyis kyis lhag pa dang /
T02D1659:313b-45: dpa' bo yab yum gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgo nas lha sum cu po dag rnam par 'phrul ba'o //
T02D1659:314a-2: sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i don gnyis su med pa'i ngo bo las byung ba'o //
T02D1659:314a-4: sbyor ba'i dang phyug gi rnam par 'phrul pa'i sgo nas /
T02D1659:314a-6: rkyen gang zhig gis she na /
T02D1659:314a-7: rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi lha las byung ba'o ;
T02D1659:314a-8: ;'bras bu ci zhig gis mdzad pa la spyod ce na /
T02D1659:314a-9: dkyil 'khor gong ma dang gis gong ma'i so so'i bya ba grub par mdzad pa'o //
T02D1659:314a-10: de ltar dkyil 'khor rgya chen po dag kyang rigs kyi dkyil 'khor rnam pa drug tu 'dus te /
T02D1659:314a-11: de las rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor ji ltar 'phrul ba'i tshul ni /
T02D1659:314a-12: dpal rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid kyi rang bzhin las snang ba'i rdo rje sems dpa'i sku dang /
T02D1659:314a-13: dung dang kunda zla ba'i bzhin gyi sa mdzes pa
T02D1659:314a-14: ye shes kyi mdangs la rin po che sna lnga'i
T02D1659:314a-16: de la sangs rgyas rigs drug gi sku byung bas mdzes pa dang /
T02D1659:314a-17: 'jo sgeg dgyes pa'i 'dzum mig dang bcas pas chags
T02D1659:314a-18: pa'i tshul du bzhugs pa dkar po dang mthing ga
T02D1659:314a-19: dang ser po dang dmar po'i zhal bzhis mtshan zhing
T02D1659:314a-20: rin po che'i dbu rgyan dang /
T02D1659:314a-21: cod pan du bcas pa phyag g-yas g-yon gyi dang
T02D1659:314a-22: pos rdo rje rtse lnga pa thugs kar bsnyems pa'i
T02D1659:314a-23: tshul du gsor zhing kha tv'am ga dril bu dang
T02D1659:314a-25: 'og ma gnyis mda' dang gzhu 'dzin pa mtshan bzang
T02D1659:314a-26: po sum cu rtsa gnyis dang dpe byad bzang po
T02D1659:314a-27: brgyad cus spras shing phyag rgya lngas mdzes pa //
T02D1659:314a-28: sku stod dar dkar gser gyi dang ris stod g-yogs
T02D1659:314a-29: su mnabs shing sku smad tshe gu'i na bza' can
T02D1659:314a-30: rin po che'i phreng ba'i rked chings can mgur chu
T02D1659:314a-32: dpung rgyan dang phyag zhabs kyi gdu bu dang /
T02D1659:314a-35: lha mo bde mchog ma lta bu'i kun du bzang po dang zhal sbyor du bzhugs pa'o //
T02D1659:314a-36: de'i phyogs bzhir gsang ba'i lha mo bzhi rang nyid
T02D1659:314a-37: kyi cha 'dra ba'i 'od kyi skyes bu bzhi la
T02D1659:314a-39: shar du lha mo bde mchog ma sku mdog dkar
T02D1659:314a-40: mo sna tshogs kyi gos dang rgyan gyis mdzes pa
T02D1659:314a-41: // 'gying bag gis phyag na mda' gzhu 'gengs pa ste padma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'o //
T02D1659:314a-42: lho phyogs su ae ma bde ba mo gser gyi
T02D1659:314b-0: mdog @314b can phyag na bha ga dang lingga'i mtshan
T02D1659:314b-1: ma 'dzin cing rdo rje dang rin po ches brgyan
T02D1659:314b-2: pa'o // nub phyogs su lha mo snang mdzad ma
T02D1659:314b-3: dmar mdangs can phyag g-yas na sna tshogs rdo rje
T02D1659:314b-4: rgya gram 'dzin cing bdag po'i sku la 'khyud nas
T02D1659:314b-5: g-yon pas thod pa'i snod bdud rtsis bkang ba thogs
T02D1659:314b-6: pa'o // te / kha tv'am ga gru mor bcug pa'o //
T02D1659:314b-7: byang phyogs su slob ma mo aindra n'i la'i mdog
T02D1659:314b-8: can g-yas pas bdag po la 'khyud cing g-yon na
T02D1659:314b-9: sangs rgyas kyi skus mtshan pa'i bdud rtsi'i bum pa
T02D1659:314b-10: bsnams pa'o // yang phyi rol gyi shar gyi re'u
T02D1659:314b-11: mig la sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ma dkar dmar
T02D1659:314b-12: gyi mdangs can tshangs pa'i mgo bzhis mtshan pa'i mda'
T02D1659:314b-14: lho phyogs su chos kyi 'khor lo ma dkar ser
T02D1659:314b-15: gyi mdangs can phyag g-yas kyi gur mo la 'khor
T02D1659:314b-16: lo dkar po rtsibs brgyad pa dang /
T02D1659:314b-17: sngon po rtsibs brgyad pa gnyis brtsegs pa'i tshul du brgyud cing 'debs pa'i tshul gyis bstod pa //
T02D1659:314b-18: g-yon pa 'gying bag gi tshul gyis khu tshur dku'i gnas su brten te bzhugs pa'i //
T02D1659:314b-19: nub phyogs su khams gsum rnam rgyal ma dmar skya'i
T02D1659:314b-20: mdog can g-yas na tri sh'u la rtse gsum bstod
T02D1659:314b-22: g-yon pas rdo rje rtse lnga pa thugs kar brten pa'o //
T02D1659:314b-23: byang phyogs su 'dod pa'i dbang mo ljang gu'i mdog
T02D1659:314b-24: can phyag gnyis na dpag bsam gyi shing lcug ma
T02D1659:314b-25: dang bcas pa rlung gis bskyod pa 'dzin zhing gar
T02D1659:314b-26: mdzad pa'o // de ltar rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D1659:314b-27: lha mo de dag kun kyang rin po che'i rgyan
T02D1659:314b-28: dang cha byad kyis mdzes shing /
T02D1659:314b-29: rang 'od kyi rig ma dang 'khril ba'i tshul gyis
T02D1659:314b-30: zhal sbyor te 'gying bag gi rnam pas bzhugs pa'o
T02D1659:314b-31: // me mtshams kyi re'u mig la rdo rje gling
T02D1659:314b-32: bu ma beed'urya'i mdog can rdo rjes mtshan pa'i gling
T02D1659:314b-33: // bu sgrogs pa'o // bden bral gyi re'u mig
T02D1659:314b-34: la rdo rje pi wang ma gser gyi mdog can
T02D1659:314b-35: rdo rjes mtshan pa'i pi wang glu dbyangs kyi drug
T02D1659:314b-37: rlung gi mtshams su rdo rje rnga chen ma aasma
T02D1659:314b-38: r'a ga'i mdog can rdo rjes mtshan pa'i rnga zlum
T02D1659:314b-39: brdung ba'o // dbang ldan gyi mtshams su rdo rje
T02D1659:314b-40: rdza rnga ma aindra n'i la'i mdog can rdo rjes
T02D1659:315a-2: yang phyi rol gyi me mtshams su rdo rje me
T02D1659:315a-3: tog ma dmar mo rdo rjes mtshan pa'i me tog
T02D1659:315a-5: bden bral gyi mtshams su rdo rje spos me ma
T02D1659:315a-6: dkar sngon rdo rje mtshan pa'i spos me thogs pa'o
T02D1659:315a-7: // rlung gi mtshams su rdo rje me ma dmar mo rdo rjes mtshan pa'i mar me 'degs pa'o //
T02D1659:315a-8: dbang ldan gyi mtshams su rdo rje dri chab ma
T02D1659:315a-9: ljang gu rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dri chab 'thor ba'o
T02D1659:315a-10: // yang shar gyi sgor rdo rje rta 'grin 'phang mtho ma chu shel gyi mdog can /
T02D1659:315a-11: g-yas na lcags kyu g-yon na thod pa'i bdud rtsi rta mgo dang bcas pa'o //
T02D1659:315a-12: lho phyogs kyi sgor phag gdong ma beed'urya'i mdog can
T02D1659:315a-13: g-yas na mche ba g-yon na zhags pa 'dzin pa'o
T02D1659:315a-14: // nub phogs kyi sgor snag ba mo dmar gsal
T02D1659:315a-15: gyi mdangs can phyag gnyis na lcags sgrog nyi zlas
T02D1659:315a-16: // mtshan pa'o // byang gyi sgrong thal byed ma lhang gu g-yas na dril bu 'khrol zhing /
T02D1659:315a-17: g-yon pas bhandha bdud rtsi'i nang nas sangs rgyas snang ba mtha' yas kyi sku phyung ba'o //
T02D1659:315a-18: lha mo nyi shu po de dag kyang rgyan dang
T02D1659:315a-19: cha lugs dang 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis mdzes par
T02D1659:315a-20: gyur ro // bsdus pa'i dbang du ni lha mo
T02D1659:315a-21: kun kyang kha dog 'dra bar le'u dgu pa las
T02D1659:315a-22: gsungs pa'i don bzhin bstan pa'o //
T02D1659:315a-23: yang rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par 'phrul ba'i phyir //
T02D1659:315a-24: rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid las snang ba'i sangs
T02D1659:315a-25: rgyas de nyid gser gyi mdog can nyi ma 'bum
T02D1659:315a-26: gyi 'od dang ldan pa'i gangs ri'i lhun po ltar
T02D1659:315a-27: bzhugs pa // gser dang ka rti ka dang /
T02D1659:315a-28: aindra n'i la dang aasma r'a ga'i mdog can gyi zhal bzhi dang lnga pa /
T02D1659:315a-29: phyag bzhi na chos gos dang lhung bzed dang 'khar sil dang /
T02D1659:315a-30: dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam 'dzin pa'i 'khor los
T02D1659:315a-31: sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i cha lugs can rin po che
T02D1659:315a-32: sna bdun dang 'dod pa'i longs spyod kun gyis nye
T02D1659:315a-33: bar mdzes pa // rang 'od kyi rig ma yum
T02D1659:315a-34: sangs rgyas spyan ma dang nyis su med par zhal
T02D1659:315a-35: sbyor gyi tshul du bzhugs pa'o //
T02D1659:315a-36: de nyid kyi shar du sangs rgyas kun brjod ma
T02D1659:315a-37: chu shes kyi mdog can rin po che'i rgyan kun
T02D1659:315a-39: phag na me lces mtshan pa'i padma 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1659:315a-40: lho phyogs su dpa' mo shin tu rgyal ma gser
T02D1659:315a-41: gyi mdog can phyag gnyis na cha lang 'dzin pa'o
T02D1659:315b-0: // nub phyogs na kun tu bzang mo @315b padma
T02D1659:315b-1: r'a ga'i mdog can phyag gnyis na rdo rje rtse
T02D1659:315b-2: lnga pa dang rin po che'i za ma tog 'dzin
T02D1659:315b-3: // pa'o // byang phyogs na mi bzang rin po che'i snod 'dzin ma //
T02D1659:315b-4: sna tshogs kyi mdog can rin po ches bkang ba'i snod dang chos kyi dung 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1659:315b-5: yang phyi rol gyi shar phyogs kyi re'u cha la
T02D1659:315b-6: sangs rgyas kun 'dzin ma gur gum gyi mdog can
T02D1659:315b-7: sangs rgyas mi bskyod pa'i sku thugs kar 'dzin pa'o
T02D1659:315b-8: // lho phyogs na lha mo zhal bzangs ma me
T02D1659:315b-9: long gi mdog can phyag gnyis me long dang rnga
T02D1659:315b-10: // yab 'dzin pa'o // nub phyogs su lha mo
T02D1659:315b-11: sprin chen ma beed'urya'i mdog can phyag gnyis kyis rdo
T02D1659:315b-12: rje sprin gyi dkyil 'khor las ser ba 'bebs pa'o
T02D1659:315b-13: // yab 'dzin pa'o // // byang phyogs su nam
T02D1659:315b-14: mkha'i spyan ma ser skya'i mdog can phyag gnyis padma'i
T02D1659:315b-15: dkyil 'khor la mig gis mtshan pa 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1659:315b-16: phyi rol gyi lha mo gling bu ma la sogs pa bzhi dang /
T02D1659:315b-17: me tog ma la sogs pa bzhi dang /
T02D1659:315b-18: rta mgrin 'phang mtho ma la sogs pa bzhi po dag ni //
T02D1659:315b-19: rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor las bstan pa dang 'dra bar gnas pa las //
T02D1659:315b-20: cung zig gi khyad par ni zhi ba'i cha lugs
T02D1659:315b-21: 'dzin cing rgyan dang phyag mtshan la 'khor lo'i rnam
T02D1659:315b-22: pas mtshan pa'o // yang dpal he du ka'i dkyil
T02D1659:315b-23: 'khor rnam par 'phrul ba'i phyir rdo rje 'chang chen
T02D1659:315b-24: po nyid las snag ba'i 'bras bu'i he ru ka
T02D1659:315b-25: de nyid sku beed'urya'i mdog can 'bar ba chen po'i
T02D1659:315b-27: zhal g-yas zhi ba'i rang bzhi dkar po dbus mthong nag drag po'i cha lugs can /
T02D1659:315b-28: rgyab ma chags 'dzad dmar po'i zhal g-yon pa rmongs mdzad ser por bzhugs pa /
T02D1659:315b-29: smin mtshams kyi khro gnyer bu 'gyur zhing spyan mig
T02D1659:315b-30: dmar po las 'jigs pa'i me stag 'phro ba dang
T02D1659:315b-31: // dbu skra dang smar ser nag tu 'khyil zhing
T02D1659:315b-32: gyen du brdzes pa ba spu rnams rdo rje'i tshul
T02D1659:315b-33: gyis g-yas su 'khyil pa zhal gdangs pa dang /
T02D1659:315b-37: 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis gnas pa dang /
T02D1659:315b-46: zhi ba'i mdangs kyis gnas pa /
T02D1659:315b-47: phyag g-yas g-yon gyi dang po na rdo rje dang /
T02D1659:315b-48: rdo rje kha tv'am ga dril bus mtshan pa 'dzin pa //
T02D1659:316a-1: chen po'i pags pa rlung gi tshul gyis bskor ba /
T02D1659:316a-2: gsum pa gnyis na mda' dang gzhu 'dzin pa /
T02D1659:316a-3: g-yas kyi bzhi pa na dung chen po khrag gis bkang zhing gsol ba'i stabs kyis gnas pa /
T02D1659:316a-4: g-yon gyi bzhi pa na dung chen po snying gis bkang ba'o //
T02D1659:316a-5: yang la lar zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa la g-yas gnyis rdo rje dang dung khrag gis bkang ba /
T02D1659:316a-6: g-yon gnyis na thod pa dang zhags pas mtshan pa /
T02D1659:316a-7: rdo rje kha tv'am ga se ral khar thogs pa'o //
T02D1659:316a-8: yang la lar zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa la rdo
T02D1659:316a-9: rje dang dung chen po khrag gis bkang pa 'dzin
T02D1659:316a-10: cing // kha tv'am ga la rgyab brten mdzad pa'o //
T02D1659:316a-11: de dag kun gyi sku la glang chen gyi ko rlon dang /
T02D1659:316a-14: lha chen po'i g-yang gzhi dang /
T02D1659:316a-18: thal ba'i ri mos mtshan zhing phyag rgya lngas brgyan
T02D1659:316a-19: pa nyi ma dang zla ba dang rin po che'i
T02D1659:316a-20: phreng bas snyan cha byas pa yum kro dhi shva
T02D1659:316a-21: ri dang zhal sbyor gyi tshul du bzhugs pa'o //
T02D1659:316a-22: de nyid kyi mdun gyi shar phyogs su goo r'i dkar ser zhi ba'i mdangs can /
T02D1659:316a-23: zhal bzhi phyag brgyad na mda' dang gzhu 'gengs pa
T02D1659:316a-24: las tshangs pa'i mgo bo bzhi sbyangs pa g-yon brkyang
T02D1659:316a-25: pa'i gar stabs kyis bzhugs pa'o //
T02D1659:316a-26: lho phyogs su tsoo r'i dmar ser drag po'i mdangs
T02D1659:316a-27: can g-yon na lcags kyu 'dzin zhing g-yas pa'i gung
T02D1659:316a-28: mos 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa bstod cing 'dzin pa
T02D1659:316a-29: / kha tv'am ga la brten bcas nas zhabs g-yas pa bteg pa'i stabs kyis bzhugs pa'o //
T02D1659:316a-30: nub tu phra mo h'a dmar nag zhal gnyis kyis
T02D1659:316a-31: gong ma phag gi gdong can phyag bzhi la dang
T02D1659:316a-32: po gnyis na rdo rje dang kham phor chang gis
T02D1659:316a-33: bkang ba / 'og ma gnyis kyis khu tshur bcings te 'khor lo 'degs pa /
T02D1659:316a-34: g-yas brkyang ba'i stabs kyis bzhugs shing rmongs byed kyi mdangs dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1659:316a-35: byang phyogs su bee t'a li dkar mo shi ba
T02D1659:316a-36: slong ba'i tshul can dga' ba'i gar stabs kyis gnas
T02D1659:316a-37: shing / g-yas na thod pa mtshan ldan bdud rtsi'i bkang ba /
T02D1659:316a-38: g-yon pa ba dan gsum pa'i phyag rgya can no //
T02D1659:316a-39: me'i phyogs su pukka s'i drag mo sna tshogs kyi mdog can /
T02D1659:316a-40: g-yas na rdo rje rtse lnga pa gsor zhing g-yon
T02D1659:316a-41: dpag bsam gyi shing lcug ma dang bcas pa 'dzin
T02D1659:316b-0: cing / gar gyi gzigs thabs kyis 'gyur ba'i bzhin dang bcas @316b pa'o ;
T02D1659:316b-1: ; bden bral gyi mtshams su tsanda l'i sngo nag
T02D1659:316b-2: dbugs 'byin pa'i tshul can g-yas na ras sgye rlung
T02D1659:316b-3: gis bkang ba rdo rjes mtshan zhing 'thor ba /
T02D1659:316b-4: g-yon na tri sh'u la 'dzin cing gar byed pa'o //
T02D1659:316b-5: rlung gi mtshams su ghasma r'i ser nag ro ldag pa'i tshul can g-yas na ral gri dang /
T02D1659:316b-6: g-yon na me thab 'dzin pa g-yon brkyang ba'i gar stabs kyis bzhugs pa'o //
T02D1659:316b-7: dbang ldan gyi mtshams su sma sha mthing nag he
T02D1659:316b-8: ru ka phyag bzhi pa dang 'dra bar g-yas gnyis
T02D1659:316b-9: na rdo rje dang dung khrag 'dzin cing /
T02D1659:316b-10: g-yon gnyis kyis thod pa dang zhags par bcas pa kha tv'am ga se ral khar thogs pa'o //
T02D1659:316b-11: lha mo de dag kun kyang thod pa'i phreng ba dang ;
T02D1659:316b-12: sbrul mdud kyis brgyan cing zhing lpags rlon pa dang dar gyi na bza' gsol ba /
T02D1659:316b-13: rin po che'i phreng bas brgyan pa'o //
T02D1659:316b-14: yang phyi rol gyi me mtshams su mda' 'dzin ma
T02D1659:316b-15: chu shel gyi mdog can phyag na mda' dang gzhu
T02D1659:316b-16: thogs pa'o // bden bral du kha tv'am 'dzin ma
T02D1659:316b-17: ser mo phyag na kha tv'am ga dril bu ba
T02D1659:316b-19: ; rlung mtshams su 'khor lo 'dzin ma dmar ser mo phyag na 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1659:316b-20: dbang ldan du sna tshogs gdan 'dzin mchu shel gyi
T02D1659:316b-21: mdog ljang gu phyag na ba dan dang dril bu
T02D1659:316b-23: gzhan yang phyi'i lha mo me tog ma la sogs
T02D1659:316b-24: pa bzhi dang rta mgrin 'phang mtho ma la sogs
T02D1659:316b-25: pa bzhi po dag ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i
T02D1659:316b-27: cung zhig gi khyad par ni khro bo'i cha lugs
T02D1659:316b-28: su gnas shing khro bo'i rdo rje sngon pos nye
T02D1659:316b-29: bar mtshan pa'o // yang dpal padma gar gyi dbang
T02D1659:316b-30: phyug gi dkyil 'khor rnam par 'phrul ba'i phyir rdo
T02D1659:316b-31: rje 'chang chen po nyid las sprul pa'i sku dpal
T02D1659:316b-32: padma gar gyi dbang phyug sku mdog dkar gsal shel
T02D1659:316b-33: gyi ri bo lta bu zhal bco lnga 'od mdangs
T02D1659:316b-34: bar mtshan pa'o // dang ldan pa / phyag lnga
T02D1659:316b-35: bcu phrag gnyis zhabs nyi shu rtsa bzhis mdzes par
T02D1659:316b-37: phyag kun gyis padma 'dzin pa las /
T02D1659:316b-38: g-yas pa rnams la rdo rje dang 'khor lo la sogs pas brgyan pa /
T02D1659:316b-39: g-yon gyi padma dag kyang kha dog so so'i mdangs dang ldan pa /
T02D1659:316b-40: sku las kha dog nyi shu rtsa lnga'i 'od 'phro
T02D1659:316b-41: ba rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyan dang gos
T02D1659:316b-42: kyis spros shing mtshan dang dpe byad du ldan pa'o
T02D1659:316b-43: // la lar zhal bzhi phyag brgyad byed pa dang zhal gcig phyag bzhi ba'i rnam pa can dang /
T02D1659:317a-1: sdong po lta bur gnas pa'i mtshan ma'i mdangs can no //
T02D1659:317a-2: de nyid kyi snang bas yum gos dkar mo 'khril ba'i tshul gyis bzhugs pa'o //
T02D1659:317a-3: shar du rnam par gzigs ma padma r'a ga'i mdangs can /
T02D1659:317a-4: phyag g-yon pas padma dmar po bsnyems pa'i tshul du 'dzin cing g-yas pas /
T02D1659:317a-6: lho phyogs su sgrol ma ljang gu g-yon pa padma ljang gu'i sdong bu nas bzung ste /
T02D1659:317a-7: dku'i gnas su brten cing g-yas 'dren pa'o //
T02D1659:317a-8: nub phyogs su sa 'dzin ma sngon po g-yon pas padma dkar po dang /
T02D1659:317a-9: g-yas pas 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1659:317a-10: byang phyogs su khro gnyer ma ljang gu g-yon pas padma mthing ga'i sdong bu 'dzin cing /
T02D1659:317a-11: g-yas pas rtse gsum pa'i phyag rgya bstod pa'o //
T02D1659:317a-12: yang phyi rol gyi shar phyogs su padmo gtum pa'i
T02D1659:317a-13: dbang phyug ma mthing ga g-yon pas padma dmar po
T02D1659:317a-14: bzung zhing / g-yas pas rdo rje gyen du bstod pa'o //
T02D1659:317a-15: lho phyogs su sna tshogs padma sngon mo g-yon pas sna tshogs padma 'dzin cing /
T02D1659:317a-16: g-yas pas 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad gyen du bstod pa'o //
T02D1659:317a-17: nub phyogs su padma'i na bza' ma ser mo g-yon pas padma 'dzin cing /
T02D1659:317a-18: g-yas pas chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1659:317a-19: byang phyogs su padma dbang phyug ma dmar mo g-yon padma dmar po 'dzin cing /
T02D1659:317a-20: g-yas pas rdo rje rtse lnga pa thugs kar gsor ba'o //
T02D1659:317a-21: lha mo 'di dag kyang rin po che'i rgyan chas dang /
T02D1659:317a-22: dar gyi na bzas bklubs pa'o //
T02D1659:317a-23: gzhan yang gling bu ma la sogs pa'i lha mo bzhi dang /
T02D1659:317a-24: me tog ma la sogs pa'i lha mo bzhi dang /
T02D1659:317a-25: rta mgrin 'phang mtho ma la sogs pa'i sgo ba
T02D1659:317a-26: bzhi dag ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1659:317a-27: las bshad pa bzhin du gnas pa las /
T02D1659:317a-28: cung zhig mi 'dra ba'i khyad par ni /
T02D1659:317a-29: chags pa'i bzhin mdangs dang bcas shing padma'i phreng bas bklubs pa'o //
T02D1659:317a-30: yang rdo rje nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rnam par 'phrul ba'i phyir /
T02D1659:317a-31: rdo rje 'chang chen po las rdo rje nyi ma'i skur phyung ste /
T02D1659:317a-32: gser gyi ri bo la nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D1659:317a-33: 'od shar ba bzhin du mdangs gsal ba zhal bzhi
T02D1659:317a-34: pa spyan mig g-yon gyen du gzigs pa /
T02D1659:317a-35: g-yas g-yon gyi dang pos mda' dang gzhu 'dzin pa /
T02D1659:317a-36: g-yas kyi 'og mas ral gri dang g-yon gyi 'og
T02D1659:317a-37: mas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis mdzes pa'i padma la
T02D1659:317a-38: rdo rje rtse lnga pas mtshan pa /
T02D1659:317b-0: che ba'i yon @317b tan rin po che sna bdun la sogs pas brgyan cing /
T02D1659:317b-1: gdan padma'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs shing yum m'a ma k'i dang gnyis su med par 'khril ba'o //
T02D1659:317b-2: gnas skabs la lar drag po'i tshogs dag gdul ba'i
T02D1659:317b-3: phyir sku mdog dmar po'i 'od kyi snang ba dang
T02D1659:317b-4: bcas pa cung zhig khros pa'i bzhin gyis gnas shing
T02D1659:317b-5: rin po che sna tshogs kyi phreng bas bklubs pa'o
T02D1659:317b-6: // shar du lha mo dbang bskur ma dmar gsal
T02D1659:317b-7: gyi mdangs can phyag na rin po che'i dbu rgyan
T02D1659:317b-8: la rdo rje rtse lnga pas mtshan pa 'dzin pa'o
T02D1659:317b-9: // // lho phyogs su lha mo gter ldan ma
T02D1659:317b-10: ser mo phyag na rin po ches bkang ba'i bum
T02D1659:317b-11: // // pa 'dzin pa'o // nub tu rgyal mtshan
T02D1659:317b-12: mchog ldan ma dkar dmar gyi mdangs can phyag na
T02D1659:317b-13: rin po che'i rgyal mtshan tog dang bcas pa 'dzin
T02D1659:317b-15: mchod rten ma ljang sngon rin po che'i snod rin
T02D1659:317b-16: po che'i rdzas kyis bkang ba 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1659:317b-17: yang phyi rol gyi shar du mda' gzhu ma dmar
T02D1659:317b-18: ser phyag na rang gi mtshan dang mthun pa'i rtags
T02D1659:317b-19: 'dzin pa'o // lho phyogs su rdo rje kha tv'am
T02D1659:317b-20: ma sngon mo phyag na ral gri dang kha tv'am
T02D1659:317b-21: 'dzin pa'o // ga 'dzin pa'o // nub phyogs su
T02D1659:317b-22: rdo rje nyi ma mo dmar ser phyag na de
T02D1659:317b-24: byang du rdo rje me mo ljang dmar phyag na rdo rjes mtshan pa'i me thab 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1659:317b-25: lha mo de dag thams cad las kyang 'od kha
T02D1659:317b-26: dog sna lnga 'byung zhing rin po che sna tshogs
T02D1659:317b-28: phyi'i lha mo gling bu ma la sogs pa bcu
T02D1659:317b-29: gnyis po de dag kyang rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil
T02D1659:317b-30: 'khor dang 'dra ba las cung zhig gi khyad par
T02D1659:317b-31: ni yon tan rgyas pa'i sgo nas rin po che'i
T02D1659:317b-32: chags pa 'phro zhing mdangs dang ldan pa /
T02D1659:317b-33: sku dang phyag mtshan gyi bye brag las nor bu rin po ches mtshan pa'o //
T02D1659:317b-34: yang rta mchog rol ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam par 'phrul
T02D1659:317b-35: phyir rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid las snang ba'i
T02D1659:317b-36: 'bras bu'i sangs rgyas de nyid sku ljang gu dang
T02D1659:317b-38: dmar ba'i zhal gsum dbu'i steng na rta mgo ljang gu mgrin pa bstod de sgra 'byin pa /
T02D1659:317b-39: sku mdog ljang gu la g-yas pa bzhis pa dan
T02D1659:317b-40: gsum pa'i phyag rgya dang rdo rje rgya gram dang
T02D1659:317b-43: g-yon pa bzhin ni sna tshogs padma dang /
T02D1659:317b-47: zhabs g-yas kyi rmig pa dang pos dngos grub gsum dang /
T02D1659:317b-48: dpal mo gnon pa gnyis pas zhi ba mo dang dga' ba ma gnon pa /
T02D1659:318a-1: pos drag po dang khyab 'jug gnon pa /
T02D1659:318a-2: gnyis pas 'dod pa'i lha dang tshangs pa mnan pa /
T02D1659:318a-6: zhi ba'i sgo nas gzigs pa'i mdangs can rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyan dang /
T02D1659:318a-7: khyad par gyi rtags kyis rnam par spras pa'o //
T02D1659:318a-8: g-yas phyogs su sna tshogs padmo ljang ser gyi sku
T02D1659:318a-9: las 'od zer 'phros pa phyag na sna tshogs padma
T02D1659:318a-10: 'dzin pa'o // g-yon phyogs su sna tshogs rdo rje
T02D1659:318a-11: ma sku mdog ljang sngon las 'od zer 'phro ba
T02D1659:318a-12: 'dzin pa'o // / phyag na sna tshogs rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1659:318a-13: mdun du rang 'od kyi snang ba yum dam tshig
T02D1659:318a-14: sgrol ma dang zhal sbyor gyi tshul du 'khril nas
T02D1659:318a-15: bzhugs pa'o // 'khor gyi lha mo gzhan dag ni phrin las kyi bye brag bzhin du /
T02D1659:318a-16: rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gzhan dag gi lha mo dang mthun pa las /
T02D1659:318a-17: cung zhig mi 'dra ba'i khyad par du ni sku dang /
T02D1659:318a-18: phyag mtshan dag la sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan cing dbu la don yod grub pa'i skus brgyan pa'o //
T02D1659:318a-19: lha mo gzhan dag gis dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo mdzad pa'i 'khor lo mi 'dra ba dag dang /
T02D1659:318a-20: rigs bsdus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'jig rten pa'i lha
T02D1659:318a-21: sna tshogs rnams ni gdul bya'i mos pa bzhin du
T02D1659:318a-22: byung zhing / mgron thabs su bkod de phrin las
T02D1659:318a-23: kyi phyag brnyan pa yin pas dkyil 'khor gyi grangs
T02D1659:318a-24: byung zhing / su bzhag kyang / skabs 'dir sprul
T02D1659:318a-25: pa'i lha ma yin pa'i phyir bshad par mi bya
T02D1659:318a-26: ste rjes su 'jug pa'i sgrub pa bos sgrub pa'i
T02D1659:318a-27: dus su ni tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i sgrub thabs las
T02D1659:318a-28: rgya cher bstan pa bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02D1659:318a-29: da ni lha de dag gi bzhugs thabs bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1659:318a-30: stan de dag ni thams cad la ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du dgod /
T02D1659:318a-31: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams
T02D1659:318a-32: ni zhabs g-yas g-yon gyi sbyor bas bde ba'i cha
T02D1659:318a-33: lugs bzhin du gar byed cing sems dpa'i skyil mo
T02D1659:318a-35: sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyi rigs kyi lha
T02D1659:318a-36: rnams ni g-yas pa'i yan lag gnon pas g-yon pa'i
T02D1659:318a-37: yan lag kun las rgyas te sems dpa'i 'gying tshul
T02D1659:318a-38: gyis bzhugs pa'o // rdo rje he ru ka'i lha
T02D1659:318a-39: rnams ni g-yas g-yon gyi sbyor bas bde ba'i gar
T02D1659:318a-40: byed cing skyil mo krung phyed pa'i tshul du rkang
T02D1659:318a-41: pa rang gi brlas mnan pa'o //
T02D1659:318a-42: padma gar dbang gi lha rnams ni g-yas g-yon gyi
T02D1659:318a-43: sbyor bas skyil krung phyed pa'i tshul du rgyal po'i
T02D1659:318b-1: rdo rje nyi ma'i lha rnams ni pus mo gnyis gshibs te rdo rje'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa'o //
T02D1659:318b-2: rta mchog gi lha rnams g-yas g-yon gyi sbyor bas
T02D1659:318b-3: brkyang bskum gyi tshul gyis khro bo'i skyil mo krung
T02D1659:318b-4: bcings pa'o // de dag thams cad kyang gdan padma'i
T02D1659:318b-5: dkyil 'khor la rang rang gi cha lugs kyis dang
T02D1659:318b-7: de ltar brten pa'i lha'i dkyil 'khor rnams kyi bzhugs
T02D1659:318b-8: gnas lha'i gzhal yas khang ji lta bu zhe na
T02D1659:318b-9: / gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
T02D1659:318b-10: rta babs bzhi yis mdzes par byas //
T02D1659:318b-11: rdo rje rin chen padmo sogs //
T02D1659:318b-12: sgo srung dang ni ldan par bya //
T02D1659:318b-13: phyi rol gyi rgyar ni ra ba rim pa gsum dang bcas pa'i dur khrod brgyad kyis brgyan cing /
T02D1659:318b-14: de'i nang du gzhal yas khang gru bzhi pa la
T02D1659:318b-15: sgo bzhi pa sangs rgyas kyi che ba'i yon tan
T02D1659:318b-16: thams cad kyis rgyas shing tshad med pa bzhi la
T02D1659:318b-17: sbyangs pas rnam par thar ba'i sgo bzhir 'jug pa
T02D1659:318b-18: / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa
T02D1659:318b-19: bdun la sogs pas mtshon pa'i mtshan ma rta babs
T02D1659:318b-21: rigs kyi mtshan mas rang nyid kyi ye shes yon
T02D1659:318b-22: tan gyi tshogs dang bcas pa'i rtags mtshon pa rang
T02D1659:318b-23: gi rigs kyi sgo srung dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1659:318b-24: de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las /
T02D1659:318b-25: gser gyi 'khor lo sna tshogs rdo rje'i dbus //
T02D1659:318b-26: gru bzhi sgo khyud rta babs bzhi yis mtshan //
T02D1659:318b-27: rin chen sna lnga'i phyogs kyi rtsig pa la //
T02D1659:318b-28: rang byung nyi shu lnga yi 'od dang bcas //
T02D1659:318b-29: rdo rjes mtshan pa'i ka ba mchog brgyad spras //
T02D1659:318b-30: rin chen mu tig me tog phreng bas mdzes //
T02D1659:318b-31: gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya'i lha mo 'khrigs //
T02D1659:318b-32: gdugs dang rgyal mtshan bla re rnga yab dang //
T02D1659:318b-33: zla phyed rdo rje rin chen ba dan bcas //
T02D1659:318b-34: dril bu snyan pa'i sgra sogs thams cad sgrogs //
T02D1659:318b-36: de nyid kyis nang gi pho brang ni rigs bsdus kyi dkyil 'khor dang /
T02D1659:318b-37: rigs so so dag gi dkyil 'khor gyi bye brag gis shes par bya'o //
T02D1659:318b-38: de nyid du lha'i rten gyi dkyil 'khor dgod pa'i phyir /
T02D1659:318b-39: rang gi lha dang 'dra ba yi //
T02D1659:318b-40: bud med dag ni legs bsgrub pa //
T02D1659:318b-41: skal bzang rang gi phyag rgyas mtshan //
T02D1659:318b-42: tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor brtag par bya //
T02D1659:318b-43: rigs so so'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis lha mo
T02D1659:318b-44: rang gi rtags dang kha dog dang mtshan mas brgyan
T02D1659:319a-1: ting nge 'dzin la gnas te de nyid kyi sku legs par bsgrubs nas /
T02D1659:319a-2: rang rang gi phyogs su skal pa bzang po'i dam
T02D1659:319a-3: tshig las byung ba'i phyag rgya'i tshul gyis gnas par
T02D1659:319a-4: bya'o // de ltar phyag rgya bzhi dang ldan pa'i
T02D1659:319a-5: sgo nas spro ba dang bsdu ba'i rim pas yon
T02D1659:319a-6: tan gyi snang ba thams cad skad cig la rdzogs
T02D1659:319a-7: par bya ba'i phyir tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor brtag par
T02D1659:319a-8: bya'o // bya'o // ga na bindhu ra zhes pas
T02D1659:319a-9: skal ldan dang 'byor ldan gyi phun sum tshogs pa
T02D1659:319a-11: gha na bi ha ra zhes pas de nyid la spyod pas de lta bu'i rtags gsal zhing /
T02D1659:319a-12: yun ring du brtags pas de dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu 'grub pa'o //
T02D1659:319a-13: da ni rnal 'byor bas tshogs kyi dbus su bdud rtsi lnga bsgrub pa'i phyir /
T02D1659:319a-14: me yi tshal ni grub pa la //
T02D1659:319a-15: dmar chen po zhes bya bar bshad //
T02D1659:319a-16: ces pa la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa drug gsungs te /
T02D1659:319a-17: gang zhig rang gi ting nge 'dzin gsal bar bya ba dang /
T02D1659:319a-18: dngos grub kyi rdzas khyad par can la brten nas
T02D1659:319a-19: 'dod pa'i don sgrub pa'i phyir bdud rtsi lnga grogs
T02D1659:319a-21: bsnyen sgrub kyi yan lag gis sgrub pa'i thabs bstan te /
T02D1659:319a-22: de yang tshigs su bcad pa dang pos ni sngags kyis drangs pa'i mtshal chen po dag ni /
T02D1659:319a-23: sgron ma gnyis kyi rten du gyur pas rang gi
T02D1659:319a-24: sgra dang ldan te de la brten nas sgra'i dngos
T02D1659:319a-25: grub ngo bo nyid kyi mthu dang rang bzhin gyis
T02D1659:319a-26: grub pa dag gsal bar bya ba dang /
T02D1659:319a-27: tshigs su bcad pa gnyis pas rdo rje dang chu dang rdo rje dri chen dang /
T02D1659:319a-28: mtshal chen po dang sbyar zhing bsgrubs te padma'i snod du bzhag nas /
T02D1659:319a-29: thugs ye shes rnam pa lnga'i rtags blta ba dang ;
T02D1659:319a-30: tshigs su bcad pa gsum pas de nyid kyi mtshan
T02D1659:319a-31: ma gsal bar grub pa'i yon tan bshad cing de
T02D1659:319a-32: las mi 'da' bar gnas pa dang /
T02D1659:319a-33: tshigs su bcad pa bzhi pas de nyid kyi mtshan nyid nges tshig dang bcas par bstan pa /
T02D1659:319a-34: tshigs su bcad pa lnga bas ni bdud rtsi lnga
T02D1659:319a-35: la sbyor ba'i dngos grub kyi dril bu sgrub pa'i
T02D1659:319a-36: thabs dang / de'i phan yon bstan to //
T02D1659:319a-37: tshigs su bcad pa drug pas ni dngos grub de
T02D1659:319a-38: dag gi nyams su blang ba'i cho ga 'bras bu
T02D1659:319a-40: bram ze rnams kyi nyi ma dang /
T02D1659:319a-41: zla ba'i mchod sbyin chen po byed pa'i dus su //
T02D1659:319b-0: brangga ra'i rgyal po'i brda sbyor bshams pa @319b bzhin
T02D1659:319b-1: du da du ra'i g-yos bshams pa myang ba ltar
T02D1659:319b-2: btung ba dang / gtso 'khor thams cad kyis srin
T02D1659:319b-3: mtheb kyi phyag rgyas lan gsum du blangs pa dang
T02D1659:319b-4: btung ba dang / / sku gsung thugs rtag pa'i dngos grub skye bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1659:319b-5: de dag bsgrubs pa'i phan yon ni //
T02D1659:319b-6: sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid kyi //
T02D1659:319b-7: ra sa ya na bde ba 'dis //
T02D1659:319b-8: zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gsum gsungs te /
T02D1659:319b-9: bdud rtsi ra sa ya na 'grub pa'i mthus 'jig
T02D1659:319b-10: rten 'di'i yon tan gyi 'bras bu thams cad dang
T02D1659:319b-11: / 'jig rten phyi ma'i dngos grub dag kyang 'grub ste /
T02D1659:319b-12: rdo rje sems dpa'i dpal bzhi 'gyur dang /
T02D1659:319b-13: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bdag nyid du 'gyur ro //
T02D1659:319b-14: bdud rtsi de nyid kyi bsrung ba'i cho ga ni /
T02D1659:319b-15: 'dis ni bsrung ba byas pas dpal //
T02D1659:319b-16: rdo rje sems dpa' bzhin du 'gyur //
T02D1659:319b-18: sangs rgyas tham cad bdag bdag nyid 'grub //
T02D1659:319b-19: yi ge lngas mtshan pa'i byang chub sems kyi thig les dbang po lnga la thig le bya zhing /
T02D1659:319b-20: bsrung ba byas pas de nyid du rigs rnam pa
T02D1659:319b-21: lnga'i sku gsal zhing 'grub par 'gyur ba dang khong
T02D1659:319b-22: du yang 'thungs shing gnas gsum du yang byugs pas
T02D1659:319b-23: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' dri ma gsum dang bral
T02D1659:319b-25: de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las /
T02D1659:319b-26: byang chub sems kyi thig le yis ;
T02D1659:319b-27: / gnas rnams kun du brgyan byas pas //
T02D1659:319b-28: de nyid rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyis //
T02D1659:319b-31: de dag gis ni bdud rtsi sgrub pa'i rim pa
T02D1659:319b-32: bstan te go rims rgyas pas nyams su blang ba'i
T02D1659:319b-33: thabs su ni cho ga lngas shes par bya ste
T02D1659:319b-34: / skabs 'dir smos pa mang bas ma bshad do //
T02D1659:319b-35: de ltar bsod nams kyi tshogs bsags nas rgyu mthun
T02D1659:319b-36: pa'i lam gyi sgo nas 'bras bu sgrub pa'i phyir
T02D1659:319b-37: ye shes kyi tshogs kyi 'khor lo bya ba'i don
T02D1659:319b-38: du gang zag gi rgyan bstan pa ni /
T02D1659:319b-39: de nas khrus byas dri zhim lus //
T02D1659:319b-40: ci 'byor ba yi gos dang rgyan //
T02D1659:319b-41: sna tshogs gos dag bgos nas ni //
T02D1659:319b-42: me tog phreng ldan kha dri zhim //
T02D1659:319b-43: phyi nang gsang ba gsum gyi khrus legs par byas
T02D1659:319b-44: nas lus dri zhim po'i rdzas kyis byugs te kha'i
T02D1659:319b-45: spos la sogs pas dri bsgyur zhing ci 'byor ba'i
T02D1659:319b-46: gos dang rgyan sna tshogs rnam par bgos nas me
T02D1659:320a-0: tog gi phreng ba gdags shing rang gi cha @320a
T02D1659:320a-2: de la kha dri zhim por byas pa'i spos ni le'u dgu pa las /
T02D1659:320a-3: ka kko la dang sug smel dang /
T02D1659:320a-4: gla sgang ga pur gla rtsi dag /'di dag zhib tu btags pa ni //
T02D1659:320a-5: seng ldeng bu ram dag dang sbyar //
T02D1659:320a-6: shing tsha ba tra lo tra dang //
T02D1659:320a-7: na le sham dang ga pur sbyar //
T02D1659:320a-8: ha sa ka ri shing mar gyis //
T02D1659:320a-9: sprus pa kha yi spos yin no //
T02D1659:320a-11: gzhan yang sbyor thabs kyi bye brag bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1659:320a-12: sna tshogs kun gyi skal bzang pos //
T02D1659:320a-13: slong bas dal gyis dal gyis su //
T02D1659:320a-14: gos dgab pa yi sbyor ba yis //
T02D1659:320a-15: bdag gis 'byung ba bskul bar bya //
T02D1659:320a-16: rigs rnam pa drug gi sgo nas sbyor thabs kyi bye brag drug cu rtsa bzhi bstan te /
T02D1659:320a-17: rang rang gi rigs kyi phyag rgya dag rnyed pa
T02D1659:320a-18: dang dga' ba'i sgo nas bskul ba'i glu brjod cing
T02D1659:320a-19: / gar stabs bskyod cing 'gying ba dang /
T02D1659:320a-24: ta ma la'i phur ba 'debs pa dang /
T02D1659:320a-25: gnas dgur sen mo gdab cing rol pa'i brtul zhugs
T02D1659:320a-26: la mi drag par bskyod pas byang chub kyi sems
T02D1659:320a-27: dbab par bya'o // de dag gi sngon du 'gro ba ni brdas bskul ba dang /
T02D1659:320a-28: gsol ba gdab pa'i sbyor ba dang /
T02D1659:320a-29: gtam gyis 'dris par bya ba dang /
T02D1659:320a-31: chags pa'i lo rgyus gleng ba'o //
T02D1659:320a-32: de las byung ba'i bde ba chen pos thabs dang
T02D1659:320a-33: shes rab kyi rgyud rim par gyur nas dkyil 'khor
T02D1659:320a-34: gsal ba dang / dngos grub blang ba dang /
T02D1659:320a-38: yang byang chub sems kyi phrin las ni /
T02D1659:320a-39: rdzogs par sangs rgyas nyi zla rnams //
T02D1659:320a-40: shar ba dang ni mthong ba yis //
T02D1659:320a-41: sdig pa kun las grol 'gyur zhing /
T02D1659:320a-43: nges pa'i lam dang kun ldan pa //
T02D1659:320a-44: rnam par 'das pas rnam par brgyan //
T02D1659:320a-45: gang zhig rang gi de kho na nyid bsod nams
T02D1659:320a-46: dang ye shes kyi tshogs rnam par dag pa'i sgo
T02D1659:320a-47: nas mthong pa'i bde ba chen po'i byang chub kyi
T02D1659:320a-48: sems chags pa'i mtshan nyid du gnas pa ni nyi
T02D1659:320a-49: ma dang zla ba lta bur snang la /
T02D1659:320a-50: de mtshon par byed pa'i rtags byang chub kyi sems rnam pa gnyis dang /
T02D1659:320a-51: gnyis su med pa'i bde ba dag kyang de'i bdag nyid do //
T02D1659:320b-0: de nyid gsal bar nyams su myong zhing mngon @320b
T02D1659:320b-1: sum du shar ba ni sku gsum gnyis su med
T02D1659:320b-2: pa'i sangs rgyas mthong ba yin te /
T02D1659:320b-3: bdag gi zhal bdag gis mthong ba'o //
T02D1659:320b-4: de'i mthus sdig pa thams cad kun las grol zhing bsod nams thams cad 'grub ste /
T02D1659:320b-5: legs pa'i lam kun dang ldan pa'i che ba'i yon
T02D1659:320b-6: tan rnam par bkod pa kun gyis brgyan par 'gyur
T02D1659:320b-7: ro // rol pa'i dus su lha mo'i glus bskul ba'i dgos pa ni /
T02D1659:320b-8: brtan zhing grub pa slong byed pa //
T02D1659:320b-9: kun nas slong ba'i bde ba ni //
T02D1659:320b-10: sgo gsum dag nas dngos grub dang yon tan gyi
T02D1659:320b-11: tshogs thams cad brtan zhing bdag dang gzhan gyi don
T02D1659:320b-12: du bskul ba'i glu brjod pas /
T02D1659:320b-13: dga' bde rnam pa gnyis slong bar byed pa dang /
T02D1659:320b-14: 'bras bu'i dbang du gnyis su med pa'i sku las 'gro ba'i don mdzad par bskul ba'o //
T02D1659:320b-16: stong pa shin tu rnal 'byor yod med mthus //
T02D1659:320b-17: nam mkha' nyid du dam tshig nye bar gnas //
T02D1659:320b-18: bde gshegs bde bar gshegs pa bzhengs su gsol //
T02D1659:320b-19: rdo rje sems dpa' skal bzang dpal khyod bdag /
T02D1659:320b-20: dang por gnyis su med pa'i bde ba chen po'i
T02D1659:320b-21: sku ni stong pa chen po'i ye shes kyi rang
T02D1659:320b-22: bzhin te / rnal 'byor rnam pa gnyis kyi mtshan
T02D1659:320b-23: nyid can de ni yod med kyi mtha' las 'das
T02D1659:320b-24: bzhin te / shing / yod med gnyis kyi ngo bor bzhugs pa yin te /
T02D1659:320b-25: rtag pa ther zug pa'i rnam pa dang /
T02D1659:320b-26: stong pa mtha' bral gyi rnam pa gnyis dang bral zhing snang stong gnyis med kyi rnam pa las /
T02D1659:320b-27: bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin du bzhugs pa'o //
T02D1659:320b-28: de'i dpe ni nam mkha' lta bur bzhugs shing rang
T02D1659:320b-29: gi mtshan nyid las mi mnga' ba'i dam tshig nye
T02D1659:320b-30: bar gnas pa'o // de lta bu'i bde bar gshegs pa la bzhengs bzhugs mi mnga' yang /
T02D1659:320b-31: sems can gyi blo'i ngos nas gzugs kyi sku yon
T02D1659:320b-32: tan gyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas par bzhengs
T02D1659:320b-33: te bdag la dngos su gsol zhes pa'o //
T02D1659:320b-34: ci 'dra ba'i rnam pas she na /
T02D1659:320b-35: rdo rje sems dpa' lha mo nyi shu'i skal pa bzang po'i tshogs dang bcas pa zhes pa'o //
T02D1659:320b-36: glu de nyid kyi phan yon ni /
T02D1659:320b-37: 'di dag nyid ni glur blangs nas //
T02D1659:320b-38: shin tu mya ngan yongs 'das par //
T02D1659:320b-39: shi ba'ang slar ni slong 'gyur na //
T02D1659:320b-40: yang srid pa lta smos ci dgos /
T02D1659:320b-41: zhu ba de rnam pa gnyis kyis 'od kyi thig ler gyur pa las /
T02D1659:321a-1: shing tshogs bsags pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu lha
T02D1659:321a-2: mo bzhi byung nas phyogs bzhi nas bskul ba'i glu
T02D1659:321a-3: blangs pa dang / gtso bo 'gog pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la bzhengs pa'o //
T02D1659:321a-4: glu de nyid kyis bskul bas kyang 'grub ba ma zhe na /
T02D1659:321a-5: shin tu mya ngan las 'das pa'i nyan thos dang
T02D1659:321a-6: rang sangs rgyas dag kyang zhi ba phyogs gcig pa'i
T02D1659:321a-7: lta ba la slong bar byed na /
T02D1659:321a-8: yang srid pa'i 'gro ba gzhan dag ni ci zhig smos zhes so //
T02D1659:321a-9: de nyid ji ltar blang zhe na /
T02D1659:321a-10: lam bzhi dang ni mnyam ldan pa //
T02D1659:321a-11: rnam par 'das pas mdzes par byas //
T02D1659:321a-12: phyogs bzhi nas lha mo bzhis tshad med pa'i glu ma tra phyed pa dang /
T02D1659:321a-15: brgyad kyi chas rim bzhin du yan lag bzhi'i sgo nas /
T02D1659:321a-16: sangs rgyas kyi che ba'i yon tan thams cad la sbyor bar byed pas /
T02D1659:321a-17: rang nyid kyi snang ba rnam par 'das pas mdzes par byas pa'i glus bskul bar byas pa'o //
T02D1659:321a-18: de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las /
T02D1659:321a-19: ma tra phyed pa'i glu yis ni //
T02D1659:321a-20: gdung ba rnam par sel byed cing //
T02D1659:321a-21: mu tig phreng ba'i rtsar bzhin du //
T02D1659:321a-22: ma tras phrin las gsal bar byed //
T02D1659:321a-23: ma tra gnyis pa glu yi rgyun //
T02D1659:321a-24: seng ge bsgyings pa'i nga ro bzhin //
T02D1659:321a-25: rjes chags gdung ba sangs byed cing //
T02D1659:321a-26: gnyis med ye shes skye bar mdzad //
T02D1659:321a-27: ma tra bzhi pa'i dbyangs rgyun gyis //
T02D1659:321a-28: mtha' yi 'ching ba grol mdzad de //
T02D1659:321a-29: bung ba'i sgra bcas gsal ba'i rgyun //
T02D1659:321a-30: tshig bzhis mtshon don gsal bar byed //
T02D1659:321a-31: ma tra brgyad pa'i glu dbyangs kyis //
T02D1659:321a-32: mgon po gnas nas bskyod mdzad do //
T02D1659:321a-33: rin chen goo rgyud mdas sgras //
T02D1659:321a-34: sna tshogs phrin las rnam par sbyor //
T02D1659:321a-35: lam bzhi dang ni mnyam ldan pa'i //
T02D1659:321a-38: gzhan yang tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du dkyil 'khor drug gi dngos grub sgrub pa'i phyir //
T02D1659:321a-39: dgos pa mtshan nyid dang bcas ni //
T02D1659:321a-41: 'jig rten gsum ni rab bsgrub pa'i //
T02D1659:321a-42: bsgrub par bya ba'i dngos grub thams cad kyi nang
T02D1659:321a-43: na mchog tu gyur pas yon tan thams cad la
T02D1659:321a-44: sbyor bar byed pas sna tshogs 'brang ba'o //
T02D1659:321a-45: de rab tu grub pas ni 'jig rten gsum gyi
T02D1659:321a-46: gnas thams cad zil gyis mnan cing yon tan gyi
T02D1659:321b-0: snang ba thams cad skad kyi rgyud @321b la ston
T02D1659:321b-1: par 'gyur ro // de'i sgo nas rigs kyi dkyil
T02D1659:321b-2: 'khor kun gyi dngos grub mthar phyin pa'i tshul ni
T02D1659:321b-3: par 'gyur ro // / 'jig rten gsum gyis phyag byas pa //
T02D1659:321b-4: 'jig rten gsum gyi ston pa po //
T02D1659:321b-5: 'jig rten gsum la skyid sbyin pa //
T02D1659:321b-6: 'jig rten gsum po bdag la bsgrubs //
T02D1659:321b-7: sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyi //
T02D1659:321b-8: yon tan thams cad mnga' brnyes pas //
T02D1659:321b-9: 'jig rten gsum du sku'i bkod pa rnam par spro
T02D1659:321b-10: ba mdzad cing kun gyi phyag gnas su gyur ba

T02D1659:321b-15: / / / rdo rje nyi ma'i tan gyi 'bras
T02D1659:321b-16: bu dag la mnga' brnyas pas 'jig rten gsum la
T02D1659:321b-17: rin po che sna bdun la sogs pa'i gdul bya'i
T02D1659:321b-18: longs spyod rnams skyed par smin pa dang /

T02D1659:321b-24: lha mo kun dang 'grogs pa yis //
T02D1659:321b-25: sna tshogs kun gyi skal bzang po //
T02D1659:321b-27: rigs thams cad kyi bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' dang ;

T02D1659:321b-31: yang don zag pa med pa'i ye shes 'grub pa'i tshul ni /
T02D1659:321b-32: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i //
T02D1659:321b-33: lha mo kun dang bde mos pa //
T02D1659:321b-34: rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag rdzogs //
T02D1659:321b-35: nyi ma zla ba gsal bar shar //
T02D1659:321b-36: rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag sbyor //
T02D1659:321b-38: bdag gi don du dman pa'i dbyibs la brten pa dang /
T02D1659:321b-39: mthar thug chos la brten pa'i tshul gyis snang ba dang /
T02D1659:321b-40: srid pas bsdus pa'i chos thams cad kyi dngos po
T02D1659:321b-41: dag rigs kyi dkyil 'khor thabs dang shes rab kyi
T02D1659:321b-42: tshul du gnyis su med pa'i bde ba la longs
T02D1659:321b-43: spyod cing rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin nyi ma
T02D1659:321b-44: dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor shar ba bzhin du gsal
T02D1659:321b-45: bar snang ste yang dag par spyor ba'o //
T02D1659:322a-0: des na rang gi mtshan nyid gsal @322a * //
T02D1659:322a-1: bar nyams su myong ba'i mthus zag pa med pa'i
T02D1659:322a-2: ye shes sku drug lhun gyis grub par sangs rgyas
T02D1659:322a-3: par gyur pas / mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i bde mchog 'byung bar 'gyur ba'o //
T02D1659:322a-4: de ni gzhan don 'phrul pa'i don du glus bskul ba las /
T02D1659:322a-5: dang por dgongs pa mtshan nyid dang bcas pa ni /
T02D1659:322a-6: lan cig dmigs pa tsam gyis kyang //
T02D1659:322a-7: bde ba'i dngos grub kun 'byung ba //
T02D1659:322a-8: zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa phyed dang gsum gsungs te /
T02D1659:322a-9: dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs rnams kyi yon tan gyis
T02D1659:322a-10: rnam pa la dmigs shing sbyor bar byed pa'i glu
T02D1659:322a-11: 'di lan cig blangs pa tsam gyis kyang bde ba
T02D1659:322a-12: gnyis kyi dngos grub 'byung zhing sku gsung thugs brtan
T02D1659:322a-13: par 'gyur ba dang grub pa slong bar byed do
T02D1659:322a-14: // des na sna tshogs kyi tshul dang ldan pas
T02D1659:322a-15: glu dbyangs mthug po dang srab bu'i sgo bye brag
T02D1659:322a-16: khug pa ring thung dang de'u mtho dman gyi sgo
T02D1659:322a-17: nas sna tshogs rnam par blang zhing rdo rje sems
T02D1659:322a-18: dpa'i dkyil 'khor gcig la gcig gis bskul ba'i phyir
T02D1659:322a-19: chags pa'i rang bzhin gyis blang bar bya'o //
T02D1659:322a-20: de nyid kyi tshigs su bcad pa ni /
T02D1659:322a-21: rjes su chags pa'i rnam mang dga' ba'i padmo rnam dag pa'i //
T02D1659:322a-22: mchod pas gsal bar rjes su mchod byas pas //
T02D1659:322a-23: mchog tu rtag pa'i rnal 'byor bde bas bde bsgrub par mdzod //
T02D1659:322a-24: dang por rigs kyi lha mo bzhis rang nyid kyi
T02D1659:322a-25: yon tan mtshon par byed pa'i rigs dang ye shes
T02D1659:322a-27: chags pa rnam pa gnyis dang ldan zhing sbyor ba'i
T02D1659:322a-28: bde ba la longs spyod pas yon tan gyi rnam
T02D1659:322a-29: pa mang po grub par mdzad de /
T02D1659:322a-30: bde mchog ma'i mda' gzhu'i sgo nas so //
T02D1659:322a-31: gnyis dang gnyis 'khyud pa'i rnam pas bde ba chen
T02D1659:322a-32: po mtshon par byed pa bha ga dang lingga'i mtshan
T02D1659:322a-34: ae ma ho bde ba mo'i nyon mongs pa'i dri ma thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1659:322a-35: rnam par dag pa'i mchod pa ste khams gsum las
T02D1659:322a-36: rnam par rgyal bar byed cing bdud rtsi'i bcud kyis
T02D1659:322a-37: brlan par gyur ba'i snang mdzad ma'o ;
T02D1659:322a-38: ; dbang phyug chen po'i yon tan thams cad thob
T02D1659:322a-39: par byed pa'i 'chi ba med pa'i bdud rtsis gzhan
T02D1659:322a-40: dag tshim par byed pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku gsal
T02D1659:322a-41: bar byed pas na gsal bar rjes su mchod pa
T02D1659:322a-42: byas pa ste slob dpon mo de dag gi ngo
T02D1659:322a-43: bo ji lta bu zhe na /

T02D1659:322b-1: yang phrin las kyi sgo nas rang gi las kyis bskul ba'i phyir /

T02D1659:322b-4: mchog / dgyes pa rang gi dam tshig skyon med
T02D1659:322b-5: rtag la rol cig rol cig ho //

T02D1659:322b-7: rab tu gsang ba'i lha mo mchog rnams so //

T02D1659:322b-10: pa med pa'i bde ba chen po rang gi dam

T02D1659:322b-17: pas de nyid kyi mtha' las grol bar gyur ba

T02D1659:322b-20: sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig gis gzhan skyong bar
T02D1659:322b-21: mdzad cing khams gsum las rgyal nas bdud rtsi'i chu
T02D1659:322b-22: rgyun dri ma'i skyon dang bral ba dag la rtag
T02D1659:322b-24: lha mo snang mdzad ma'i phrin las kyis dus kun

T02D1659:322b-28: bar gyur ba'i don la dbang thob pas bdag por

T02D1659:322b-35: ba'i tshogs la dga' ba rab tu gsang ba'i don

T02D1659:323a-4: rtog pa sna tshogs pa dag gi lam las bzlog

T02D1659:323a-6: po'i bdag nyid du sbyor pas chos thams cad kyi

T02D1659:323a-9: par can ston par byed pa ni rdo rje 'chang
T02D1659:323a-10: chen po nyid kyi ngo bo las byung ba ste

T02D1659:323a-12: ba'i dbyings nas mkha' 'gro bde ba'i dkyil 'khor ston
T02D1659:323a-13: / par mdzad pa'o // tshul de nyid kyi sku
T02D1659:323a-14: drug lhun gyis grub pa'i dngos grub rnal 'byor pa'i
T02D1659:323a-15: rgyud la sgrubs shig ces pa'o //

T02D1659:323a-19: de ltar glu blangs pa'i phan yon ni /

T02D1659:323a-21: rdo rje sems dpa' dpal la gnas //

T02D1659:323a-27: por ni sems can gdul ba'i don du dbang gi

T02D1659:323a-37: nas sems can gdug pa can rnams la drag po'i

T02D1659:323a-42: gnas pa rnams la zhi ba'i phrin las kyis don
T02D1659:323a-44: yang rigs kyi 'khor so so re re'i sgo nas
T02D1659:323a-45: yang phrin las rnam pa bzhi'i tshul gyis don mdzad
T02D1659:323b-0: par bskul ba ste gnas skabs kyis sbyar bar @323b
T02D1659:323b-1: bya'o ; ; de las rnam pa mang po'i 'dod chags kyi rgyud kyi sems can 'dul ba ni /
T02D1659:323b-2: nyid kyi sku las 'od dmar po 'phros /
T02D1659:323b-3: rigs kyi dkyil 'khor de nyid kyis mkha' 'gro sgyu
T02D1659:323b-4: ma'i dkyil 'khor rnam par sprul nas tshul rnam pa
T02D1659:323b-5: lnga las la sbyor bar mdzad cing de nyid mthar
T02D1659:323b-6: phyin par bya ba'i phyir bskul ba'i dam tshig ni

T02D1659:323b-10: de nyid dang mthun pa'i dkyil 'khor sprul pas don
T02D1659:323b-11: mdzad pa'i phyir ni h'um gsum brjod pa'o //
T02D1659:323b-12: khro bo'i cha lugs rang rgyud pa dag gdul ba'i
T02D1659:323b-13: phyir ni nyams dgu'i phyag rgyas rnam par gnon pa

T02D1659:323b-15: bhyo h'um gis bskul bar mdzad pa'o //

T02D1659:323b-17: can mang po dag bde bar bya ba'i phyir ni

T02D1659:323b-45: rtag tu brjod pas bde bar gshegs pa'i yon tan

T02D1659:324a-18: sarba ta th'a ga ta dzva le pra dzva le /
T02D1659:324a-21: ru lu ru lu h'um bhyo h'um /

T02D1659:325a-1: par bsgrub cing mtshan ma'i rtags kyis brgyan pa'i mthus
