T02D1659:326a-12: mnyam pa chen po'i gnas la rol du gsol //
T02D1659:326a-13: he ra te badzra bi la si na tra ta
T02D1659:326a-14: ces brjod cing gling bu phreng ba ltar bya ba
T02D1659:326a-15: dang / yang tshigs su bcad pa'i rjes la aom
T02D1659:326a-16: badzra pushpe zhes brjod cing me tog 'thor ba'i tshul
T02D1659:326a-17: dang / du bya'o // de bzhin du gzhan dag la yang rgya cher sbyar ro //
T02D1659:326a-18: de dag gi don ni rigs dang ye shes dang tshad med pa dang /
T02D1659:326a-19: phrin las kyi las la bskul ba'i don gyis shes par bya'o //
T02D1659:326a-20: de ltar mchod pa'i phyag rgya 'dis me tog 'thor ba'i tshul du bya'o //
T02D1659:326a-21: mchod pa'i las thams cad la sbyar ba'i phyir //
T02D1659:326a-22: glu yi phyag rgya 'di ni dpal //
T02D1659:326a-23: rdo rje sems dpa' la gnas te //
T02D1659:326a-24: mchod pa ma lus med pa yi //
T02D1659:326a-25: rab 'byam las las sbyar du rung //
T02D1659:326a-26: so so'i sngags dang phyag rgya dang ting nge 'dzin gyis sgyur zhing /
T02D1659:326a-27: tshigs su bcad pa'i 'dis mchod pa'i las thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D1659:326a-28: gzhan la yang gong nas gsungs pa'i glu 'di dag kun gyis ni //
T02D1659:326a-32: phrin las dag gi dus su spyan drang ba dang /
T02D1659:326a-34: bstod cing bskul ba'i las thams cad la sbyar du rung zhes bya'o //
T02D1659:326a-35: de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las /
T02D1659:326a-36: glu yi bskul ba sna tshogs kyis //
T02D1659:326a-37: rab 'byam las la sbyar bar bya //
T02D1659:326a-38: bsnyen dang sgrub sogs gang dag gis //
T02D1659:326a-39: cho ga'i yan lag kun 'grub bo //
T02D1659:326a-41: de ltar mchod pa'i phan yon no //
T02D1659:326a-42: gang dag grub par ma gyur dang ;
T02D1659:326a-43: ; mchod pa dag ni mi 'byor ba //
T02D1659:326a-44: phyag rgya 'di yis mchod byas na //
T02D1659:326a-45: mchod pa thams cad myur du 'grub //
T02D1659:326a-46: yun ring du rnam par dpyod pa'i lam gang dag gsal bar ma gyur ba dang /
T02D1659:326a-47: dngos su 'byor ba'i rdzas ma tshogs pa dag gis
T02D1659:326a-48: ni phyag rgya'i mchod pa gong ma rnams kyis tshogs
T02D1659:326b-3: da ni slob ma'i las su bya ba'i rim pa las dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i thabs bstan te /
T02D1659:326b-4: mchod pa'i sbyor ba 'di dag dang //
T02D1659:326b-5: lha mo bzhi po dag gis ni //
T02D1659:326b-6: me tog la sogs mchod byas nas ;
T02D1659:326b-7: ; slob ma thams cad gzung bar bya //
T02D1659:326b-8: rdo rje slob dpon gyi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du
T02D1659:326b-9: mchod pa thams cad kyi sngags dang phyag rgya dang
T02D1659:326b-10: ting nge 'dzin du bcas pas 'byor ba'i rdzas thams
T02D1659:326b-11: cad la sbyar zhing byin gyis brlabs te /
T02D1659:326b-12: lha mo bzhi'i tshul gyis me tog la sogs pa'i phreng ba dang /
T02D1659:326b-13: bdug spos kyi ril bu la sogs pa dang /
T02D1659:326b-15: phreng ba la sogs pa dang /
T02D1659:326b-16: dri'i sbyar ma rang bzhin dang /
T02D1659:326b-17: bcos ma las byung bdag gis sna drangs shing /
T02D1659:326b-18: de'i rjes la gzhan dag kyang phul te slob dpon 'jug par bya'o //
T02D1659:326b-19: de nas slob ma'i don du gsol ba gdab cing 'jug pa'i phyir /
T02D1659:326b-20: thun mtshams su bya ba'i cho ga dang /
T02D1659:326b-21: yol ba'i nang du gzhug pa'i cho ga dang /
T02D1659:326b-22: rjes su bya ba'i las dag gi rim par 'jug par bya'o //
T02D1659:326b-23: de dag gi cho ga ni 'di ltar yin te /
T02D1659:326b-24: dang por rdo rje slob dpon gyis snga ma'i dkyil
T02D1659:326b-25: 'khor du ji ltar zhugs pa bzhin du bya ba
T02D1659:326b-26: dang / dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par dag pa bsgom pa dang /
T02D1659:326b-27: byang chub kyi sems kyi tshigs su bcad pa gsol ba gdab pa dang /
T02D1659:326b-28: bden pa bdar ba dang dbang bzhi rgyud la bskyed pa dang /
T02D1659:326b-29: lha dang bla ma la mnyes pa'i cho ga dag bya'o //
T02D1659:326b-30: de'i rjes la slob ma stegs bu la bzhag ste /
T02D1659:326b-31: bum pa'i chus bsang ba dang /
T02D1659:326b-34: phreng ba thogs te sems bskyed pa dang /
T02D1659:326b-41: snyim pa'i gar ni kun bskyed nas //
T02D1659:326b-42: de dag gdong ni mdzes pa yi //
T02D1659:326b-43: ras kyis g-yogs nas gzung bar bya //
T02D1659:326b-44: dman pa'i dngos grub dang mchog tu 'gyur ba'i dngos
T02D1659:326b-45: grub sna tshogs pa dag ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin
T02D1659:326b-46: du thob par bya ba'i don du rigs dang mthun
T02D1659:326b-47: pa'i ras kha dog rnam pa drug gis gdong g-yogs
T02D1659:327a-0: te / so so'i dkyil 'khor du 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba gdab cing @327a * //
T02D1659:327a-1: snyim pa'i gar thabs lan gsum du bskor nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i phyag rgyas bcings te /
T02D1659:327a-2: lag pa g-yon pa'i thal mo kha sbub pa'i steng
T02D1659:327a-3: du g-yas pa'i thal mo gan rgyal du bzhag pa
T02D1659:327a-4: ste / mthe'u chung dang mtheb chen du bsnol mar
T02D1659:327a-5: sbrel nas rin po che'i phreng ba thogs te yol
T02D1659:327a-6: ba'i nang du gzhug par bya'o //
T02D1659:327a-7: de yang gzhug pa'i thabs dang /
T02D1659:327a-12: sku'i dam tshig bsnan pa'i cho ga bzhis sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can du bya ba dang /
T02D1659:327a-13: gsol ba gdab pa dang dbab pa'i thabs dang /
T02D1659:327a-16: che ba'i yon tan lngas ye shes dbab par bya'o //
T02D1659:327a-17: des na 'jug pa'i cho ga ni //
T02D1659:327a-18: dngos grub ji ltar thob 'dod par //
T02D1659:327a-19: slob ma me tog 'thor du gzhug / lha mo gang la lhung ba ni //
T02D1659:327a-21: rang gi dngos grub kyi mtshan ma brtag pa'i phyir me tog dkyil 'khor du gtor te /
T02D1659:327a-22: de nyid kyi sgo nas ltas brtag pa'o //
T02D1659:327a-23: de yang bden pa brjod pa las dngos grub dbab pa dang /
T02D1659:327a-27: de'i rjes su bya ba ni //
T02D1659:327a-28: de nas gdong ni bkrol nas kyang //
T02D1659:327a-29: yon gyi mchog ni dbul bar bya //
T02D1659:327a-30: gser gyi thur mas mig dbye zhing gdong g-yogs bsal
T02D1659:327a-31: te dkyil 'khor bltas nas yon dbul ba dang bka'
T02D1659:327a-32: bsgo bar bya'o // de'i rjes su dbang bskur ba'i phyir //
T02D1659:327a-33: sangs rgyas rin chen dbang bskur bas //
T02D1659:327a-34: ji lta bar ni dbang bskur ro //
T02D1659:327a-35: de yang gsol ba gdab pa dang /
T02D1659:327a-37: slob ma gdan la gzhag ste brgyan pa dang /
T02D1659:327a-39: rigs kyi lhar bsgom zhing mchod pa ste sngon du
T02D1659:327a-40: 'gro ba'i yan lag bzhi'i rjes la rig pa'i dbang
T02D1659:327a-41: bskur bar bya'o // de ltar sngon gyi rgyal ba
T02D1659:327a-42: dag sangs rgyas rin po che dbu rgyan la sogs
T02D1659:327a-43: pas ji ltar dbang bskur ba bzhin du rigs lnga'i
T02D1659:327a-44: ye shes lnga'i rtags mtshon zhing /
T02D1659:327a-45: don 'grub par byed pa'i rang bzhin chu'i dbang dang /
T02D1659:327a-49: ming gi dbang dag bskur zhing phan yon bstan te /
T02D1659:327a-50: dam tshig bsgrags pa'i rim pa bzhin du bsnan zhing
T02D1659:327b-0: sdom pa ni sbyin pa dang sdom pa @327b nyams
T02D1659:327b-1: pa'i skyon dang / srid pa dag par bsgrub pa dang /
T02D1659:327b-2: mi mthun pa'i spang bya dang /
T02D1659:327b-3: lta spyod dang ldan par 'dod yon lnga la spyod pa'i man ngag sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1659:327b-4: de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyi dbang bskur ba'i cho ga dag rim pa bzhin byas nas /
T02D1659:327b-5: gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'i phyir //
T02D1659:327b-6: dmar chen po dang ga pur bcas ;
T02D1659:327b-7: ; tsandan dmar po sbyar ba rnams //
T02D1659:327b-8: tshogs kyi dbus su bzhag pa la //
T02D1659:327b-9: g-yon pa mtshan 'dzin rdo rjer bcas //
T02D1659:327b-10: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1659:327b-12: bsgrub pa la brten pa'i sgo nas dbang bskur ba dang /
T02D1659:327b-13: gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor tsam la brten te dbang
T02D1659:327b-14: bskur ba las dang po pa'i dbang du yab yum
T02D1659:327b-15: thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i rol pa
T02D1659:327b-16: las byung ba'i nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor rnam pa gnyis
T02D1659:327b-17: gcig tu 'dres pa dag tsandan dmar po dang sbyar
T02D1659:327b-18: te / mtshan dang ldan pa'i thod par blugs la /
T02D1659:327b-19: tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzhag ste /
T02D1659:327b-20: lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas byin gyis brlab cing /
T02D1659:327b-21: g-yon pa mtshan 'dzin rdo rje'i srin mtheb kyi phyag
T02D1659:327b-22: rgyas zhi ba'i btung ba bzhin du myang bas dngos
T02D1659:327b-23: grub kyi mchog thob par 'gyur ba'o //
T02D1659:327b-24: de yang dbang bskur ba 'ba' zhig don du gnyer ba'i dus su ni /
T02D1659:327b-25: gsang ba'i gnas nas smra byed kyi phyag rgyas blangs
T02D1659:327b-26: te longs spyod kyi gnas su gzhug par bya ba
T02D1659:327b-27: las / 'dir ni tshogs bsags shing sgrub pa'i don
T02D1659:327b-28: du bstan pas bya ba mi 'dra bar bstan pa
T02D1659:327b-29: las / yin no // bsdus pa'i don ni 'di
T02D1659:327b-30: ltar yin te dben zhing rgyan gyis brgyan par rdo
T02D1659:327b-31: rje slob dpon la zhus te bzhugs su gsol nas
T02D1659:327b-32: shes rab ma yon tan can rab tu brtags nas
T02D1659:327b-33: las / yin no // / dbang bskur zhing byin
T02D1659:327b-34: gyis brlabs pa slob dpon la dbul zhing mnyes par
T02D1659:327b-35: las / yin no // / byas la / slar slob mas gsol ba gdab pa dang /
T02D1659:327b-36: slob dpon gyis gnang ba'i lan brjod pa dang /
T02D1659:327b-37: dbang bskur ba'i don du khrus la sogs pas lha mo sbyang zhing lhar bskyed pa dang /
T02D1659:327b-38: dbang bskur zhing byin gyis brlabs te rol pa mdzad pa dang /
T02D1659:327b-39: byang chub kyi sems dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su sgrub pa'am /
T02D1659:327b-40: yang na slob ma'i khar dbab cing gnang ba'i lan brjod pa dang /
T02D1659:327b-41: slob mas longs spyod kyi gnas su gzhug ste don bzhin bsgom pa'o //
T02D1659:328a-0: de'i rjes la gsang ba chen @328a * //
T02D1659:328a-1: po'i dbang bskur ba'i phyir tshig gcig la zur gnyis su 'dren te /
T02D1659:328a-2: rang gi lha yi rnal 'byor ldan //
T02D1659:328a-3: srin lag dang ni mthe bo'i rtses //
T02D1659:328a-4: zhi ba'i btung ba bzhin myangs na //
T02D1659:328a-6: zhes pa dang yang gong nas 'byung ba'i //
T02D1659:328a-7: de nas khrus byas dri zhim lus ;
T02D1659:328a-8: ; ci 'byor pa yi gos dang rgyan //
T02D1659:328a-9: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don gyis slob dpon la bskul zhing gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02D1659:328a-10: lha mo lag tu gtad de lan gdab pa dang /
T02D1659:328a-11: lha mos grogs la bskul ba dang /
T02D1659:328a-12: grogs kyis lan brjod pa dang /
T02D1659:328a-14: dbang bskur ba'i don du gnas dben par thabs dang shes rab kyi bsgom pa dang /
T02D1659:328a-15: sbyor thabs sna tshogs kyi sgo nas mtshan ma brtag pa dang /
T02D1659:328a-16: mtshon bya don dang bcas pa'i byang chub kyi sems blang zhing slob dpon mnyes par bya ba dang /
T02D1659:328a-17: bde ba chen po'i dbang bskur ba'i cho ga'o //
T02D1659:328a-18: de dag gi phan yon ni /
T02D1659:328a-19: sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i //
T02D1659:328a-20: mkha' 'gro ma yi tshogs kyis kyang //
T02D1659:328a-21: rgyas mi thebs shing mi rmongs te //
T02D1659:328a-22: de la gnod par mi 'gyur ro //
T02D1659:328a-23: rig pa'i dbang bskur ba tsam gyi sgo nas spyod
T02D1659:328a-24: pa'i rnal 'byor pa tshul bzhin du 'jug pa dag
T02D1659:328a-25: la ni // 'jig rten pa'i mkha' 'gro ma la
T02D1659:328a-26: sogs pa drag po drag mo'i tshogs rnams kyis rgyas
T02D1659:328a-27: la ni // mi thebs shing // rims la sogs
T02D1659:328a-28: pa'i glo bur dag gis kyang gnod mi nus so
T02D1659:328a-29: la ni // mi thebs shing // // de dag gi dam tshig dang sdom pa'i rim pa ni //
T02D1659:328a-30: de nas mna' ni bsgrag byas nas //
T02D1659:328a-31: sangs rgyas thams cad mthun pa yis //
T02D1659:328a-32: mchog tu rtag pa'i bka' stsal ba //
T02D1659:328a-33: dam tshig sdom pa sbyin par bya //
T02D1659:328a-34: dang po slob ma'i dbang bskur nas dam tshig bsgrags
T02D1659:328a-35: pa'i rim pa ni mna' bsgrag cing sdom pa sbyin
T02D1659:328a-36: pa'i phyir ro // rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sbyor
T02D1659:328a-37: ba gsal ba'i thugs ka'i 'od zer gyis rigs kyi
T02D1659:328a-38: dkyil 'khor rnams dbang po'i tshul du kun gyis dbyangs
T02D1659:328a-39: mthun pa'i gsung gis brjod par mdzad pa'o //
T02D1659:328a-40: de la dam tshig nyams pa'i skyon ni //
T02D1659:328a-41: sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i //
T02D1659:328a-42: sdom pa nyams par khyed byed pa //
T02D1659:328a-43: zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gnyis gsungs pa yin te /
T02D1659:328a-44: dkyil 'khor 'di nyid kyi sgo nas dam bcas pa'i
T02D1659:328b-0: @328b don las 'gal bar byas na theg pa thun
T02D1659:328b-1: mong gi sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang
T02D1659:328b-2: / rnal 'byor ba'i rig 'dzin la sogs pa dag
T02D1659:328b-3: gis chad pas bcad cing khyad par dkyil 'khor dag
T02D1659:328b-6: srid pa dag par bsgrub pa'i dam tshig gi dgos pa gzung bar bya ste /
T02D1659:328b-7: sems can khams ni ma lus don //
T02D1659:328b-8: srid pa shin tu dag bya'i phyir //
T02D1659:328b-9: mi 'gog chos nyid sbyor ba yis //
T02D1659:328b-10: rtag pa nyid du bsgrub par bya //
T02D1659:328b-11: bdag dang 'gro ba mtha' dag gi 'dzin rtog gi
T02D1659:328b-12: mtshan ma ma lus pa dag sbyang bar bya ba'i
T02D1659:328b-13: phyir srid pa gsum gyi mtha' dag rgyu dang rkyen
T02D1659:328b-14: dang 'bras bu rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid du
T02D1659:328b-15: sbyor zhing mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i
T02D1659:328b-16: 'gog pa med pa'i chos nyid gsal bar byas pa'i
T02D1659:328b-17: mthus sku drug lhun gyis grub pa'i don rtag pa'i
T02D1659:328b-18: ngo bo nyid sgrub par 'gyur ba yin no //
T02D1659:328b-19: de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las /
T02D1659:328b-20: sdig pa dag par bsgrub pa'i phyir //
T02D1659:328b-21: rgyu rkyen 'bras bu sbyor ba'i dngos //
T02D1659:328b-22: dag pa nam mkha' lta bu'i dbyings //
T02D1659:328b-23: mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa'i rgyu //
T02D1659:328b-24: mi 'gog rtag pa nyid du sgrub //
T02D1659:328b-27: rang bzhin la gnas dam tshig che //
T02D1659:328b-28: sku gsung thugs su gsal byed pa //
T02D1659:328b-29: gnyis med chos su spyod pa'i mthus//
T02D1659:328b-30: sku drug bsgrub par bya ba'o //
T02D1659:328b-32: da ni 'jig rten gyi mi mthun pa spang ba'i phyir /
T02D1659:328b-33: rang gi ngo bo yongs spangs shing //
T02D1659:328b-34: dka' thub kyis ni gzir mi bya //
T02D1659:328b-35: ci bde bar ni bde bar spyad //
T02D1659:328b-36: 'dir ni phyi dus sangs rgyas yin //
T02D1659:328b-37: gang zhig rang gi mtshan nyid mi shes par yon
T02D1659:328b-38: tan gyi 'bras bu bzang po dag thob par 'dod
T02D1659:328b-39: cing / mu stegs kyi dka' thub dang /
T02D1659:328b-40: nyan thos kyi dka' thub sna tshogs la zhugs nas rang gi lus ngag gdung bas gzir ba ni //
T02D1659:328b-41: 'jig rten 'dir yang sdug bsngal gyi rgyu la spyod cing /
T02D1659:328b-42: gzhan du yang bde ba'i ye shes dang phrad par mi 'gyur ro //
T02D1659:328b-43: des na 'dod pa'i yon tan rnam pa lnga dag
T02D1659:328b-44: rang nyid kyi ye shes las byung ba'i snang ba
T02D1659:328b-45: ste / yon tan gyi rtsal ma 'gags pas ji
T02D1659:328b-46: ltar mos shing bde ba'i sgo nas spyad pa'i mthus
T02D1659:328b-47: 'dis ni rig 'dzin la sogs pa'i yon tan gyi
T02D1659:328b-48: sgo nas phrin las kun 'grub cing des ni sangs
T02D1659:328b-49: rgyas kyi ye shes brnyes par 'gyur ro //
T02D1659:329a-1: don ni dang por bya ba thams cad bsgrub pa'i don du rten gyi mtshan nyid bstan te /
T02D1659:329a-2: slob dpon gyi yon tan dang /
T02D1659:329a-4: mi mthun pa'i spang bya la sogs pa shes par bya'o //
T02D1659:329a-5: gzhan yang lta spyod dang ldan pas 'dod pa lnga la longs spyod pa'i phyir /
T02D1659:329a-6: rnal 'byor longs spyod thams cad la //
T02D1659:329a-7: cis kyang mi 'jigs dga' bar gyis //
T02D1659:329a-8: sdig pa med kyis khyed ma 'jigs //
T02D1659:329a-10: khyad par gyi don du phyi'i yul dang nang gi
T02D1659:329a-11: 'byung ba las bsdus pa mtha' dag gi nyon mongs
T02D1659:329a-13: 'dod pa'i longs spyod kyi dngos po ma lus pa
T02D1659:329a-14: mtha' dag rigs kyi dkyil 'khor lha mo'i tshogs dang
T02D1659:329a-16: bdag dang gzhan gyi don mthar phyin par mdzad pa dang /
T02D1659:329a-17: zab pa'i dbang du g-yo ba dang /
T02D1659:329a-19: dbang po'i rnam par 'phrul ba ma 'gags pa'i tshogs
T02D1659:329a-20: mtha' dag rnal 'byor gyi longs spyod kyi rnam par
T02D1659:329a-21: shes shing rtogs par longs spyod de /
T02D1659:329a-22: bag yangs kyis gnas par bya'o //
T02D1659:329a-23: gzhan yang spyod pa'i rim pa ni //
T02D1659:329a-24: grub pa gcig pu gcig la spyod //
T02D1659:329a-25: lhan cig spyod dang rjes spyod sdug / sangs rgyas byang chub bla med yin //
T02D1659:329a-26: yang dag nyid kyis rtag tu brten //
T02D1659:329a-27: gang zag bzhi'i sgo nas bdag gzhan gyi las la
T02D1659:329a-28: spyod pa pos mngon par byang chub pa la sogs
T02D1659:329a-29: pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'i yan lag rdzogs pa'i sgo
T02D1659:329a-30: nas lha dpa' bo gcig pa yab yum gang yang
T02D1659:329a-31: rung ba cig tsam bsgom pa dang /
T02D1659:329a-32: de nyid kyi rig ma dang 'od kyi skyes bu dag zhal sbyor gyi tshul du bsgom pa dang /
T02D1659:329a-33: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo 'khor gyi tshogs dang lhan cig tu spyod pa'i rnam par bsgom pa dang /
T02D1659:329a-34: de dbang bskur zhing byin gyis brlabs pa'i lha dag
T02D1659:329a-35: las 'od zer gyi 'phro 'dus bdag gzhan mdzes par
T02D1659:329a-36: byas pa'i rnam par bsgom pa dang /
T02D1659:329a-37: thams cad sangs rgyas byang chub kyi ngo bo bla na med pa la bkod pas na /
T02D1659:329a-38: yang dag par rtag tu bsnyen par bya'o //
T02D1659:329a-39: de ltar nges sam zhe na /
T02D1659:329a-40: rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs //
T02D1659:329a-41: de skad bka' stsal dpal ldan gyi //
T02D1659:329a-42: yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /
T02D1659:329a-43: rdo rje can gyis bka' stsal to //
T02D1659:329a-44: che ba'i yon tan mi zad par bsgoms pa'i mthus rtag tu 'byung ba yin te /
T02D1659:329b-0: de dag ye nas @329b gnas pa'i ngo bor gsal
T02D1659:329b-1: zhing rgyan gyi cho 'phrul rnam par bkod pa dag
T02D1659:329b-2: rnal 'byor dag pa'i mthu las gsal bar snang ste
T02D1659:329b-3: / de nyid rigs thams cad kyi bdag po rdo rje 'chang ba dang /
T02D1659:329b-4: de las byung ba'i dkyil 'khor kun gyis gsungs pa'o //
T02D1659:329b-5: da ni gong du dbang bskur ba'i thog mar ye shes dang pa'i cho ga bstan pa'i phyir //
T02D1659:329b-6: rnal 'byor bcas dang gsang bcas pa'i //
T02D1659:329b-7: bdag gi ye shes rgya bsgrubs nas //
T02D1659:329b-8: ji ltar tshul bzhin gar byed pas //
T02D1659:329b-9: slob ma rnams la bde ba sbyin //
T02D1659:329b-11: gsang sngags dang phyag rgyar bcas pas gsang ba'i phyag
T02D1659:329b-12: rgya'i ye shes dbab pa'i thabs las byung ba'i dkyil
T02D1659:329b-13: 'khor rnam pa bzhi yi ge'i mtshan ma dang bcas
T02D1659:329b-15: de las sku gsungs thugs kyi phyag rgyas rang gi mtshan ma dbab pa dang /
T02D1659:329b-16: bdag gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya bsgrub cing rtse
T02D1659:329b-17: gcig tu gnas pa las rnal 'byor gyi bde ba
T02D1659:329b-18: sbyin pa dang / ji lta bu'i tshul gyis gar
T02D1659:329b-19: thabs su bskyod cing slob ma la bde ba'i ye
T02D1659:329b-21: de'i rjes su bya ba ni /
T02D1659:329b-22: slob ma dam pas de phyin chad //
T02D1659:329b-23: phyag rgya'i ye shes rjes bzung bas //
T02D1659:329b-24: rnam par snang mdzad mchog bzhin du //
T02D1659:329b-25: sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid 'grub //
T02D1659:329b-26: rang gi nyams su myong ba'i mtshan ma dag la
T02D1659:329b-27: rtse gcig tu gnas pa sku g-yo zhing 'gul ba
T02D1659:329b-28: dang mtshan dang dpe byad kyi rnam pa gsal bas
T02D1659:329b-30: sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad bzhin du sku mchog
T02D1659:329b-31: tu gyur pa 'grub cing sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag
T02D1659:329b-33: de ltar cha tshogs bsags shing bsgrub pa dang /
T02D1659:329b-34: dbang bskur ba'i rjes la lha dang slob dpon mchod pa'i thabs ni //
T02D1659:329b-35: de nas ro dang zas dang gnas //
T02D1659:329b-36: glu dang sil snyan la sogs pa //
T02D1659:329b-37: de dag mgon po rnams la dbul //
T02D1659:329b-38: rdo rje bla ma chen po dang /
T02D1659:329b-39: bdag dang gzhan yang 'dod dgus mchod //
T02D1659:329b-41: 'dod pa'i longs spyod kyi tshogs 'grub pa dang /
T02D1659:329b-42: gzhan yang mchod pa'i rdzas ma lus pa dag dngos su sbyar ba dang /
T02D1659:329b-43: yid kyis sprul pa'i sgo nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs rnams la thog mar mchod pa phul zhing //
T02D1659:330a-0: de'i rjes la sangs rgyas gnyis pa tshul de @330a * //
T02D1659:330a-2: bdag dang rnal 'byor pa gzhan dag lha'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1659:330a-3: du bsgoms pa rnams kyang 'dod pa'i longs spyod sna
T02D1659:330a-5: da ni dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i yan lag bstan pa'i phyir //
T02D1659:330a-6: de nas bdag nyid rab bsgrubs nas //
T02D1659:330a-7: kun gyi slob dpon rab gnas pa //
T02D1659:330a-8: ji lta'i tshul gyis 'jug pa yis //
T02D1659:330a-9: bden pa'i chos ni brjod par bya //
T02D1659:330a-10: rdo rje slob dpon gang zhig gis sngon du bsnyen
T02D1659:330a-11: pa'i rim pas bdag gi rgyud las su rung bar
T02D1659:330a-12: bya ste / gsang ba'i don bkod pa dag las bstan pa'i cho gas bsgom pa dang /
T02D1659:330a-13: bzlas pa'i bya bas rdzogs par byas nas /
T02D1659:330a-17: rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga la sogs pa'i don
T02D1659:330a-18: brtson pa'i phyir de kho na nyid bcu la sogs
T02D1659:330a-19: pa bya ba mtha' dag rdzogs shing //
T02D1659:330a-20: rigs so so'i dkyil 'khor rtsom pa la mkhas pa'i blo dang ldan pas //
T02D1659:330a-21: kun gyi slob dpon du rab tu gnas pas ji
T02D1659:330a-22: lta bu'i tshul gyis sa'i cho ga dang sta gon
T02D1659:330a-23: la gnas pa'i cho ga la sogs pas 'jug par
T02D1659:330a-24: bya'o // de yang rim pa ni 'di ltar yin te /
T02D1659:330a-25: tshogs bsags pa dang bsgrub pa dag la ni dang
T02D1659:330a-26: po nas sa'i cho gas mgo rtsom zhing 'jug par
T02D1659:330a-27: bya ba dang / slob ma dbang bskur ba'i rim
T02D1659:330a-28: pa dag la ni bsnyen pa rnam pa lnga gang
T02D1659:330a-29: yang rung ba dag rdzogs pa las rtsom par byed
T02D1659:330a-30: bya ba dang / de / dkyil 'khor gyi dus
T02D1659:330a-31: kyi cho ga'i thog mar dkyil 'khor gyi dgos pa
T02D1659:330a-32: bya ba dang / de / shes pas / sa brtag pa dang /
T02D1659:330a-34: sa gzhi byin gyis brlab pa dang /
T02D1659:330a-35: sa'i dbang po bsgo ba dang /
T02D1659:330a-36: sa srung ba'i don du gsol ba gdab pa dang bsrung ba'i cho ga rgyas par bya'o //
T02D1659:330a-38: ji lta'i tshul gyis 'jug pa yis //
T02D1659:330a-40: gzhan yang lha sta gon la gnas pa'i don du
T02D1659:330a-41: mandala byug cing me tog sna tshogs dang bcas pa
T02D1659:330a-42: dgram pa dang / mchod pa bshams shing srung ba'i 'khor lo bsgom pa dang /
T02D1659:330a-43: bsgom pa'i rim par gsol ba gdab cing mnyes par bya bas na /
T02D1659:330a-44: ji lta'i tshul gyis 'jug pa yis //
T02D1659:330a-46: yang slob ma sta gon la gnas pa'i don du bka' bsgo ba dang /
T02D1659:330b-0: dbang po'i spyan sngar tshogs bsags shing byang chub tu sems @330b bskyed nas sdom pa bzung ba dang /
T02D1659:330b-1: shis par bya ba'i phyir gnas gsum dag par bya ba dang /
T02D1659:330b-2: tshems shing sbyin pa'i rim pa dang /
T02D1659:330b-3: skyon bsal zhing dor ba dang /
T02D1659:330b-4: de la mtshan ma'i ltas blta ba dang /
T02D1659:330b-5: dri chab kyis spyang ba dang /
T02D1659:330b-9: sta gon gyi gnas su gtor ma gtang zhing slob ma kun sha'i stan la nyal ba dang /
T02D1659:330b-10: slob dpon gyis nang du dkyil 'khor mnyes par bya ba dang /
T02D1659:330b-11: mtshan ma bzang ngan gyi bya ba bstan pa dang /
T02D1659:330b-13: yang ji lta'i tshul gyis 'jug par bya ste /
T02D1659:330b-14: bum pa sta gon la gnas pa'i phyir rgyu dang dbyibs dang kha dog bstan pa dang /
T02D1659:330b-15: rigs kyi mtshan mas brgyan cing byin gyis brlab pa dang /
T02D1659:330b-16: rnam par dag pa'i de nyid dang /
T02D1659:330b-17: rigs kyi dkyil 'khor bstim zhing bzlas brjod tshang bas sngags kyi chur gyur pa dang /
T02D1659:330b-18: de nyid shis par bya ba'i cho ga dang /
T02D1659:330b-19: gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa'i rjes la sogs so so'i gnas su dgram pa'o //
T02D1659:330b-20: yang ji lta'i tshul gyis 'jug pa gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor rtsom pa dang /
T02D1659:330b-24: rab gnas kyi las dag la 'jug par bya'o //
T02D1659:330b-25: de dag gi cho ga rgyas par ni le'u bdun
T02D1659:330b-26: pa las bstan pas de nyid du gsal bar bshad
T02D1659:330b-27: do // de dag spyi'i las su bya ba'i rim pa ni dkyil 'khor cho ga las bstan te /
T02D1659:330b-29: des na tshigs su bcad pa 'di ni cho ga'i
T02D1659:330b-30: yan lag kun gyi spyi don du shes par bya
T02D1659:330b-31: ba yin te / rkang pa dang pos ni sngon du 'jug pa'i yan lag bstan to //
T02D1659:330b-32: gnyis pas ni rten gyi mtshan nyid bstan to //
T02D1659:330b-33: gsum pas ni dkyil 'khor gyi dus kyi cho ga'i yan lag bcu po bsdus te bstan to //
T02D1659:330b-34: bzhi pas ni de dag dang mi 'gal ba'i gdams ngag bstan to //
T02D1659:330b-35: de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las /
T02D1659:330b-36: de nas bdag nyed rab bsgrubs nas //
T02D1659:330b-37: rnal 'byor gsal bar goms pa'i mthus //
T02D1659:330b-38: bsnyen pa'i yan lag gang dag gis //
T02D1659:330b-39: sngon du 'gro ba dang po brtsams //
T02D1659:330b-40: de nyid bcu sogs rim pa dag //
T02D1659:330b-41: kun gyi slob dpon la gnas shing //
T02D1659:330b-42: blo ldan dpa' bo chen po yis //
T02D1659:331a-0: bdag gzhan don la rab tu @331a * //
T02D1659:331a-2: ; dkyil 'khor dus kyi cho ga'i tshogs //
T02D1659:331a-3: ji lta'i tshul gyis 'jug pa yis //
T02D1659:331a-4: sa nas cho ga lhag ma'i bar //
T02D1659:331a-5: ma 'dres las kyi don spyod pas //
T02D1659:331a-6: don mthun gdams ngag ji bzhin par //
T02D1659:331a-8: bden pa'i chos ni brjod bya zhing ;
T02D1659:331a-9: ; bstan pa'i don ni tshim par mdzad //
T02D1659:331a-11: da ni phrin las kyi mtshan nyid rigs pa bsdus
T02D1659:331a-12: spyi'i 'gro ba dag 'dul bar mdzad pa'i tshul bstan
T02D1659:331a-13: te / rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi tshul //
T02D1659:331a-14: rtog pa thams cad rab bsgrub cing //
T02D1659:331a-15: rtog pa kun gyi rab sbyor ba'i //
T02D1659:331a-16: ngo bo nyid phyir chen po'i mchog / sku gsum
T02D1659:331a-17: gnyis su med pa'i rdo rje 'chang chen po de
T02D1659:331a-18: nyid kyis gdul bya'i dbang po dang skye mched kyi
T02D1659:331a-19: bye brag sna tshogs kyi sgo nas rgya chen po'i
T02D1659:331a-20: tshogs rnams gcig tu bsdus pa la dga' zhing /
T02D1659:331a-21: de nyid kyi sgor 'jug par 'dod pa'i don du rigs bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor bstan te /
T02D1659:331a-22: bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi sku las dpal rnam pa gnyis kyi snang ba /
T02D1659:331a-23: rigs rnam pa drug gi rtog pa thams cad rab tu bsgrub cing /
T02D1659:331a-24: rtog pa'i cho ga kun gyi sgo nas gzhan dag
T02D1659:331a-25: gi don rgya chen po la sbyor zhing don dam
T02D1659:331a-26: pa'i de kho na nyid dang /
T02D1659:331a-27: kun rdzob kyi rnam par 'phrul ba gnyis su med
T02D1659:331a-28: pa'i rnam par ston par mdzad pas rang gi ngo
T02D1659:331a-29: bo nyid kyi de bzhin du phyag rgya'i cho ga
T02D1659:331a-31: bsdus pa'i don ni rigs bsdus kyi dkyil 'khor chen
T02D1659:331a-32: po'i sgo nas tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po rtsom
T02D1659:331a-33: pa dang / de la brten te tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa'i don gyi phyir /
T02D1659:331a-34: blo dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor bas rten gyi mtshan nyid dang ldan par bya'o //
T02D1659:331a-35: de yang rtog pa bdun pa las /
T02D1659:331a-36: shes rab kyis ni blo phyes nas //
T02D1659:331a-37: nges par brtags pa'i sa gzhi la //
T02D1659:331a-38: bla mas nges pa'i lung 'di bstan //
T02D1659:331a-39: grub pa'i dbang phyug phun sum tshogs //
T02D1659:331a-40: zhes pa la sogs pa dang /
T02D1659:331a-42: bzhin bzangs rang bzhin zhi ba'i chos //
T02D1659:331a-43: skye bo kun dga' mkha' 'dra'i blo //
T02D1659:331a-44: zhes pa la sogs pa'i don gyis yon tan dang skyon gyi bye brag shes par byas nas /
T02D1659:331a-45: phun sum tshogs pa bzhi dang ldan pas /
T02D1659:331a-46: rdzas dang sa gzhi brtags pa de //
T02D1659:331b-1: 'od zer kun du spros nas kyang //
T02D1659:331b-2: ma lus nye bar khyab byas te //
T02D1659:331b-3: re dang dam pa'i tshul du dgongs //
T02D1659:331b-4: zhes pa la sogs pa'i don gyis phun sum tshogs pa bsags pa dang /
T02D1659:331b-5: sa'i cho ga dang sta gon la gnas pa'i cho ga dang /
T02D1659:331b-6: gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor rtsom pa dang ;
T02D1659:331b-7: dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i rim pa bzhin du bya'o //
T02D1659:331b-8: de yang dkyil 'khor gyi bye brag ni phyi rol
T02D1659:331b-9: gru bzhi rdo rje'i phreng ba la sogs pa rim
T02D1659:331b-10: pa rnams kyis bskor zhing dur khrod chen po'i gnas
T02D1659:331b-11: brgyad dang bcas pa'i nang du gru bzhi pa la
T02D1659:331b-12: sgo bzhi rim pa dang bcas pa'i nang du phyi
T02D1659:331b-13: nang gi bar khyams dang pho brang gi phreng ba
T02D1659:331b-15: de'i nang rol ka ba brgyad kyi gdung mas phye
T02D1659:331b-16: ba'i phyogs mtshams kyi sa gzhi ste lte ba dang
T02D1659:331b-17: bcas pa / dkyil 'khor chen po dgu'i gnas dgod par bya ste /
T02D1659:331b-18: dbus su rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor zhi ba'i
T02D1659:331b-19: rdo rje rtse lnga dkar dmar 'od zer dang bcas
T02D1659:331b-20: pa'i rva phyogs su rnam par snang mdzad kyi 'khor
T02D1659:331b-21: lo'i pho brang la 'khor lo'i phreng bas mdzes pa'o
T02D1659:331b-22: // lho phyogs su he ru ka'i dkyil 'khor zla
T02D1659:331b-23: gam kha nang du bstan pa la re'u mig dgur
T02D1659:331b-24: // phye ba la / khro bo rdo rje sngon po rtse mo gyes pas bskor ba'o //
T02D1659:331b-25: nub tu padma gar gyi dbang phyug gi pho brang
T02D1659:331b-26: padma'i dkyil 'khor la padma dmar po'i phreng bas bskor
T02D1659:331b-27: ba'o // byang du rdo rje nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rin po che'i phreng ba ser pos bskor ba'o //
T02D1659:331b-28: mtshams kyi re'u mig bzhi la rta mchog las bzhi'i
T02D1659:331b-29: dkyil 'khor phrin las rnam bzhi'i kha dog dang mtshan
T02D1659:331b-30: mas brgyan pa'o // de ltar dbus kyi pho brang
T02D1659:331b-31: dgu po de dag la ni nang gi lha bcu
T02D1659:331b-32: gsum po dag so so'i gnas su bkod cing /
T02D1659:331b-33: de'i phyi rol bar khyams nang ma la mchod pa'i
T02D1659:331b-34: lha mo bzhi dag kha dog dang rgyan chas mi
T02D1659:331b-35: 'dra zhing phyag gi mtshan ma mthun par mtshams rer
T02D1659:331b-37: sgo nang ma la ni ye shes kyi lha mo
T02D1659:331b-38: dgu bzhi bkod cing phyi ma la ni de dang
T02D1659:331b-39: cha lugs gcig pa'i 'jig rten pa'i lha mo dgu
T02D1659:331b-41: bar khyams phyi ma la ni sprul pa 'jig rten
T02D1659:331b-42: pa dang mthun pa'i dkyil 'khor dang rang rgyud pa
T02D1659:331b-44: shar du lha chen po dag dang phyogs skyong dag go //
T02D1659:332a-1: phyogs su mkha' 'gro ma chen mo brgyad kyi tshogs rnams so //
T02D1659:332a-2: nub tu klu chen po brgyad rang rang gi 'khor tshogs dang bcas pa'o //
T02D1659:332a-3: byang du 'gro ba rigs drug gi gtso bo 'khor dang bcas pa'o //
T02D1659:332a-4: sgo nang ma la ni sangs rgyas kyi che ba'i
T02D1659:332a-5: yon tan rnam par bkod pa dang bcas pas rta
T02D1659:332a-6: babs la sogs pa'i rgyan gyis mtshan pa'o //
T02D1659:332a-7: sgo phyi ma la ni 'jig rten pa'i bar khyams
T02D1659:332a-8: zlum po la 'jig rten pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o
T02D1659:332a-9: // de nas rtogs pa thams cad la rab tu
T02D1659:332a-10: bsgrub pa'i phyir bsod nams kyi tshogs bsags pa dang
T02D1659:332a-11: // / sbyin gtor gyi cho ga rgya chen pos bar chad kyi bgegs bsal zhing /
T02D1659:332a-12: srung ba'i 'khor lo la sogs pas mtshams kyi rim
T02D1659:332a-13: pa brtan par byas nas bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi
T02D1659:332a-14: 'khor lo dang / ye shes kyi tshogs kyi 'khor
T02D1659:332a-15: los bsnyen sgrub kyi yan lag dang ldan pas bsgrub
T02D1659:332a-16: 'khor lo dang / par bya'o // de nas rtog pa kun las rab tu sbyor ba'i phyir /
T02D1659:332a-17: tshogs kyi cho ga dang phrin las rgya chen po
T02D1659:332a-18: dag gis bdag gzhan gyi don mthar dbyung zhing spyin
T02D1659:332a-19: sreg dang lhag ma'i gtor mas mnyes shing bstan par
T02D1659:332a-20: bya ba dang / rjes su bya ba'i yan lag
T02D1659:332a-21: cho ga'i lhag ma dag gis dkyil 'khor gyi bsgrub
T02D1659:332a-23: dkyil 'khor gyi mtha' ma bskor zhing mi 'bral ba'i smon lam gdab pa dang /
T02D1659:332a-26: dngos grub kyi lhag ma blang ba dang /
T02D1659:332a-27: lha rnams la mchod bstod bya ba dang /
T02D1659:332a-28: dkyil 'khor rnam pa gsum rim pa bzhin du bsdu ba dang /
T02D1659:332a-29: mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor dgrol zhing srung ma dang /
T02D1659:332a-30: mgron tshogs dag la gtor ma sbyin pa dang /
T02D1659:332a-31: rdo rje slob dpon la sogs pa dag yon gyis mnyes par bya ba dang /
T02D1659:332a-32: 'gro ba'i don du smon lam gdab cing chos kyi sbyin pa brjod pa dang /
T02D1659:332a-33: spyod lam gyi rnal 'byor las mi nyams par gnas pas rab tu sbyor bar bya'o //
T02D1659:332a-34: des ni rigs bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i ngo bo nyid gsal bar 'grub pa'i phyir /
T02D1659:332a-36: sgrub pa'i tshul chen po'i sgo nas phyag rgyas rab
T02D1659:332a-37: tu sbyor zheng gnas pas de dang mthun pa'i mchog
T02D1659:332a-39: de nyid kyi tshul ni rtog pa dgu pa'i gnas skabs nas kyang bshad la /
T02D1659:332b-0: rtsa ba'i @332b rgyud las kyang rgya cher bstan pa'i don bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02D1659:332b-1: da ni rigs so so'i dkyil 'khor dag la dga'
T02D1659:332b-2: ba dag gi don du so so'i phrin las kyis
T02D1659:332b-3: dkyil 'khor gyi las bsgrub pa'i phyir tshul rnam pa
T02D1659:332b-5: dang por rdo rje sems dpa'i sgo nas /
T02D1659:332b-6: sna tshogs las kyi sbyor ba dang ;
T02D1659:332b-7: ; gdul ba'i thabs ni sna tshogs pas //
T02D1659:332b-8: sems can rnams ni gdul ba'i phyir //
T02D1659:332b-9: de las gzhan pa'i tshul du bstan //
T02D1659:332b-10: thabs thugs rje chen po mdzad pa'i phrin las sna tshogs rnam par bstan te /

T02D1659:332b-12: lam la gzhug pa'i thabs khyad par can mnga' bas
T02D1659:332b-13: / de nyid kyi sgo nas gzhug pa'i phyir rdo
T02D1659:332b-14: rje sems dpa'i rnam pa las byung ba'i tshogs dang
T02D1659:332b-15: / / chos kyis sgrub pa'i sgo nas rnam par spyad pa'o //

T02D1659:332b-17: rten gyi gang zag khyad par gyi mtshan nyid can
T02D1659:332b-18: gyis le'u bdun pa las 'byung ba'i rang gi gnas
T02D1659:332b-22: rgyan cha la sogs phun sum tshogs pa bzhi dang
T02D1659:332b-23: ldan pas rang gi dkyil 'khor gyi sgo nas bsgrub

T02D1659:332b-25: gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor bri ba dang /
T02D1659:332b-27: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyi bya ba

T02D1659:332b-35: bro gar gyi phyag rgya sna tshogs kyi sgo nas so sor mnyes par bya ba dang /
T02D1659:332b-36: bza' btung gi tshogs la longs spyod pa dang /
T02D1659:332b-37: gnas dang dam tshig gi phyag rgya la gnas pa dang /
T02D1659:332b-38: so so'i las kyi sgo nas rol pa'o //
T02D1659:332b-39: rjes su 'jug pa'i gang zag gi don gong ma
T02D1659:332b-40: dang 'dra bar rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor
T02D1659:332b-42: de ltar rdo rje he ru ka dang /
T02D1659:332b-43: padma gar gyi dbang phyug dang /
T02D1659:332b-45: rta mchog rol pa bsgrub pa'i phrin las la sbyor ba'i thabs bstan pa'i phyir /

T02D1659:333a-0: zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshogs su bcad pa @333a * //
T02D1659:333a-2: bsgrub pa'i rim pa ni tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho
T02D1659:333a-3: ga las rgya cher bstan pas 'dir spro bar mi
T02D1659:333a-5: rten gyi sgo nas bsgrub pa'i phyir //
T02D1659:333a-6: rang gi lha dang 'dra ba yi //
T02D1659:333a-7: rang gi byin rlabs bsgrub pa'i phyir //
T02D1659:333a-8: gzugs brnyan ngo bor sbyor ba yis //
T02D1659:333a-9: phyag rgya'i sbyor bas gar bya'o //
T02D1659:333a-10: tha mal ba'i 'gro bdag gis lus ngag yid gsum
T02D1659:333a-11: dag bde bar gshegs pa'i sku gsung thugs su sbyor
T02D1659:333a-12: ba'i phyir / sku'i gzugs brnyan dang /
T02D1659:333a-14: thugs kyi phyag rgya dag bdag la bstan cing sbyor ba rnams gar byed /
T02D1659:333a-15: bsdus pa'i don ni tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du sku
T02D1659:333a-16: gsung thugs kyi phyag rgya gang yang rung ba cig
T02D1659:333a-17: la / bsnyen sgrub la yan lag bzhi'i sgo nas
T02D1659:333a-18: rtags rnam pa lnga gsal bar gyur pa dang phyag
T02D1659:333a-19: rgya'i dngos grub blang bar bya'o zhes pa'o //
T02D1659:333a-20: da ni gong ma dag gi 'bras bu bstan pa las /
T02D1659:333a-21: dang por spyi'i mtshan nyid ni //
T02D1659:333a-22: dam tshig rnam pa sna tshogs kyis //
T02D1659:333a-23: de ltar rnam par dpyad na ni //
T02D1659:333a-24: zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa phyed
T02D1659:333a-25: dang gsum gsungs te bsgrubs pa las byung ba'i las
T02D1659:333a-26: thams cad skad cig mas rgyud la nyams su myang
T02D1659:333a-27: bar bya ba'i phyir nyams su blang ba'i thabs lam
T02D1659:333a-28: rnam pa gnyis la sbyar bar bya ste gzhi dang
T02D1659:333a-29: rten la sogs pa'i las gsal ba dag la dmigs
T02D1659:333a-30: shing de nyid dang tshul mthun pa'i spyod pa'i rim
T02D1659:333a-31: pa dag rnam par spyad nas don bzhin du bstan
T02D1659:333a-32: pa'i mthus / sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par
T02D1659:333a-33: spyor ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba mchog gi
T02D1659:333a-35: khyad par gyi dbang du rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil
T02D1659:333a-36: 'khor bsgrub pa'i 'bras bu la sogs pa rigs kyi
T02D1659:333a-37: dkyil 'khor rnams kyi rang rang gi yon tan 'bras
T02D1659:333a-39: kun du kun nas thams cad ni //
T02D1659:333a-40: sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul thams cad kyis //
T02D1659:333a-41: zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa drug gsungs te /
T02D1659:333a-42: rigs rnam pa lnga dang ye shes rnam pa lnga'i
T02D1659:333a-43: don rtags kyis chos thams cad la sbyor zhing khyad
T02D1659:333a-44: par gyi phrin las rnam pa lnga'i mdzad pa rang
T02D1659:333a-45: gi gdul bya grol bar mdzad nas bsgrub pa'i 'bras
T02D1659:333a-46: bu yon tan mchog tu gyur pa la sbyor bar
T02D1659:333b-0: mdzad pa'o // @333b de dag gi 'bras bu ni go sla ba'i phyir ma bshad do //
T02D1659:333b-1: yang 'bras bu'i mjug bsdu ba'i phyir /
T02D1659:333b-2: de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog / chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa //
T02D1659:333b-3: zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa phyed dang gnyis gsungs te /
T02D1659:333b-4: dngos grub rgya chen por 'khrigs pa las byung ba'i
T02D1659:333b-5: 'bras bu tshad med cing mtha' yas pa'i mchog gi
T02D1659:333b-6: snying po chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa dang mi mnyam
T02D1659:333b-7: pas bsdus pa mthar thug pa med pa'i bar du
T02D1659:333b-8: rnam par spros shing bde ba chen po'i ye shes
T02D1659:333b-9: kyis brgyan pa'i dpal rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du
T02D1659:333b-10: grub pa'o // da ni phrin las kyi mjug bsdu ba'i phyir /
T02D1659:333b-11: dpal dgyes rol pa rnam 'phrul pa //
T02D1659:333b-12: sna tshogs kyis ni rnam par rol //
T02D1659:333b-13: zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa phyed dang gnyis gsungs te /
T02D1659:333b-14: dpal bde ba chen po'i sku las khyad par gyi phrin las rnam pa bzhi dang /
T02D1659:333b-18: sum brgya drug cu'i bar du dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor
T02D1659:333b-19: lo ngag gi mdzad pa'i rnam pas grol ba'i don
T02D1659:333b-20: du sna tshogs kyi bya bas rnam par rol cing
T02D1659:333b-21: / thams cad skal pa bzang po'i bde ba mchog
T02D1659:333b-22: gis gdul bya'i phrin las rnam pa sna tshogs kyi
T02D1659:333b-23: sgo nas sems can gyi khams dag rab tu bsgrub
T02D1659:333b-24: / pa'o // gzhan yang tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi mjug bsdu ba'i phyir /
T02D1659:333b-25: de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog / chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa //
T02D1659:333b-26: zhes pa la sogs pa tshigs su bcad pa phyed dang gnyis gsungs te /
T02D1659:333b-27: tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgor zhugs pa'i rnal 'byor
T02D1659:333b-28: pa dag gis dang por sgrub pa'i rim pa shes
T02D1659:333b-30: de'i don bzhin du spyod pas yon tan gyi 'bras
T02D1659:333b-31: bu de nyid dang mthun pa'i tshogs snang bar mdzad
T02D1659:333b-32: pa yin no // sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam
T02D1659:333b-33: par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi rtog
T02D1659:333b-34: pa zhes pa ni spyi'i sgra las khyad par gyi
T02D1659:333b-35: bye brag tu sbyar ba ste /
T02D1659:333b-36: las mkhan gyi skabs su bab pa'i tshig bzhin du /
T02D1659:333b-37: tshul de nyid kyi rtog pa gcod par byed pas
T02D1659:333b-38: tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams la yang gnas
T02D1659:333b-39: skabs kyi sgra de nyid 'jug par 'gyur ro //
T02D1659:333b-40: des na mkha' 'gro ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi rtog pa shes pa yin no //
T02D1659:333b-41: rtog pa drug pa'i don rnam par bshad pa'o /
T02D1659:334a-0: // / @334a * // gang zhig gis chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid ji ltar gnas pa'i don mi shes shing /
T02D1659:334a-1: las sgrub pa dag gis phan yon ma rtogs pa
T02D1659:334a-2: dag gis ni bya ba'i sgo rnams thams cad la
T02D1659:334a-4: re na bu'i tshogs kyi rgyal po'i bka' gsang nang bar las spyod pa lta bu'o //
T02D1659:334a-5: long ba'i tshogs kyis brtags pa'i bstan bcos mtha' dag la spyod pa bzhin no //
T02D1659:334a-6: de dag bsgrub par mi nus pas ni shes pa'i
T02D1659:334a-7: lo rgyus tsam la brten pas phan par mi 'gyur
T02D1659:334a-8: te / klu taksha'i spyi bo nas rgyan gyi rin
T02D1659:334a-9: po che lta bu'am las mtha' la spyod pa'i dus
T02D1659:334a-10: su drug za ba'i bdud rtsi bzhin no //
T02D1659:334a-11: de dag spyod par mi nus pas ni bsgrubs shing bsags pas kyang phan par mi 'gyur te /
T02D1659:334a-12: bram ze mo bzang mdzes ma lta bu'am /
T02D1659:334a-13: btsun mo rin spyod ma lta bu'o //
T02D1659:334a-14: de dag kyang sngon gyi lo rgyus la sogs pas de ni ma bsgrubs shing /
T02D1659:334a-15: sgrub pa'i thabs la spyod pa'i yan lag dang bral bas ni 'jug par mi 'gyur te /
T02D1659:334a-16: yid mi ches shing gsal ba'i don nyams su myong ba rgyud la bskyed par mi 'gyur te /
T02D1659:334a-17: bstan bcos kyi lo rgyus gang yang med pa'i lam la 'jug pa dang /
T02D1659:334a-18: rgyu rkyen ma tshogs pa'i bya ba rtsom pa ste /
T02D1659:334a-19: khyim bdag rnam dpyod kyis shing mkhan gyi gnas su zhugs pa lta bu'am /
T02D1659:334a-20: rgyal po sgra gcan gyi las gsungs pa'i 'khor lor bsgrub pa lta bu'o //
T02D1659:334a-21: de dag thams cad kyang phun sum tshogs pa'i sgo nas las dag la sbyor bar ma byas shing /
T02D1659:334a-22: rang nyid kyi rgyud ma sbyangs pas ni stobs 'phel
T02D1659:334a-23: zhing 'jug par mi nus te ma pham pa'i longs
T02D1659:334a-25: khyim bdag bshes gnyen can gyi 'khor lo lta bu'o //
T02D1659:334a-26: de dag gi rten gnas ni lam dang po'i mtshan nyid can las byung ba ste /
T02D1659:334a-27: gang zhig de lam brten par bya ba'i las gzhan
T02D1659:334a-28: rtsom par 'dod pa dag rgyal po ser skyong gi
T02D1659:334a-29: dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi ba bzhin du 'gyur
T02D1659:334a-30: bas rang dga'i blo dgag par bya'o //
T02D1659:334a-31: de dag gi mtshan nyid ni rten nyams pa dang /
T02D1659:334a-32: gnas dang mi ldan pa dkyil 'khor du ma zhugs pa dang /
T02D1659:334a-33: de las byung ba'i don dag ma mthong zhing thob par ma byas pa ste /
T02D1659:334a-34: ne tso smra rgyal dang bram ze'i bu mo sngo bsangs dang /
T02D1659:334a-35: rgyal po yul skyong gi bu dang /
T02D1659:334a-36: gsum mdzes phreng ba can gyi bu dang /
T02D1659:334b-0: rgyal @334b po skyabs seng dag bzhin no //
T02D1659:334b-1: des na le'u bdun pa las 'byung ba'i don dag ni kun gyi thog mar 'gro ba yin te /
T02D1659:334b-2: de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las /
T02D1659:334b-3: las kyi sgrub pa gang dag la /
T02D1659:334b-4: brten nas phun sum ma tshogs par //
T02D1659:334b-5: rjes su spyod pa gang yin pa //
T02D1659:334b-8: ; de dag spyi'i mtshan nyid ni rtog pa bdun pa las /
T02D1659:334b-9: rten gnas phun sum tshogs ldan pas //
T02D1659:334b-10: sngon 'gro'i bsnyen pa rdzogs byas te /
T02D1659:334b-11: sa gzhi sta gon gnas pa dang //
T02D1659:334b-12: gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor rtsom sgrub cing //
T02D1659:334b-13: gtor ma sbyin sreg shis pa'i las //
T02D1659:334b-14: 'jug pa dbang bskur la sogs rnams //
T02D1659:334b-15: bdag gzhan smin cing grol ba'i phyir //
T02D1659:334b-16: dam pa'i lung bzhin bsgrub par bya //
T02D1659:334b-18: de las dang po gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor mdor bstan pa'i phyir //
T02D1659:334b-19: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
T02D1659:334b-20: rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi lha //
T02D1659:334b-21: rnam pa sna tshogs kun gyi mchog /'khor lo thams cad rnam 'phrul ba //
T02D1659:334b-22: gsang ba mchog gi dgyes par ni //
T02D1659:334b-23: thams cad bdag nyid rjes su bsgrub //
T02D1659:334b-24: gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor bshang pa skabs su bab pa'i phyir /
T02D1659:334b-28: rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga la sogs pa'i don
T02D1659:334b-29: du las gong du ma dag las gzhan du bya
T02D1659:334b-30: ba'i rim pa dag gis dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi
T02D1659:334b-31: rgya shes pa'i sbyor ba dang ldan pas stang stabs
T02D1659:334b-32: kyi bye brag sna tshogs kyi sgo nas dkyil 'khor
T02D1659:334b-33: thams cad kyi rtog pa la sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D1659:334b-34: de dag sngon byung gi dus su ri rab kyi
T02D1659:334b-35: rtse mor dkyil 'khor 'phrul zhing bshad pa'i tshul dag
T02D1659:334b-36: rgya chen por snang ba ni dpal rdo rje sems
T02D1659:334b-38: 'khor lo thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul ba'i tshul
T02D1659:334b-39: gyis dpa' bo yan lag bdun pa dang ldan pa'i
T02D1659:334b-40: sgo nas ston par mdzad pa dang /
T02D1659:334b-41: de nyid sgrub pa'i thabs khyad par can rten gyi gang zag nas bzung ste /
T02D1659:334b-42: dbang bskur ba la sogs pa cho ga'i yan lag
T02D1659:334b-43: rnams rdzogs par rjes su 'jug pa'i gang zag gis
T02D1659:334b-44: bsgrub pa'i yan lag tu bshad pa'i 'khor lo thams
T02D1659:334b-45: cad rnam par 'phrul ba'i phyir ston par mdzad do
T02D1659:335a-1: ma'i rkang pa gnyis ni phyi nang gsang ba gsum
T02D1659:335a-2: gyi gnas dben par phun sum tshogs pa thams cad
T02D1659:335a-3: dang ldan pas bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D1659:335a-4: de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las /
T02D1659:335a-5: bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor rgya chen po //
T02D1659:335a-6: ri rab rtse mor sprul mdzad cing //
T02D1659:335a-7: gdul bya'i snang ba'i snang ba ji lta bar dkyil 'khor rnam par 'phrul pa'i tshul //
T02D1659:335a-9: de nyid dkyil 'khor bshad mdzad cing //
T02D1659:335a-10: phyi nang gsang ba'i gnas dag tu //
T02D1659:335a-11: phun sum tshogs pa'i bsgrub par bstan //
T02D1659:335a-13: de ni rgyas pa'i sgo nas gnas bstan pa'i phyir //
T02D1659:335a-14: dben pa yi ni gnas dag gam //
T02D1659:335a-15: rang gi skyed mos tshal sogs par //
T02D1659:335a-16: zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa phyed dang bdun gsungs te /
T02D1659:335a-17: dang por tshigs su bcad pa phyed kyis rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas bstan to //
T02D1659:335a-18: de nas tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis ni rten
T02D1659:335a-19: phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pas bsgrub pa'i yan
T02D1659:335a-20: lag dang / dkyil 'khor gyi sngon du 'gro ba
T02D1659:335a-21: la sogs pa phun sum tshogs pas 'jug par bya'o
T02D1659:335a-22: lag dang / // de'i rjes la tshigs su bcad pa lngas ni dpal rnam par snang mdzad dang /
T02D1659:335a-24: padma gar gyi dbang phyug dang /
T02D1659:335a-26: rta mchog gi dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa'i gnas rim pa bzhin du bstan pa yin no //
T02D1659:335a-27: de ltar spyi'i mtshan nyid shes nas khyad par gyi don ni //
T02D1659:335a-28: dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa la mi mthun pa'i phyogs thams
T02D1659:335a-29: cad kyis dben pa'i gnas su khang pa rim pa
T02D1659:335a-31: phyi rol gyi bar khyams su phyi'i srung ma dang
T02D1659:335a-32: gar dang rol mo la sogs pa'i rdzas dag dgod
T02D1659:335a-33: par bya'o // bsar gyi khyams su ni las kyi
T02D1659:335a-34: rdo rje la sogs pa'i phyi'i rnal 'byor slob ma'i
T02D1659:335a-36: nang gi khang par ni gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor
T02D1659:335a-37: bri zhing rgyan dang yo byad la sogs pas mdzes
T02D1659:335a-38: par byas te / rnal 'byor pa gtso bzung dag gnas par bya'o //
T02D1659:335a-39: de lta bu'i gnas dag dang mi ldan na rang gi skyed mos tshal dang /
T02D1659:335a-42: ne'u sing me tog gis brgyan pa la sogs par
T02D1659:335a-43: dkyil 'khor rtsom pa dang bsgrub pa'i rim pa brtsam
T02D1659:335a-44: mo // de yang rten ji lta bu'i rnam pas bsgrub par bya zhe na /
T02D1659:335b-0: rang nyid dpal rdo @335b rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya
T02D1659:335b-1: chen por gnas shing kun du sna tshogs skal ba
T02D1659:335b-2: bzang po'i lha mo'i tshogs dang bcas pas rang gi
T02D1659:335b-4: dkyil 'khor bsgom pa la sogs pa'i rnam pas dkyil
T02D1659:335b-5: 'khor sgrub cing gsal bar gyur pa dang phrin las
T02D1659:335b-7: de yang phrin las phyogs gcig pa dang /
T02D1659:335b-8: sgrub pa phyogs gcig pa'i dus su ni rgyu rkyen
T02D1659:335b-9: rten 'brel tshogs pa dag gi mthus 'grub par 'gyur
T02D1659:335b-10: ba yin la / bsnyen sgrub ci bde ba'i dus su ni gnas ci bder brtsam par bya'o //
T02D1659:335b-11: zhi ba'i dus su sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad
T02D1659:335b-12: kyi dkyil 'khor rtsom pa'i phyir ni dgon mchog gsum
T02D1659:335b-13: gang yang rung ba'i rten gnas su gyur pa dang
T02D1659:335b-14: / khyad par du rten btsugs pa'i gnas dang /
T02D1659:335b-15: grong las dpag tshad lnga brgyas dgon par gyur ba de'i gtsug lag khang la sogs pa dang /
T02D1659:335b-16: chos brgyad dang ldan pa'i ri bo'i rtse mo dag tu bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D1659:335b-17: drag po'i dus su dpal he ru ka'i dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i gnas ni /
T02D1659:335b-18: chos dgu dang ldan pa dur khrod kyi gnas dang /
T02D1659:335b-19: 'jig rten gyi lha chen po dag gsol mchod byed / pa'i gnas dang /
T02D1659:335b-20: ma mo'i gnas bdun la sogs par brtsams par bya'o //
T02D1659:335b-21: dbang gi dus su padma gar gyi dbang phyug bsgrub pa la ni padma'i skyed mos tshal dang /
T02D1659:335b-22: me tog dmar po'i skyed mos tshal dang /
T02D1659:335b-23: chu rgyun g-yas nas 'khyil ba dang /
T02D1659:335b-25: rgya mtsho'i gnas la sogs par brtsam par bya'o //
T02D1659:335b-26: rgyas pa'i dus su rdo rje nyi ma bsgrub pa'i phyir //
T02D1659:335b-27: rgyal po chen po'i pho brang ngam /
T02D1659:335b-28: dga' mchog mang po 'dus pa'i gnas sam /
T02D1659:335b-29: khyim bdag 'byor can gyi gnas dang /
T02D1659:335b-30: padmo'i skyed mos tshal la sogs par bya'o //
T02D1659:335b-31: las sna tshogs pa dag bsgrub pa'i phyir /
T02D1659:335b-32: rta mchog gi gnas ni bya ba sna tshogs kyi
T02D1659:335b-33: las so so dang mthun pa'i dge 'dun gyi gnas
T02D1659:335b-39: gnas khang gzhan las 'phags pa dag tu brtsams par bya'o //
T02D1659:335b-40: da ni mngon par 'dod pa'i gnas de nyid du rgyan dang yo byad bsags pa'i phyir /
T02D1659:335b-41: cha lugs rnam pa sna tshogs dang /
T02D1659:335b-42: sgrub pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis //
T02D1659:336a-2: dkyil 'khor la sogs rab tu bsgrub //
T02D1659:336a-3: dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa'i don du rgyan dang /
T02D1659:336a-5: mchod pa'i yo byad la sogs pa sna tshogs sbyar zhing bkod par bya ba ste /
T02D1659:336a-6: gong du rgyas par bshad zin to //
T02D1659:336a-7: de'i don ni khyad par du rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor la sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D1659:336a-8: rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gzhan dag gi khyad par gyi
T02D1659:336a-9: rgyan dang yo byad kyi zhar la rgyan dang gdan
T02D1659:336a-10: dgod pa dag bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1659:336a-11: sangs rgyas rnams kyi padmo dmar //
T02D1659:336a-12: phyag na rdo rje sna tshogs la //
T02D1659:336a-13: 'jig rten dbang gi kha dog dkar //
T02D1659:336a-14: rdo rje nyi ma dpal gyi ser //
T02D1659:336a-15: kha dog kun dang ci 'byor ba //
T02D1659:336a-16: bla re rgyal mtshan rgyan gyi rnams //
T02D1659:336a-17: sna tshogs rab tu sgrub pa dpal //
T02D1659:336a-18: rta mchog rdo rje can gyi'o //
T02D1659:336a-19: sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan dang /
T02D1659:336a-21: mchod pa'i rdzas la sogs pa dag ni dmar por bya'o //
T02D1659:336a-22: de yang chags pa rnam pa gnyis dang ma bral zhing /
T02D1659:336a-23: zhi ba phyogs gcig pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa zil gyis mnan pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1659:336a-24: de bzhin du he ru ka'i ni mngon spyod kyi
T02D1659:336a-25: las sna tshogs 'grub pa'i sgo nas dregs byed kyi
T02D1659:336a-26: tshogs rnams grol bar mdzad pa sna tshogs pa dang
T02D1659:336a-27: / padma gar gyi dbang phyug gis ni gti mug gi rgyud dag par mdzad cing /
T02D1659:336a-28: sgro skur gyi mtha' thams cad zhi ba dang /
T02D1659:336a-29: rtag chad kyi mtshan ma dag par mdzad pa'i phyir dkar po'o //
T02D1659:336a-30: rdo rje nyi ma ni yon tan rin po che'i
T02D1659:336a-31: tshogs sna tshogs kyi sgo nas chags sred can dang
T02D1659:336a-32: 'jungs pa'i tshogs dag sgrol bar mdzad pa'i phyir ser
T02D1659:336a-33: po'o // rta mchog gi ni gcig tu nges pa
T02D1659:336a-34: med de rnal 'byor ba'i rgyan dang dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D1659:336a-35: po'o // bla rgyan dang / mchod pa'i rgyan dag
T02D1659:336a-36: kha dog sna tshogs kyi sgo nas ji ltar 'dod
T02D1659:336a-37: pa bzhin du bshad par bya'o //
T02D1659:336a-38: da ni rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rnam pa
T02D1659:336a-39: dang mthun par gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor dag bri
T02D1659:336a-40: ba'i phyir / gnas dang 'khor rnams ci 'dra dang //
T02D1659:336a-44: sngon byung gi dus su ri rab kyi rtse mor
T02D1659:336a-45: bde bar gshegs pa nyid kyis gnas byin gyis brlab
T02D1659:336a-46: cing bsrung bar bya ba bzhin du /
T02D1659:336b-0: rjes su 'jug pa po dag gis @336b kyang sgrub
T02D1659:336b-1: pa'i gnas gang dag sa'i cho ga la sogs pas
T02D1659:336b-2: dag par bya'o // de'i rim pa ni 'di ltar yin te /
T02D1659:336b-3: sa gzhi rgyan gyi sgo nas brtag pa dang /
T02D1659:336b-4: dbyibs kyi sgo nas brtag pa dang /
T02D1659:336b-5: las dang bya ba'i sgo nas brtag pa dang /
T02D1659:336b-6: rnam shes ye shes phyag rgya'i sgo nas brtag pa rnam pa bzhi byas nas /
T02D1659:336b-7: sa snang ba la bslang ba'am /
T02D1659:336b-9: mi snang ba la bslang ba'i phyir sbyor ba la gnas pa dang /
T02D1659:336b-10: gtor mas mnyes par byas nas sa sbyang ba'i phyir
T02D1659:336b-11: rdzas dang ting nge 'dzin sngags kyis dag par bya
T02D1659:336b-12: ba dang / lto 'phye brtag pa dang /
T02D1659:336b-13: skyon bsal zhing stegs bu brtsigs pa nas /
T02D1659:336b-15: chos nyid rnam par dag pa'i sngags dang dris byug par bya'o //
T02D1659:336b-16: de nas sa gzhi byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir mchod
T02D1659:336b-17: gtor bshams shing gtso 'khor gyi rigs kyi lhar bsgom
T02D1659:336b-18: pa dang / 'byung ba rim brtsegs rdo rje ra ba la sogs par byin gyis brlab pa dang /
T02D1659:336b-19: rdo rje rgya gram gyi sngags dang ;
T02D1659:336b-20: phyag rgyas brtan par byas shing sa'i dbang po la
T02D1659:336b-21: bsgo ba'i phyir thal mo sa la brdabs nas lha
T02D1659:336b-23: de la mchod gtor dbul ba dang /
T02D1659:336b-25: lha mos rjes su gnang ba dang /
T02D1659:336b-26: sa bsrung ba'i don du rnal 'byor ba gtso 'khor gyi bya ba dang /
T02D1659:336b-27: phyogs bzhi'i lha mos tshad med pa bzhi la sogs pa'i sgo nas bskul ba dang /
T02D1659:336b-29: spyi'i mtshan nyid kyi sgo nas gsol ba gdab pa dang /
T02D1659:336b-33: mtshon cha 'khrul zhing sngags brjod de /
T02D1659:336b-34: drag po'i tshogs spro ba dang /
T02D1659:336b-36: dkyil 'khor bskor zhing phur bas gdab pa dang /
T02D1659:336b-37: stang stabs kyi bye brag dag gis ni sa'i cho ga rnam par bsdus pa yin no //
T02D1659:336b-38: der 'khor rnams ci 'dra zhes pas sngon byung gi
T02D1659:336b-39: dus su rten gnas gzhal yas khang rgyan gyis rnam
T02D1659:336b-40: par mdzes shing / khang pa brtsegs ma'i bye brag dang /
T02D1659:336b-41: de ltar lha'i dkyil 'khor brten pa'i tshogs rnams ci 'dra ba dang /
T02D1659:336b-42: der 'jug pa'i gang zag gis 'khor rnams ci 'dra ba bzhin du gnas pa dang /
T02D1659:336b-43: bkod pa dang zhes sgras bum pa la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan dang /
T02D1659:336b-44: mchod pa'i yo byad la sogs pa dag ji ltar
T02D1659:337a-0: tshogs pa bzhin du rjes su 'jug pa po @337a
T02D1659:337a-1: * // dag gis kyang de dag sta gon la gnas par bya ba yin te /
T02D1659:337a-2: lha sta gon la gnas par bya ba'i don du
T02D1659:337a-3: mandala byug cing me tog sngags dang phyag rgya bcas
T02D1659:337a-4: par dgram pa dang mchod pa bshams shing srung ba'i
T02D1659:337a-6: bsgom pa'i rim pa gsal ba'i dmigs pa gnyis kyi las bya ba dang /
T02D1659:337a-7: gsol ba gdab cing mnyes par bya ba dang /
T02D1659:337a-8: slob ma'i don du bka' bsgo ba dang /
T02D1659:337a-11: tshogs bsags pa'i don du dbang po'i spyan sngar dam bcas pa dang /
T02D1659:337a-12: rgyas pa'i dbang po yan lag bcu bzhis rnam par dag pa dang ;
T02D1659:337a-13: bsdus pa'i dbang du yan lag bdun pas dag par bya ba dang /
T02D1659:337a-14: sems bskyed cing sdom pa'i rim pa dang /
T02D1659:337a-15: shis par bya ba'i don du gnas gsum dag par bya ba dang /
T02D1659:337a-16: tshems shing sbyin pa'i rim pa dang /
T02D1659:337a-17: skyon bsal zhing dor ba dang /
T02D1659:337a-18: de la mtshan ma'i ltas blta ba dang /
T02D1659:337a-19: dri chad kyis sbyang ba dang /
T02D1659:337a-23: sta gon gyi gnas su gtor ma btang zhing slob ma ku sha'i stan la nyal ba dang /
T02D1659:337a-24: slob dpon gyis nang du dkyil 'khor mnyes par bya ba dang /
T02D1659:337a-25: mtshan ma bzang ngan gyi bya ba bstan pa dang /
T02D1659:337a-27: bum pa'i don du rgyu dbyibs kha dog bstan pa dang /
T02D1659:337a-28: rigs kyi mtshan mas brgyan cing byin gyis brlab pa dang /
T02D1659:337a-29: rnam par dag pa de nyid rang rigs kyi dkyil
T02D1659:337a-30: 'khor bstim zhing bzlas brjod tshang bas sngags kyi chur
T02D1659:337a-31: gyur pa dang / de nyid shis par bya ba'i
T02D1659:337a-32: cho ga dang dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa'i rjes la so
T02D1659:337a-34: des ni sta gon la gnas pa'i cho ga rnam par bsdus pa yin no //
T02D1659:337a-35: des na 'gro ba ci 'dra ba dang zhes pa'i
T02D1659:337a-36: don gyis gdul bya'i rnam par rtog pa sna tshogs
T02D1659:337a-38: sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor bdun brgya bcu gsum byung ba'i
T02D1659:337a-39: tshul gyis gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor yang de'i grangs
T02D1659:337a-40: dang mthun par dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bkod pa'i
T02D1659:337a-41: tshogs de 'dra bar bstan pa yin no zhes pa'o
T02D1659:337a-42: // ci dkyil 'khor gyi rim pa mngon sum byung
T02D1659:337a-43: bar ma mthong bar bcos pa la spyod pas 'grub
T02D1659:337b-0: // bam zhe na / dkyil 'khor rnam pa gsum bsod nams 'dra bar bstan pa'i @337b phyir ;
T02D1659:337b-1: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i lha rnams kyi /
T02D1659:337b-2: 'khor lo mngon sum mthong ba las /
T02D1659:337b-3: bsod nams rtag pa ci 'dra ba //
T02D1659:337b-4: phyis byas pa yang de bzhin no //
T02D1659:337b-5: rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid kyis rnam par 'phrul
T02D1659:337b-6: pa las byung ba'i rigs kyi 'khor lo rnam pa
T02D1659:337b-7: drug gi snang ba'i bye brag sngon du 'phrul ba'i
T02D1659:337b-8: dkyil 'khor dang / ri rab kyi rtse mor bshad cing 'phrul ba'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa dang /
T02D1659:337b-9: de'i don bzhin du ting nge 'dzin gsal bar bsgom pa dang /
T02D1659:337b-10: de dag ma mthong ba rnams la phyis gzugs brnyan
T02D1659:337b-11: gyi sgo nas mtshon par byed pa dag bsod nams
T02D1659:337b-13: de ltar sa'i cho ga dang sta gon la gnas
T02D1659:337b-14: pa'i cho ga dang dkyil 'khor gyi phan yon bstan
T02D1659:337b-15: pa'i rjes su ni gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor rtsom
T02D1659:337b-16: pa la sogs pa'i las brtsam par bya ste /
T02D1659:337b-17: de yang dang por thig gi las dang /
T02D1659:337b-19: dkyil 'khor thig gdab shes rab can //
T02D1659:337b-20: phyogs kun mnyam pa nyid bsgrub cing //
T02D1659:337b-21: shar nub byang gi phyogs rnams su //
T02D1659:337b-22: thig bzhi btab pas dkyil 'khor brgyad //
T02D1659:337b-23: slob dpon de kho na nyid rnam pa bcu dang ldan zhing /
T02D1659:337b-24: phyi nang gi las dang gsang ba'i bye brag mtha'
T02D1659:337b-25: dag shes pas dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga las dang
T02D1659:337b-26: por thig gdab pa'i las brtsams te /
T02D1659:337b-27: thig g-yog las kyi phyag rgya mo dang ldan pa'am
T02D1659:337b-28: gzhan yang lha mo bzhi'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs
T02D1659:337b-29: pa'i sgrub pa'i grogs mchog bzhis phyogs bzhi nas gsol
T02D1659:337b-30: ba gdab cing / rang rang gi phyag rgyas brgyan te /
T02D1659:337b-31: thig skud tshon rtsi sna lnga las byung ba'i sbom
T02D1659:337b-32: phra sgo'i nyi shu'i cha ring thung dkyil 'khor nyis
T02D1659:337b-34: phyogs kun thams cad mnyam pa nyid du dmigs nas /
T02D1659:337b-35: shis pa dang mi shis pa'i rtog pa thams cad
T02D1659:337b-36: bsal nas rang bzhin gcig pa'i blos nam mkha' la
T02D1659:337b-37: lha rnams kyi bzhugs gnas khang pa brtsegs pa dbub
T02D1659:337b-38: cing / de nyid du sta gon gyi lha rnams dbang po'i tshul du bzhugs su gsol nas /
T02D1659:337b-39: phyag rgya'i stang stabs kyis bskor zhing de dang rjes
T02D1659:337b-40: su mthun par shar nub byang dang lho'i phyogs rnams
T02D1659:337b-41: ma nor ba'i sgo nas sa gzhi la thig gdab
T02D1659:337b-42: par bya'o // de'i phyir rtog pa bdun pa las /
T02D1659:337b-43: slob dpon mtshan nyid kun ldan zhing//
T02D1659:338a-0: @338a * // yang dag ye shes de nyid shes //
T02D1659:338a-1: rang gi lha yi spyod ldan pas //
T02D1659:338a-2: shes ldan mtshan ma bcu gnyis brgyan //
T02D1659:338a-3: zhes pas slob dpon gyi mtshan nyid bstan pa dang /
T02D1659:338a-5: thig skud sar pa tshad ldan pa //
T02D1659:338a-6: sngags bcas lha mos bkal ba yis //
T02D1659:338a-8: spom phra sgo yi nyi shu cha //
T02D1659:338a-9: rin chen thod pa'i snod bzhag la //
T02D1659:338a-10: rigs kyi ye shes sngags kyis bskyed //
T02D1659:338a-12: de nyid bsdus pa'i rgyud las kyang //
T02D1659:338a-13: mig gi lta bas dgug byas pa'i //
T02D1659:338a-14: sangs rgyas rigs rnams gzhug par bya //
T02D1659:338a-16: thig skud kyi mtshan nyid dang /
T02D1659:338a-17: de nyid rigs kyi lhar bskyed pa'o //
T02D1659:338a-18: yang rtog pa bsdus pa las /
T02D1659:338a-19: nyi shu 'bar ba'i lcags kyu yis //
T02D1659:338a-20: gnyis med gcig tu gnas pa dag / mchod dbul bstod pas mnyes byas nas //
T02D1659:338a-21: gtso bo'i sngags kyis bsgil [?] bar bya //
T02D1659:338a-22: zhes pas ye shes dkyil 'khor dgug par bya zhing gnyis su med par bstims nas /
T02D1659:338a-24: yang de nyid bsdus pa'i rgyud las /
T02D1659:338a-25: aom dipta drishti aam ku shi dza: aom badzra sa ma ya stu tra m'a ti kra ma h'um /
T02D1659:338a-27: h'um zhes pas brtan par bya ba dang /
T02D1659:338a-28: don yod zhags pa'i rgyud las kyang //
T02D1659:338a-29: sgrub pa'i grogs mchog nub gnas pas //
T02D1659:338a-30: de nyid gsum gyi gsang sngags la //
T02D1659:338a-31: dzdza: bdag gtso bo'i thugs ka nas //
T02D1659:338a-32: rang gi smin mtshams drang por 'dren //
T02D1659:338a-33: zhes pas thig brkyang ba dang /
T02D1659:338a-35: stobs mchog dpa' bo dgongs su gsol //
T02D1659:338a-36: rdo rje thig gi sgrar [?] ldan pas //
T02D1659:338a-37: nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor legs bsgrub cing //
T02D1659:338a-38: 'gro ba'i don la skul bar mdzad //
T02D1659:338a-39: ces pas thig gi sgras bskul ba dang de yang ngan song sbyong ba las /
T02D1659:338a-40: aom aa n+yo n'+ya nu ga ta sarba dharm'a /
T02D1659:338a-41: spha ra spha r'a nu ga ta sarba dharma /
T02D1659:338a-42: aa tyant'a nu pra bishta sarba dharm'a h'um /
T02D1659:338a-43: zhes pas rjes su chags par bskul ba dang /
T02D1659:338a-45: grogs mchog rdo rje'i phyag rgya yis //
T02D1659:338a-46: dza: gsum lte ba'i gnas su 'dren //
T02D1659:338a-47: rdo rje khu tshur sar gzhag cing //
T02D1659:338a-48: dang po'i thig skud gdab par bya //
T02D1659:338a-50: yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las kyang /
T02D1659:338a-51: shar nub byang lho'i thig bzhi'i rjes //
T02D1659:338b-0: @338b logs dang mtshams su gdab par bya //
T02D1659:338b-1: dang po'i cha chen bcu drug las //
T02D1659:338b-2: khyams kyi snam bu ma gtogs par //
T02D1659:338b-3: cha phran bzhi bzhir bgo byas pas //
T02D1659:338b-4: phyi nang bcu drug rta babs sgo //
T02D1659:338b-5: rtsig pa rgyan bcas 'dod yon gnas //
T02D1659:338b-6: ra ba dur khrod ci rigs brtag / dbus ma rang gi rigs 'khor lo //
T02D1659:338b-7: dkyil 'khor so so'i cha bzhi ba'o //
T02D1659:338b-8: zhes pas dkyil 'khor gyi cha chen gdab cing zhib tu bgo ba dang /
T02D1659:338b-10: thig gdab cho ga rdzogs byas nas //
T02D1659:338b-11: ye shes skud pa mchod bstod cing //
T02D1659:338b-12: phyag rgya gsang sngags ting 'dzin gyis //
T02D1659:338b-13: rang gi gnas su gshegs su gsol //
T02D1659:338b-14: zhes pas ye shes kyi skud pa mnyes par bya zhing gshegs su gsol ba'o //
T02D1659:338b-15: de nas cha dbye ba'i phyir /
T02D1659:338b-17: rigs kyi nga rgyal spyor ldan pas //
T02D1659:338b-18: mig gnyis nyi zla'i lte ba yis //
T02D1659:338b-19: phyogs bcur rdzi ma 'dren byed cing //
T02D1659:338b-20: hi bcas sgo dang cha rnams dbye //
T02D1659:338b-21: aom badzra be g'a kra ma h'um /
T02D1659:338b-22: zhes pas rdo rje'i lta bas sgo dang cha dbye ba dang /
T02D1659:338b-24: aom thams cad rnam 'phrul rang bzhin mchog / dngos med zhi ba'i 'od ldan gsal //
T02D1659:338b-26: dkyil 'khor dag par byin gyis rlob //
T02D1659:338b-27: mnyam pa'i sngags blo rnams gsal ba //
T02D1659:338b-28: nyes pa'i thug rdu dag par 'gyur //
T02D1659:338b-29: zhes pas gsol ba gdab cing nyes pa'i zug rdu dag par byas nas //
T02D1659:338b-30: de'i rjes su tshigs su bcad pa 'di nyid kyis
T02D1659:338b-31: phyogs kun mnyam pa nyid du blta ba yin pas
T02D1659:338b-32: / bla ma dam pa'i gdams ngag gis dkyil 'khor
T02D1659:338b-33: gyi cho ga'i las bstan pas de'i dbang du cho
T02D1659:338b-34: ga'i yan lag bsgrigs pa yin no //
T02D1659:338b-35: thig bzhi ni tshang thig gnyis zur thig gnyis te bzhi'o //
T02D1659:338b-36: de btab pas ni dkyil 'khor gyi cha rtse phran brgyad du 'gyur te /
T02D1659:338b-37: de nyin ni tshad mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i dgos pa yin no //
T02D1659:338b-38: yang de'i rjes la dkyil 'khor brtag cing bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1659:338b-39: dkyil 'khor yang dag ji lta bar //
T02D1659:338b-40: rab tu brtag par su zhig nus //
T02D1659:338b-41: rang gi lha yi rang bzhin gyis //
T02D1659:338b-43: don dam pa yi dkyil 'khor dang //
T02D1659:338b-44: de las rnam par 'phrul ba'i ye shes kyi lha
T02D1659:338b-45: dag ni gdul bya kun gyis mthong bar nus pa
T02D1659:339a-2: ;'o na ji ltar dkyil 'khor la blta bar bya zhe na /

T02D1659:339a-4: de ltar du spyod par mi nus pa dag gis kyang /

T02D1659:339a-8: nas bde bar gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi dngos po

T02D1659:339a-10: gnyis pas ni rang bzhin dang ting nge 'dzin gyi

T02D1659:339b-0: @339b mu khyud dang mtshams 'byed dag rdo rje'i ra

T02D1659:339b-13: rdo rje 'od kyi phreng ba gsum gyis rnam par

T02D1659:339b-15: gnas brgyad 'jigs pa'i tshul du gnas shing /
T02D1659:339b-16: kun 'byung gi yon tan brgyad dang /

T02D1659:339b-18: des na dkyil 'khor kun du sna tshogs pa zhes bya'o //

T02D1659:339b-22: khang pa gru bzhi sgo dang bcas //

T02D1659:339b-46: shing brgyad ngos nas zhing skyong lus phyed 'thon //

T02D1659:340a-1: gri gug g-yon na thod pa 'dzin //

T02D1659:340b-23: tshon bzang ngan gyi ltas blta bar bya'o //
