T02D1659:342a-8: zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gnyis gsungs te /
T02D1659:342a-9: rdo rje slob dpon yon tan phun sum tshogs pa
T02D1659:342a-10: dang ldan pas slob ma la sogs pa'i las dang
T02D1659:342a-12: de las gzhan pa dag gis ni ma yin no //
T02D1659:342a-13: de yang yon tan ni rtsa ba'i rgyud las /
T02D1659:342a-14: gzhan don brtson pa'i blo ldan pas //
T02D1659:342a-15: rang bzhin mngon par 'dus byas pa'i //
T02D1659:342a-16: thun mong khyad par blang thob ldan //
T02D1659:342a-17: yon tan rtsal ldan gang yang rung //
T02D1659:342a-19: dgug mchod las sbyor bsrung ba che //
T02D1659:342a-20: nyer bsdus gshegs su gsol ba yi //
T02D1659:342a-21: de nyid bcu sogs las la mkhas //
T02D1659:342a-22: khyad par las kyi rim pa yis //
T02D1659:342a-23: gsal mdzad rgya chen 'gro ba dmigs //
T02D1659:342a-24: rgya mtsho ri rab nor bu rdzing //
T02D1659:342a-25: nam mkha' sa gzhi gser bzhin gnas //
T02D1659:342a-27: de lta bu dang ldan pas gsang sngags kyi dkyil 'khor chen por zhugs nas //
T02D1659:342a-28: rjes su 'jug par 'dod pa'i slob ma yon tan dang ldan pa dag gzhug ste /
T02D1659:342a-29: de yang rtog pa bdun pa las /
T02D1659:342a-30: des shing 'jam la snyan par smra //
T02D1659:342a-31: dad brtson shes rab blo ldan pas //
T02D1659:342a-32: thos bsam sgom pa'i las la brtson //
T02D1659:342a-33: sems can kun la byams sems can //
T02D1659:342a-34: snying rje dga' ba btang snyoms gnas //
T02D1659:342a-35: dkyil 'khor rgyud dang bla ma dang //
T02D1659:342a-36: zab mo'i chos la rtse gcig dga' //
T02D1659:342a-37: bstan bcos kun la 'jigs med cing //
T02D1659:342a-38: brtan po byang chub don gnyer bas //
T02D1659:342a-40: de dag gzung bar bya ste /
T02D1659:342a-41: dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga las ji ltar bshad pa bzhin du bum pa'i chus bsang ba dang /
T02D1659:342a-44: phreng ba thogs te sems bskyed pa dang /
T02D1659:342b-1: de la gzhug pa'i dris lan ni rdo rje slob
T02D1659:342b-2: dpon gyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi gzhung nas 'byung
T02D1659:342b-3: ba'i mtshan nyid brjod cing khyod ci la dga' zhes
T02D1659:342b-4: dris pa dang / slob mas kyang bdag gis skal ba bzang po de dag 'grub pa'i phyir /
T02D1659:342b-5: dkyil 'khor du 'jug cing dbang nod par 'dod do zhes so ;
T02D1659:342b-7: gsang ba yang dag 'di shes na //
T02D1659:342b-8: ji ltar 'dod par rab tu gzhug / gsang ba yang dag mi shes na //
T02D1659:342b-9: g-yas pa yis ni gzhug par bya //
T02D1659:342b-10: sngon du dkyil 'khor gyi gnas su zhugs shing brda'i
T02D1659:342b-11: don shes pa dag gis snga ma'i bya ba dag
T02D1659:342b-12: gis tshul gyis rang nyid ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin
T02D1659:342b-13: du dkyil 'khor du gzhug par bya'o //
T02D1659:342b-14: gal te brda med dag ni g-yas pa thabs kyi sgo nas gzhug par bya'o //
T02D1659:342b-15: de'i rjes su bya ba'i tshul ji ltar zhe na /
T02D1659:342b-16: de ltar dkyil 'khor du zhugs nas /
T02D1659:342b-17: de bzhin du ni yon phul te /
T02D1659:342b-18: gsang ba'i cho ga nyid shes pas mi 'gyur ba'i mchog 'grub pa'o //
T02D1659:342b-19: slob ma yol ba'i nang du bcug nas cho ga
T02D1659:342b-20: rnam pa lnga rdzogs par byas pa'i rjes su sku
T02D1659:342b-21: gsung thugs kyi rdo rje sbyin zhing /
T02D1659:342b-22: ye shes dbab pa'i cho ga rnam pa lnga dang /
T02D1659:342b-23: 'jug pa'i cho ga lngas rdzogs par byas te /
T02D1659:342b-24: rjes su bya ba'i las mig dbye ba dang /
T02D1659:342b-25: gdong g-yogs bsal zhing dkyil 'khor blta ba dang /
T02D1659:342b-28: des ni gsang ba'i cho ga nyid shes nas de'i
T02D1659:342b-29: don bzhin du 'jug cing spyod pas mi 'gyur ba'i
T02D1659:342b-30: mchog 'grub pa'o // de la yon gyi rim pa ni /
T02D1659:342b-31: kun du sna tshogs bla ma la //
T02D1659:342b-32: yon mchog dag ni dbul bar nges //
T02D1659:342b-33: zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa dgu gsungs te /
T02D1659:342b-34: dang por dpal rdo rje sems dpa' dang /
T02D1659:342b-35: rdo rje slob dpon gnyis su med pa'i tshul du gnas pa dag mnyes par bya ba yin no //
T02D1659:342b-36: gang rang la phangs shing shin tu gtong bar dka' ba'i rnam pa dag dang /
T02D1659:342b-37: rang gi snying du sdug pa dag dang ;
T02D1659:342b-38: khyad par can gyi rdzas kyi rnam pa dag gis mnyes par bya'o //
T02D1659:342b-40: de nyid kyi don mi zad pa 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1659:342b-41: cang 'grub par nus sam zhe na /
T02D1659:342b-42: kun du sna tshogs rdo rje 'dzin pa dang gnyis su med pa yin te /
T02D1659:343a-0: sku gsung thugs kyi khyad par 'dra ba las phan pa'i sgo nas @343a * //
T02D1659:343a-2: de'i phyir yon gyi mchog 'bul bar nges pa yin no //
T02D1659:343a-3: yang na de nyid kyi sems mngon par dga' zhing ji ltar 'dod pa'am /
T02D1659:343a-4: thugs la dgyes pa'i las gang yang rung ba dag
T02D1659:343a-5: bsgrubs pas ni chung du dag kyang chen por 'gyur
T02D1659:343a-6: ba ste / yon gyi mchog tu gyur la yin no //
T02D1659:343a-7: gal te slob ma de la yo byad mchog tu
T02D1659:343a-8: gyur ba'i rdzas sna tshogs yod pa las gang ngan
T02D1659:343a-9: pa dang dman par gyur cing rang nyid la mi
T02D1659:343a-10: dgos pa dag rdo rje slob dpon la 'bul na
T02D1659:343a-11: brnyas pa'i las kyis ltung bar 'gyur te /
T02D1659:343a-12: rtag tu sdug bsngal gyi lam la 'khor zhing mi
T02D1659:343a-13: 'dod pa'i 'bras bu nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro
T02D1659:343a-14: // des na rdo rje slob dpon gyi yon tan dang /
T02D1659:343a-15: de la bsnyen bkur byas pa'i 'bras bu dag ni
T02D1659:343a-16: tshad gzung bar mi nus shing de la ma gus
T02D1659:343a-17: shing ngan du bsags pa'i las kyang de dang 'dra
T02D1659:343a-18: bar tshad gzung du rung ba ma yin no //
T02D1659:343a-19: de'i phyir rnam par snang mdzad sgyu 'phrul dra ba las ;
T02D1659:343a-20: re zhig dang por dngos grub ni //
T02D1659:343a-21: slob dpon gyi ni rjes 'brangs te //
T02D1659:343a-22: slob dpon med par gyur na ni //
T02D1659:343a-23: dngos grub thob par mi 'gyur bas //
T02D1659:343a-24: slob dpon gyi ni mtshan nyid bshad //
T02D1659:343a-25: brtan zhing dul la blo gros ldan //
T02D1659:343a-26: bzod ldan drang zhing g-yo sgyu med //
T02D1659:343a-27: gsang sngags rgyud kyi sbyor ba shes //
T02D1659:343a-28: dkyil 'khor gyi ni las la brtson //
T02D1659:343a-29: sems can kun la mi 'jigs sbyin //
T02D1659:343a-30: theg pa che la dga' ba dang //
T02D1659:343a-31: de nyid bcu ni yongs shes pas //
T02D1659:343a-32: de ni slob dpon yin par gsungs //
T02D1659:343a-33: de dag rab tu mchod pas ni //
T02D1659:343a-35: gang zhig de la smod pa dang /
T02D1659:343a-36: sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar 'gyur //
T02D1659:343a-38: yang dpal gsang ba 'dus pa las kyang rgyud 'dir
T02D1659:343a-39: dbang thob pa'i slob dpon ni byang chub sems su
T02D1659:343a-40: bstan pa'o // byang chub kyi sems ni sangs rgyas ma lus pa'i 'byung gnas so //
T02D1659:343a-41: de bas na phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub
T02D1659:343a-42: sems dpa' thams cad kyis slob dpon de dang phrad
T02D1659:343a-43: na phyag 'tshal zhing mchod pa byed do zhes pa
T02D1659:343a-44: dang / gzhan yang dpal zla gsang thig le la sogs pa'i rgyud las kyang /
T02D1659:343a-45: rdo rje slob dpon la mchod pa'i yon tan dang /
T02D1659:343a-46: brnyas pa'i skyon mang du bshad de /
T02D1659:343b-0: @343b de dag spros pa mang bas gzhag go //
T02D1659:343b-1: gzhan yang sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor dang /
T02D1659:343b-2: de nyid kyi slob dpon la ni bu mo shin tu brgyan pa dang /
T02D1659:343b-3: chung ma sdug pa dag dbul zhing rdo rje slob
T02D1659:343b-4: dpon la nam mi dgos pa'i dus su rin gyis
T02D1659:343b-5: slar slu ba'o // dpal he ru ka'i dkyil 'khor dang de'i rdo rje slob dpon dag la ni /
T02D1659:343b-6: rang nyid dam gzhan dag la ni gang yang rung
T02D1659:343b-7: ba'i skyes su mtshan dang ldan pa dbul zhing slar
T02D1659:343b-8: slu ba'o // yang padma gar gyi dbang phyug gi dkyil 'khor dang /
T02D1659:343b-9: slob dpon dag la ni mu tig bzang po dang /
T02D1659:343b-11: ras dkar po zung du 'brel pa dang /
T02D1659:343b-12: rta dkar po dag dbul zhing bslu ba'o //
T02D1659:343b-13: rdo rje nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang /
T02D1659:343b-14: slob dpon dag ni rgyal srid kyi longs spyod rin po che dang /
T02D1659:343b-15: gos dang rgyan dag dbul zhing bslu bar bya'o //
T02D1659:343b-17: slob dpon dag la ni rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i rta dang /
T02D1659:343b-19: shing rta la sogs pa dag dbul zhing slar bslu ba'o //
T02D1659:343b-20: de ltar dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa'i slob ma la dbang bskur ba'i phyir /
T02D1659:343b-21: khams kyi rang bzhin thams cad dang //
T02D1659:343b-22: srog dang rtsa ba de bzhin te //
T02D1659:343b-23: zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa brgyad gsungs te /
T02D1659:343b-24: dang por sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa'i lha bsgom pa dang /
T02D1659:343b-25: dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba'i slob ma dag la
T02D1659:343b-26: ni rin po che'i dbu rgyan gyis mtshan par bya
T02D1659:343b-27: ste / rgyu ni khams kyi rang bzhin thams cad
T02D1659:343b-28: las byung ba dang srog chags dang rtsa ba las
T02D1659:343b-30: de nyid las dbu rgyan rtse mo lnga pa'i rin
T02D1659:343b-31: po che'i khang bu sgo can rgyan gyis spras pa'i
T02D1659:343b-32: gnas su sangs rgyas rnam pa lnga bzhugs shing rang
T02D1659:343b-33: rang gi cha lugs dang phyag rgya'i mtshan mas brgyan
T02D1659:343b-34: par gnas pa dag gis gnas rnam pa lngar sngags
T02D1659:343b-36: ting nge 'dzin gyis gzhag par bya'o //
T02D1659:343b-37: rin po che'i dbu rgyan de nyid 'ching ba'i don
T02D1659:343b-38: du dar gyi cod pan dkar dmar gyi 'phur ma
T02D1659:343b-39: dang bcas pa'o // yang ye shes drug dang pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang /
T02D1659:343b-40: mdzad pa'i phrin las rnam pa drug gi snang bas
T02D1659:343b-41: rigs rnam pa lnga'i bde bar gshegs pa dag la
T02D1659:343b-42: brgyan pa'i rtags su rin po che'i rgyun thag la
T02D1659:343b-43: thod pa drug gis mtshan pas mtha' mar thod thabs
T02D1659:344a-2: rigs kyi bdag po rang nyid dang cha 'dra ba'i
T02D1659:344a-3: rnam pas spyi gtsug gi nor bu bzhin du dbu
T02D1659:344a-4: rgyan gyi rtse mo dbu ma la gnas par 'gyur
T02D1659:344a-5: pa'o // yang rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbu rgyan
T02D1659:344a-6: rin po che'i ngo mtshar can rgyu dang kha dog
T02D1659:344a-7: gcig las byas pa'i rtse mo gcig pa la khang
T02D1659:344a-8: bu sgo dang bcas pa'i nang na rigs kyi sangs
T02D1659:344a-9: rgyas gcig gi sku dang thod pa gcig gis mtshan
T02D1659:344a-10: zhing rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan cing 'khor
T02D1659:344a-11: lo'i phreng ba dang dar dbyangs kyis brgyan pa'o //
T02D1659:344a-12: ci sangs rgyas kyi sku la rigs kyi bdag po
T02D1659:344a-13: gang zhig nyid kyis nyid la mtshan pa dag ni
T02D1659:344a-14: dgos pa med do zhe na /
T02D1659:344a-15: 'gal ba med de bde bar gshegs pa thams cad
T02D1659:344a-16: kyi rigs kyi byin gyi rlabs las rgyu'i tshul du
T02D1659:344a-17: bzhugs pas / rdo rje 'chang chen po las khyad
T02D1659:344a-18: par gyi don du sprul ba'i 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid
T02D1659:344a-19: 'dzin pa dag gi bye brag gis gnyis su snang
T02D1659:344a-20: bzhugs pas / ba'o // he ru ka'i ni rin
T02D1659:344a-21: po che'i dbu rgyan la rdo rje byed pas mtshan
T02D1659:344a-22: zhing khang pa sgo dang bcas par rang nyid kyi
T02D1659:344a-23: sku bzhugs shing rdo rje'i phreng bas mtshan pa'o //
T02D1659:344a-24: padma gar gyi dbang phyug gi ni padma rin po
T02D1659:344a-25: che'i dbu rgyan la rang gi skus mtshan pa padma'i
T02D1659:344a-27: rdo rje nyi ma la ni rin po che'i dbu
T02D1659:344a-28: rgyan zur brgyad pa rtse mo la nor bu rin
T02D1659:344a-29: po che 'bar bas mtshan pa las rang nyid kyi
T02D1659:344a-30: skus brgyan cing rin po che'i phreng bas bskor ba'o
T02D1659:344a-31: // rta mchog gi ni rigs rnam pa bzhi'i sgo nas don mdzad pa'i phyir /
T02D1659:344a-32: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i dbu rgyan sangs rgyas lnga'i mtshan ma dang /
T02D1659:344a-33: rnam snang gi dbu rgyan rin po che dang gar dbang gi dbu rgyan padmo dang /
T02D1659:344a-34: he ru ka'i dbu rgyan rdo rje dang nyi ma'i
T02D1659:344a-35: dbu rgyan nor bu dag gang rung gis mtshan pa
T02D1659:344a-36: las / rang nyid kyi sna tshogs rdo rje rgya gram gyi phreng bas brgyan pa'o //
T02D1659:344a-37: da ni gzugs brnyan gyis dkyil 'khor du mtshan ma dgod pa dang /
T02D1659:344a-38: dbang bskur ba'i mtshan ma dag thun mong du bstan pa las ;
T02D1659:344a-39: dang por rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgo nas /
T02D1659:344a-40: kun du sna tshogs bskal bzang po //
T02D1659:344a-41: rang byung rnams kyi mtshan ma'i rgya //
T02D1659:344a-42: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1659:344a-43: de yang dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi lte ba la
T02D1659:344a-44: rdo rje sems dpa'i mtshan ma dbyings dang ye shes
T02D1659:344b-0: kyi don @344b mtshon par byed pa'i rtags kun du
T02D1659:344b-1: sna tshogs skal ba bzang po'i rang byung gi ye
T02D1659:344b-3: rdo rje'i mtshan ma gang yin pa de nyid la de skad ces bya ste /
T02D1659:344b-4: dkyil 'khor gyi lha mo bzhi dang bcas pa'i brdar gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1659:344b-5: de yang rtog pa bdun pa las /
T02D1659:344b-6: de nyid chen po gsang ba lnga //
T02D1659:344b-7: rdo rje rtse lngar 'dod pa yin //
T02D1659:344b-10: lha mo kun dang 'dus pa yis //
T02D1659:344b-11: kun du sna tshogs skal ba bzang //
T02D1659:344b-13: de nas ni phyag rgya'i mtshan ma gzhan dag byung ba'i phyir rnams zhes smos so //
T02D1659:344b-14: des na rdo rje sems dpa'i mtshan ma rdo rje dang /
T02D1659:344b-15: rdo rje kha tv'am ga dril bu dang bcas pa dang ;
T02D1659:344b-16: mda' dang gzhu dag kyang rnams kyi sgras shes par bya'o //
T02D1659:344b-17: yang lha mo rnams kyi ni shar phyogs kyi le'u
T02D1659:344b-18: tshe la bde mchog ma'i rdo rje rtse lngas mtshan
T02D1659:344b-20: lho phyogs kyi le'u tshe la ae ma bde ba mchog gi bha ga dang /
T02D1659:344b-21: lingga skal ba bzang po'i mtshan ma dgod par bya'o//
T02D1659:344b-22: nub phyogs kyi le'u tshe la ni snang mdzad mo'i thod pa dang /
T02D1659:344b-23: kha tv'am ga dang rdo rje rgya gram mo //
T02D1659:344b-24: byang phyogs kyi le'u tshe la ni slob ma mo'i
T02D1659:344b-25: thod pa'i nang nas rdo rje rgya gram gyi dbus
T02D1659:344b-26: su sangs rgyas tshe dpag med kyi skus mtshan pa'o
T02D1659:344b-27: // yang phyi rol gyi shar gyi le'u tshe la
T02D1659:344b-28: sangs rgyas byang chub ma'i mda' bzhis phug pa'i tshangs
T02D1659:344b-30: lho phyogs kyi le'u tshe la chos kyi 'khor lo ma'i 'khor lo dkar po dang /
T02D1659:344b-32: nub phyogs kyi le'u tshe la 'jig rten gsum las
T02D1659:344b-33: rnam par rgyal ma'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa dang
T02D1659:344b-34: tri sh'u la'o // byang phyogs kyi le'u tshe la
T02D1659:344b-35: 'dod pa'i dbang mo'i dpag bsam gyi shing me tog
T02D1659:344b-37: shar phyogs kyi sgor rta mgrin 'phang mtho ma thod
T02D1659:344b-38: pa'i bdud rtsi'i nang nas byung ba'i rta mgo ljang
T02D1659:344b-39: gu rta skad mtsher ba dang rdo rjes mtshan pa'i
T02D1659:344b-40: lcags kyu'o // lho phyogs kyi sgro la ni rdo
T02D1659:344b-41: rje gdong mo'i rdo rjes mtshan pa'i mche ba dang
T02D1659:344b-42: lcags kyu'o // zhags pa'o // nub phyogs kyi sgo
T02D1659:344b-43: la ni rdo rje spyan ma'i rdo rje mtshan pa'i
T02D1659:344b-44: lcags sgro ga dang nyi zla'o //
T02D1659:344b-45: byang phyogs kyi sgo la ni thod pa'i nang nas
T02D1659:344b-46: sangs rgyas snang ba mtha' yas kyi sku byung zhing
T02D1659:344b-47: bdud rtsis bkang ba dang dril bu'o //
T02D1659:345a-1: su ni rdo rjes mtshan pa'i gling bu dang pi wang dang rnga chen dang rdza rnga'o //
T02D1659:345a-2: nang gi re'u mig gi mtshams bzhi dang phyi'i gru chad dag la ni bdud rtsi'i bum pa'o //
T02D1659:345a-3: bar khyams kyi mtshams bzhir ni rdo rjes mtshan pa'i me tog dang /
T02D1659:345a-7: so so'i lha mo dag gi phyag rgya'o //
T02D1659:345a-8: dpal rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor la ni dbus su 'khor lo dang lhung bzed dang /
T02D1659:345a-11: dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam mo //
T02D1659:345a-12: shar phyogs kyi 'khor lo'i rtse mo la sangs rgyas
T02D1659:345a-13: kun spyod ma'i lces mtshan pa'i padma sdong bu dang
T02D1659:345a-14: bcas pa'o // lho phyogs kyi rtse mo la dpa' mo'i cha lang dang rnga'o //
T02D1659:345a-15: nub phyogs kyi rtse mo la kun du bzang mo'i
T02D1659:345a-16: rdo rje rtse lnga dang rin po che 'od 'bar
T02D1659:345a-17: ba'o // byang phyogs kyi rtse mo la zad med
T02D1659:345a-18: kyi snod 'dzin ma'i rin po che'i snod de nyid
T02D1659:345a-19: kyi rgyan thams cad kyis bkang ba dang chos kyi
T02D1659:345a-20: ba'o // dung ngo // yang phyi rol gyi shar
T02D1659:345a-21: gyi le'u tshe la sangs rgyas sku ldan ma'i sangs

T02D1659:345a-29: pa las mi 'dra ba'i khyad par ni 'khor los

T02D1659:345a-36: lho phyogs kyi le'u tshe la tsoo r'i mas 'dren

T02D1659:345a-40: t'a l'i'i thod pa bdud rtsi'i chus bkang ba dang
T02D1659:345b-0: shar lho'i le'u tshe la ni @345b pukka s'i'i dpag
T02D1659:345b-1: bsam shing gi lcug ma rlung gis bskyod pa dang
T02D1659:345b-3: lho nub kyi le'u tshe la ni tsanda l'i'i rdo rjes mtshan pa'i ral gri dang tri sh'u la'o //
T02D1659:345b-4: nub byang gi le'u tshe la ni gha sma r'i'i
T02D1659:345b-5: rdo rje 'bar bas mtshan pa'i me thab dang ral
T02D1659:345b-6: gri'o // byang shar mtshams kyi le'u tshe la ni
T02D1659:345b-7: sma sha n'i'i phyag mtshan gsal bar ma smos kyang
T02D1659:345b-8: dpal khrag 'thung phyag bzha'i ba'i phyag mtshan dang 'dra
T02D1659:345b-9: gri'o // ste / rdo rje 'bar ba dang /
T02D1659:345b-10: kha tv'am ga dang zhags pa dang thod pa'o //
T02D1659:345b-11: 'khor gyi lha mo gzhan dag gi phyag mtshan yang /
T02D1659:345b-12: rtsa ba'i rgyud las 'byung ba bzhin du dgod par bya ste /
T02D1659:345b-13: gru chad bzhi la lha mo mda' 'dzin ma dang ;
T02D1659:345b-16: sna tshogs ba dan 'dzin ma dag gis mtshan dang mthun pa'i phyag mtshan dgod par bya'o //

T02D1659:345b-19: dkyil 'khor dang mthun pa las khro bo'i rdo rjes

T02D1659:345b-21: 'khor la ni dbus su padma 'dab ma sna tshogs
T02D1659:345b-22: mdzes pa'o // pa dang / de bzhin du dmar po dang /

T02D1659:345b-31: ma'i bud med kyi khu tshur gyi phyag rgya dang
T02D1659:345b-32: pa'o // padma ljang gu'o // nub phyogs kyi 'dab

T02D1659:346a-1: 'khor la ni dbus su gzhu dang mda' dang ral
T02D1659:346a-2: gri dang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'bar ba'i me 'od

T02D1659:346a-8: ma'i nor bu rin po ches mtshan pa'i rgyal mtshan

T02D1659:346a-20: rta mchog gi dkyil 'khor la ni dbus su rang
T02D1659:346a-21: nyid kyi mtshan ma brgyad dang lha mo gnyis kyi
T02D1659:346a-23: gzhan dag ni phrin las so so'i gnas skabs bzhin du dbye bar bya'o //
T02D1659:346a-24: de ltar gong du bshad pa'i phyag mtshan de dag
T02D1659:346a-25: kyang skabs 'dir mi gsal ba dag gi gzhan gyis
T02D1659:346a-26: kha bskangs te bshad pa yin no //

T02D1659:346a-31: dngos po brtan g-yo ma lus kun //
T02D1659:346a-32: rang byung rnams kyi mtshan ma'i rgya //

T02D1659:346a-37: rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyis gsungs //

T02D1659:346a-41: don sgro skur gyi mtha' dang bral ba sdud pa

T02D1659:346b-1: rtog pa bdun pa'i don rnam par bshad pa'o /

T02D1659:346b-4: 'bras bu la mngon par phyogs pa de dag gis

T02D1659:346b-36: khyad par gyi lha rnams mgu bar bya ba'i don
T02D1659:346b-37: du dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul ba
T02D1659:346b-38: las / mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kun gyi
T02D1659:346b-39: mchog tu gyur pa thams cad rnam par 'phrul zhing
T02D1659:346b-40: phyag 'tshal ba'i mchod pa lus ngag yid gsum gyi
T02D1659:346b-41: rnam pa las byung ba dang /

T02D1659:347a-3: sna tshogs kun gyi phyag rgya yis //
T02D1659:347a-4: dkyil 'khor thams cad mnyes par bya //

T02D1659:347a-7: pa las dang por rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor

T02D1659:347a-19: bu 'dzin pa'i tshul gyis dku'i gnas su bzhag ste

T02D1659:347a-21: g-yas pa'i srin mtheb sbyar te /

T02D1659:347a-31: phyag rgya de lta bu sngon du song bas 'dzum mig dang bcas par lta zhing /

T02D1659:347a-42: ga ru pa ti aa la la ho /
T02D1659:347a-43: aom aa ti h'um zhes pas sngags brjod cing phyag btsal bar bya'o //

T02D1659:347b-3: rdo rje nyi ma khams gsum pas //

T02D1659:347b-6: rigs kyi dkyil 'khor thun mong ba'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dag dang /
T02D1659:347b-7: 'jig rten gyi lha chen po dregs byed kyi tshogs
T02D1659:347b-8: kun gyis phyag 'tshal zhing las thams cad byed par

T02D1659:347b-10: mdzad la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gzhan dag gi phyag
T02D1659:347b-11: 'tshal phyag rgya dag bstan pa'i phyir ;
T02D1659:347b-12: rdo rje dpal gyi thal mo bsgyur //

T02D1659:347b-14: zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa lnga gsungs te /
T02D1659:347b-15: dang por rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor la
T02D1659:347b-16: ni tshul gong ma dang 'dra ba las 'khor lo'i
T02D1659:347b-17: phyag rgya'i thal mo dbral bar gtug cing aom aa

T02D1659:347b-19: pas sangs rgyas kyi mchod pa rgya chen pos thams
T02D1659:347b-20: cad mnyes shing thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ba'o //
T02D1659:347b-21: he ru ka'i smin ma g-yon pa bteg cing gar
T02D1659:347b-22: stabs kyi sgo nas mthe'u chung mche ba bzhin du

T02D1659:347b-24: hi ru lu ru lu h'um zhes brjod pas 'jig
T02D1659:347b-25: rten gyi lha chen po dregs byed kun gyis bran
T02D1659:347b-27: padma gar dbang gi ni padma'i thal mo kha 'bus
T02D1659:347b-28: bzhin du mthe bong mthe'u chung bzhi po dag padma'i
T02D1659:347b-29: 'dab ma kha bye ba bzhin du snying gar sbyar
T02D1659:347b-30: te / aom aa ti pu hri zhes pas chos
T02D1659:347b-31: thams cad rnam par dag pa'i ngang du sbyor zhing
T02D1659:347b-33: rdo rje nyi ma'i ni gar bskor ba sngon du
T02D1659:347b-34: 'gro bas lus kyi yan lag thams cad sa la
T02D1659:347b-35: phab ste gnas gsum du thal mo sbyar zhing /
T02D1659:347b-36: aom aa ti pu tram zhes pas phyag 'tshal bas
T02D1659:347b-37: yon tan rin po che'i rigs thams cad kyis rgyas
T02D1659:347b-38: par 'gyur ba'o // rta mchog gi ni gar bskor
T02D1659:347b-39: ba sngon du song bas rdo rje 'gying bag gi

T02D1659:347b-43: des ni phyag 'tshal ba'i phyag rgya shes pa'i don rnam par bshad pa'o //
T02D1659:348a-0: @348a * // da ni mchod pa'i phyag rgya'i sgo nas dkyil 'khor mnyes par bya ba las /
T02D1659:348a-1: dang por rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo'i phyag rgya bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1659:348a-2: gar gyi rgyud rnams ji snyed dang //
T02D1659:348a-3: de bzhin bya ba'i tshul ston kun //
T02D1659:348a-4: de dag rdo rje sems dpa'i rgya //
T02D1659:348a-5: rang gi don rnams sgrub byed pa'o //

T02D1659:348a-15: mu sti ha ra la sogs pa'i stabs kyi sgo
T02D1659:348a-16: nas gar dang phyag rgya sna tshogs bsgyur zhing bya
T02D1659:348a-17: ba'i tshul dang bcas pas rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag
T02D1659:348a-18: rgya'i sgo nas rang gi don rnams bsgrub par bya'o
T02D1659:348a-19: // de dag gi tshul gzhan yang bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1659:348a-20: 'gying dang bcas pa'i tshul bstan nas //
T02D1659:348a-21: ji lta'i tshul bzhin gar byed cing //

T02D1659:348a-23: tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i so so'i las
T02D1659:348a-24: dang mthun par bye brag gi tshul du phyi nang
T02D1659:348a-25: gsang ba'i mchod pa thams cad kyi sngags dang /

T02D1659:348a-29: ba'i gar thabs kyi sgo nas las su bya ba

T02D1659:348a-35: ; bsdus pa'i don ni 'di ltar yin te /
T02D1659:348a-36: gang zhig gis bsgom pa'i rim pa rdzogs par byas
T02D1659:348a-37: nas dkyil 'khor dag mchod pa la sogs pa'i skabs
T02D1659:348a-38: su sbyor ba'i sgo nas dkyil 'khor bskul ba dang
T02D1659:348a-46: lha rnams dgug gzhug bya ba dang /
T02D1659:348a-47: phyag rgya chen po gsal zhing mnyes par bya ba dang /
T02D1659:348a-49: dam tshig gi phyag rgyas brtan par bya ba dang /
T02D1659:348b-0: mchod pa bzhi'i sgo nas gsol ba gdab pa @348b dang ;
T02D1659:348b-1: rdo rje glu'i sgo nas gsol ba gdab pa dang /
T02D1659:348b-2: las sna tshogs kyi sgo nas gsol ba gdab pa dang /
T02D1659:348b-6: gsang ba'i mchod pa dag gis mnyes par bya'o //
T02D1659:348b-7: de dag gi phan yon ni /
T02D1659:348b-8: phyag rgya 'di yis btab na ni //
T02D1659:348b-9: sangs rgyas kun dang 'grogs pa dang //
T02D1659:348b-10: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig gsungs pa yin te /
T02D1659:348b-11: de las sangs rgyas kun dang 'grogs pa ni phyag
T02D1659:348b-12: rgya 'di'i mthus bde bar gshegs pa'i sku gsung thugs
T02D1659:348b-13: yon tan phrin las kun gyi bdag nyid du sbyor
T02D1659:348b-14: bar mdzad pa'o // dpal skal ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'i bshad pa'o /
T02D1659:348b-16: // / da ni lha mo bde mchog ma la sogs pa'i mchod pa bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1659:348b-17: snyems 'dzin chen por bcas pa yi //
T02D1659:348b-18: sbyor bas de ni bteg gnas su //
T02D1659:348b-19: zhas bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gnyis gsungs te /
T02D1659:348b-20: lha mo nyi shu la sogs pa'i so so'i 'gying
T02D1659:348b-21: bag dang bcas pas gar thabs lan gsum du bsgyur
T02D1659:348b-22: zhing / 'gram pa'i phyogs su bteg ste yang bsgyur
T02D1659:348b-23: zhing thal mo sbyar te spyi bo'i mtshams su bzhag
T02D1659:348b-24: pa las bkrol nas so so'i phyag rgya bcings pa'i
T02D1659:348b-25: rjes la h'um gi glu blang zhing mchod pa thams
T02D1659:348b-27: dpal skal ba bzang po bde ba chen po las rnams kyi phyag rgya bshad pa'o //
T02D1659:348b-28: da ni rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gzhan dag gi mchod pa'i phyag rgya bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1659:348b-29: lag pa g-yas g-yon gnyis dag gi / mdzub mo mthe'u chung mdzes bsgyur ba'i //
T02D1659:348b-30: zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gsungs pa las /
T02D1659:348b-31: dang por rnam par snang mdzad kyi ni gar bsgyur
T02D1659:348b-32: ba las byung ba'i 'khor lo'i thal mo sbyar zhing
T02D1659:348b-33: g-yon phyogs su bsgyur zhing bteg ste spyi bo'i mtshams
T02D1659:348b-34: su bzhag nas aom gyi glu dang bcas pas las
T02D1659:348b-36: he ru ka'i ni gar ba sgyur ba las thal mo gyen du bkrol te /
T02D1659:348b-37: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi zhal lam /
T02D1659:348b-38: thod pa'i tshul du byas nas mchod pa dang /
T02D1659:348b-39: gtor mas bkang ba'i tshul gyis dur khrod kyi chas
T02D1659:348b-40: dang ldan par byas nas rdo rje drag po'i gad
T02D1659:348b-41: mo'i sgo nas las la sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D1659:349a-1: gar bskor ba las byung ba'i rdo rje rin po
T02D1659:349a-2: che'i thal mo lan gsum du brdab cing hri'i glu
T02D1659:349a-3: blangs te las thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D1659:349a-4: nyi mas ni gar bskor ba las byung ba'i rdo
T02D1659:349a-5: rje rin po che'i thal mo sbyar zhing tram gi
T02D1659:349a-6: glu blangs te las thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o
T02D1659:349a-7: // rta mchog gi ni gar bskor ba las so so'i phrin las kyi bya ba bzhin du /
T02D1659:349a-8: sna tshogs rdo rje'i thal mo bcings shing bkrol te /
T02D1659:349a-9: rnam par snang mdzad phyag rgya dang sngags la rang
T02D1659:349a-10: gi snying po ham gis brgyan pa'i glu blangs pa'o
T02D1659:349a-11: // da ni mchod pa'i lha mo bzhi'i sgo nas brtsam pa dang /
T02D1659:349a-12: phyag rgya gong ma dag bcing ba'i rjes su mchod pa 'di dag la sogs pa dbul ba'i phyir /
T02D1659:349a-14: bskor zhing de bzhin nyug pa dang //
T02D1659:349a-15: me tog bdug pa mar me dang //
T02D1659:349a-17: lha mo'i sngags dang phyag rgya me tog gyen du 'thor ba dang /
T02D1659:349a-18: bdug spos thur du blugs pa dang mar me phyogs bcur bskor ba dang /
T02D1659:349a-19: dris bdag dang lha rnams kyi thugs kar nyug pa
T02D1659:349a-20: la sogs pa'i tshul du las de rnams la sbyar
T02D1659:349a-21: bar bya'o // yang tshigs su bcad pa tha ma
T02D1659:349a-22: 'di nyid kyis ni mchod pa'i lha mo dag kyang
T02D1659:349a-24: de ltar mchod pa de dag grangs la sogs pa'i tshad ji tsam zhe na /
T02D1659:349a-25: gang ngam 'on te stong yang rung //
T02D1659:349a-26: yang na ci 'byor ba yis kyang //
T02D1659:349a-27: dam tshig mnyam par bsgrubs pa yis //
T02D1659:349a-29: snod gcig nas bzung ste stong gi bar du rin
T02D1659:349a-30: po che dang mchod pa'i tshogs rnams kyis bkang ba'am
T02D1659:349a-31: / yang na ci 'byor ba bzhin du bshams shing /
T02D1659:349a-32: dngos su 'byor bas gang ba dang /
T02D1659:349a-33: ma 'byor ba'i stong pa dag kyang sems kyis rgya cher sprul te mchod par bya'o //
T02D1659:349a-34: de yang dam tshig dang mnyam par ldan pa'i sgrub
T02D1659:349a-35: pa pos sngags dang phyag rgya dang ting nge 'dzin
T02D1659:349a-36: tshogs pa'i rnam pas mchod pa'i tshogs rnams bsgrub cing
T02D1659:349a-38: de dag gi phan yon ni /
T02D1659:349a-39: phyag rgya 'di rnams bcings na ni //
T02D1659:349a-40: sangs rgyas thams cad mchod par 'gyur //
T02D1659:349a-41: zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa bzhi gsungs te go sla bsam bshad do //
T02D1659:349b-0: mchod pa @349b thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba
T02D1659:349b-1: bzang po dam tshig gi rtog pa nyid rang gi
T02D1659:349b-2: che ba'i yon tan rnam par 'phrul pa las byung
T02D1659:349b-3: bas rang nyid mchod par mdzad pas mnyam par sbyor
T02D1659:349b-4: ba ste / de dag mi 'bral zhing longs spyod
T02D1659:349b-5: par mdzad pas skal ba bzang po dpal gyi dam
T02D1659:349b-6: ba ste / tshig ces bya'o // le'u brgyad pa'i don rnam par bshad pa'o /
T02D1659:349b-8: // / gang zhig lam gyi chos nyams su blangs pa de dag kyang /
T02D1659:349b-9: cho ga'i yan lag phun sum tshogs pa dang mi ldan pas ni 'grub par mi 'gyur te /
T02D1659:349b-10: rgyal po rta rna'i bkod pa lta bu yin la /
T02D1659:349b-11: yan lag ma tshang ba'i gsangs sngags dang /
T02D1659:349b-12: rten 'brel ma tshogs pa'i las kyang de bzhin du
T02D1659:349b-13: bram ze mo bzang ldan gyi bkod pa bzhin no
T02D1659:349b-14: // des na bsgrub bya'i 'bras bu dag ni rgyu
T02D1659:349b-15: phun sum tshogs pa dang rkyen phun sum tshogs pa
T02D1659:349b-17: legs par sbyar ba'i shing rta dag kyang rta la
T02D1659:349b-18: ma brten par rang gi gnas su phyin par mi
T02D1659:349b-19: nus la / bden pa'i mthus ni zol ba'i las dag kyang 'grub par byed de /
T02D1659:349b-20: sgyu ma mkhan bza' bo'i bza' ston bzhin no //
T02D1659:349b-21: de'i phyir phyag rgya nyi shu rtsa bdun dang ldan
T02D1659:349b-22: pas ni las thams cad la sbyar bar byed cing
T02D1659:349b-23: / de dag gi phyin las ma lus pa 'byung 'grogs su gyur ba yin no //

T02D1659:349b-25: bsgrub pa'i las rnams gang zhig la //
T02D1659:349b-26: goms pa'i las kyis brtsam bya ba'ang //
T02D1659:349b-27: rgyu rkyen rten 'brel ma tshogs par //
T02D1659:349b-28: mi mthun phyogs kyis sgrub byed pa'i //
T02D1659:349b-29: rma bya shi ri sha'i bzhin du //
T02D1659:349b-31: smin cing grol bar bya ba'i thabs //
T02D1659:349b-32: thabs kyi yan lag spyod pa dang //
T02D1659:349b-33: rgyu rkyen la sogs tshogs pa'i mthus //
T02D1659:349b-35: phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gang dag la //
T02D1659:349b-36: phyag rgya'i tshogs kyis ma bsgrubs par //
T02D1659:349b-38: de phyir phun sum tshogs pas 'jug / ces so //
T02D1659:349b-39: des na lam gang ma dag bsgrub par bya ba
T02D1659:349b-40: la ni phyag rgya nyi shu rtsa bdun gyis bya
T02D1659:349b-41: dgos so // de yang rtog pa bdun pa las /
T02D1659:349b-42: bsnyen sgrub la sogs pas gang ba'i //
T02D1659:349b-43: phyag rgya rim pa gsal ba dag / bsgrub bya'i lam du gyur pa ste //
T02D1659:350a-2: chogs pa'i yan lag nyi shu bdun //
T02D1659:350a-3: phyag rgya'i las su rab tu grags //
T02D1659:350a-4: khyad par so so'i las dag gi /'jug pa'i yan lag grogs su bshad //
T02D1659:350a-5: de dag gnas skabs gong du 'gro ba ni gong du bshad zin to //
T02D1659:350a-6: de yang bsdu na phyag rgya bzhi ru shes par bya ste /
T02D1659:350a-10: brgyad pa dag gi ni phyag rgya chen po'o //
T02D1659:350a-15: bcu dgu pa ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02D1659:350a-20: bco brgyad pa dag ni chos kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D1659:350a-26: nyi shu pa nas bzung ste /
T02D1659:350a-27: mthar thug gi bar du ni las kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D1659:350a-28: de dag gi tshig gi 'brel tshul dang por phyag
T02D1659:350a-29: rgya chen po'i sku la brten dgos pas thams cad
T02D1659:350a-31: de nyid kyis rgyas btab nas /
T02D1659:350a-32: yang dam tshig gi phyag rgya brten par bya dgos pas gnyis pa bstan to //
T02D1659:350a-33: de yang dam tshig chen po'i phyag rgya la brten te 'byung ba'i phyir gsum pa bstan to //
T02D1659:350a-34: de dag gi gzhir gyur pa ni sbyor ba'i phyag rgya yin te /
T02D1659:350a-35: de nyid dang ldan dgos pa'i phyir bzhi pa bstan to //
T02D1659:350a-36: des ni sbyor ba sna tshogs kyi sgo nas las bya ba'i phyir lnga ba bstan to //
T02D1659:350a-37: des las sgrub pa dag shes par bya ba'i phyir
T02D1659:350a-38: gzhan gyi cha lugs dang 'dzum pa'i rim pa dang
T02D1659:350a-39: lta ba'i khyad par gyi bye brag gis sbyor dgos
T02D1659:350a-41: bdun pa dang brgyad pa dag bstan pa yin no //
T02D1659:350a-42: des dag dag par byas shing bzlas brjod la sogs
T02D1659:350a-43: pa bya ba dang mchod bstod la sogs pa bya
T02D1659:350a-44: ba'i phyir / dgu pa dang bcu ba dang bcu gcig pa gsungs pa yin no //
T02D1659:350a-45: des lha mnyes par bya ba'i phyir gar gyi phyag rgya dang rdo rje'i glu dang /
T02D1659:350a-47: gtor ma brtsam dgos pas bcu gnyis pa dang /
T02D1659:350a-50: bco lnga pa dag bstan pa yin no //
T02D1659:350a-51: de ltar mchod pas mnyes pa'i rjes la lha dang
T02D1659:350a-52: slob ma dbang bskur dgos pas bcu drug pa bstan
T02D1659:350b-0: to // des ni dngos grub @350b kyi las dang /
T02D1659:350b-1: bsrung ba la sogs pa'i las la sbyar dgos pa'i
T02D1659:350b-2: phyir bcu bdun pa dang bco brgyad pa bstan to
T02D1659:350b-3: // de nyid brda'i mtshan ma la gnas pas las la 'jug pa'i phyir bcu dgu pa bstan to //
T02D1659:350b-5: las kyi bye brag gzhan la'ang sbyar ba'i phyir nyi
T02D1659:350b-6: shu ba nas nyi shu bdun gyi bar bstan pa
T02D1659:350b-7: yin no // de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las /
T02D1659:350b-8: sna tshogs phyag rgya mtha' dag kun //
T02D1659:350b-9: phyag rgya bzhi las spros pa ste //
T02D1659:350b-10: de yi yan lag nyi shu bdun //
T02D1659:350b-11: las kyi cho ga ston par byed //
T02D1659:350b-12: dngos grub thams cad sgrub pa dang //
T02D1659:350b-13: phrin las cho ga rab 'byam dag / phyag rgya nyi shu rtsa bdun gyis //
T02D1659:350b-14: gsal zhing 'grub par byed pa yi //
T02D1659:350b-15: sna tshogs gnyis med dkyil 'khor gsal //
T02D1659:350b-16: sna tshogs dam tshig rjes chags shing //
T02D1659:350b-17: sna tshogs chos kyi sngags brjod pas //
T02D1659:350b-18: sna tshogs phrin las kun du spyod //
T02D1659:350b-19: sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor bas //
T02D1659:350b-20: sangs rgyas kun gyi dam tshig mchog / mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i kun spyod gnas //
T02D1659:350b-21: las kyi cho ga rnam gsal 'grub //
T02D1659:350b-22: rang gi las la sbyor ba'i mthus //
T02D1659:350b-23: phyag rgya'i ye shes gsal bas 'grub //
T02D1659:350b-25: de'i phyir phyag rgya spros pa mtha' dag ni phyag
T02D1659:350b-26: rgya nyi shu rtsa bdun du 'dus pa de dag
T02D1659:350b-27: ni phyag rgya rnam pa bzhir 'dus pa'o //
T02D1659:350b-28: des na rtog pa bdun pa las kyang /
T02D1659:350b-29: phyag rgya spros sogs ma lus kun //
T02D1659:350b-30: phyag rgya bzhi la 'dus par bstan //
T02D1659:350b-32: de las dang por phyag rgya chen po'i mtshan nyid mdor bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1659:350b-33: de nas gzhan yang bshad pa ni //
T02D1659:350b-34: rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi lha //
T02D1659:350b-35: kun du sna tshogs mchog rnams kyi //
T02D1659:350b-36: phyag rgya thams cad rnam 'phrul pa'o //
T02D1659:350b-37: phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i yan lag gong ma
T02D1659:350b-38: dag las khyad par gyi mtshan nyid mi 'dra ba
T02D1659:350b-39: gzhan yang dang por lha'i dkyil 'khor so so'i sku
T02D1659:350b-43: phyag mtshan la sogs pa'i bye brag thams cad 'byung
T02D1659:350b-44: ba'i phyag rgya sna tshogs pa dag ni dpal rdo
T02D1659:350b-45: rje sems dpa'i snang ba yin te /
T02D1659:350b-47: kun du sna tshogs kyi cha lugs dang ldan zhing
T02D1659:350b-48: mchog tu gyur ba'i phyag rgya thams cad rnam par
T02D1659:351a-1: da ni khyad par gyi sgo nas dkyil 'khor drug

T02D1659:351a-3: rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo'i mtshan
T02D1659:351a-5: sems dpa' sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos //
T02D1659:351a-6: rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog / gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na //
T02D1659:351a-7: thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs //

T02D1659:351a-10: kyi snang ba las byung ba yin te /
T02D1659:351a-11: rigs drug gi bdag nyid du bzhugs pa'o //

T02D1659:351a-13: bde ba kun la zhen pa dang //
T02D1659:351a-14: dngos grub thams cad rnam dag phyir //
T02D1659:351a-15: rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog / zla ba nya ltar rtsa dmar sku //
T02D1659:351a-16: bde ba dang yid bde ba bla na med pa'i
T02D1659:351a-17: chos la longs spyod pas chags pa chen po'i cha
T02D1659:351a-18: lugs su mdangs dmar po dang ldan zhing dngos grub
T02D1659:351a-19: thams cad rnam par dag pa'i byang chub kyi sems

T02D1659:351a-22: de yang rtog pa bdun pa las /
T02D1659:351a-23: dam pa'i yi ge grub pa dang //
T02D1659:351a-24: chos rnams thams cad rnam dag cing //
T02D1659:351a-25: gsang ba de nyid dag pa'i phyir //
T02D1659:351a-26: rdo rje 'dzin pa zla ba'i mdog / ci phyir bcom ldan 'dod chags che //
T02D1659:351a-27: 'dod chags kun la rjes chags phyir //
T02D1659:351a-28: rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid kyang //
T02D1659:351a-29: sna tshogs dmar mo 'bar ba'i mdog / ces so //
T02D1659:351a-30: de nyid kyi 'od kyi snang ba gzhan spang bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1659:351a-31: 'dod chags kun la chags pa'i phyir //
T02D1659:351a-32: chags pa chen po bcom ldan 'das //
T02D1659:351a-33: rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya 'di //
T02D1659:351a-35: stong gsum gyi skye 'gro mtha' dag la thugs rje
T02D1659:351a-36: chen pos dbri bkol med par gzigs shing don mdzad
T02D1659:351a-37: pa'i phyir / dpal rdo rje sems dpa' phyag rgya zhal rnam pa bzhi dang /

T02D1659:351a-39: kha dog sna tshogs 'od 'phro pa las rigs rnam
T02D1659:351a-40: pa drug gi dkyil 'khor gyis gzhan gyi las la

T02D1659:351b-6: dkar mthing gser mdog dmar ba'i mdangs //
T02D1659:351b-7: zhal mang phyag bzhi sgeg bzhad 'chang //

T02D1659:351b-13: mtshan dpe'i phyag rgya lnga yis mdzes //
