T02D1659:351b-26: stong gsum gyi 'jig rten dag na nor thams cad
T02D1659:351b-27: kyi mchog tu gyur ba ni nor bu rin po
T02D1659:351b-28: che yin te / dkon zhing yon tan thams cad kyi 'byung gnas su gyur pa dang /
T02D1659:351b-29: rin po che yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1659:351b-30: de dag gis zag bcas kyi rdzas ston par nus kyang /
T02D1659:351b-31: zag pa med pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin ma yin pas 'dus byas kyi rdzas so //
T02D1659:351b-32: de las khyad par du gyur ba'i phyir dkon mchog rin po che yin la /
T02D1659:351b-33: de yang theg pa thun mong du brtags pa'i sangs
T02D1659:351b-34: rgyas dag ni gsang sngags kyi dkyil 'khor du ma
T02D1659:351b-35: zhugs shing / dam tshig dang mi ldan pa'i phyir
T02D1659:351b-36: dbu rgyan med de bde ba chen po'i ye shes
T02D1659:351b-38: 'dir gsang sngags kyi dkyil 'khor du lha mos dbang
T02D1659:351b-39: bskur ba'i 'bras bu las rigs kyi bdag pos dbu
T02D1659:351b-40: brgyan pa'o // de yang rtog pa bdun pa las /
T02D1659:351b-41: dkyil 'khor spyan drangs lha mo yis //
T02D1659:351b-42: khrus byas dri ma gsum dag nas //
T02D1659:351b-43: dbang bskur 'bras bu bsam par bya //
T02D1659:351b-44: sangs rgyas gtsug gi nor bu'o //
T02D1659:351b-46: de yang gzhan gyi nor bu lta bu ma yin te /
T02D1659:351b-47: rang nyid kyi zag pa med pa'i ye shes kyi snang ba las byung ba'o //
T02D1659:352a-0: @352a * // de nas lha mo'i bdud rtsi'i bum pa'i chu rgyun
T02D1659:352a-1: ni lha'i dkyil 'khor gnyis su med pa'i 'od las
T02D1659:352a-2: byung ba'o // de nyid stong pa nyid kyi ye
T02D1659:352a-3: shes kyi ngo bo mtshan ma'i tshogs thams cad yang
T02D1659:352a-4: dag par mdzad pas chu rgyun lta bu ste /
T02D1659:352a-5: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyi mthu dang /
T02D1659:352a-6: lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa'i smon lam
T02D1659:352a-7: gyi ngo bo nyid kyis lhun gyis grub pa'i rang
T02D1659:352a-8: bzhin gyis 'bras bu gsal bar byas pa'o //
T02D1659:352a-9: de yang ye shes rnam pa drug dang rigs rnam
T02D1659:352a-10: pa drug gi rtags kyis mtshan zhing stong gsum gyi
T02D1659:352a-11: 'jig rten thams cad sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor gyis
T02D1659:352a-13: de dag gi phan yon ni /
T02D1659:352a-14: rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba //
T02D1659:352a-15: lha mo kun dang 'dus pa yis //
T02D1659:352a-16: zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gsum gsungs te go sla ba'i phyir ma bshad do //
T02D1659:352a-17: mchog tu dga' ba la rab tu sbyor ba ni /
T02D1659:352a-18: sbyor ba la sogs pa'i sgo nas phyag rgya chen po'i cha lugs la gnas pa'i mtshan can no //
T02D1659:352a-20: rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog rol pa //
T02D1659:352a-21: zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya las gtso bo'i rang bzhin
T02D1659:352a-22: dang sku mdog la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid bshad pa'o
T02D1659:352a-23: // de ni yab yum gnyis su med par rol pa'i skyil mo krung bshad pa'i phyir //
T02D1659:352a-24: g-yas dang g-yon pa'i sbyor ba yis //
T02D1659:352a-25: bde ba'i cha lugs gar byed cing //
T02D1659:352a-26: sems dpa'i skyil mo krung bcas na //
T02D1659:352a-27: dpung rnams thams cad rab tu 'joms //
T02D1659:352a-28: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' yab yum zhal sbyor te
T02D1659:352a-29: zhabs g-yas g-yon bsnol nas gnyis su med pa'i rol
T02D1659:352a-30: pa la snyoms par zhugs pa'i sbyor bas bde ba'i
T02D1659:352a-31: cha lugs dang 'od zer gyi 'phro 'dus phrin las
T02D1659:352a-32: gnyis kyi bya ba'i tshogs kyis gar byed cing sems
T02D1659:352a-33: dpa'i skyil mo krung du gnas pas bdud kyi dpung
T02D1659:352a-36: gtso bo'i zhabs g-yas g-yon gyi rkang pa'i bol gnyis
T02D1659:352a-37: brla'i steng du phyung nas yum pang du bzhag ste
T02D1659:352a-39: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gi bshad pa'o //
T02D1659:352a-40: da ni dkyil 'khor gyi lha mo rnams kyi phyag
T02D1659:352b-0: rgya chen po'i mtshan nyid @352b las thun mong du
T02D1659:352b-1: kha dog gi bye brag bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1659:352b-2: zla ba'i kha dog 'dzum pa'i zhal //
T02D1659:352b-3: dngos grub thams cad dag pa dang //
T02D1659:352b-5: brla yi dbus ni dkar la dmar //
T02D1659:352b-6: zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa bzhi gsungs te /
T02D1659:352b-7: lha mo thams cad mthun par bsdus pa'i rgyud 'dir kha dog mtshungs par bstan te /
T02D1659:352b-8: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rnam pa gnyis
T02D1659:352b-9: rab tu rgyas shing dngos grub thams cad rnam par
T02D1659:352b-11: zhal gyi dkyil 'khor zla ba rgyas pa 'dra ba las bzhin 'dzum pa'i mdangs dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1659:352b-12: brla gnyis kyi nang rol ni byang chub kyi sems
T02D1659:352b-13: rnam pa gnyis dang ldan pa'i rtags su dkar la
T02D1659:352b-15: phyag dag ni phrin las thams cad las mi 'gyur ba'i sgo nas sbyor bar mdzad pa dang /
T02D1659:352b-16: de nyid kyi che ba'i longs spyod mnga' brnyes pa'i
T02D1659:352b-17: rtags su bra ma ta'i lo ma gcig tu gcus
T02D1659:352b-18: pa lta bu las 'od 'ja' tshon bzhin du 'gyur
T02D1659:352b-19: ba'o // de bzhin du zhabs kyi byin pa gnyis kyang sngon por gnas pa'o //
T02D1659:352b-20: bde ba'i dbang phyug yon tan gyi tshogs thams cad
T02D1659:352b-21: la rnam par sbyor zhing bde ba chen po'i cha
T02D1659:352b-22: lugs kyis bdag gzhan gyi 'dod pa mtha' dag ston
T02D1659:352b-24: brla'i rgyab dang mtha' bzhi dang ni dkar la ser ba'i mdangs can no //
T02D1659:352b-25: sku las 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs 'phro zhing
T02D1659:352b-26: de dag gi rtse mo las kyang sangs rgyas drug
T02D1659:352b-27: gi dkyil 'khor gyis stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi
T02D1659:352b-28: khams thams cad gang bar mdzad pas rin po che'i
T02D1659:352b-29: kha dog can gyi lha rdzas kyi tshogs ston par
T02D1659:352b-30: mdzad pa'o // de dag kyang gdan padma'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1659:352b-31: la chos thams cad rnam par dag pa'i ting nge
T02D1659:352b-33: dbu la sogs pa'i rgyan dag sangs rgyas lnga'i mtshan
T02D1659:352b-34: mas spras shing rin po che'i rgyan la sogs pa
T02D1659:352b-36: de dag gi sku'i snang bas stong gsum gyi 'jig rten thams cad rgyas par mdzad de /
T02D1659:352b-37: dper na bcom ldan 'das 'od zer bkod pa'i gnas
T02D1659:352b-38: la 'jug cing mi mjed kyi 'jig rten 'di dag
T02D1659:352b-39: sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs kyis bkang ste
T02D1659:352b-40: / gdul bya'i lha ma srin sde brgyad dag skad cig gis 'dul bar mdzad pa bzhin no //
T02D1659:353a-0: @353a * // da ni khyad par gyi lha mo dag gi mtshan
T02D1659:353a-1: nyid so sor bstan pa las dang por lha mo
T02D1659:353a-2: bde mchog ma'i bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1659:353a-3: bya ba dang ni zlog pa dang //
T02D1659:353a-4: 'phrog pa dag kyang lhag par mdzad //
T02D1659:353a-5: bdag la 'khyud pa'i phyag rgya yis //
T02D1659:353a-7: zhi gnas dang lhag mthong zung du 'brel ba'i mda'
T02D1659:353a-8: gzhu 'gengs pas gtso bo'i thugs bskul zhing rjes su
T02D1659:353a-9: chags pa'i tshul gyi rang 'od kyi rig mal 'khyud
T02D1659:353a-10: pa'o // de dag gi phan yon ni /
T02D1659:353a-11: phyag rgya 'di yis btab na ni //
T02D1659:353a-13: zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig gsungs te go sla'o //
T02D1659:353a-14: dpal rdo rje mda' bde ba'i mchog rol ba zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1659:353a-15: phyag mtshan gyi sgo nas so //
T02D1659:353a-16: yang lha mo gzhan dag gi bstan pa'i phyir //
T02D1659:353a-17: rnam pa sna tshogs dam tshig chags //
T02D1659:353a-18: bde ba 'bab pa'i gar byed pas //
T02D1659:353a-19: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te ;
T02D1659:353a-20: ae ma'o bde ba mo'i dam tshig chags pa mo'i dam tshig gi brdas mtshon te /
T02D1659:353a-21: bha ga dang lingga'i mtshan ma 'dzin cing rang 'od kyi rig ma la 'khyud pa dang /
T02D1659:353a-22: snang mdzad ma'i se ral kha'i tshul du kha tv'am ga la rgyab brten bcas shing /
T02D1659:353a-23: g-yas pa rang 'od kyi rig ma la 'khyud pa dang /
T02D1659:353a-24: g-yon pas rdo rje rgya gram 'dzin pa dang /
T02D1659:353a-25: slob ma mos g-yas pa rang 'od kyi rig ma
T02D1659:353a-26: la 'khyud cing g-yon pas thod pa sangs rgyas kyi
T02D1659:353a-29: dbus kyi lha mchog chen po'o //
T02D1659:353a-30: zhes pa ni rang 'od kyi rig mi rdo rje
T02D1659:353a-31: sems dpa' lta bu dang 'khril zhing rdo rje pho
T02D1659:353a-32: brang nang ma'i khongs su chud pa'o //
T02D1659:353a-33: des na rtsa ba'i phyag rgya'i tshogs zhes kyang bshad do //
T02D1659:353a-34: phyag rgya bcings pa'i phan yon thun mong dang khyad par du bstan pa dag ni go sla'o //
T02D1659:353a-35: yang phyi'i lha mo gzhan dag gis bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1659:353a-36: gtsug lag ji lta'i rjes mthun par //
T02D1659:353a-37: dpal rdzogs rgya chen gar dag gis //
T02D1659:353a-38: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1659:353a-39: lha mo sangs rgyas byang chub ma la sogs pa bzhi dang /
T02D1659:353a-40: rta mgrin 'phang mtho ma la sogs pa bzhi dang /
T02D1659:353a-41: gling bu ma la sogs pa bzhi dang /
T02D1659:353a-42: me tog ma la sogs pa bzhi dag gi phyag rgya ste /
T02D1659:353b-0: de dag ji ltar 'ching ba'i mtshan nyid ni gong @353b du gsal bar bstan zin la /
T02D1659:353b-1: rnam par dag pa'i de kho na nyid ni cho
T02D1659:353b-2: ga lnga ba las gsal bar bstan pas 'dir spro
T02D1659:353b-3: bar mi bya'o // de dag gi phan yon phyogs gcig tu bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1659:353b-4: de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog / chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa //
T02D1659:353b-5: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
T02D1659:353b-6: yang bskul ba'i glu bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1659:353b-7: sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba //
T02D1659:353b-8: mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog gi / zhes pa
T02D1659:353b-9: la sogs pa tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyis dgos
T02D1659:353b-10: pa'i don dang glu'i mtshan nyid bstan nas tshigs su
T02D1659:353b-12: rdo rje sems dpa' skal bzangs dpal khyod bdag lags bdag cag bsgrubs la rtogs par mdzad du gsol //
T02D1659:353b-13: kye de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi bdag nyid bde
T02D1659:353b-14: ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma sna tshogs bde ba'i mchog
T02D1659:353b-15: / ces pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1659:353b-16: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i phyag rgya rol
T02D1659:353b-17: pa dang bcas pa'i gar thabs kyis skal ba bzang
T02D1659:353b-18: po'i lha mo la spyod pa ni bdag gi rang
T02D1659:353b-19: bzhin dang gnyis su med par gnas pa lags pas
T02D1659:353b-20: de nyid kyi che ba'i yon tan bdag gi rgyud
T02D1659:353b-21: la mi gsal ba dag gsal bar sgrub tu gsol
T02D1659:353b-23: 'khor gyi lha mo kun gyi rang bzhin te //
T02D1659:353b-24: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi bde ba dang //
T02D1659:353b-25: mkha' 'gro sgyu ma sna tshogs bde ba dang //
T02D1659:353b-26: sna tshogs gdul ba'i mchog 'grub pa dang /
T02D1659:353b-27: sbyor ba sna tshogs kyi gar gyi sgo nas de kho na nyid ston par mdzad cing /
T02D1659:353b-28: sngags rnam pa bzhis gsung mtshon pa dang /
T02D1659:353b-29: phrin las kyi dam tshig bzhis thugs mtshon par mdzad pa dang /
T02D1659:353b-30: de'i yon tan 'bras bu dang bcas pa bstan pa yin no //
T02D1659:353b-31: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor gyi thams cad 'byung ba'i phyag rgya zhes pa'i don bshad pa'o //
T02D1659:353b-32: da ni dpal rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor
T02D1659:353b-33: gyi lha thams cad 'byung ba'i phyag rgya bstan pa'i
T02D1659:353b-34: phyir ; rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das //
T02D1659:353b-35: rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs //
T02D1659:353b-36: zhes pa la sogs pas dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs kyi spyi'i mtshan nyid dang /
T02D1659:354a-2: glu'i bye brag rnams bstan to //
T02D1659:354a-4: dbus kyi gtso bo'i mtshan nyid ni //
T02D1659:354a-5: thar ba thams cad rnam dag phyir //
T02D1659:354a-6: sangs rgyas phyag rgya dpal du gnas //
T02D1659:354a-7: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam srid
T02D1659:354a-8: pa las nges par 'byung ba'i don la gnas pa
T02D1659:354a-9: dag ni nyan thos la sogs pa dag par bya
T02D1659:354a-10: ba'i phyir bde ba chen po'i phyag rgya ston par
T02D1659:354a-11: mdzad pa'i dpal rnam par snang mdzad 'khor los sgyur
T02D1659:354a-12: ba'i rgyal po'i cha lugs sam /
T02D1659:354a-13: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa'i cha lugs su rab tu sprul ba'o //
T02D1659:354a-14: de nyid kyi sku mdog ni /
T02D1659:354a-15: don rnams thams cad dag pa'i phyir //
T02D1659:354a-16: btso ma gser gyi kha dog bzhin //
T02D1659:354a-17: chags med la sogs chags chen phyir //
T02D1659:354a-18: dkar zhing sna tshogs gsal ba'i mdangs //
T02D1659:354a-19: zhes chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes thugs su chud
T02D1659:354a-20: cing 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos
T02D1659:354a-21: thams cad sku drug lhun grub kyi ngo bor sbyor
T02D1659:354a-22: bas mtshan ma'i rnam par rtog pa gzhan gyis mi
T02D1659:354a-23: 'gyur bas sku byin po dang zhal dbus ma ni
T02D1659:354a-25: yang 'dul ba'i mos pa bzhin du sku'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1659:354a-26: dkar po la zhal g-yas ser por yang bstan to
T02D1659:354a-27: // bdag la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa'i rtog pa
T02D1659:354a-28: thams cad spangs pas chags pa med de dkar po'i
T02D1659:354a-29: // tshul dang / phrin las sna tshogs dang ldan pas ljang gu'i tshul dang /
T02D1659:354a-30: chags pa chen po'i chos thams cad la mdzad pas
T02D1659:354a-31: dmar gsal du bzhugs pa'i zhal bzhi dang ldan no
T02D1659:354a-32: // de nyid kyi phyag rgya rnam pa bzhi'i ni
T02D1659:354a-33: rang rtags kyi phyag rgya 'dzin zhing rgyan dang cha
T02D1659:354a-34: lugs kyis mdzes par sprul pa'o //
T02D1659:354a-35: de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las /
T02D1659:354a-36: zhal bzhi ser dkar ljang dmar mdog / sku mdog gangs ri nyi shar bzhin //
T02D1659:354a-37: phyag na chos gos lhung bzed dang //
T02D1659:354a-39: 'khor los sgyur rgyal cha lugs dang //
T02D1659:354a-40: longs spyod tshogs kyis nyer mdzes par //
T02D1659:354a-41: thun mong rgyan tshogs tshangs pa las //
T02D1659:354a-42: khyad par rtags kyis rnam spras pa'o //
T02D1659:354a-44: yang rin po che'i rgyan chas kyi sgo nas ni /
T02D1659:354a-45: chos kyi rgyal srid rab bsgrub pa //
T02D1659:354a-46: rin chen chos las lhag pa med //
T02D1659:354a-47: de bas theg chen byang chub sems //
T02D1659:354b-0: @354b rgyal ba rdo rje rin chen can //
T02D1659:354b-1: gang zhig rgyal srid kyi longs spyod thams cad ni
T02D1659:354b-2: chos kyi rgyal srid kyis zil gyis gnon par byed
T02D1659:354b-3: la / rin po che'i tshogs thams cad ni theg
T02D1659:354b-4: pa chen po'i chos bla na med pa'i byang chub
T02D1659:354b-5: kyi sems kyis gnon par mdzad de /
T02D1659:354b-6: de dang ldan pa'i rtags su rin po che'i dbu rgyan dang rgyan chas kyis spras pa'o //
T02D1659:354b-7: de nyid kyi las kyi phyag rgya ni /
T02D1659:354b-8: g-yas pa'i mthe bong gung mo gnyis //
T02D1659:354b-9: g-yon pa'i khu tshur bcangs pa yi //
T02D1659:354b-10: sor mo kun la reg pa ni //
T02D1659:354b-11: rtsa ba'i phyag rgya yin par grags //
T02D1659:354b-12: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02D1659:354b-13: shes rab pha rol phyin gsal yin ;
T02D1659:354b-14: ; chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i tshul du phyag rgya bcings te /
T02D1659:354b-15: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chos can
T02D1659:354b-16: dang chos nyid kyi don mtha' dag par mdzad pa'i
T02D1659:354b-17: tshul gyis chos kyi rgyal srid rab tu grub par
T02D1659:354b-18: mdzad pa'o // de dag gi mdzad pa'i phrin las ni //
T02D1659:354b-19: byang chub sems can skye ba dang //
T02D1659:354b-20: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba ste //
T02D1659:354b-21: zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa phyed dang gsum gsungs te /
T02D1659:354b-22: phyag rgya gsal bar byas pa'i sgo nas /
T02D1659:354b-23: byang chub kyi sems rgya chen po bskyed pa dang /
T02D1659:354b-24: chos kyi 'khor los mi mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad gcod par mdzad nas /
T02D1659:354b-25: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul rgya
T02D1659:354b-26: chen po la sbyor zhing 'bras bu'i de kho na
T02D1659:354b-28: de dag gi phan yon bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1659:354b-29: gang gis ldan pa 'di mthong zhing //
T02D1659:354b-30: rnam pa kun du mchod byed pa //
T02D1659:354b-31: zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa phyed dang gnyis gsungs te /
T02D1659:354b-32: ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor gsal ba'i sgo nas
T02D1659:354b-33: rtse gcig tu bsgoms shing mchod na ye shes kyi
T02D1659:354b-34: dkyil 'khor thams cad mthong zhing mchod pa dang 'dra
T02D1659:354b-35: ste / sems bskyed cing lam la zhugs ma thag
T02D1659:354b-36: tu sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu 'grub ste chos kyi
T02D1659:354b-38: dpal dam tshig ces bya ba'i phyag rgya ni dpal
T02D1659:354b-39: rnam par snang mdzad kyis 'khor ba'i chos thams cad
T02D1659:354b-40: mi spong zhing longs spyod pas zhi ba phyogs gcig
T02D1659:354b-41: pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa 'joms par mdzad pas
T02D1659:354b-42: na rang nyid kyi de kho na nyid mtshon pa'i
T02D1659:354b-43: phyag rgya chen po'i tshul gyis bzhugs pa'o //
T02D1659:355a-2: g-yas pa'i yan lag gnon pa yis //
T02D1659:355a-3: g-yon pa'i yan lag kun las rgyal //
T02D1659:355a-4: sems dpa'i skyil mo krung byas na na //
T02D1659:355a-5: bdud rnams thams cad rab tu 'joms //
T02D1659:355a-6: yab yum gyi brla g-yas pa dag gis so so'i brla g-yon pa mnan to //
T02D1659:355a-7: zhabs bsnol ba'i skyil mo krung bcas nas gnyis su
T02D1659:355a-8: med pa'i snyoms 'jug la zhugs pas srid pa dang
T02D1659:355a-9: zhi ba'i mtha' la gnas pa dag 'dul bar mdzad
T02D1659:355a-10: pa'o // dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i skyil mo krung
T02D1659:355a-11: ni rdo rje sems dpa'i skyil mo krung dang 'dra
T02D1659:355a-13: gtso bo'i mtshan nyid rnam par bshad pa'o //
T02D1659:355a-14: da ni 'khor gyi lha mo'i mtshan nyid la phyag rgya'i yon tan bstan pa dang /
T02D1659:355a-15: 'og nas lha mo rnams kyis mtshan sbyar te shes par bya ba las /
T02D1659:355a-16: rdo rje khu tshur bcangs nas su //
T02D1659:355a-17: lag pa g-yon pas bkab nas ni //
T02D1659:355a-18: zhes pa la sogs pas khyad par gyi lha mo brgyad kyi phyag rgya bcing ba'i phyir /
T02D1659:355a-19: gar bskor ba sngon du 'gro bas lag pa g-yas
T02D1659:355a-20: pa rnams kyis ji skad du bstan pa'i rang rang
T02D1659:355a-21: gi khu tshur bzhin g-yon pa'i thal mos 'gebs par
T02D1659:355a-22: mdzad pa'o // de la rdo rje khu tshur ni
T02D1659:355a-23: lha mo sangs rgyas kun brjod ma'i ste khu tshur
T02D1659:355a-24: bcangs pa las srin lag dad mthe'u chung gi bar
T02D1659:355a-25: du mthe bo'i rtse bcug ste /
T02D1659:355a-26: mdzub mo brkyang ste cung zad bkug pa'o //
T02D1659:355a-28: srin lag mthe'u chung yan lag dbus //
T02D1659:355a-29: mthe bong legs par gzhag par bya //
T02D1659:355a-30: de nas khu tshur bcangs nas ni //
T02D1659:355a-31: mdzub mo legs par dgug par bya //
T02D1659:355a-33: lha mo dpal mo'i ni he ru ka'i khu tshur ni /
T02D1659:355a-34: rdo rje khu tshur bcangs pa las //
T02D1659:355a-35: mthe'u chung gnyis ni rab brkyang ste //
T02D1659:355a-36: zhes mche ba ltar byas pa'o //
T02D1659:355a-37: kun du bzang mo'i ni padmo'i bud med kyi khu tshur te /
T02D1659:355a-38: brdeg pa'i khu tshur bcangs pa las //
T02D1659:355a-39: mthe bong dag la gung mo gzhag / ces te /
T02D1659:355a-40: khu tshur bcangs pa las mthe bong gung mo rtse sbyar te padma'i 'dab ma 'dra bar byas pa'o //
T02D1659:355a-41: mi bzad snod 'dzin pa yi ni //
T02D1659:355a-42: rin chen 'dzin pa'i khu tshur to //
T02D1659:355a-43: gong ma las gung mo sbyar zhing tshigs zur can du byas pa'o //
T02D1659:355a-45: rin chen 'dzin pa'i khu tshur ni //
T02D1659:355a-46: khu tshur rdo rje rin chen mchog / ces so //
T02D1659:355b-0: sangs rgyas yan lag bdun ldan @355b ma'i ni sangs rgyas kyi khu tshur bcangs pa ste /
T02D1659:355b-1: rdo rje khu tshur legs bcangs la //
T02D1659:355b-2: bdag gi mthe bong nang du gzhug / ces pa'o //
T02D1659:355b-3: zhal bzangs gzugs ma'i bud med phyag rgya ni khu
T02D1659:355b-4: tshur snying gar bstod de me long 'dzin pa'i tshul
T02D1659:355b-6: khu tshur snying gar bcings pa ni //
T02D1659:355b-7: bud med phyag rgya der bshad de //
T02D1659:355b-9: sprin chen mo ni rta mchog gi khu tshur te /
T02D1659:355b-10: rdo rje khu tshur bcangs pa las //
T02D1659:355b-11: sor mo thams cad yongs su bzung //
T02D1659:355b-12: rtul phod las rnams thams cad ni //
T02D1659:355b-13: ma lus lus pa med pa 'grub //
T02D1659:355b-15: nam mkha'i spyan ldan ma yi ni ;
T02D1659:355b-16: ; dpal grub spyan gyi khu tshur bzhin te /
T02D1659:355b-17: mdzub mos mthe bong mnan nas ni //
T02D1659:355b-18: rang gi mthe bos mdzub mo mnan //
T02D1659:355b-19: dpal grub spyan gyi phyag rgya ste //
T02D1659:355b-20: mdzub mo mig gi 'bras bur bcas //
T02D1659:355b-22: de yang lha mo 'di dag gi so so'i khu
T02D1659:355b-23: tshur bcangs pa las rang gi phyag mtshan nang du
T02D1659:355b-24: chud pa'o // de yang rigs drug gi khu tshur
T02D1659:355b-25: ni las thams cad kyi phyag rgya zhes pa las
T02D1659:355b-26: chud pa'o // bshad cing / bud med kyi phyag
T02D1659:355b-27: rgya ni dngos grub kyi dbang phyug gi phyag rgya
T02D1659:355b-29: dpal grub can gyi phyag rgya ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya las bstan to //
T02D1659:355b-31: so so'i sngags brjod cing so so'i sku gsal bar bsgoms pas phyag rgya chen po'i rgyas 'debs pa'o //
T02D1659:355b-32: lha mo gling bu ma la sogs pa dag ni
T02D1659:355b-33: rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor las bshad pa bzhin
T02D1659:355b-35: so so'i sngags la 'khor lo'i sgra dang ldan par brjod pa'o //
T02D1659:355b-36: de ltar dkyil 'khor 'og ma dag la yang tshul de ltar shes par bya'o //
T02D1659:355b-37: da ni bskul ba'i glu las /
T02D1659:355b-38: dang po'i spyi'i mtshan nyid ni /
T02D1659:355b-39: phyag rgya shes pa 'di dag gi / sangs rgyas
T02D1659:355b-40: sprul ba glu mchog gi / zhes pa la sogs
T02D1659:355b-41: pa tshigs su bcad pa phyed dang gnyis gsungs pa
T02D1659:355b-42: la / gong nas 'byung ba'i phyag rgya ni 'og
T02D1659:355b-43: nas 'byung ba dag gi don shes pa las sangs
T02D1659:355b-44: rgyas sprul ba'i glu blang zhing bskul ba'i mthus thams
T02D1659:355b-46: thams cad 'gag pa las thams cad la sbyor ba'o //
T02D1659:355b-47: des ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam la zhen pa dag kyang slong bar byed cing /
T02D1659:356a-1: thugs kyi phyag rgya bstan par 'grub pas na glu mthug po dang /
T02D1659:356a-2: srab bu la sogs pa bye brag bzhi legs par sbyar ba'i dbyangs phral 'khyug pa dang /
T02D1659:356a-3: tshangs pa'i dbyangs dag blang bar bya'o //
T02D1659:356a-4: de dag gi bskul ba'i glu dngos ni /
T02D1659:356a-5: 'jig rten khams mang rdul phran grangs med khyad par spros pa yi //
T02D1659:356a-6: rgyal ba'i don rnams rab tu phra ba'i rdul gyi grangs snyed pa //
T02D1659:356a-7: zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig gsungs pa las /
T02D1659:356a-8: 'jig rten gyi khams snrel zhi dang /
T02D1659:356a-11: phan tshun la sogs pa'i bkod pa rgya chen po
T02D1659:356a-12: mtha' dag tu de dang mthun pa'i mdzad pa sna
T02D1659:356a-13: tshogs kyis sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad cing
T02D1659:356a-14: zhes pa dang / bya ba'i tshul de dag skad
T02D1659:356a-15: cig tsam gyi rnam pas bdag la sbyor zhing grub
T02D1659:356a-17: de dag gi phan yon ni /
T02D1659:356a-18: glu 'di dag ni blangs pa yis //
T02D1659:356a-19: nam mkha' thams cad mnyam spyor ba //
T02D1659:356a-20: mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog /'grub par 'gyur ba gdon mi za //
T02D1659:356a-23: bskul ba'i rjes la mchod pa'i phyir //
T02D1659:356a-24: de nas bud med bzhi rnams dang //
T02D1659:356a-25: rang gi yang dag gsang ba yis //
T02D1659:356a-26: zhes pa la sogs pas mchod pa'i lha mo bzhi dang /
T02D1659:356a-27: ting nge 'dzin gyis mngon par sprul ba'i phyi nang
T02D1659:356a-28: gsang ba'i mchod pa dag rgya chen por spros shing
T02D1659:356a-29: mchod pa'o // de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya shes pa'i don rnam par bshad pa'o //
T02D1659:356a-30: da ni dpal he ru ka'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya chen po las /
T02D1659:356a-31: dang po spyi yi mtshan nyid ni //
T02D1659:356a-33: rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs //
T02D1659:356a-34: dam tshig la sdang rnam sbyar phyir //
T02D1659:356a-35: dur khrod gar gyi phyag rgyar gsal //
T02D1659:356a-36: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i che ba'i yon tan las
T02D1659:356a-37: dam tshig la sdang ba'i ru tra la sogs pa
T02D1659:356a-38: gzhom pa'i don du dpal he ru ka dur khrod
T02D1659:356a-39: chen po'i chas brgyad la sogs pa'i cha lugs dang
T02D1659:356a-40: ldan par bya'o // da ni khyad par gyi mtshan nyid las /
T02D1659:356a-41: gtso bo'i sku de ltar bstan pa gang gi don du zhe na /
T02D1659:356a-42: thugs rje bskyed pa'i yul dag gi phyir te /
T02D1659:356a-43: shin tu gdug cing gtum pa la //
T02D1659:356a-44: zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te //
T02D1659:356a-46: de'i gnyen por thugs rje chen po'i mtshan nyid ni /
T02D1659:356b-0: shes @356b rab thabs kyi rnal 'byor gyi //
T02D1659:356b-3: de nyid kyi cha lugs kyi mtshan ma ni /
T02D1659:356b-4: sangs rgyas khro byung khro bo ni //
T02D1659:356b-5: thal bar 'jig pa'i mchog yin te //
T02D1659:356b-6: zhes pa la sogs pa la /
T02D1659:356b-7: phyag brgyad las dang po'i 'og ma gnyis na dbang
T02D1659:356b-8: phyug chen po'i pags pa brgyad ste 'dzin pa dang
T02D1659:356b-9: / gsum pa dag na mda' dang gzhu 'dzin pa /
T02D1659:356b-10: bzhi pa dag na sha chen po dag dang /
T02D1659:356b-11: sbrang rtsi'i sgras khrag chen po dag gis bkad ba'i thod pa 'dzin pa dang /
T02D1659:356b-12: dang po gnyis ni 'og nas 'byung ba'i rdo rje dang kha tv'am ga 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1659:356b-13: gzhan dag gi don ni go sla bsam bshad do ;
T02D1659:356b-14: ; de nyid kyi phrin las ni /
T02D1659:356b-15: dpal ldan he ru ka bcas pa'i //
T02D1659:356b-16: phyag rgya sna tshogs rnam sprul pas //
T02D1659:356b-18: padma gar gyi dbang phyug ces pa ni dpal he
T02D1659:356b-19: ru kas chos thams cad la gar thabs sna tshogs
T02D1659:356b-20: kyi sgo nas dbang sgyur bar mdzad pas so //
T02D1659:356b-21: yab yum gyi mtshan nyid bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1659:356b-22: se ral kha yi tshul dag tu //
T02D1659:356b-23: kha tv'am ga la rgyab brten byas //
T02D1659:356b-24: zhes pa la sogs pa la yum gyi sku mdog dang /
T02D1659:356b-25: rgyan chas dang phyag mtshan dag kyang shes par bya'o //
T02D1659:356b-26: de nyid kyi phyag rgya'i yon tan ni /
T02D1659:356b-27: bud med la sogs rin chen mchog / dngos po thams cad mkha' las 'byin //
T02D1659:356b-28: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te go sla'o //
T02D1659:356b-29: yab yum gyi skyil krung gi mtshan nyid ni /
T02D1659:356b-30: g-yas dang g-yon pa'i sbyor ba yis //
T02D1659:356b-31: bde ba 'bab pa'i gar byed pas //
T02D1659:356b-32: skyil mo krung ni phyed bcas pas //
T02D1659:356b-33: rkang pa rang gi brlas mnan na //
T02D1659:356b-34: 'gying bag dang bcas pa'i sgo nas langs te yab
T02D1659:356b-35: kyi zhabs g-yas pas yum gyi brla la 'khyud cing
T02D1659:356b-36: / g-yon pa brkyang ste sa la bzhag nas yum
T02D1659:356b-37: gyis kyang de bzhin du skyil krung phyed pa'i zhabs
T02D1659:356b-39: de dag gi phrin las dang yon tan dang bcas pa ni /
T02D1659:356b-40: drag po dbang po nye dbang bcas //
T02D1659:356b-41: nyi zla gshin rje tshangs bcas pa //
T02D1659:356b-43: bde bar reg pa mnyam par sbyor ba skal ba
T02D1659:356b-44: bzang po dpal rdo rje drag po gnas pa ni
T02D1659:356b-45: gnyis su med pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi 'od
T02D1659:356b-46: zer las sprul par bcas pas mnyam par sbyor zhing
T02D1659:356b-47: de nyid kyi phrin las kyis drag po'i tshogs 'joms
T02D1659:357a-1: da ni 'khor gyi lha mo las dang po spyi'i mtshan nyid ni /
T02D1659:357a-2: de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa //
T02D1659:357a-4: dpal ldan he ru ka bcas pa'i //
T02D1659:357a-5: phyag rgya sna tshogs gnas pa'o //
T02D1659:357a-6: gtso bo'i cha lugs las gzhan pa'i lha mo rnams
T02D1659:357a-7: kyi mtshan nyid phyag rgya sna tshogs kyi tshul du
T02D1659:357a-8: gnas te / dang por sku'i cha lugs bstan pa dang lta ba'i khyad par dang /
T02D1659:357a-9: phyag mtshan gyi khyad par dang /
T02D1659:357a-10: gar thabs kyi khyad par dang /
T02D1659:357a-11: mtshan gyi khyad par gyi sgo nas sna tshogs su gnas pa'o //
T02D1659:357a-12: de las dang po sku'i khyad par ni /
T02D1659:357a-13: zhi dang drag po rmongs pa mchog / dga' ba'i gar byed 'gyur bar bcas //
T02D1659:357a-14: shi ba ldang ba'i sbyor ba yis //
T02D1659:357a-15: bde ba'i phyag rgya rab tu gnas //
T02D1659:357a-16: 'dir gnas zhes pa'i sgras zhal gdong gi khyad par dang /
T02D1659:357a-17: bzhugs tshul bstan pa yin te /
T02D1659:357a-18: goo r'i ni rgyas 'debs ma ste zhi ba'i zhal
T02D1659:357a-19: dang ldan zhing de nyid kyi tshul gyis bzhugs pa'o
T02D1659:357a-20: // de bzhin du zhal dang bzhugs thabs gnyis ka la sbyor te /
T02D1659:357a-21: tsoo r'i ni snying 'dren ma zhes bya ste drag po'i tshul lo //
T02D1659:357a-22: pra mo h'a ni rmongs byed ma ste /
T02D1659:357a-23: de nyid kyi tshul gyis so //
T02D1659:357a-24: pukka s'i ni gar byed ma zhes te dga' ba'i tshul can no //
T02D1659:357a-25: gha sma r'i ni 'debs byed ma ste /
T02D1659:357a-26: de nyid kyi tshul gyis so //
T02D1659:357a-27: bee t'a l'i ni gsod byed ma ste 'gyur ba'i tshul du bzhugs pa'o //
T02D1659:357a-28: sma sh'a ma ni gsod byed ma ste /
T02D1659:357a-29: shi ba slong ba'i tshul gyis bzhugs pa'o //
T02D1659:357a-30: tsanda l'i ni zab mo ste /
T02D1659:357a-31: shi ba ldang ba'i tshul du bzhugs pa'o //
T02D1659:357a-32: de ltar lha mo kun kyang rang rang gi skyes
T02D1659:357a-33: bu dang mi 'bral zhing bde ba la longs spyod
T02D1659:357a-34: pas na bde ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D1659:357a-35: yang lha mo dag gi lta ba'i khyad par bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1659:357a-36: zhi dang drag po rmongs byed dang //
T02D1659:357a-37: gyen du dbugs 'byin gar byed lus //
T02D1659:357a-38: lta ba'i phyag rgya grub pa'i mchog / gsang ba'i sbyor ba de mchog gis //
T02D1659:357a-39: de la zhi ba'i lta ba ni mig zam zim
T02D1659:357a-40: du byas la glang po che khyo shug byed pa'i
T02D1659:357a-42: drag po'i lta ba ni sdang mig gi tshul du'o //
T02D1659:357a-43: rmongs pa'i lta ba ni chang gis myos pa bzhin mi gsal bar brtags pa'o //
T02D1659:357a-44: shi ba slong ba ni cung zad gyen du gzigs pa'o //
T02D1659:357b-0: dbugs 'byin pa'i tshul ni @357b phyogs bcur blta ba'o //
T02D1659:357b-1: gar byed pa ni rang gi g-yas dang g-yon du res bzhin gzigs pa'o //
T02D1659:357b-2: rnam par g-yeng ba ni phyogs bcur phur bu 'debs pa'i tshul gyis gzigs pa'o //
T02D1659:357b-3: ro za ba ni mdun du res kyis lta ba'o //
T02D1659:357b-4: grub pa'i mchog ni lta ba de dag gi las la sbyor bar byed cing /
T02D1659:357b-5: gsang ba'i sbyor ba'i bde mchog la gnas pa'o //
T02D1659:357b-6: phyag mtshan gyi khyad par ni /
T02D1659:357b-7: me tog bdug par sbyar ba'i mchog / chang dang chu dang lcug ma dang //
T02D1659:357b-8: zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa lnga gsungs te /
T02D1659:357b-9: dang pos ni mchod pa'i mtshan ma brgyad bstan te /
T02D1659:357b-10: bsgrub par bya ba la rgyas 'debs par mdzad pa'o //
T02D1659:357b-11: gnyis pas ni phrin las rgyas 'debs par mdzad pa'o //
T02D1659:357b-12: gsum pas ni cha lugs kyi rim pa mtshon par byed pa'o //
T02D1659:357b-13: bzhi pa dang lnga pas ni phrin las kyi phyag mtshan dag bstan pa'o //
T02D1659:357b-15: dang po rgyas 'debs ma yi rgya //
T02D1659:357b-17: zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gnyis gsungs pa'o //
T02D1659:357b-18: yang phyag rgya lan dang bcas pa ni /
T02D1659:357b-19: de nas phyag rgya 'di kun gyis //
T02D1659:357b-20: phyag rgya'i lan rnams bla na med //
T02D1659:357b-21: ces pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1659:357b-22: gzhan gyi sbyor ba la sogs pas mi tshugs par bya zhing /
T02D1659:357b-23: rang gi dngos grub mtha' dag sgrub pa'i phyir dpal he ru ka'i phyag rgya dang /
T02D1659:357b-24: 'khor gyi lha mo rnams kyi phyag rgya rim pa
T02D1659:357b-25: bzhin du bcing zhing las thams cad la sbyar bar
T02D1659:357b-26: bya'o // dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams mnyes par bya zhing /
T02D1659:357b-27: rang gi las la sbyor bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1659:357b-28: glus bskul ba las dang po spyi'i mtshan nyid ni /
T02D1659:357b-29: de nas phyag rgya shes pa 'di //
T02D1659:357b-30: dpal ldan rdo rje'i sbyor ba'i glu //
T02D1659:357b-31: las rnams thams cad rab sgrub pa //
T02D1659:357b-32: khyad par du ni bshad par bya //
T02D1659:357b-33: dpal he ru ka'i phyag rgya dang gnyis su med par sbyor zhing /
T02D1659:357b-34: las thams cad 'grub par byed pa'i tshul gyis rang
T02D1659:357b-35: gi de kho na nyid gsal bar ston pa'i glu
T02D1659:357b-36: brjod pa'o // de las dang po gtso bo'i zhal rnam pa bzhi'i sgo nas bskul ba'i phyir /
T02D1659:357b-37: gzigs pa rnam pa sna tshogs 'gyur ba'i rgyas thob la //
T02D1659:357b-38: rnam pa sna tshogs 'o byed 'khyud pas rmongs mdzad de //
T02D1659:358a-0: rnam pa sna tshogs bde ba'i mchod ston kun gsol @358a * //
T02D1659:358a-2: ; rnam pa sna tshogs bde mchog ngo mtshar bstan du gsol //
T02D1659:358a-3: zhal dang po drag po'i sgo nas gzigs pa sna tshogs 'gyur ba'i rgyas 'debs pa dang /
T02D1659:358a-4: zhal gnyis pa rmongs pa'i sgo nas 'o byed 'khyud pa dang /
T02D1659:358a-5: zhal gsum pa zad byed kyi sgo nas mchod bstod kun gsol ba dang /
T02D1659:358a-6: zhal bzhi pa sgeg pa'i sgo nas ngo mtshar bstan pa'o //
T02D1659:358a-7: da ni 'khor gyi lha mo brgyad kyis bskul ba'i glu gsungs te /
T02D1659:358a-8: rgyas btab rmongs byas mnabs su gsol //
T02D1659:358a-9: bde mchog ngo mtshar bde bar bzhugs //
T02D1659:358a-10: zhes pa ni nang gi lha mo bzhi'i'o //
T02D1659:358a-11: h'um aa la la ho snang bar mdzod //
T02D1659:358a-12: rnal 'byor bde mchog sgyu mas sbrul //
T02D1659:358a-13: zhes pa ni nang gi lha mo bzhi'i phrin las so //
T02D1659:358a-15: nyon mongs kun las rgyal bar mdzod //
T02D1659:358a-16: ma lus pa dag mnabs su gsol //
T02D1659:358a-17: nyon mongs thams cad bsal bar mdzod //
T02D1659:358a-18: ces pa ni phyi'i lha mo bzhi'i'o //
T02D1659:358a-20: dpal he ru ka rdo rje'i phyag rgya zhes pa'i don rnam par bshad pa'o //
T02D1659:358a-21: da ni dpal padma gar gyi dbang phyug gi dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya chen po las /
T02D1659:358a-22: dang por spyi'i mtshan nyid ni /
T02D1659:358a-24: rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs //
T02D1659:358a-25: 'dod chags thams cad rnam sbyang phyir //
T02D1659:358a-26: padmo'i phyag rgya dpal du gnas //
T02D1659:358a-27: bdag tu 'dzin pa'i lta bas kun du bslang cing /
T02D1659:358a-28: rtag pa dang chad pa'i mtha' rnam pa gnyis mngon
T02D1659:358a-29: par zhen pa dag par bya ba'i don du gang
T02D1659:358a-30: zhig padma'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya chen
T02D1659:358a-31: po de nyid la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1659:358a-32: de las gtso bo'i sku mdog gi rnam par dag pa bstan pa'i phyir //
T02D1659:358a-33: mi 'gyur dag pa dam pa'i phyir //
T02D1659:358a-34: shel sgong bzhin du dag pa yi //
T02D1659:358a-35: 'dod chags thams cad dag pa'i phyir //
T02D1659:358a-37: mi mthun pa'i mtshan ma gzhan dang ;
T02D1659:358a-38: rtog pa'i bag chags kyis 'gyur ba med de /
T02D1659:358a-39: gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i bar du
T02D1659:358a-40: chos thams cad rnam par dag pa la mnga' brnyes
T02D1659:358a-41: pas nor bu chu shel gyi mdangs dang ldan pa'o
T02D1659:358a-42: // mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i thugs
T02D1659:358b-0: rje chen pos gdul bya du ma'i @358b 'dul thabs
T02D1659:358b-1: mkhyen cing mthun pa'i mdzad pa ston pa'i phyir /
T02D1659:358b-2: kha dog nyi shu rtsa lnga'i mdangs 'phro ba'o //
T02D1659:358b-4: rgyan dang mtshan ma bstan pa'i phyir //
T02D1659:358b-5: sangs rgyas tshe yi rin chen spras //
T02D1659:358b-6: gos dang sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan //
T02D1659:358b-7: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1659:358b-8: rigs kyi mtshan ma mi 'gyur zhing 'bras bu la rgyas gdab pa'i phyir /
T02D1659:358b-9: sangs rgyas tshe dpag med kyis brgyan cing rigs dang mthun pa'i mdzad pa'o //
T02D1659:358b-10: de nyid kyi spyod pa'i phyir /
T02D1659:358b-11: sna tshogs pa'i gos dang rgyan gyis brgyan pa sku'i
T02D1659:358b-12: 'od zer las byung ba'i bde bar gshegs pas stong
T02D1659:358b-14: gzhan yang zhal nyi shu rtsa lnga las phyag rgyas mtshan pa'am /
T02D1659:358b-15: zhal bzhi la phyag lnga bcus mtshan pa'am /
T02D1659:358b-16: brgyad dang bzhis mtshan pa'i g-yas kyi padma dag la rdo rje dang /
T02D1659:358b-23: bkra shis kyi mtshan ma brgyad la sogs pas mtshan zhing /
T02D1659:358b-24: g-yon pa dag ni padma rkyang ba'o //
T02D1659:358b-25: de dag gi sgo nas rigs kyi dkyil 'khor spro zhing /
T02D1659:358b-26: padma'i mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis sgyu mas 'dul ba'i thabs sna tshogs ston cing //
T02D1659:358b-27: sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la bkod pa'o //
T02D1659:358b-28: yab yum dang zhal sbyor du bzhugs pa'i skyil krung gi mtshan nyid ni /
T02D1659:358b-29: g-yas dang g-yon pa'i sbyor ba yis //
T02D1659:358b-30: skyil mo krung ni phyed mar gnas //
T02D1659:358b-31: rgyal po'i skyil mo krung bcas nas //
T02D1659:358b-32: sdug bsngal thams cad sel bar byed //
T02D1659:358b-33: me tog padma'i stegs bu la g-yas pa brkyang ste sa la brten cing /
T02D1659:358b-34: g-yon pa bskum ste skyil mo krung gi tshul du yum dang zhal sbyor ba'i tshul gyis gnas pa'o //
T02D1659:358b-35: dpal padma rgyal po gnas zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'i bshad pa'o //
T02D1659:358b-36: gzhan yang 'khor gyi lha mo rnams kyi phyag rgya chen po'i mtshan nyid ni /
T02D1659:358b-37: bsnyems pa'i lag pa g-yon pa yis //
T02D1659:358b-38: padma dmar po ci bder bzung //
T02D1659:358b-39: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1659:358b-40: lha mo brgyad po 'di dag gis //
T02D1659:358b-41: phyag g-yon pa na padma so so'i kha dog dang
T02D1659:358b-42: mthun par 'gying bag gi tshul gyis gnas shing 'dzin
T02D1659:358b-43: pa / g-yas pa dag na so so'i phyag rgya'i gar gyi cha lugs dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1659:359a-1: dang po lha mo rnam par gzigs pas ni g-yon pas padma dmar po ci bde bar 'dzin zhing /
T02D1659:359a-2: g-yas pa'i mtheb mdzub rtse sprad cing skam pa'i phyag
T02D1659:359a-3: rgyas rang gi snying gar 'dren zhing kha 'byed par
T02D1659:359a-4: mdzad pa'o // des na rnam par gzigs pa'i rnam dag dpal te chos dag pa la spyod pa'o ;
T02D1659:359a-5: ; sgrol mas ni padma sngon po bzung ste rang
T02D1659:359a-6: gi snying gar bud med kyi khu tshur gyis 'dren
T02D1659:359a-7: pa'o // des na byang chub kyi mchog tu gyur
T02D1659:359a-8: pa la longs spyod pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa'o
T02D1659:359a-9: pa'o // // rgyan can mas ni g-yon pas padma
T02D1659:359a-10: dkar po bzung ste g-yas na chos kyi 'khor lo
T02D1659:359a-11: pa'o // // bskor ba'o // des na chos kyi
T02D1659:359a-12: 'khor los 'khor ba'i 'khor lo gcod par byed pa'o
T02D1659:359a-13: pa'o // // bskor ba'o // // khro gnyer mas ni g-yon pa padma mthing ga 'dzin cing /
T02D1659:359a-14: g-yas kyis ba dan gsum pa'i phyag rgyas gar mdzad pa'o //
T02D1659:359a-15: de nyid kyi sgo nas gzhan gyi phyag rgya slar zlog par mdzad pas na /
T02D1659:359a-17: padma gtum pa'i dbang phyug mas ni g-yon pa padma
T02D1659:359a-18: thogs te bsnyems bag gis sku'i gnas su brten cing
T02D1659:359a-19: / g-yas pas ni rin po che 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1659:359a-20: des ni gzhan dag gi 'dod pa thams cad skong bar mdzad pas /
T02D1659:359a-21: pad gtum dbang phyug rin chen mchog / ces so //
T02D1659:359a-22: sna tshogs padma mos ni g-yon na padma ljang gu
T02D1659:359a-23: bstod cing g-yas na rtse gsum pa 'dzin pas phrin
T02D1659:359a-24: las gsum gyis gzhan 'joms pa'i phyir /
T02D1659:359a-25: sna tshogs padma rtse gsum las rgyal zhes so //
T02D1659:359a-26: padma dpal chen mos ni g-yon na padma ser po
T02D1659:359a-27: 'dzin cing g-yas na chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan 'dzin
T02D1659:359a-29: des padmo gnas pa'i skyed pa'o zhes so //
T02D1659:359a-30: 'dod pa'i dbang mos ni g-yon na padmo le brgan
T02D1659:359a-31: 'dzin cing g-yas pa rdo rje rtse gsum thogs te
T02D1659:359a-32: gar byed pas 'gro ba gsum dbang du bsdu ba'o
T02D1659:359a-33: // da ni de dag mnyes par bya ba'i glu dbyangs gsungs pa las /
T02D1659:359a-34: dang po spyi'i mtshan nyid go sla'o //
T02D1659:359a-35: gzhan yang gtso bo la bskul ba'i phyir /
T02D1659:359a-36: de bzhin gshegs pa kun la sogs pa'i gzugs mchog sna tshogs 'dzin //
T02D1659:359a-37: sems can rnam pa sna tshogs 'dul mchog dngos grub mchog mnga' ba //
T02D1659:359a-38: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs pa las /
T02D1659:359b-0: kun la sogs pa'i gzugs mchog can te snangs rgyas dang byang chub @359b sems dpa' dang /
T02D1659:359b-1: 'jig rten gyi lha dregs byed chen po dag gi
T02D1659:359b-2: sku sna tshogs ston cing 'gro ba'i don du 'phrul
T02D1659:359b-4: sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pa bdag / tshangs pa
T02D1659:359b-5: 'jug sel dbang phyug bdag / nyi zla bdag lags
T02D1659:359b-6: zhes pa dang // rnal 'byor gyi rgyud rdo rje
T02D1659:359b-7: rtse mo las kyang 'di nyid kyi rigs kyi sprul
T02D1659:359b-8: pas 'gro ba 'dul ba la 'khor ba dang mya
T02D1659:359b-9: ngan las 'das pa'i dngos po sna tshogs snang bar
T02D1659:359b-10: zhes pa dang // bstan te / 'gro ba 'dul ba kun gzugs can //
T02D1659:359b-12: yang 'khor gyi lha mo rnams kyi glu ni /
T02D1659:359b-14: rnam pa sna tshogs 'dul mdzad dag pa'i tshul gyis gar mdzad pa ;
T02D1659:359b-15: ; padmo dam tshig dbang phyug sangs rgyas gar rnams mdzad du gsol //
T02D1659:359b-16: zhes pa la sogs pa'i sgo nas yon tan dang bcas par bstan to //
T02D1659:359b-17: dpal padmo gar gyi dbang phyug gi phyag rgya zhes pa'i don rnam par bshad pa'o //
T02D1659:359b-18: gzhan yang rdo rje nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag
T02D1659:359b-19: rgya chen po las dang po spyi'i mtshan nyid bstan
T02D1659:359b-20: pa'i phyir / rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das //
T02D1659:359b-21: rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs //
T02D1659:359b-22: nor mchog rnam par sbyong ba'i phyir //
T02D1659:359b-23: dpal ldan nyi ma'i phyag rgyar gnas //
T02D1659:359b-24: gang zhig ser sna'i lam la gnas shing 'chal ba'i
T02D1659:359b-25: tshul khrims kyi dri ma can dag 'khor gsum yongs
T02D1659:359b-26: su dag pa'i sbyin pa bzhi la dgod pa'i phyir
T02D1659:359b-28: gzi brjid dag gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1659:359b-29: da ni gtso bo'i mtshan nyid las /
T02D1659:359b-30: dang por zhi ba'i cha lugs su gnas pa'i tshul ni /
T02D1659:359b-31: nam mkha'i snying po thams cad phyogs ;
T02D1659:359b-32: ; re ba thams cad yongs rdzogs pa //
T02D1659:359b-33: bud med la sogs rin chen mchog / rin chen thams cad mkha' las 'bebs //
T02D1659:359b-34: gang zhig nam mkha'i lus can la /
T02D1659:359b-35: gser gyi ri bo ltar bzhugs pa /
T02D1659:359b-36: phyogs thams cad nas sems can gyi re ba rdzogs
T02D1659:359b-37: par byed pa'i btsun mo rin po che la sogs
T02D1659:359b-38: pa'i bdun po dag char bzhin du 'bebs par mdzad
T02D1659:359b-39: pa ni nam mkha'i snying po nyid do //
T02D1659:359b-40: de las khyad par du dag po'i tshogs rnams gdul
T02D1659:359b-41: ba'i phyir khro bo'i cha lugs su bstan pa ni
T02D1659:359b-42: / shin tu gdug cing gtum pa la //
T02D1659:360a-2: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1659:360a-3: nyi ma 'bum gyi 'od zer dang ldan pa'i sgo nas gzhan dag gi gdung ba sel zhing /
T02D1659:360a-4: drag po'i cha lugs sna tshogs dang ldan zhing /
T02D1659:360a-5: sku nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'bar ba bzhin dmar ser du gnas nas /
T02D1659:360a-6: drag po'i thabs sna tshogs kyi sgo nas de dag 'dul bar mdzad pa'o //
T02D1659:360a-7: de dag gi phyag mtshan la sogs pa'i khyad par bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1659:360a-8: rdo rje gzhu dang mda' mchog dang //
T02D1659:360a-9: shin tu legs par 'gyings pa ste //
T02D1659:360a-10: zhes pa la sogs pa las phyag rnam pa bzhi ni gzhu dang /
T02D1659:360a-13: ral gri 'dzin cing 'dzum bag dad bcas pa'i bzhin gyis spyan mig g-yon pa gyen du bteg ste /
T02D1659:360a-14: mkha' la rin po che sna bdun gyi char 'bebs pa gzigs pa'o //
T02D1659:360a-15: de nyid kyi phrin las ni go sla'o //
T02D1659:360a-16: skyil krung gi khyad par bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1659:360a-17: rdo rje pus mo gnyis bcings te //
T02D1659:360a-18: rdo rje skyil mo krung bcas nas ;
T02D1659:360a-19: ; zhes pa la sogs pa la /
T02D1659:360a-20: nor bu rin po che'i dbyibs ltar pus mo gnyis bcings te /
T02D1659:360a-21: yum dang zhal sbyor du bzhugs shing /
T02D1659:360a-22: bgegs thams cad gzhig par mdzad pa'o //
T02D1659:360a-23: gzhan yang 'khor gyi lha mo dag gi mtshan nyid
T02D1659:360a-24: kyi sgo nas phyag rgya chen po'i cha lugs bstan
T02D1659:360a-25: pa'i phyir / dbang bskur ba dang gter dag dang /
T02D1659:360a-26: rgyal mtshan mchog ldan mchod pa che //
T02D1659:360a-27: zhes pa ni nang gi lha mo bzhi'o //
T02D1659:360a-28: ji lta'i tshul dag ston pa dang //
T02D1659:360a-29: rang gi don rnams rab sgrub pa'o //
T02D1659:360a-30: zhes pa ni phyi'i lha mo dag dang so so'i las so //
T02D1659:360a-31: dkyil 'khor gyi lha de dag mnyes shing las la gzhug pa'i phyir bskul ba'i glu gsungs pa las /
T02D1659:360a-32: de nas phyag rgya shes pa 'di //
T02D1659:360a-33: rgyal po sgyu ma mchog gi glu //
T02D1659:360a-34: las rnams thams cad rab sgrub pa //
T02D1659:360a-35: khyad par du ni bshad par bya //
T02D1659:360a-36: gar sna tshogs dang so so'i phyag rgya bcings nas /
T02D1659:360a-37: sku'i dkyil 'khor gsal bar gyur pa la dmigs te
T02D1659:360a-38: sngags dang phyag rgyar ldan pas las la gzhug par
T02D1659:360a-39: bya'o // de yang las rnam pa bzhi'i sgo nas
T02D1659:360a-40: zhal bzhi'i rnam pas lha mo bzhi'i phrin las la
T02D1659:360a-41: bya'o // gzung ba'i phyir / sems can sprin las byang chub mchog sbyin sna tshogs char 'bebs pa //
T02D1659:360b-0: bdag gi re ba kun sgrub myur du @360b ston aa la la ho //
T02D1659:360b-1: zhal dang po dang lha mo dbang bskur ma'i sgo
T02D1659:360b-2: nas sems can sprin tshogs la byang chub sems kyi
T02D1659:360b-5: lha mo gter ldan ma'i sgo nas rin po che'i
T02D1659:360b-6: mchog sna tshogs kyi char 'bebs shing byin pa dang
T02D1659:360b-7: / zhal gsum pa dang lha mo rgyal mtshan mchog
T02D1659:360b-8: ldan ma'i sgo nas chos thams cad zil gyis gnon
T02D1659:360b-9: / cing / bdag gi re ba kun sgrub pa'i thabs myur du ston pa dang /
T02D1659:360b-10: zhal bzhi pa dang lha mo mchod chen ma'i sgo nas dga' bzhi'i mchod pa spro ba'o //
T02D1659:360b-11: gzhan yang lha mo rnams kyis khyad par gyi las la bskul ba'i phyir /
T02D1659:360b-12: mi zad gter gyi dbang bskur khyad par bdag la stsal du gsol //
T02D1659:360b-13: khyad par 'di dag thams cad bud med rin chen rnams kyi phyir //
T02D1659:360b-14: zhes pa la sogs pa'i glu dang phan yon dag gsungs pa yin no //
T02D1659:360b-15: dpal rdo rje nyi ma'i phyag rgya chen po'i bshad pa'o //
T02D1659:360b-16: gzhan yang dpal rta mchog rol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya chen po las /
T02D1659:360b-17: dang po spyi yi mtshan nyid ni //
T02D1659:360b-19: rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs //
T02D1659:360b-20: drag shul sbyor bar rnam sbyong dpal //
T02D1659:360b-21: rta yi rgyal po rab tu gnas //
T02D1659:360b-22: dpal rdo rje 'chang chen po las rta mchog gi skur sprul pa'i tshul lo //
T02D1659:360b-23: da ni phyag rgya chen po'i cha lugs las dgongs mdzad kyi rnam pa ni /
T02D1659:360b-24: thams cad dag par mos pa yis //
T02D1659:360b-25: sdig med stobs kyis ngo mthon du //
T02D1659:360b-26: zhes pa la sogs pas lha chen po bzhi'i drags
T02D1659:360b-27: pa gzhom pa'i phyir zhal bzhi'i sgo nas phrin las
T02D1659:360b-28: rnam pa bzhi mnga' bar bstan pa'o //
T02D1659:360b-29: gzhan yang phyag rgya'i cha lugs ni //
T02D1659:360b-30: zhal bzhi pa la phyag bzhi pa //
T02D1659:360b-31: zhabs bzhi pa la rmig pa bzhi //
T02D1659:360b-32: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1659:360b-33: dpung pa bzhi la lag ngar brgyad du gyes pa'o //
T02D1659:360b-34: g-yon pa dag na ni khu tshur gyis sna tshogs padma dang ;
T02D1659:360b-38: g-yas pa dag na ni ba dan gsum pa gyen du bsgreng ba dang /
T02D1659:360b-41: phyag rgya de dag bcings pa'i phan yon ni /
T02D1659:360b-42: phyag rgya 'di yis btab na ni //
T02D1659:360b-43: shin tu ltung bar gyur pa yang //
T02D1659:361a-1: pa la sogs pa ste go sla'o //
T02D1659:361a-2: rdo rje slong ba ni padma sdigs mdzub kyi phyag
T02D1659:361a-3: rgyar bcas pas dregs byed kyi tshogs rnams brgyal zhing
T02D1659:361a-5: de nyid kyi skyil krung ni /
T02D1659:361a-6: g-yas dang g-yon pa'i sbyor ba yis //
T02D1659:361a-7: brkyang bskum pa yi tshul bcas nas //
T02D1659:361a-8: zhes pa la sogs pa ste zhabs g-yas brkyang ba'i
T02D1659:361a-9: dang pos gsum grub ma dang dpal mo mnan pa'o
T02D1659:361a-10: // gnyis pas sgrol ma dang dga' mo mnan pa'o //
T02D1659:361a-11: g-yon bskum pa'i dang pos mig gsum pa dang khyab 'jug mnan pa'o //
T02D1659:361a-12: gnyis pas tshangs pa dang lha'i bu dga' rab dbang phyug mnan pa'o //
T02D1659:361a-13: khro bo gnas pa ni khro bo chen po'i cha lugs kyi brkyang bskum gyis mnan pa'o //
T02D1659:361a-14: de nyid la bskul ba'i glu ni /
T02D1659:361a-15: de nas phyag rgya zhes pa 'di //
T02D1659:361a-16: rta mchog dpal ldan gnas pa'i glu //
T02D1659:361a-17: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1659:361a-18: 'dod pa'i lha mo dag dang chags pa'i tshul gyis gnas shing /
T02D1659:361a-19: glang po che smyon pa 'dod chags kyis myos pa
T02D1659:361a-20: stong bas lhag par gnas pa dag 'dul zhing bde
T02D1659:361a-22: zhal dang po sgeg par bstan pa dang /
T02D1659:361a-23: khyab 'jug zhe sdang gi me bsngo bas gshin rje
T02D1659:361a-24: stong bas 'jigs pa'i mtshan nyid can 'dul ba'i phyir
T02D1659:361a-25: / zhal gnyis pa drag por bstan pa dang /
T02D1659:361a-26: brgya byin zhi ba'i sku tshangs pa stong pas lhag pa'i bzhin dang ldan pa gdul ba'i phyir /
T02D1659:361a-27: zhal gsum pa zhi ba'i tshul du bstan pa dang /
T02D1659:361a-28: thams cad dag par mos pas ngo mthon gyi stobs kyis gdul ba'i phyir /
T02D1659:361a-29: zhal bzhi pa rta'i gdong pa khro gnyer dang bcas
T02D1659:361a-30: pa las dgyes pa'i gad mo pha rol gnon pa'i
T02D1659:361a-31: stobs kyis sgra dang bcas par sgrogs pa'o //
T02D1659:361a-32: gzhan yang zhabs rnam pa bzhi'i sgo nas lha chen
T02D1659:361a-33: po bzhi mnan zhing de dag gi chung ma la
T02D1659:361a-35: de yang dbang phyug chen po'i chung ma ni mig las phyung ba ste /
T02D1659:361a-36: lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis mchod sbyin chen po
T02D1659:361a-37: byed pa'i dus su lha gzhan dag ma bos par
T02D1659:361a-38: sngon du tshogs nas de dag 'dus pa'i rjes la
T02D1659:361a-39: dbang phyug chen po spyan drangs pa las /
T02D1659:361a-40: nga kun gyi mtha' mar bod pa ci nyes zhes
T02D1659:361a-41: te gtum tshig drag por smras shing khros nas dpral
T02D1659:361b-0: ba nas mig lhag pa gcig @361b byung bar mdzad
T02D1659:361b-1: do // des bltas pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi khams su nad rnam par sna tshogs dang /
T02D1659:361b-2: mu ge dang gdug pa'i mtshon cha'i char dang 'khrugs pa la sogs pa mang du spro zhing /
T02D1659:361b-3: 'jig rten gyi khams na skye 'gro kun la gnod par mdzad do //
T02D1659:361b-4: de 'dul ba'i phyir sangs rgyas 'od mtha' yas pa'i
T02D1659:361b-5: skus 'od zer gyi snang ba dpag tu med pa
T02D1659:361b-6: las khro bo mi g-yo mgon po'i sprul pa snang
T02D1659:361b-7: bar mdzad de / lha chen po'i sems rmongs par byas shing /
T02D1659:361b-8: sgo gsum gnon par mdzad pa las zhum pa'i sgo
T02D1659:361b-9: nas mchi ma phyung ba dag rang nyid kyi smon
T02D1659:361b-10: lam gyi mthus lha mo gsum grub par gyur nas
T02D1659:361b-11: / de dang longs spyod pa las rta mchog gi mthus phrogs pa'o //
T02D1659:361b-12: gzhan yang khyab 'jug gis ni nyid kyis smon lam gyi lha mo mngon par sprul pa dang /
T02D1659:361b-13: tshangs pas ni sbyor ba'i mthu las lha mo sprul par mdzad pa dang /
T02D1659:361b-14: dga' rab dbang phyug gis ni me tog gi mdangs
T02D1659:361b-15: gzhan dag gi mdangs bsdus te chags pa'i sems g-yos
T02D1659:361b-16: pas rang nyid kyi mdangs 'phel bar byas pa las
T02D1659:361b-18: de ltar dpal mo dang sgrol ma dang dga' ba mo dag la spyod par mdzad pa'o //
T02D1659:361b-19: de dag gi lo rgyus ni gsung bkod pa'i rgyud las bshad pa'o //
T02D1659:361b-20: ci lha mo 'di dag res 'ga' gdul bya'i dbang
T02D1659:361b-21: gis skyob par mdzad pa dang 'khor du mdzad pa
T02D1659:361b-22: dang / yum du mdzad pa dang zhabs kyis mnan pa dag ni 'gal bar snang ngo zhes /
T02D1659:361b-23: ye shes kyi cho 'phrul chen por ji ltar 'dul
T02D1659:361b-24: ba gzhan thabs sna tshogs kyi sgo nas snang bar
T02D1659:361b-25: bkod pa dang / de nyid gzung ba'i phyir skyon med do //
T02D1659:361b-26: yang lha mo gnyis kyi sgo nas bskul ba'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa gcig gsungs pa las /
T02D1659:361b-27: gang zhig gis gnyen la mdzad par bya ba'i sems dang /
T02D1659:361b-28: dgra la brgal bar bya ba'i sems dag ni rtse gcig pa'i sgo nas 'grub ste /
T02D1659:361b-29: the tshom dang yid gnyis su bcas pas ni de
T02D1659:361b-30: ltar 'grub par 'gyur ba ma yin pa bzhin du
T02D1659:361b-31: theg pa chen po gsang sngags 'di'i sgor 'jug pa'i
T02D1659:361b-32: gang zag gis kyang yid gnyis kyi rtog pa spang
T02D1659:361b-33: bar bya'o // des na rtsa ba'i rgyud las /
T02D1659:361b-34: the tshom gyis ni rmongs par byed //
T02D1659:361b-36: 'jug pa'i gnas skabs mi shes te //
T02D1659:362a-2: gnyis pas ni mdza' ba dang rgol ba dag kyang /
T02D1659:362a-3: 'jig rten gyi bya ba'i sgo nas rtog pa dag ma skyes kyang sla'i //
T02D1659:362a-4: gnyen la chags pa dang dgra la zhe sdang ba'i
T02D1659:362a-5: chos de dag ni skad cig ma'i rnam pa mi
T02D1659:362a-6: brtan pa'i ngo bo bcos pa dang sgyu ma yin
T02D1659:362a-7: pa'i phyir / de la su zhig gis yid brtan par rung ste gnas par mi bya'o //
T02D1659:362a-8: gang zhig lta dang lhag pa'i lha la sems mdzad par byas nas mi 'bral zhing bsgrub pa dang /
T02D1659:362a-9: lam gyi mi mthun pa'i tshogs rnam par rtog pa'i
T02D1659:362a-10: dgra dag la rgol bar byed pa ni yum gyi
T02D1659:362a-11: srid brtan pa'i las la 'jug pa ste yon thams
T02D1659:362a-12: cad kyi 'bras bu la sbyor bar byed pa'o //
T02D1659:362a-13: yang gsum pa'i don gyis 'di ltar lha dang mi
T02D1659:362a-14: la sogs pa dag la gang zhig phan par bya
T02D1659:362a-15: ba dang / gnod par bya ba'i rtog pa gzhi nas ma skyes na sla'i /
T02D1659:362a-16: gal te de dag khas blangs phan chad du ni
T02D1659:362a-17: de'i don sgrub par mi nus pa dag sgyu ma
T02D1659:362a-19: de nyid ni mdza' bo ltar snang ba'am mdza' bo'i
T02D1659:362a-20: gzugs brnyan nam sgyu ma'i mdza' bo yin pa'i phyir
T02D1659:362a-21: / de la mi gdags par mi rigs te /
T02D1659:362a-22: su zhig gis rjod par byed /
T02D1659:362a-23: de ltar yi dam gyi lhag dag la chags sdang
T02D1659:362a-24: zhen rtog gi blo mi mnga' ba'i phyir dngos grub
T02D1659:362a-25: stsol ba dang / mi stsol ba'i rtog pa ga la yod /
T02D1659:362a-26: gal te mnga' ba zhig yin na ni su zhig
T02D1659:362a-27: gis lha zhes brjod de 'os pa ma yin no
T02D1659:362a-28: // de dag gis rigs rnam pa drug gi sgo
T02D1659:362a-29: nas phyag rgya chen po'i mtshan nyid bstan pa yin
T02D1659:362a-30: // te / mnyam par sbyor ba rnam pa drug
T02D1659:362a-31: gi sgo nas las rgya chen po 'grub par mdzad
T02D1659:362a-33: de yang dpal rdo rje sems dpa' ni rigs kun gyi bdag nyid pas /
T02D1659:362a-34: sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor zhes bya ste tshul sna tshogs kyi bya bas 'jug pa'o //
T02D1659:362a-35: dpal rnam par snang mdzad la ni nam mkha' thams cad mnyam par sbyor ba zhes bya ste /
T02D1659:362a-36: chos thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bor sbyor zhing /
T02D1659:362a-37: chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyis khyab par mdzad pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1659:362a-38: dpal he ru ka la ni rdo rje thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba zhes bya ste /
T02D1659:362a-39: sku gsung thugs rdo rje lta bus drag po'i tshogs 'joms shing /
T02D1659:362b-0: @362b me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi snang ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1659:362b-1: dpal padma gar gyi dbang phyug la ni sna tshogs padmo dang mnyam par sbyor ba zhes bya ste /
T02D1659:362b-2: gdul bya'i ji lta ba sna tshogs mkhyen cing chos
T02D1659:362b-3: thams cad rnam par dag pa'i dbyings su sbyor bas
T02D1659:362b-4: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi sul dang ldan
T02D1659:362b-5: pa'o // rdo rje nyi ma la ni rgyal srid
T02D1659:362b-6: thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba zhes bya ste
T02D1659:362b-7: pa'o // / yon tan rgyas pa'i tshogs rnams kyis 'jug pa'i rgyud grol bar mdzad cing /
T02D1659:362b-8: so sor kun du rtog pa'i ye shes kyi tshul dang ldan pas so //
T02D1659:362b-9: rta mchog rol ba la ni las thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba zhes bya ste /
T02D1659:362b-10: lha chen po dag gi rtog pa zhi bar mdzad
T02D1659:362b-11: cing phrin las rnam pa bzhi'i bdag nyid can du
T02D1659:362b-12: bzhugs nas bya ba grub pa'i ye shes kyi tshul
T02D1659:362b-13: gyis thams cad la sbyor ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1659:362b-14: de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las /
T02D1659:362b-15: sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i //
T02D1659:362b-16: rdo rje sems dpa'i lha rnams kyis //
T02D1659:362b-17: sna tshogs cho ga kun gyi tshul //
T02D1659:362b-18: sna tshogs 'gro ba sgrol bar byed //
T02D1659:362b-19: nam mkha' thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i //
T02D1659:362b-20: rnam snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor gyis //
T02D1659:362b-21: shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i tshul //
T02D1659:362b-22: dman rnams lta ba grol bar mdzad //
T02D1659:362b-23: rdo rje thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i //
T02D1659:362b-24: he ru ka yi dkyil 'khor gyis //
T02D1659:362b-25: sku gsung thugs rdo rje yi tshogs //
T02D1659:362b-26: drag po'i mi mthun phyogs 'joms mdzad //
T02D1659:362b-27: sna tshogs padma mnyam sbyor ba'i //
T02D1659:362b-29: sna tshogs dag pa'i chos grub cing //
T02D1659:362b-30: sgro skur rtog pa zhi bar mdzad //
T02D1659:362b-31: rgyal srid thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i //
T02D1659:362b-32: rdo rje nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis //
T02D1659:362b-33: bkod pa'i yon tan 'phel mdzad de //
T02D1659:362b-34: gdungs pa'i las mtha' rnam par grol //
T02D1659:362b-35: sna tshogs dag par mnyam sbyor ba'i //
T02D1659:362b-36: las kun pa yi dkyil 'khor gyis //
T02D1659:362b-37: lha chen drag po'i rgyud 'dul zhing //
T02D1659:362b-38: phrin las stobs kyis thams cad gnon //
T02D1659:362b-40: ; de nyid kyi cho ga'i yan lag ni mdun gyi dkyil 'khor la phyag 'tshal ba dang /
T02D1659:362b-41: mchod pas mnyes par byas nas sngags bzhi'i dgug gzhug byas te /
T02D1659:362b-42: phyag rgya chen po'i sku gsal zhing mnyes par byas nas /
T02D1659:362b-43: de'i rjes la dngos grub bskul ba'i glu blang bar bya'o //
T02D1659:363a-1: dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi sku mdog la sogs pa
T02D1659:363a-2: 'byung ba'i phyag rgya dang po'i don rnam par bshad
T02D1659:363a-3: pa'o // de ltar glus bskul ba'i rjes la /
T02D1659:363a-4: gnyis pa dam tshig gi phyag rgya bstan par bya dgos pa'i phyir /
T02D1659:363a-5: dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya bstan pa las /
T02D1659:363a-6: dang por rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1659:363a-7: mdzub mos mthe bong mnan nas ni / rang gi mthe bos mdzub mo mnan //
T02D1659:363a-8: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs pa la /
T02D1659:363a-9: dang po lag pa gar thabs lan gsum du bsgyur
T02D1659:363a-10: zhing sor mo phan tshun bsnol te rdo rje thal
T02D1659:363a-12: de las yi ge'i 'phro 'dus so so'i dkyil 'khor bstim zhing /
T02D1659:363a-13: dga' chen dpal gyi rdo rje las byung ba'i rdo rje bcings pa gcig tu byas nas /
T02D1659:363a-14: mdzub mos mthe bong rtsa ba mnan te mig gi 'bras bu bzhin bya ba'o //
T02D1659:363a-15: yang de las khu tshur so sor phral te gar thabs su lan gsum du bskor zhing /
T02D1659:363a-16: sor mo'i lhag ma rnams thal mo khong stong du sbyar nas lha so so'i gnas su bstan zhing /
T02D1659:363a-17: gong ma bzhin du so so'i sngags brjod pas sku gsung thugs brtan par byas pa'i //
T02D1659:363a-18: de ltar bcings pa'i phan yon ni go sla ba'i phyir ma bshad do //
T02D1659:363a-19: gzhan yang rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i dkyil
T02D1659:363a-20: 'khor lnga po dag gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya
T02D1659:363a-21: phan yon dang bcas pa rim pa bzhin du bstan
T02D1659:363a-22: pa'i phyir / rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar nas //
T02D1659:363a-23: mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo dgug / ces pa la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D1659:363a-24: de la rnam par snang mdzad kyi ni rdo rje
T02D1659:363a-25: thal mo'i tshul du sor mo bsnol te mdzub mo
T02D1659:363a-26: gnyis kyi rtse mo bkug ste /
T02D1659:363a-27: mthe bong gnyis kyi bar du bcug rgya sngags dang bcas pas brtan par byas nas /
T02D1659:363a-28: de ma thag tu te dpral bar bzhag pas ni bsrung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1659:363a-29: he ru ka'i ni rdo rje thal mo gyen du
T02D1659:363a-30: phye la rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi zhal gnam du
T02D1659:363a-32: gdug par byed pa rnams kyi tshogs za ba la sogs pa'i las rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D1659:363a-33: padma gar dbang gi ni padma'i 'dab ma kha 'byed pa bzhin du byas pa'o //
T02D1659:363a-34: sdig pa sbyang ba'i las la sbyar ro //
T02D1659:363a-35: rdo rje nyi ma'i ni rin po che'i gzugs lta bur byas pas /
T02D1659:363b-0: rang nyid kyi rgyal srid skyong @363b ba'i las la sbyar ro //
T02D1659:363b-1: rta mchog gi ni de nyid kyi phyag rgya ste las thams cad pa'i rgyud la sbyar ro //
T02D1659:363b-2: de dag gi cho ga'i rim pa ni dngos grub
T02D1659:363b-3: bskul ba'i rjes la dam tshig gi phyag rgya sngags
T02D1659:363b-4: dang bcas pas brtan par byas nas /
T02D1659:363b-5: de ma thag tu mchod pa bzhi'i sgo nas gsol ba gdab pa dang /
T02D1659:363b-6: rdo rje glu'i sgo nas gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02D1659:363b-7: des ni bde bar gshegs pa dag dus thams cad du dam tshig las mi 'da' zhing /
T02D1659:363b-8: bdag nyid la dngos grub stsol bar 'gyur te /
T02D1659:363b-9: dam tshig gi phyag rgya zhes pa'i don rnam par bshad pa'o //
T02D1659:363b-10: gsum pa dam tshig chen po'i phyag rgya shis pa ni /
T02D1659:363b-11: rang gi lha dang dus thams cad du sbyor zhing
T02D1659:363b-12: byin rlabs khyad par can gsal bar bya ba'i phyir
T02D1659:363b-13: ro // de yang sku dang gsung dang thugs rnam
T02D1659:363b-14: pa gsum gyi sgo nas shes par bya ba las
T02D1659:363b-15: dang po sbyor ba'i tshul ni /
T02D1659:363b-16: lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yis //
T02D1659:363b-17: mtshan ma'i phyag rgyar ldan byas te ;
T02D1659:363b-18: ; thams cad 'byung ba'i phyag rgya yis //
T02D1659:363b-19: bdag gi lhar ni bdag nyid bya //
T02D1659:363b-20: rnal 'byor pa la sogs pa'i tha mal ba'i lus
T02D1659:363b-21: ngag yid gsum bde bar gshegs pa'i sku gsung thugs
T02D1659:363b-23: gnas gsum du zla ba dang /
T02D1659:363b-24: padma dang nyi ma la gnas pa'i yi ge rnam
T02D1659:363b-25: pa gsum so so'i 'od zer kha dog dang ldan
T02D1659:363b-26: pas / ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad gnas
T02D1659:363b-27: gsum du bsdu zhing sku gsung thugs kyi mtshan ma
T02D1659:363b-28: rnam pa gsum du grub nas /
T02D1659:363b-29: sngags brjod pas bdag dang gnyis su med par grub pa'o //
T02D1659:363b-30: de dag gi phan yon ni /
T02D1659:363b-31: 'dis ni sangs rgyas thams cad dpal //
T02D1659:363b-32: de bzhin dpa' bo thams cad dang //
T02D1659:363b-33: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
T02D1659:363b-34: cho ga'i yan lag ni thog mar rang nyid rigs
T02D1659:363b-35: kyi lha gang yang rung bar bsams nas nus pa
T02D1659:363b-36: bskyed pa'i phyir yan lag byin gyis brlabs pa dang
T02D1659:363b-37: / sgo gsum byin gyis brlab pa dang /
T02D1659:363b-40: gsal bar byas pa'i gnas skyabs su yang 'gro la /
T02D1659:363b-41: rjes su sbyor ba gsum bskyod pa'i rjes la thun
T02D1659:363b-42: mong du lus ngag yid gsum byin gyis brlab pa
T02D1659:364a-0: dang / slob ma dbang bskur ba la sogs pa'i cho ga'i yan lag gzhan la @364a * //
T02D1659:364a-2: de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las /
T02D1659:364a-3: las rnams kun gyi thog ma dang //
T02D1659:364a-4: tha ma la sogs gnas rnams su //
T02D1659:364a-5: sku gsung thugs kyi phyag rgya yis //
T02D1659:364a-6: thams cad byin gyis brlab par bya //
T02D1659:364a-8: de ltar sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig dang ldan pas ni /
T02D1659:364a-9: dngos grub thams cad kyi rten yin pas phyag rgya chen por gyur pa ste /
T02D1659:364a-10: dam tshig chen po'i phyag rgya zhes so //
T02D1659:364a-11: dam tshig chen po'i phyag rgya zhes pa'i don rnam par bshad pa'o //
T02D1659:364a-12: gzhan yang bzhi pa sbyor ba'i phyag rgya la mi
T02D1659:364a-13: gnas pas ni rang gi de kho na nyid gsal
T02D1659:364a-15: lta ba dang bsgom pa thams cad kyi gnas skabs su de nyid shes par bya'o //
T02D1659:364a-16: des na mtshan nyid kyi bye brag dang dmigs pa'i yul dang /
T02D1659:364a-17: sbyor ba'i thabs la sogs pa phyogs gcig tu bstan pa yin te /
T02D1659:364a-19: sbyor ba bzhi yi mtshan nyid kyis //
T02D1659:364a-20: phyag rgyas las kun gnas la 'jug / sngon du 'gro ba'i las can te //
T02D1659:364a-21: rnam grol ye shes skyed par mdzad //
T02D1659:364a-24: dang po rdo rje sems dpa'i ni //
T02D1659:364a-25: rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba //
T02D1659:364a-26: ji lta'i gzugs dang dbyibs su ldan //
T02D1659:364a-27: zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gnyis
T02D1659:364a-28: kyi de nyid kyi tshul yon tan dang bcas pa
T02D1659:364a-30: mtshan ma med pa dang mtshan ma dang bcas pa'i
T02D1659:364a-31: tshul rnam pa gnyis kyis 'jug cing chos thams cad
T02D1659:364a-32: rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo la dkyil 'khor rnam
T02D1659:364a-33: la gnyis kyi tshul du sbyar nas rdo rje sems
T02D1659:364a-34: dpa'i phyag rgyas gnas pas dbang po drug gi snang
T02D1659:364a-35: ba thams cad bde ba chen po'i ye shes zag
T02D1659:364a-36: pa med pa'i rang bzhin du bzhugs par mdzad cing
T02D1659:364a-37: / de dang tshul mthun pa'i sgo nas sbyor ba
T02D1659:364a-38: rnam pa bzhi'i bye brag la sogs pa gsal bar
T02D1659:364a-41: lha mo dag gi khyad par du //
T02D1659:364a-42: sbyor ba'i phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid ni //
T02D1659:364a-43: chags pa med cing ma chags med //
T02D1659:364a-44: dbu mar yang ni dmigs su med //
T02D1659:364a-45: ces pa la sogs pas mtshon bya dang mtshon byed
T02D1659:364a-46: gnyis su med pa'i sgo nas rang rang gi mtshan
T02D1659:364a-47: nyid dang las la sbyor zhing /
T02D1659:364a-48: de'i phan yon dang bcas par bstan pa yin no //
T02D1659:364a-49: yang sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i sgo nas ni /
T02D1659:364b-0: yod pa ma yin med @364b pa min //
T02D1659:364b-1: dbu mar yang ni dmigs su med //
T02D1659:364b-2: ces pa la sogs pa'i don gsungs pa las dang
T02D1659:364b-3: po chos thams cad rnam par dag pa'i tshul bstan
T02D1659:364b-4: pa dang / de'i rang bzhin bstan pa de las sbyor ba'i thabs bstan pa dang /
T02D1659:364b-5: de nyid kyi yon tan dang phrin las kyi sgo nas shes par bya ste /
T02D1659:364b-6: tshigs su bcad pa'i don ni gong du bshad zin la /
T02D1659:364b-7: rigs kyi dkyil 'khor dang sbyar ba ni gsal bar snang bas ma bshad do //
T02D1659:364b-8: sbyor ba'i phyag rgya zhes pa'i don bshad pa'o //
T02D1659:364b-9: da ni lnga pa sbyor ba thams cad kyi phyag rgya zhes pa'i don bshad pa las /
T02D1659:364b-10: dang por rdo rje sems dpa'i sgo nas bstan te /

T02D1659:364b-13: rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi rgya //
T02D1659:364b-14: dngos grub thams cad rab grub pa'o //

T02D1659:364b-18: phrin las dang sbyor ba dag gi las sbyor ba'i phyir /

T02D1659:364b-20: dngos grub thams cad kyi las bsgrub pa la sbyor bar bya'o //

T02D1659:364b-23: bya ba dang ni bzlog pa dang /
T02D1659:364b-24: khyad par du ni dbrog pa dang //

T02D1659:364b-27: sbyor ba thams cad kyi las kyis byang chub kyi sems dbab pa dang /
T02D1659:364b-29: che ba'i yon tan gyis rgyas par mdzad cing las gzhan la yang sbyor te /
T02D1659:364b-30: so so'i bya ba'i las la gzud cing bya ba ma yin pa'i las bzlog pa dang /
T02D1659:364b-31: gzhan gyi yon tan gyi tshogs dag dbrog par mdzad pa'o //
T02D1659:364b-32: de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las /
T02D1659:364b-33: mda' bzhi yongs su 'phangs mdzad nas //
T02D1659:364b-34: gtso bo chags pa'i thugs bskul zhing //
T02D1659:364b-35: byang chub sems sprin dbab pa dang //
T02D1659:364b-36: bzlog la sogs pa'i las dag gis //
T02D1659:364b-37: phrin las sna tshogs spyod mdzad de //
T02D1659:364b-38: bdud bzhi dag las rgyal bar 'gyur //
T02D1659:364b-39: gnyis pa ni ae ma'o bde ba'i sgo nas bha
T02D1659:364b-40: ga dang lingga dag 'dzin cing dbyings dang ye shes
T02D1659:365a-0: kyi phyag rgyas 'o byed 'khyud pa la @365a *
T02D1659:365a-1: // sogs pa'i tshul gyis khams gsum pa dag rgyas

T02D1659:365a-4: bha ga lingga'i mtshan ma yis //
T02D1659:365a-5: bde ba'i gar thabs rgyas 'debs shing //
T02D1659:365a-6: khams gsum pa yi 'jig rten dag / phrin las gsum gyis rnam par spyod //
T02D1659:365a-8: gsum pa ni lha mo snang mdzad ma'i sgo nas
T02D1659:365a-9: snod bcud kyi 'jig rten mtha' dag bdud rtsi longs
T02D1659:365a-10: spyod pho brang dang bcas par byin gyis brlabs te
T02D1659:365a-11: zhal du gsol zhing khams gsum las rgyal ba'i mtshon
T02D1659:365a-12: chas phrin las rnam pa bzhi la sbyor ba'o //
T02D1659:365a-14: stong gsum bhandha bzang khor yug / sbyor ba'i longs spyod bdud rtsis rgyas //
T02D1659:365a-15: rtse gsum mtshon chas khams gsum las //
T02D1659:365a-16: rgyal bar byas te kun spyod pa'o //
T02D1659:365a-18: bzhi pa ni lha mo slob ma mo'i sgo nas
T02D1659:365a-19: bdud rtsi'i snod dag sangs rgyas kyi skus brgyan pa
T02D1659:365a-20: 'dzin zhing / glu dang gar sna tshogs kyi tshul

T02D1659:365a-24: sbyor ba kun gyi bde ba'i rgyas /
T02D1659:365a-25: sangs rgyas sku ldan mtshan ma 'dzin //
T02D1659:365a-26: gar dang glu rnams sna tshogs kyis //
T02D1659:365a-27: rang gi phrin las rnam lngar spyong //

T02D1659:365a-30: gi gtso bo dang rigs kyi lha mo bzhi'i sbyor
T02D1659:365a-31: ba thams cad kyi mtshan nyid bstan te /

T02D1659:365a-33: rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gzhan dag kyang shes par bya'o //
T02D1659:365a-34: cho ga'i rim pa ni sbyor ba sna tshogs kyi

T02D1659:365a-37: sbyor ba thams cad kyi phyag rgya zhes pa'i don bshad pa'o //
T02D1659:365a-38: gzhan yang drug pa bzhin gyi phyag rgya zhes pa las /

T02D1659:365a-46: mi gsal gyi bar du bzhin gyi 'gyur ba'i cha

T02D1659:365b-2: mdzes pa'i bzhin ni rnam par bsgyur //
T02D1659:365b-3: zhes pa la sogs pa la /

T02D1659:365b-5: mdzes pa'i bzhin rnam par bsgyur te rang gi phrin

T02D1659:365b-9: pa ste bud med kyi cha lugs kun gyi mchog
T02D1659:365b-10: blta ba dang / tu gyur pa'o // gzhan yang
T02D1659:365b-11: rnam par snang mdzad pa sogs pa dag gi yang
T02D1659:365b-12: blta ba dang / tu gyur pa'o // bstan pa'i phyir / sangs rgyas byang chub mnyam sbyor ba //
T02D1659:365b-13: rab tu dga' bas lta zhing 'dzum //
T02D1659:365b-14: zhes pa la sogs pa so so'i yon tan dang bcas par bstan pa las /

T02D1659:365b-16: 'khor gyi lha mo sangs rgyas kun brjod ma la

T02D1659:365b-19: gsang ba'i lta ba la gnas pa'o //
T02D1659:365b-20: dpal he ru ka 'khor gyi lha mo dang bcas
T02D1659:365b-21: pa'i pa ni phyag rgya chen po'i gnas skabs nas

T02D1659:365b-23: to // padma gar gyi dbang phyug gi ni steg
T02D1659:365b-24: pa la sogs pa'i tshul bzhi dang ldan pa mdzes

T02D1659:365b-26: to // bcas pa'o // rdo rje nyi ma ni

T02D1659:365b-29: to // bcas pa'o // bya'o // rta mchog gi

T02D1659:365b-41: bzhin gyi phyag rgya zhes don bshad pa'o //

T02D1659:366a-1: kun gyi bde ba'i mchog / mdzes pa'i ma mchu sos mnan pa'i //

T02D1659:366a-7: de yang rdo rje sems dpa'i cha lugs dang ldan
T02D1659:366a-8: pas ma mchu sos mnan cing 'dzum pa'i gnyer ma

T02D1659:366a-11: 'dod chags bde bas g-yem spyo ba //

T02D1659:366a-16: gsum pa ni snang mdzad ma'i'o //

T02D1659:366a-20: 'dzum pa'i phyag rgya mchog ces pa'i don bshad pa'o //

T02D1659:366a-31: bud med mkhas pa sgyu ma'i mchog / mdzes par lta ba'i gar byas pas //

T02D1659:366a-38: zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa bzhi gsungs pa yin te /
T02D1659:366a-39: rnam snang gi zhi ba'i lta ba dang /
T02D1659:366a-40: he ru ka'i khro bo'i lta ba dang /
T02D1659:366a-41: rdo rje nyi ma'i khro 'dzum gyi lta ba dang /
T02D1659:366b-0: @366b padma gar gyi dbang phyug gi chags pa thams cad dbang du mdzad pa'i lta ba'o //
T02D1659:366b-1: 'dir rta mchog ma smos pa ni /
T02D1659:366b-2: las thams cad pa yin pas /
T02D1659:366b-3: gang zhig gi gnas skabs su de nyid kyi lta ba'i lta ba dang tshul dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1659:366b-4: lta ba'i phyag rgya shes pa'i don bshad pa'o //

T02D1659:366b-6: na mo stu sarba buddhe bhya: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1659:366b-7: sku phyag rgya'i sbyor ba la sogs pa la gnas
T02D1659:366b-8: pas lce la padma 'dab ma brgyad pa bsams te
T02D1659:366b-9: / ge sar dang ze 'bru dag las 'od zer 'phro ba'o //
T02D1659:366b-10: de'i dbus su hu'm las gyur ba'i rdo rje dkar
T02D1659:366b-11: dmar rtse mo lnga pa bum pa la yi ge
T02D1659:366b-12: h'um gis mtshan pa bsgoms nas /
T02D1659:366b-13: de las byung ba'i 'od zer gyis phyogs bcur khyab
T02D1659:366b-14: cing bde bar gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang sngags thams
T02D1659:366b-16: yi ge'i tshul du g-yas nas bskor ba'i rim pas /

T02D1659:366b-18: bya'o zhes pa'i tshul du gnas par bsam par bya'o
T02D1659:366b-19: // de ltar bsgom zhing bzlas pa'i mthus rang gi

T02D1659:366b-27: ka'i ni padma la gnas pa'i khro bo'i rdo rje

T02D1659:366b-29: pa la sogs pa'i sngags kyis bskor ba'o //

T02D1659:366b-33: la gnas pa'i rin po che la tr'am la sogs
T02D1659:366b-35: rta mchog gi ni padma la gnas pa'i sna tshogs
T02D1659:366b-36: rdo rje la shr'i badzra la sogs pa'i sngags kyis
T02D1659:366b-37: bskor ba'o // cho ga'i yan lag ni sgo gsum dag par bya ba dang /
T02D1659:366b-38: chos kyi phyag rgyas rgyas gdab pa dang /
T02D1659:366b-39: bzlas brjod dang bstod pa la sogs pa'i las grub par bya ba'i phyir sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D1659:367a-0: chos kyi phyag rgya zhes pa'i don rnam @367a * //
T02D1659:367a-2: yang bcu pa glu'i phyag rgya zhes pa'i don bshad pa las /
T02D1659:367a-3: dang por spyi yi mtshan nyid ni //
T02D1659:367a-4: skad kyi gsang ni mthon dman dang //
T02D1659:367a-5: gre sgyur bcos shing bzlas pa dang //
T02D1659:367a-6: zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa phyed
T02D1659:367a-7: dang gnyis gsungs pa las glu gang yang rung ba
T02D1659:367a-8: dag blang ba'i thog mar rang nyid kyi rigs kyi
T02D1659:367a-9: dkyil 'khor dag gsal bar byas nas /
T02D1659:367a-10: so so'i sngags dang yi ge dang tshigs su bcad pa'i sgo nas dbyangs kyi de'u mthon dman dang /
T02D1659:367a-11: gre 'gyur dang khugs su bcas pas dus gsum du
T02D1659:367a-12: rab tu zhi ba'i lha rnams mtshon par byed pa'i
T02D1659:367a-13: h'um gis sna drangs te bstod pa la sogs pa'i
T02D1659:367a-15: de dag khyad par gyi don du rigs kyi dkyil 'khor rim pa bzhin du ston pa las /
T02D1659:367a-16: h'um gi glu yi phyag rgya dpal //
T02D1659:367a-17: rdo rje sems dpa' rab bsgrub pa'o //
T02D1659:367a-18: zhes pa la sogs pa la /
T02D1659:367a-19: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i ni h'um gi glu ci bde bar len cing /
T02D1659:367a-20: lha mo rnams kyis ni lnga ldan dang drug ldan la sogs pa'i dbyangs brjod pa'o //
T02D1659:367a-21: rnam par snang mdzad kyis ni rig byed kyi smrang
T02D1659:367a-22: 'don pa ltar tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis aom tshar phyed
T02D1659:367a-24: dpal he ru ka'i ni dbyangs drug gi sgo nas

T02D1659:367a-27: padma gar gyi dbang phyug gi ni de'i sgo nas chags pa'i glu dag blang ba'o //
T02D1659:367a-28: rdo rje nyi ma'i ni hi'i sgo nas sbom zhing khugs mnyam pas ring ba dang bcas pa'o //
T02D1659:367a-29: rta mchog gi sgo nas las rnam pa bzhi la so so'i gnas skabs su /
T02D1659:367a-33: drag po'i glu dag blang bar bya'o //

T02D1659:367a-36: glu'i phyag rgya zhes pa'i don rnam par bshad pa'o //

T02D1659:367a-41: zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gsum gsungs pa las /
T02D1659:367b-0: sil snyan gyi rnam pa @367b sna tshogs pa dag sbyang zhing byin gyis brlabs te /
T02D1659:367b-1: rang rang gi lha mo'i tshogs kyis 'dzin pas /
