T02D1659:367b-5: dang rig sngags dag ni phrin las rnam pa bzhi
T02D1659:367b-6: dang / rigs bzhi dang phyag rgya bzhi dang lha mo bzhi la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
T02D1659:367b-7: de dag gi khyad par gyi don du rigs kyi dkyil 'khor rim pa bzhin du bstan pa las /
T02D1659:367b-8: dang por rdo rje sems dpa'i lha mo rnams kyi sgo nas ni /
T02D1659:367b-10: zhes pa las lha mo nang ma dag gis chos
T02D1659:367b-11: kyi sa bon gyis rang gi las la skul bar
T02D1659:367b-12: byed pa'o // ru ta ma ta ni sangs rgyas byang chub ma'i'o //
T02D1659:367b-13: sma ra dha ni chos kyi 'khor lo ma'i'o //
T02D1659:367b-14: hu lu hu lu ni 'jig rten gsum rgyal ma'i'o //
T02D1659:367b-15: pra si tya ni 'dod pa'i lcug ma ma'i'o //
T02D1659:367b-16: takki h'um dza: lha mo dag las rol pa'i tshig go //
T02D1659:367b-22: h'um dza: ni phag gdong ma'i'o //
T02D1659:367b-23: hu lu ni nyi zla ma'i'o //
T02D1659:367b-24: yang hu lu zhes pa ni thal byed ma'i 'o //
T02D1659:367b-25: aa la la la la ho zhes pa ni me tog ma la sogs pa bzhi'i'o //
T02D1659:367b-26: shudhya siddhy'a darsha ya sarban zhes pa las sna tshogs kyi sgo nas bskul ba'o //
T02D1659:367b-27: ta ghendhe zhes pa la sogs pa ni rdo rje sems dpa'i thal mo brdab pa'i sgra skad do //
T02D1659:367b-28: hin don zhes pa la sogs pa ni ma mo rnams kyis thal mo brdab pa'i sgra skad do //
T02D1659:367b-29: ta ghe ghe zhes pa la sogs pa ni bde mchog ma la sogs pa'i rgyun gyi rnga'o //
T02D1659:367b-30: aang aang zhes pa la sogs pa ni rnam par
T02D1659:367b-31: snang mdzad dkyil 'khor rnams kyi dam tshig gsum gyi
T02D1659:367b-32: rnga'o // de kong kong kong kong zhes pa ni koo r'i ma'i'o //
T02D1659:367b-33: dhe badzra badzr'a n+ya ra zhes pa ni zhes pa ni tsoo r'i ma'i'o //
T02D1659:367b-34: yang kong kong kong kong zhes pa ni pra mo h'a'i'o //
T02D1659:367b-35: h'um bhyo bzhi ni be t'a l'i'i'o //
T02D1659:367b-36: ru lu ru lu h'um bhyo ni dpal chen po
T02D1659:367b-37: dang lha mo sma sha n'i'i thun mong gi sngags
T02D1659:367b-38: so // dheng kong kong ni pukka s'i'i 'o //
T02D1659:367b-39: yang kong kong bzhi ni tsanda l'i'i'o //
T02D1659:367b-40: dhe kong kong ni ghasma r'i'i'o //
T02D1659:368a-0: padma zhes pa la sogs pa ni dpal ldan padma @368a * //
T02D1659:368a-1: gar gyi dbang phyug gi sku gsung thugs las bskul ba'o //
T02D1659:368a-2: tr'am tr'am tr'am zhes pa la sogs pa ni rdo
T02D1659:368a-3: rje nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la mtshan gyi sgo nas
T02D1659:368a-4: bskul ba'o // takki ni h'um dzdza: zhes pa la
T02D1659:368a-5: sogs pa'i rta mchog gi las bzhi'i sgo nas bskul
T02D1659:368a-6: bskul ba'o // ba'o // cho ga yan lag ni lha mnyes pa'i don du mchod pa dang /
T02D1659:368a-7: bstod pa'i las la sbyor ba'o //
T02D1659:368a-8: rnga dang sil snyan gyi phyag rgya zhes pa'i don bshad pa'o //
T02D1659:368a-9: da ni bcu gnyis pa gar gyi phyag rgya zhes pa thams cad bsdu ba'i sbyor ba ni /
T02D1659:368a-10: rdo rje sems dpa' bdag sbyor bas //
T02D1659:368a-11: lag gnyis rdo rjer bcings pa yis //
T02D1659:368a-12: zhes pa la sogs pa la /
T02D1659:368a-13: rigs so so'i sbyor ba dang ldan pas rdo rje khu tshur las byung ba'i se gol dang /
T02D1659:368a-14: thal mo dag gi sgras sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drang zhing /
T02D1659:368a-15: de dag gi las la rnam par sbyar ba'o //
T02D1659:368a-16: de la [?] pas ni thabs kyi rang bzhin pas thal mo'i las la sbyar ba yin la /
T02D1659:368a-17: g-yon ni shes rab kyi rang bzhin pas de nyid kyi las la sbyor ba'i sgrar brjod pa'o //
T02D1659:368a-18: da ni gar dgu'i mtshan nyid kyi sgo nas rigs bsdus kyi dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1659:368a-19: sgeg dang dpa' dang snying rje dang /
T02D1659:368a-20: dgong dang khro dang 'jigs pa dang //
T02D1659:368a-21: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1659:368a-22: rigs bsdus kyi dkyil 'khor 'di dag ni rdo rje
T02D1659:368a-23: 'chang chen po nyid kyi sku gsung thugs kyi gar
T02D1659:368a-24: rnam pa dgu las byung ba ste /
T02D1659:368a-25: de yang mu stegs pa'i ma h'a de ba gdul
T02D1659:368a-26: ba'i phyir ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa' lha mo
T02D1659:368a-27: nyi shu'i dkyil 'khor rgyan dang cha lugs kyis mdzes
T02D1659:368a-29: dpa' bo'i lha stobs ldan gdul ba'i phyir ni sangs
T02D1659:368a-30: rgyas rnam par snang mdzad lha mo'i tshogs dang bcas
T02D1659:368a-32: snying rje can gyi lha'i dbang po brgya byin gdul
T02D1659:368a-33: ba'i phyir ni rdo rje 'dzin pa he ru ka'i
T02D1659:368a-35: dgod pa'i gad mo can tshangs pa gdul ba'i don
T02D1659:368a-36: du ni padma gar gyi dbang phyug gi skur bstan
T02D1659:368a-37: pa dang ; ; khro bo bi na ya gdul
T02D1659:368a-38: ba'i don du ni rdo rje nyi mar ston pa
T02D1659:368a-39: pa dang ; dang / 'jigs pa'i gzugs can khyab
T02D1659:368a-40: 'jug gdul ba'i don du ni dpal rta mchog gi
T02D1659:368a-42: mi sdug pa'i gzugs can log 'dren sna yon gdul
T02D1659:368a-43: ba'i don du ni sh'akya thub pa'i skur bstan pa
T02D1659:368b-0: dang / ngo mtshar can sgra gcan @368b 'dzin gdul
T02D1659:368b-1: ba'i don du ni mkha' 'gro ma'i skur ston pa
T02D1659:368b-2: dang / dang / zhi ba'i klu'i rgyal po se
T02D1659:368b-3: sha gdul ba'i don du ni sangs rgyas snang mdzad
T02D1659:368b-5: skye 'gro mtha' dag gi don spyod pa'o //
T02D1659:368b-6: gzhan yang dngos grub kyi tshul bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1659:368b-7: blta bas mi ngoms pa yi gzugs //
T02D1659:368b-8: thams cad bdag nyid ston par mdzad //
T02D1659:368b-9: ces pa la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gnyis gsungs te /
T02D1659:368b-10: bsnyen sgrub kyi dus su sems mngon par goms pa'i
T02D1659:368b-11: mthus nang gi mtshan ma gsal zhing de dang rjes
T02D1659:368b-12: su mthun pa'i bde bar gshegs pa'i byin brlabs yid
T02D1659:368b-13: bzhin gyi nor bu las snang ba bzhin du 'dod
T02D1659:368b-14: pa'i las mtha' dag stsol bar mdzad pa'i phyir /
T02D1659:368b-15: rten gyi dkyil 'khor mtshan dang dpe byad kyis brgyan pa dang sna tshogs su bstan te /
T02D1659:368b-16: blta bas mi ngoms pa'i sku dang /
T02D1659:368b-17: legs so zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshig brjod cing /
T02D1659:368b-18: dngos grub kyi mchog dag stsol bar mdzad nas 'gro
T02D1659:368b-19: ba thams cad kyi re ba skong zhing zag pa
T02D1659:368b-20: med pa'i bde ba ster bar mdzad pa'o //
T02D1659:368b-22: phyag rgya'i sbyor bas mchod pa'i phyir //
T02D1659:368b-23: phyag rgya'i sbyor ba 'di dag gis //
T02D1659:368b-24: rang gi mchod pa rab tu sbyar //
T02D1659:368b-25: zhes pa la sogs pa la /
T02D1659:368b-26: tshogs kyi 'khor lo la sogs pa'i gzhung du bsnyen
T02D1659:368b-27: sgrub kyi yan lag la sbyor ba'i phyag rgya ni
T02D1659:368b-28: rang las sprul pa'i lha mo'i tshogs kyi phyag rgya
T02D1659:368b-29: dang phyag rgya'i lan gyi sgo nas mchod pa rgya
T02D1659:368b-31: de dag gi sbyor ba la gnas par bya'o zhes pa'o //
T02D1659:368b-32: yang rgol ba lan dang bcas pa'i phyag rgya las sna tshogs la sbyar ba'i phyir /
T02D1659:368b-33: kun du sna tshogs skal bzang po //
T02D1659:368b-34: kun du slob dpon bdag nyid bsgyur //
T02D1659:368b-35: zhes pa la sogs pa la rdo rje slob dpon dang /
T02D1659:368b-36: slob ma'i tshogs rnams kyis tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i sngon du 'gro bdag rnam par spyod cing /
T02D1659:368b-37: phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pas bya ba'i las dag rtsom pa'i phyir /
T02D1659:368b-38: phyi dang nang gi mtshams bcad nas las kyi rdo
T02D1659:368b-39: rje dag sgo srung gi khro bor gnas pa las
T02D1659:368b-40: / phyi nas 'jug pa po dag gis phyag rgya dkrol zhing /
T02D1659:368b-41: slar nang nas de dag gi lan bstan par bya zhing /
T02D1659:368b-42: lus dang ngag las byung ba'i brda sna tshogs kyis mtshon zhing rim pa bzhin du 'jug par bya'o //
T02D1659:369a-0: @369a * // de'i rjes la rdo rje slob dpon slob ma'i tshogs brda dang brda'i lan la spyang bar bya ste /
T02D1659:369a-1: rigs drug gi dkyil 'khor dag gi sgo nas so
T02D1659:369a-2: so'i mtshan nyid dang phrin las la sbyar bar bya'o
T02D1659:369a-3: // de'i rjes la rnal 'byor pa gnyis kyis gar
T02D1659:369a-4: stabs dang ldan pa'i sgo nas dang por dpal rdo
T02D1659:369a-5: rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po lha mo so
T02D1659:369a-6: so'i sngags dang phrin las su bcad pa'i sgo nas
T02D1659:369a-7: // gar bsgyur zhing / de'i rjes la rgol bas
T02D1659:369a-8: rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor dag gi phyag
T02D1659:369a-9: rgya sngags dang bcas par rim pa bzhin du 'ching
T02D1659:369a-10: // gar bsgyur zhing / zhing / yang phyir rgol bas he ru ka'i phyag rgya bcings pa dang /
T02D1659:369a-11: de bzhin du padma gar gyi dbang phyug dang /
T02D1659:369a-14: yang rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor gyi bar du
T02D1659:369a-15: rgol ba dang slar rgol pa dag gis phyag rgya
T02D1659:369a-16: rim pa bzhin du bsgyur zhing /
T02D1659:369a-17: de dag rdzogs pa dang bskul ba'i glus so so'i
T02D1659:369a-18: rgyud bskul zhing tshogs kyi mchod pas mnyes par bya'o
T02D1659:369a-19: // de yang dang por bskul ba spyi'i mtshan nyid ni /
T02D1659:369a-20: de nas phyag rgya zhes pa 'di //
T02D1659:369a-21: sdom pa thams cad rab ston pa //
T02D1659:369a-22: zhes pa la sogs pa ni brda dang lan gyi sgo nas dam tshig la gnas par bstan to //
T02D1659:369a-23: glu'i bye brag ni la lar dri med zla ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes pa la sogs pas /
T02D1659:369a-24: rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgo nas bskul ba dang /
T02D1659:369a-25: la lar rab tu 'jigs pa'i zhes pa la sogs
T02D1659:369a-26: pas he ru ka'i sgo nas bskul ba dang la
T02D1659:369a-27: lar mdangs bzang gzi chen zhes pas rdo rje nyi
T02D1659:369a-28: ma'i dkyil 'khor la bskul ba dang /
T02D1659:369a-29: bde dang zhi bar ldan pa rgyal ba'i gzugs su snang //
T02D1659:369a-30: zhes pas rnam snang gi dkyil 'khor la bskul ba dang /
T02D1659:369a-31: la lar 'gro ba thams cad ces pa la sogs
T02D1659:369a-32: pas gar dbang gi dkyil 'khor la bskul ba dang
T02D1659:369a-33: / rdo rje sems dpa' zhes pa la sogs pas
T02D1659:369a-34: rta mchog gi dkyil 'khor la bskul ba dang rnam
T02D1659:369a-35: pa mang po zhes pa la sogs pas lha mo'i
T02D1659:369a-36: tshogs rnams la khyad par gyi glus bskul ba dang
T02D1659:369a-37: / / de dag gi phan yon bstan pa dag
T02D1659:369a-38: ni yi ge'i don go sla ba'i phyir ma bshad
T02D1659:369a-39: / / do // de ltar glus bskul ba'i rjes la tshogs kyi yon bdag dang /
T02D1659:369b-0: gsar du zhugs pa dang pham pa dag gis gzhan rnams rigs kyi @369b dkyil 'khor du bsgoms nas /
T02D1659:369b-1: dbang dang dam tshig gsol ba'i don du bza' ston
T02D1659:369b-2: gyi bye brag gis gzhan dag mchod cing yon dbul
T02D1659:369b-4: de ltar rab tu gar byas te //
T02D1659:369b-5: de las gang zhig pha ma gyur ba //
T02D1659:369b-6: tshogs la da yis tshogs kyi zas //
T02D1659:369b-7: yon dang bcas par dbul par bya //
T02D1659:369b-8: brda dang gar gyi phyag rgyas mtshon pa'i dus su
T02D1659:369b-9: pham par gyur pa gang yin pa dag gis tshogs
T02D1659:369b-10: pa dag la tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i bza' ston bya'o
T02D1659:369b-11: zhes pa'o // de dag gi phan yon ni /
T02D1659:369b-12: mchod pa'i cho ga 'di dag gis //
T02D1659:369b-13: sdig pa kun las thar par 'gyur //
T02D1659:369b-14: zhes pa la sogs pa ste go sla'o //
T02D1659:369b-15: cho ga'i yan lag ni sgrub pa dang tshogs kyi
T02D1659:369b-16: 'khor lo'i dus su rnal 'byor pa dag gzhug pa'i
T02D1659:369b-17: cho ga la sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D1659:369b-18: gar gyi phyag rgya zhes pa'i don rnam par bshad pa'o //
T02D1659:369b-19: da ni bcu gsum pa rdo rje glu'i mchod pas phyag rgya zhes pa las //
T02D1659:369b-20: dang por rdo rje sems dpa' dkyil 'khor gyi lha mo dang bcas pa'i sgo nas /
T02D1659:369b-21: rab tu dga' ba rjes su chags pa dga' ba'i
T02D1659:369b-22: mda' gzhu rab tu phra ba'i rgyas btab pas zhes
T02D1659:369b-23: pa la sgos pa gsungs pa las tshigs su bcad
T02D1659:369b-25: dang por lha rnams kyi yon tan gyi sgo nas bstod pa dang /
T02D1659:369b-26: gnyis pa 'gro ba'i las la bskul ba dang /
T02D1659:369b-27: gsum pa dngos grub kyi don du bskul ba'o //
T02D1659:369b-28: de yang dpal rdo rje sems dpa' ni dga' bde
T02D1659:369b-29: rnam pa gnyis kyi tshul gyis las rnam pa gnyis
T02D1659:369b-30: kyi rjes su chags pa dang /
T02D1659:369b-31: bde mchog mas dga' ba'i mda' gzhus chos nyid phra ba'i don 'bigs shing ;
T02D1659:369b-32: 'gro ba thams cad la rgyas 'debs pa dang /
T02D1659:369b-33: ae ma'o bde ba mos dbyings dang ye shes gnyis
T02D1659:369b-34: su med par bde ba bdag la sgrub pa dang
T02D1659:369b-35: / snang mdzad mos bde ba'i rgyal mtshan bsgreng zhing longs spyod pa dang /
T02D1659:369b-36: slob ma mos dga' ba'i dbang phyug tshe dpag med kyi sku dang bcas par bzhugs pas ni /
T02D1659:369b-37: lha mo rnams kyi yon tan gyis dgyes shing phrin
T02D1659:369b-38: las kyi las dag la rta mchog gi mdzad pa
T02D1659:369b-40: yang lha mo rnams kyi phrin las sna tshogs kyi
T02D1659:369b-41: sgo nas bde mchog mas bde ba'i mchog la rol
T02D1659:369b-42: pa dang / ae ma bde ba mos bde bas slong zhing rnam par rol pa dang /
T02D1659:370a-0: @370a * // snang mdzad mos thugs rtse gcig gis rnam par gsal
T02D1659:370a-1: bar byed cing dga' ba rnam pa bzhi'i las la
T02D1659:370a-2: rol pa dang / slob ma mos de bzhin gshegs
T02D1659:370a-3: pa kun gyi mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i tshul gyis las
T02D1659:370a-4: rol pa dang / mdzad pa'o // yang lha mo
T02D1659:370a-5: bzhi'i dngos grub kyi mchog de lta bu bdag la
T02D1659:370a-7: bde ba'i mchog grub pa dang bde bas bde ba stsol ba dang /
T02D1659:370a-8: dam pa gzhug cing bde bar gyur pa dang /
T02D1659:370a-10: des na dpe'i bde ba bskyod cing de la brten pa'i zag pa med pa'i lam grol ba dang /
T02D1659:370a-11: byang chub kyi sems 'phel zing rgyas pa dang /
T02D1659:370a-12: brtan par gyur pas chos thams cad las rgyal ba dang /
T02D1659:370a-13: bde ba'i gar gyi 'khor lo rtag tu rgyud las 'byung ba'o //
T02D1659:370a-14: de dag gi phan yon ni go sla'o //
T02D1659:370a-15: yang rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gzhan dag gi rdo rje glu'i mchod pa'i phyag rgya las /
T02D1659:370a-16: dang por rnam par snang mdzad kyi sgo nas /
T02D1659:370a-17: rdo rje sems dpa' sdud pa dang //
T02D1659:370a-18: rdo rje rin chen bla na med //
T02D1659:370a-19: rdo rje chos ni gsungs pa dang //
T02D1659:370a-20: rdo rje las ni byed par 'gyur //
T02D1659:370a-21: 'khor lo'i gling bu ma la sogs pa bzhis rang gi phrin las la spyod pa ste /
T02D1659:370a-22: gling bu mas byang chub kyi sems kyis chos thams cad sdud pa dang /
T02D1659:370a-23: pi wang mas yon tan rin po che'i tshogs bla na med par spel ba dang /
T02D1659:370a-24: lha mo rdza rnga mas chos thams cad rnam par dag pa'i gsung sgrogs pa dang /
T02D1659:370a-25: rnga chen mas phrin las rnam par dag pa'i tshogs la sbyor ba'o //
T02D1659:370a-26: des na lha mo rnam pa bzhis bskul ba'i glu
T02D1659:370a-27: 'di dag la thog mar aom brjod cing mthar so
T02D1659:370a-28: so'i sngags dang phyag rgyar ldan pas mchod pa'i las
T02D1659:370a-29: dag bya ste / rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gzhan dag gi gnas skabs su yang sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D1659:370a-30: ci mchod pa thun mong ba 'di rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor du brjod ce na /
T02D1659:370a-31: dkyil 'khor 'di'i sgo nas mchod pa dang bstod pa'i las dag khyad par du byed pa ste /
T02D1659:370a-32: theg pa dman pa dang zhi ba phyogs gcig pa'i
T02D1659:370a-33: mya ngan las 'das pa'i las can dag slong zhing
T02D1659:370a-34: / 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i tshul gyis 'khor ba'i chos thams cad la spyod pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1659:370a-35: de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las /
T02D1659:370a-36: mgon po rnam snang mdzad chen skus //
T02D1659:370b-0: chags pa'i lam chen @370b bsgrub pa'i phyir //
T02D1659:370b-1: 'gog pa'i lam rnams slong mdzad de //
T02D1659:370b-2: sna tshogs mchod dang bstod par mdzad //
T02D1659:370b-4: de'i phyir rnam par snang mdzad kyi gnas skabs su
T02D1659:370b-5: bshad pa'i mchod pa dag ni kun gyi thun mong
T02D1659:370b-7: 'o na rdo rje nyi ma yang rgyal po'i cha
T02D1659:370b-8: lugs su bzhugs shing yon tan rin po che'i mchod
T02D1659:370b-9: pa la spyod do zhe na /
T02D1659:370b-11: khyad par gyi phrin las gzhan mdzad pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1659:370b-12: des na rigs kyi dkyil 'khor drug la khyad par gyi phrin las drug bstan pa yin no //
T02D1659:370b-13: yang he ru ka'i sgo nas h'um rdo rje las kyi mda' gzhu la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1659:370b-14: dpal rdo rje chags pa'i dam tshig la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1659:370b-15: rdo rje kha tv'am ga rab tu 'jigs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1659:370b-16: dpal rdo rje dril bu rab tu 'khrol ba la
T02D1659:370b-17: phyag 'tshal go / zhi gnas lhag mthong zung du
T02D1659:370b-19: chags pa gnyis kyi dam tshig dang mi 'bral ba'i rtags su lha chen po'i g-yang gzhi dang /
T02D1659:370b-20: ye shes rnam pa lnga mtshon par byed pa'i rdo rje rtse mo lnga pa dang /
T02D1659:370b-21: khams gsum las rgyal ba'i rtags su kha tv'am ga rtse mo gsum pa dang /
T02D1659:370b-22: dug gsum dag par byas shing snod bcud cing car
T02D1659:370b-23: du gsol ba'i rtags su sha khrag gis bkang ba'i

T02D1659:371b-1: // mchod pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya zhes pa'i don rnam par bshad pa'o //

T02D1659:371b-9: myos pa ni bu ram gyi chang ngo //

T02D1659:371b-12: de nyid yun ring du lon pa ni 'dod chags sra ba'o //
T02D1659:371b-13: g-yon can ni skyur po'i khu ba'o //

T02D1659:371b-30: lce zhabs su bcangs nas bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02D1659:371b-31: yang bcos pa'i gtor ma ni sems can lnga'i gzugs brnyan byas te /
T02D1659:371b-32: kha ra la sogs pas byug cing shing mngar la

T02D1659:371b-35: brnyan dag / shing shun nam gro ga la sogs

T02D1659:371b-38: de'i 'khor gnas pa dag mnyes par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1659:371b-39: sangs rgyas rnams la bshos dbul ba //

T02D1659:371b-41: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1659:372a-0: rnam par snang mdzad la ni kha na @372a * //
T02D1659:372a-1: mtho ba dag spangs pa'i sha dang chang gi ston mo dang /
T02D1659:372a-2: glu dang sil snyan la sogs pas mchod pa'o //
T02D1659:372a-3: he ru ka la ni skyes bu mtshan dang ldan pa'i sha khrag gi gzugs brnyan dag dbul lo //
T02D1659:372a-5: cho ga'i yan lag ni sbyin sreg dang dkyil 'khor
T02D1659:372a-6: gyi cho ga la sogs pa'i gtor ma'i gnas skabs
T02D1659:372a-8: mchod pa dang gtor ma thams cad kyi phyag rgya zhes pa'i don rnam par bshad pa'o //
T02D1659:372a-9: da ni bcu drug pa phyag rgyas dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya zhes pa las /
T02D1659:372a-10: dang por rdo rje sems dpa' yi //
T02D1659:372a-11: mthe bong sems dpa'i skyil mo krung //
T02D1659:372a-12: mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo dgug / ces pa la sogs pa ste /

T02D1659:372a-14: dbu rgyan gyis dbang bskur ba ste /

T02D1659:372a-36: rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar te /

T02D1659:372a-38: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs so //

T02D1659:372b-3: rdo rje nyi ma'i rin po che'i phyag rgya bcings te tram aa bhi shinytsa m'am zhes pa dang /
T02D1659:372b-4: rta mchog gi ni phrin las gang la bab pa

T02D1659:372b-7: de dag gi phyag rgya bcings pa'i thabs dang phan

T02D1659:372b-35: rdo rje bsdams pa yin par bshad //

T02D1659:373b-35: kho na nyid bsgom pa dang /
T02D1659:373b-36: rten sbyang ba las mtshan ma bsgrub pa dang /
T02D1659:373b-37: ri mo bris pa'i sgo nas tshogs pas bcing bsrung bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1659:373b-38: yi ge 'khor lo'i cho la 'jug par bya'o //
T02D1659:373b-39: de yang bri ba'i dbang du sa gzhi legs par byas la /
T02D1659:374a-0: rdul tshon gyis bri ba dang ras dang shing shun la sogs pa la pir tshon @374a * //
T02D1659:374a-1: gyis bris te zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i
T02D1659:374a-2: 'khor lo'i phreng ba rim pa bdun dang ldan pa
T02D1659:374a-3: la dbus kyi lte bar rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gang
T02D1659:374a-4: yang rung ba'i rtsa ba'i snying po mgo nub tu
T02D1659:374a-5: bstan pa so so'i kha dog bzhin du gnas pa
T02D1659:374a-6: bri'o // de dag gi mu khyud rnams la ni rang rang gi mtshan ma'i phreng bas bskor ba'o //
T02D1659:374a-7: de'i mtha' mar rnal 'byor ba dang /
T02D1659:374a-8: gang bsrung bar 'dod pa'i gsan ba'i ming dang srung sngags bri bar bya'o //
T02D1659:374a-9: nang gi 'khor lo rtse mo brgyad pa la ni shar nas brtsams te /
T02D1659:374a-10: phyogs dang mtshams ma nor bar lha mo so so'i
T02D1659:374a-11: chos kyi snying po yi ge brgyad dag dgod par
T02D1659:374a-12: bya'o ; ; de'i phyi rim 'khor lo rtse mo
T02D1659:374a-13: bcu drug la yi ge brgyad pa shar gyi dang
T02D1659:374a-15: de la thug gi bar du dgod par bya'o //
T02D1659:374a-16: de yang rtse mo dang po ni aom badzra sa tva sa ma ya'o //
T02D1659:374a-17: gnyis par ni ma nu p'a la ya'o //
T02D1659:374a-18: gsum par ni badzra satva tve no pa tishtha'o //
T02D1659:374a-19: bzhi bar ni dridho me bha ba'o /
T02D1659:374a-20: lnga bar ni su toshyo me bha ba'o //
T02D1659:374a-21: drug par ni aa nu rakto me bha ba'o //
T02D1659:374a-22: bdun par ni su po shyo me bha ba'o //
T02D1659:374a-23: brgyad par ni sarba siddhi mme'o //
T02D1659:374a-25: bcu par ni sarba karma su tsa me'o //
T02D1659:374a-26: bcu gcig par ni tsittam shre ya: ku ru'o //
T02D1659:374a-27: bcu gnyis par ni h'um dang ha bzhi dang ho:'o //
T02D1659:374a-28: bcu gsum par ni bha ga w'an no //
T02D1659:374a-29: bcu bzhi par ni sarba ta th'a ga ta'o //
T02D1659:374a-30: bco lnga par ni badzra m'a me munytsa'o //
T02D1659:374a-31: bcu drug par ni badzre bha ba ma h'a sa ma ya satva a'a: zhes pa'o //
T02D1659:374a-32: 'di dag ni rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang du bstan pa ste /
T02D1659:374a-33: rigs gzhan dag gis ni rang gi mtshan gyis bsgyur ba'i gsang sngags gzhan no //
T02D1659:374a-34: 'khor lo'i rtsibs mchan bcu drug pa la ni 'og
T02D1659:374a-35: nas 'byung ba'i rigs so so'i phrin las kyi gsang
T02D1659:374a-36: sngags mtha' rgyan dang bcas par bri'o //
T02D1659:374a-37: de'i phyir rol na sna tshogs rdo rje'i rtse mo
T02D1659:374a-38: bzhi'i ra dbus ma la ni chos kyi snying po
T02D1659:374a-39: dkyil ma dang mthun par 'dri ba las /
T02D1659:374a-40: rnam par snang mdzad kyi ni khyad par du aom mo //
T02D1659:374a-41: sna tshogs rdo rje'i rtsibs mchan bzhir ni khro bo
T02D1659:374a-42: gnod mdzes kyi snying po h'um bzhi dang sbyor ba
T02D1659:374a-44: shar lhor ni aom sum bha ni sum bha h'um zhes pa'o //
T02D1659:374a-45: lho nub tu grihna h'um zhes pa'o //
T02D1659:374a-46: nub byang du du ni grihn'a pa ya grihn'a pa ya h'um zhes pa'o //
T02D1659:374b-0: byang shar du ni a'a na ya @374b ho: bha
T02D1659:374b-1: ga w'an bi dya r'a dza' ya h'um phat ces
T02D1659:374b-2: pa'o // de'i phyir rol mu khyud la phyogs mtshams
T02D1659:374b-3: rim pa bzhin du a'a li bcu drug las gnas
T02D1659:374b-4: re re ru gnyis gnyis dgod pa'o //
T02D1659:374b-5: de'i phyi rol mu khyud la gsal byed kyi yi ge rnams phyogs dang /
T02D1659:374b-6: mtshams su sde ba re re dgong bar bya'o //
T02D1659:374b-7: dbus kyi yi ge ma gtogs pa'i yi ge thams
T02D1659:374b-8: cad ni mgo bo shar nas bstan te bri bar
T02D1659:374b-9: bya'o // mtha' ma'i mu khyud la ni /
T02D1659:374b-10: aom chos rnams thams cad rgyud las byung //
T02D1659:374b-11: de rgyu de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs //
T02D1659:374b-12: rgyu la 'gog pa gang yin pa /
T02D1659:374b-13: dge sbyong chen po 'di skad gsungs //
T02D1659:374b-14: zhes pa'i rjes la sv'a h'a zhes brgyan par bya'o //
T02D1659:374b-15: de'i phyir rtsa ba'i rgyud chen po las kyang 'di dag rgyas par bshad de /
T02D1659:374b-16: gzhung mang po'i tshogs 'dzin pa dag la tshigs bcad kyi don bsdus te bstan pa'o //
T02D1659:374b-17: de lta bu'i 'khor lo bris nas mchod pa dang
T02D1659:374b-18: bsgoms pas ni 'go gnas brjod pa'i yon tan dag
T02D1659:374b-20: de yang tshon sna tshogs dang gru gum la sogs
T02D1659:374b-21: pa'i dri sna tshogs bzang po'i brgyan cing mchod pa'i
T02D1659:374b-22: tshogs rgya chen po bshams nas /
T02D1659:374b-23: rigs kyi dkyil 'khor dgug gzhug byas te rab tu gnas pa'i tshal gyis gnyis su med par pa'o //
T02D1659:374b-24: de la yi ge'i don ni gang zhig a'a li
T02D1659:374b-25: k'a li ni thabs dang shes rab mtshon pa'i rtogs
T02D1659:374b-26: su byung bas / 'od kyi skud pa dang bcas
T02D1659:374b-27: par mnyam zhing mtshungs pa'i phreng ba gnyis su bya
T02D1659:374b-28: su byung bas / zhing / shar phyos kyi kha'i
T02D1659:374b-29: thad kar mgo mjug gi rtse mo mdud par bya'o
T02D1659:374b-30: su byung bas / zhing / // de dag bsgom
T02D1659:374b-31: pa'i dus su ni snying gar gnas pas yi ge'i
T02D1659:374b-32: sbyor mtshams kha'i thad kar mdud pa yin la /
T02D1659:374b-33: rten la sgrub pa'i dus su yang rnal 'byor pa'i mdun drang por bstan pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1659:374b-34: de ltar yi ge sna tshogs bkod pa'i sgo nas yi ge thams cad dgod par bya'o //
T02D1659:374b-35: de dag ni thun mong gi cho gar bstan pa ste /
T02D1659:374b-36: gang zag rnam pa gsum gyi sgo nas rigs kyi dkyil 'khor spyi'i don du shes par bya'o //
T02D1659:374b-37: da ni khyad par gyi mtshan nyid las rigs drug
T02D1659:374b-38: gi dkyil 'khor rim pa bzhin du bstan pa'i phyir
T02D1659:374b-39: / rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi lha'i //
T02D1659:375a-2: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1659:375a-3: rdo rje sems dpa'i sgo nas gzhan bsrung zhing sdig pa sbyang bar bya ba dang /
T02D1659:375a-4: bdag nyid kyis dngos grub la sbyor ba'i dus su 'khor lo'i bye brag gnyis bstan te //
T02D1659:375a-5: 'khor lo'i rtsibs mchan bcu drug la gnas pa'i sngags dang mtha' rgyan dag bsgyur ba'i sgo nas so //
T02D1659:375a-6: de bzhin du sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad la
T02D1659:375a-7: sogs pa'i 'khor lo dag kyang shes par bya bya
T02D1659:375a-8: ste go sla ba'i phyir ma bshad do //
T02D1659:375a-9: gang dag bris shing brjod pa'i khyad par gyi phan yon ni //
T02D1659:375a-10: bris na bsod nams che ba ltar //
T02D1659:375a-11: brjod pa dag kyang de bzhin te //
T02D1659:375a-12: las kyi dngos grub rab 'byam dag / ma lus par ni myur du 'grub //
T02D1659:375a-13: gang nas 'byung ba bzhin du sgom pa dang /
T02D1659:375a-14: sgrub pa mi nus pa dag gis sngags brjod pas kyang las thams cad la sbyor bar byed do //
T02D1659:375a-15: gang zhig gis yi dam gyi lha dang bla ma dag gi mtshan brjod pa'i tshul ni /
T02D1659:375a-16: lhag pa'i lha ni gang gis //
T02D1659:375a-17: slob dpon gang dang gang yin pa /
T02D1659:375a-18: de dang de yi mtshan dag ni //
T02D1659:375a-19: dpal gyi tshig dang ldan par brjod //
T02D1659:375a-20: de dag la ma gus pa spang ba'i don du
T02D1659:375a-21: gnas dang yon tan gyi sgo nas dpal gyi zhabs
T02D1659:375a-23: yang gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor dang /
T02D1659:375a-24: tshogs kyi 'khor lo dang sbyor ba'i 'di dag tsam gyi sgo nas dbang bskur ba'i don du //
T02D1659:375a-25: slob ma dkyil 'khor bcu gnas kyang //
T02D1659:375a-26: yon gyi mchog dag blangs nas ni //
T02D1659:375a-27: rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur bas //
T02D1659:375a-28: de bzhin gshegs par de lung bstan //
T02D1659:375a-30: gnyis par ni yi dam dam lha'i sngags blang ba'i
T02D1659:375a-31: don du gnas dben par mandala legs par byugs te
T02D1659:375a-32: / rdo rgyus kyi phye mas ae gru gsum dkar
T02D1659:375a-33: po la gnas pa'i padma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad
T02D1659:375a-34: / bri bar bya'o // de la dbyangs dang gsal byed kyi yi ge dag dgod de //
T02D1659:375a-35: dbus su ni ksha mgo nub tu bstan pa'o //
T02D1659:375a-36: 'dab ma brgyad la ni shar nas brtsams te /
T02D1659:375a-39: ta log gi sde tshan dang /
T02D1659:375a-40: ta drang gi sde tshan dang /
T02D1659:375a-43: a'a li'i sde tshan dag bri bar bya'o //
T02D1659:375b-0: de'i mtha' mar mchod pa'i tshogs dang gtor ma'i tshogs dang @375b rgyan thams cad bkram zhing /
T02D1659:375b-1: de dag sbyangs nas slar byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D1659:375b-2: de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis sngon du 'gro ba'i las dag dang /
T02D1659:375b-3: bsod nams kyi tshogs bsags pa dang /
T02D1659:375b-4: srung ba'i 'khor lo bsgom pa dang /
T02D1659:375b-5: gzhi rten sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
T02D1659:375b-6: dmigs pa gsum gyi las kyis ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor rnams dgug gzhug bya ste /
T02D1659:375b-7: sngags kyi rnam pas bstims nas mnyes par gyur ba dang /
T02D1659:375b-8: yi dam gyi lha'i snying po btu bar bya ste /
T02D1659:375b-9: mandala gyi mtha' mar rdo rgyus kyi bris nas slob ma klog tu gzhug go //
T02D1659:375b-10: de nas bde bar gshegs pa'i byin rlabs dang /
T02D1659:375b-11: sngags kyi rnam pa de nyid kyi rgyud la dbab pa byas nas /
T02D1659:375b-12: yi ge brgya pas brtan par bya zhing las mthar phyin par bya'o //
T02D1659:375b-13: de dag gi rjes la gtor ma'i cho gas mgron
T02D1659:375b-14: rnams mnyes par byas nas bkra shis kyi cho ga
T02D1659:375b-15: brjod par bya'o // de'i phan yon ni /
T02D1659:375b-16: phyag rgya'i sbyor ba 'di dag gis ;
T02D1659:375b-17: ; byang chub snying po'i bar du ni //
T02D1659:375b-18: rdo rje ming du rab tu gnas //
T02D1659:375b-19: de nas sangs rgyas su yang 'gyur //
T02D1659:375b-21: cho ga'i yan lag ni tshogs bsags pa dang /
T02D1659:375b-23: dngos grub kyi las kyi las thams cad la sbyor ba dang /
T02D1659:375b-25: gsang sngags blang bdag gi dus su cho ga'i yan
T02D1659:375b-26: lag sngon du 'gro ba dag dang ldan pas 'di
T02D1659:375b-27: nyid brtsam par bya'o zhes pa'o //
T02D1659:375b-28: bstod pa dang bcas pa'i ming gi phyag rgya zhes pa'i don rnam par bshad pa'o //
T02D1659:375b-29: da ni bcu dgu pa brda'i phyag rgya zhes pa las /
T02D1659:375b-30: dang por lus kyi brda dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i sgo nas phyag btsal ba'i phyir //
T02D1659:375b-31: spyi bor nyug pa gang yin pa //
T02D1659:375b-32: phyag 'tshal bar ni bstan pa ni //
T02D1659:375b-33: dpral bar reg par byed pa ni //
T02D1659:375b-34: phyag lan yin par shes par bya //
T02D1659:375b-35: dur khrod la sogs pa'i gnas su rnal 'byor pa nang par tshogs pa'i tshe /
T02D1659:375b-36: sgo gang nas 'jug pa la sogs pa'i tshul dang //
T02D1659:375b-37: phyi nang gi mtshan ma ngo shes par bya ba dang /
T02D1659:375b-38: tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i gnas su rnal 'byor pa gcig la gcig gis dam tshig brtag pa dang /
T02D1659:375b-39: sgrub pa dang phrin las kyi dus su gsang ba'i brda la gnas shing /
T02D1659:376a-0: tha mal pa'i lus kyi spyod pas bar chad du mi 'gyur ba'i @376a * //
T02D1659:376a-2: rdo rje slob dpon dang slob mar bcas pa thams
T02D1659:376a-3: cad kyi tshul 'di nyid kyis 'jug par bya ste
T02D1659:376a-4: / phyag 'tshal ba'i dus su ni spyi gtsug sa la gtugs pa ste der nyug pa'o //
T02D1659:376a-5: phyag lan gyi dus su dga' ba'i mdangs kyis dpral pa gyen du 'degs pa'o //
T02D1659:376a-6: yang smin ma la sogs pa'i lus kyi yan lag dang /
T02D1659:376a-7: nying lag la sogs pa kun gyi sgo nas bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1659:376a-8: smin ma bskul ba gang yin pa //
T02D1659:376a-9: sangs rgyas thams cad gnas pa'i brda //
T02D1659:376a-10: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1659:376a-11: smin ma g-yas pa dang g-yon pa dag gi bye
T02D1659:376a-12: brag gi lha yab yum gyi ngo bor gnas pa
T02D1659:376a-13: yin zhes pas / g-yas pa gyen du bteg pa ni nam mkha' la blta ba ste /
T02D1659:376a-14: de dang tshul mthun pa'i mkha' 'gro ma'i dngos grub thob ces pa'o //
T02D1659:376a-15: g-yon pa bteg pa ni 'jig rten gsum gyi dngos
T02D1659:376a-16: grub mtha' dag la sbyor zhing de dag zil gyis
T02D1659:376a-17: mnan pa'o // mig g-yon pa bsgyur bas shes rab kyi brda ste bud med mtshon pa'o //
T02D1659:376a-18: g-yas pa thabs kyi brda ste skyes pa mtshon pa'o //
T02D1659:376a-19: rna ba g-yon pa'i sgo nas shes rab kyi glu snyan pa'i dbyangs nyan pa dang /
T02D1659:376a-20: g-yas pa thabs kyi tshig legs par brjod pa'o //
T02D1659:376a-21: sna bug g-yas pa thabs kyi sgo nas 'dug pa slong ba dang /
T02D1659:376a-22: g-yon pa'i sgo nas shes rab kyi dri de las gzhan dag slong ba'o //
T02D1659:376a-23: lce g-yas dang g-yon par nyug pa ni gtum pa'i sha dang /
T02D1659:376a-25: mche ba g-yas pas ma mchu mnan pa ni thabs
T02D1659:376a-26: kyi mtshan mas skyes par 'gyur la g-yon pa shes
T02D1659:376a-27: rab kyi brdas ni bud med do //
T02D1659:376a-28: lkog ma ni dam pa'i chos thams cad brjod pa'i
T02D1659:376a-29: sgra'i gnas te rtog pa thams cad kyi don mtshon
T02D1659:376a-30: par byed pa'o // snying ga ni gsang ba'i mdzod rang byung gi ye shes kyi gnas yin pas /
T02D1659:376a-31: de nyid nas mdzub mos 'dren pa ltar byed pa ni rdo rje theg pa'i don ston cing /
T02D1659:376a-32: 'khor ba'i chos thams cad byang chub chen po'i lam du sbyor bar byed pa'o //
T02D1659:376a-33: lte ba ni lus kyi dkyil du gyur pas mtha'
T02D1659:376a-34: thams cad dang bral ba'i dbu ma'i don sgrub cing
T02D1659:376a-35: ye shes kyi 'khor lo las chos sna tshogs kyi
T02D1659:376a-36: don ston cing bskor bar mdzad pa'o //
T02D1659:376a-37: dbang po 'greng ba ni rang byung /
T02D1659:376b-0: @376b gi ye shes chen po'i bde ba las byung
T02D1659:376b-1: ba'i bde ba chen po'i sku mtshon par byed pa'o
T02D1659:376b-2: // phrag pa g-yas pas ni 'gugs pa'i don du bskul zhing /
T02D1659:376b-3: g-yon pas ni slar gtong bar byed pa'o //
T02D1659:376b-4: dpung pa g-yas g-yon dag gis bdag la 'khyud pa las thams cad 'grub pa dang /
T02D1659:376b-5: de las khyad par du gyur ba'i che ba'i yon tan gyi dbang phyug thams cad 'grub pa'o //
T02D1659:376b-6: khu tshur g-yas pa bcings pas ni gang yang rung ba dag bcings shing /
T02D1659:376b-7: g-yon pa bkrol bas ni de dag slar thong shig pa'o //
T02D1659:376b-8: brla g-yas pas ni 'dod pa'i bya ba la sbyor zhing /
T02D1659:376b-9: g-yon pas chos sna tshogs la sbyor ba'o //
T02D1659:376b-10: pus mo g-yon pas ni 'dud pa tsam yin la /
T02D1659:376b-11: g-yas pas ni dga' zhing dang ba'i sgo nas phyag 'tshal ba dang /
T02D1659:376b-12: yang g-yas pa dang g-yon pas bya ba'i las thams cad 'ching ba dang /
T02D1659:376b-14: rkang pa g-yon pa shes rab kyi tshul gyis gnon cing /
T02D1659:376b-15: g-yas pa thabs kyis ni de dag 'joms par mdzad pa'o //
T02D1659:376b-16: de dag gi phan yon ni go sla'o //
T02D1659:376b-17: des ni lus kyi yan lag dang nying lag gi
T02D1659:376b-18: sgo nas brda'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bstan pa'o
T02D1659:376b-19: // da ni ngag gi brda las phyag 'tshal ba dang /
T02D1659:376b-21: aom aa ti pu zhes pa'i brda 'di ni phyag 'tshal zhes bstan pa'o //
T02D1659:376b-22: pra ti pu zhes pa ni phyag lan yin par shes par bya'o //
T02D1659:376b-23: rigs so so'i dkyil 'khor du rang rang gi sngags
T02D1659:376b-24: kyis mtshon zhing gus pa'i sgo nas tshig brjod pa
T02D1659:376b-25: dang / dgyes pa'i sgo nas lan brjod par bya'o //
T02D1659:376b-26: de dag ni spyir bstan pa ste ;
T02D1659:376b-27: khyad par gyi don rgyas par bshad pa ni rtsa ba'i rgyud las 'byung ba dag ste /
T02D1659:376b-28: tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho gar bsdus shing gsal bar byas pa yin no //
T02D1659:376b-29: da ni dkyil 'khor gyi mtshan nyid kyi brda las /
T02D1659:376b-30: dang por rdo rje sems dpa' ni //
T02D1659:376b-31: sems dpa' sngon dang mtha' med pa //
T02D1659:376b-32: rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog / ces pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1659:376b-33: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' ni 'khor ba'i thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i dus su byung zhing /
T02D1659:376b-34: chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang 'byung gnas bde ba chen po'i skur gnas pa'o //
T02D1659:376b-36: thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni //
T02D1659:377a-1: sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog / byang chub sems mchog gtso bo'i gtso //
T02D1659:377a-2: kun du bzang po'i kun bdag nyid //
T02D1659:377a-3: ces dpal mchog dang po'i rgyud las kyang gsungs so //
T02D1659:377a-4: de nyid ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos dang ldan pas ae ma bde zhes bya ste /
T02D1659:377a-5: de nyid dpal dang ldan pa'i sgras brjod na sdig
T02D1659:377a-6: pa thams cad las thar zhing bde ba thams cad
T02D1659:377a-8: da ni dkyil 'khor gyi lha mo rnams kyi rim pa bzhin du bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1659:377a-9: bde mchog ae ma'o bde ba dang //
T02D1659:377a-10: sgron ma de bzhin shi shi dag / ces pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1659:377a-11: rang nyid kyi che ba'i yon tan ye shes bzhi'i
T02D1659:377a-12: snang ba rigs rnam pa bzhi'i bde bar gshegs pa
T02D1659:377a-13: dag ni lha mo bzhi'i mtshan mar gnas te /
T02D1659:377a-14: de dag dang mi 'bral zhing rtag tu gnas pa'i sgo nas gsang ba'i lha mo bzhi zhes te /
T02D1659:377a-15: phung po rnam pa lnga dang /
T02D1659:377a-16: nyon mongs pa lnga po rnam par 'dzad pa'i phyir /
T02D1659:377a-17: rgyas 'debs ma dang rmongs byed ma dang /
T02D1659:377a-18: zab mo dang tshe 'phel mo zhes brdar bstan pa'o //
T02D1659:377a-19: byang chub kyi sems rnam pa bzhi rnam par dag
T02D1659:377a-20: pa'i mtshan nyid ye shes kyi dmigs pa'i yul du
T02D1659:377a-21: snang ba rigs kyi yum bzhi dag ni sangs rgyas
T02D1659:377a-22: byang chub ma la sogs pa'i brdas bstan pa'o ;
T02D1659:377a-23: / thabs mkhas pa'i tshad med pa bzhi'i mdzad spyod
T02D1659:377a-24: kyi snang ba dag la rta gdong ma la sogs
T02D1659:377a-26: dga' ba las byung ba'i phyag rgya chen po'i byang chub sems rnam pa bzhi dang /
T02D1659:377a-27: zag pa med pa'i phung po lnga mtshan pa'i brdar ni nang gi mchod pa'i lha mo bzhi dang ;
T02D1659:377a-28: phyi'i lha mo bzhi dag bstan pa'o //
T02D1659:377a-29: dkyil 'khor gyi mtshan rgya chen po'i brdas ni sna tshogs pa'i don mtshon par byed pa ste /
T02D1659:377a-30: nyid kyi snang ba'i yon tan rang las byung ba tshogs ma lus pa rnams so //
T02D1659:377a-31: yang gsang ba'i lha mo bzhi'i phyag mtshan gyi brda ni /
T02D1659:377a-32: smin ma bskyod pa brda bzhi yin //
T02D1659:377a-33: bha ga lingga ae ma'o bde //
T02D1659:377a-34: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1659:377a-35: chags pa'i sgo nas me tog gi mda' 'phen pa dang /
T02D1659:377a-36: smin ma bskyod pa'i lta ba dag chos mthun te /
T02D1659:377a-37: bde ba byang chub kyi sems kyi ngo bo la
T02D1659:377a-38: dga' ba rnam pa bzhis gnas pa'i brdar 'gyur ba'o
T02D1659:377b-0: // bha @377b ga dang linggas ni lus dang sems
T02D1659:377b-1: kyi bde ba chen po dag bskyed pa'i brdar gyur
T02D1659:377b-2: // ba'o // thod pa ni padmo dang chos mthun
T02D1659:377b-3: zhing rnam par dag pa'i don ston par byed la
T02D1659:377b-4: // ba'o // / des ni 'khor ba'i snod bcud
T02D1659:377b-5: thams cad la spyod kyang de nyid dang tshul mthun
T02D1659:377b-6: // ba'o // / par gnas shing / khams gsum
T02D1659:377b-7: las rgyal nas bsnyems pa mi mnga' ba'i rtags su
T02D1659:377b-8: thong pa bdud rtsi si bkang ba dang /
T02D1659:377b-9: kha tv'am ga byung ba yin no //
T02D1659:377b-10: bde ba byang chub kyi sems kyi bdud rtsis skye
T02D1659:377b-11: 'gro mtha' dag 'dzin cing 'chi ba med pa'i skur
T02D1659:377b-12: bsgrub pa'i phyir thod pa sangs rgyas kyi sku dang
T02D1659:377b-13: bcas par bstan pa yin no //
T02D1659:377b-14: da ni dkyil 'khor gyi nges tshig bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1659:377b-16: de nyid dam tshig yin par bshad //
T02D1659:377b-18: mtshon cha'i 'khor lo dag ni chos dang las mthun te /
T02D1659:377b-19: tshogs pa dang gcod pa dang bsrung ba dang myur ba dang gzhan dag 'jigs par mdzad pa'o //
T02D1659:377b-20: de nyid ni mi 'dra ba'i sgo nas rang bzhin gyi chos su gnas pa'o //
T02D1659:377b-21: yang tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i nges tshig ni /
T02D1659:377b-22: lha rnams thams cad tshogs pas na //
T02D1659:377b-23: skye bo dam pa kun tshogs pa //
T02D1659:377b-24: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1659:377b-25: phun sum tshogs pa bzhi dang bkod pa bdun dang /
T02D1659:377b-26: mdza' pa mtha' dag 'dus pa'i sgo nas bstan pa'o //
T02D1659:377b-27: da ni rten gyi mtshan nyid las rdo rje rgyal po dang /
T02D1659:377b-28: rgyal theb dang las mkhan la sogs pa dag gi mtshan nyid rim pa bzhin du bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1659:377b-29: lha mo thams cad kun 'dus pas //
T02D1659:377b-30: thams cad sna tshogs skal ba bzang //
T02D1659:377b-31: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1659:377b-32: rdo rje rgyal po ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa'
T02D1659:377b-33: dang gnyis su med par bzhugs pa'i rnam pa can
T02D1659:377b-34: te / lha mo thams cad kyi longs spyod thams cad dang /
T02D1659:377b-35: 'dod pa'i gnas thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas su gyur
T02D1659:377b-36: pa shes bya thams cad la ma rmongs pa'i thams
T02D1659:377b-37: cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes can rtag tu 'gro ba'i
T02D1659:377b-38: don rnam par spyod pa la brtson pa'o //
T02D1659:377b-39: rgyal theb ni de nyid rjes su slob cing las
T02D1659:377b-40: dang bya ba thams cad gsal bar shes shing sgrub
T02D1659:377b-41: pa dang / cho ga'i yan lag kun dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1659:378a-0: las kyi rdo rje ni phrin las phyogs gcig nyams su lon @378a * //
T02D1659:378a-2: brtson 'grus shes rab kyi grogs dang ldan zhing rab 'bring tha ma gsum gyi skal ba can no //
T02D1659:378a-3: de dag gis ni rten gyi gang zag gi mtshan nyid bstan pa yin no //
T02D1659:378a-4: da ni dbang bskur ba'i brda bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1659:378a-5: sangs rgyas thams cad rin chen mchog / dbu rgyan mi 'gyur dam pa ni //
T02D1659:378a-6: zhes pa la sogs pa ste rigs kyi dkyil 'khor
T02D1659:378a-7: rnam pa lnga yon tan gyi rgyal srid dang bcas
T02D1659:378a-8: par mtshon pa'i brdar ni rin po che lnga las
T02D1659:378a-9: grub pa'i dbu rgyan rtse mo lnga pa dang ye
T02D1659:378a-10: shes drug dang pha rol du phyin pa drug gis
T02D1659:378a-11: mtshon pa'i brdar ni thod pa'i phreng ba dang /
T02D1659:378a-12: drug pa rdo rje 'chang chen po dang ldan pa'i
T02D1659:378a-13: brdar ni sangs rgyas gtsug gi nor bus mtshon pa'o
T02D1659:378a-14: // yang rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i rigs
T02D1659:378a-15: kyi dkyil 'khor gzhan dag gi rang bzhin nyid kyi
T02D1659:378a-16: // rigs dang / ye shes dang yon tan dang
T02D1659:378a-17: mdzad pa'i tshogs dag mtshon pa'i rtags su sangs rgyas
T02D1659:378a-18: rang bzhin grub pa gcig dang /
T02D1659:378a-19: de bzhin padmo'i rang bzhin gcig / thams cad dbang bskur dbang bskur che //
T02D1659:378a-20: yin par don kun grub par gsungs //
T02D1659:378a-21: rigs so so'i dbu rgyan gong nas gsungs pa lta
T02D1659:378a-22: bur bstan pas de kho na nyid kyi brda grol
T02D1659:378a-23: bar mdzad pa'o // gzhan yang yon gyi rim pa ni /
T02D1659:378a-24: nor gyi dbyig tu bshad pa ste //
T02D1659:378a-25: snying yang nor gyi mchog yin pas //
T02D1659:378a-26: sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgyas bshad //
T02D1659:378a-27: yin rab 'bring rnam gsum las mchog tu gyur pa
T02D1659:378a-28: ni dad pa dang ldan zhing sems gdung bas bka'
T02D1659:378a-29: bzhin bsgrub pa'o // yang tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du sgrub pa'i rdzas ni /
T02D1659:378a-30: ga pur tsandan dmar po dang //
T02D1659:378a-31: sbyar ba khrag chen yin par bshad //
T02D1659:378a-32: ces pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1659:378a-33: tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga dang /
T02D1659:378a-34: chags pa chen po'i mtshan ma dang mchod pa'i rdzas
T02D1659:378a-35: rigs rnam pa drug gi longs spyod kyi rkyen du
T02D1659:378a-36: gyur pa kun du bsdus shing dbul bar bya'o //
T02D1659:378a-37: des ni mchod pa'i dus su phyi nang gsang ba'i
T02D1659:378a-38: tshul gyi de kho na nyid kyi don ston cing
T02D1659:378a-39: / rang rang gi mtshan nyid mtshon pa dang /
T02D1659:378a-40: dkyil 'khor gyi mtshon nyid mnyes par mdzad pa'o //
T02D1659:378a-41: da ni dam tshig gi brda bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1659:378b-0: @378b de nas grub pa'i mna' bsgag pa //
T02D1659:378b-1: dam tshig ces par bshad pa'o //
T02D1659:378b-2: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1659:378b-3: dkyil 'khor du zhugs shing dbang thob nas sdom pa'i
T02D1659:378b-4: rim pa dag / ji ltar mna' dang dam tshig
T02D1659:378b-5: tu khas blangs pa bzhin du gnas shing /
T02D1659:378b-7: lha mo bzhi'i don gyi sgo nas sgrub pa'i de
T02D1659:378b-8: bzhin nyid dag shes pa'i sgo nas nyams su blang
T02D1659:378b-9: ba'o // yang phyag rgya'i brda ni /
T02D1659:378b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis kyang //
T02D1659:378b-11: 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pas //
T02D1659:378b-12: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1659:378b-13: sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya dag
T02D1659:378b-14: ni rnal 'byor bas dus thams cad du bsgom zhing
T02D1659:378b-15: bsgrub pa dang / bde bar gshegs pas kyang de nyid la rgyas 'debs pa'i phyir /
T02D1659:378b-16: sku gsung thugs kyi phyag rgya la sbyor bar gyur pa ni dam tshig gi mchog ste /
T02D1659:378b-17: de nas sbyor ba dang phyag rgya dang dam tshig dag gi tshul gcig pa'i las can de /
T02D1659:378b-18: sna tshogs gcig gi ngo bo la sbyor bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1659:378b-19: yang mchod pa'i sgo nas brda bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1659:378b-20: de yi nye ba'i longs spyod ni //
T02D1659:378b-21: khams gsum thams cad ma lus pa'o //
T02D1659:378b-22: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1659:378b-23: rigs kyi dkyil 'khor du gsal ba'i sbyor bas phyi
T02D1659:378b-24: nang snod bcud kyi snang srid mtha' dag lha dang
T02D1659:378b-25: lha mo'i dkyil 'khor du bsgom zhing de las byung
T02D1659:378b-26: ba'i snang ba mtha' dag ni mchod pa'i tshogs su
T02D1659:378b-28: de yang ji lta bu'i rnam pa can zhe na /
T02D1659:378b-29: 'dod pa'i yon tan rnam pa drug ste /
T02D1659:378b-30: rang gi longs spyod kyis rang nyid mchod pa'i brdar gyur pa yin no //
T02D1659:378b-31: de yang kha dog dang dbyibs kyi rnam pa dag ni gzugs kyi lha mo'o //
T02D1659:378b-32: sgra'i bye brag sna tshos par grag pa dag ni sgra'i lha mo'o //
T02D1659:378b-33: dri zhim par byed pa'i tshul gyis dri'i lha mo'o //
T02D1659:378b-34: ro thams cad ras ya na'i rnam par 'gyur bas de nyid 'dzin pa'i sgo nas ro'i lha mo'o //
T02D1659:378b-35: dga' ba dang bde ba gnyis kyi don nyams su myong bas reg gi lha mo'o //
T02D1659:378b-36: zag pa med pa'i ye shes rnam par grol ba'i lam la sbyor bas chos kyi lha mo ste /
T02D1659:378b-37: 'di dag ni phyi rol gyi 'byung ba kun la yang snang la /
T02D1659:379a-2: rnal 'byor pa'i longs spyod kyis ji ltar bde ba bzhin du bstan par bya'o zhes pa'i //
T02D1659:379a-3: da ni sbyor ba bzhi'i rim pa'i brda las dang por mtshan nyid bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1659:379a-4: bdag gi lhag pa'i lhar sbyor ba //
T02D1659:379a-5: rang gi mchod pa'i dam tshig yin ;
T02D1659:379a-6: ; rjes su sbyor bas mchod na ni //
T02D1659:379a-7: sbyor ba kun gyi bde ba'i mchog / sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya yis //
T02D1659:379a-8: bde ba chen po yin par bshad //
T02D1659:379a-9: dang por mtshan nyid mdor bstan pa yin te /
T02D1659:379a-10: sbyor bas rang nyid rgyu'i rdo rje sems dpar sgrub
T02D1659:379a-11: pa ni lhag pa'i lha'i sbyor ba ste rang nyid
T02D1659:379a-13: rjes su sbyor bas yum bskyed cing byang chub kyi
T02D1659:379a-14: sems kyi 'od zer gyis phrin las dag mthar phyin
T02D1659:379a-15: pa ni mnyes pa'i yan lag gnyis pa'o //
T02D1659:379a-16: shin tu sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor bskyed cing de dag
T02D1659:379a-17: gis spyi dang khyad par las rgya cher mdzad pa
T02D1659:379a-18: ni mnyes pa'i yan lag gsum pa'o //
T02D1659:379a-19: de la skye mched drug byin gyis brlab cing /
T02D1659:379a-20: sku gsung thugs rdo rje bsgom pa la sogs pas bde ba mchog tu gyur pa ste /
T02D1659:379a-21: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang /
T02D1659:379a-22: tshe 'di nyid kyi mngon par shes pa dag 'grub cing bde ba chen po'i sku la sbyor ba'o //
T02D1659:379a-23: des na sbyor ba chen po ni 'bras bu'i ngo bor gnas so zhes kyang bshad do //
T02D1659:379a-24: yang de nyid kyi nges tshig bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1659:379a-25: ye shes tsam la snyoms 'jug pa //
T02D1659:379a-26: rnal 'byor zhes ni bshad pa yin //
T02D1659:379a-27: zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gnyis gsungs te /
T02D1659:379a-28: dang por mngon par byang chub pa rnam pa lnga ye shes lnga'i tshul gyis sbyor zhing /
T02D1659:379a-29: byang chub kyi sems rnam pa lnga gsal bar byed
T02D1659:379a-30: pa'i tshul gyis thabs kyi sku gcig pu la dmigs
T02D1659:379a-31: pa tsam zhes pa'i sgra smras pa yin no //
T02D1659:379a-32: gzhan dag ni go sla ste de nyid kyi don
T02D1659:379a-33: gsal bar ni rtog pa bdun pa las gsal bar
T02D1659:379a-34: bshad pa / sbyor ba bzhi yi rim pa yis //
T02D1659:379a-35: dkyil 'khor rdzogs par byas nas ni //
T02D1659:379a-36: rjes su 'gro ba'i las dag gis //
T02D1659:379a-37: dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bya ba yin //
T02D1659:379a-39: yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las kyang /
T02D1659:379a-40: sbyor ba'i bye brag rim pa bzhin //
T02D1659:379b-0: dkyil @379b 'khor gsal bar bsgom byas nas //
T02D1659:379b-1: rgyun mthun lam gyi tshogs las ni //
T02D1659:379b-3: sbyor ba bsgoms pa'i mthu dag gis //
T02D1659:379b-4: rjes sbyor la sogs gsal bar 'gyur //
T02D1659:379b-5: mi rtog rnam gol blo 'bras bu //
T02D1659:379b-8: da ni bsnyen sgrub kyi brda las dang por //
T02D1659:379b-9: mtshan ni dga' spyod sgrub par bshad //
T02D1659:379b-10: rjes su sbyor ba rjes su bsgrub //
T02D1659:379b-11: ces pa la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gnyis gsungs te /
T02D1659:379b-12: bsnyen sgrub kyi rim pa dag mtshon pa'i mtshan mar
T02D1659:379b-13: khyad par so so'i ming gis ston par byed de
T02D1659:379b-14: / dang por ting nge 'dzin gyi dgos pa nas bzung ste /
T02D1659:379b-15: sbyor ba'i bar du gsal bar bsgom pa ni bsgrub pa'o //
T02D1659:379b-16: de bzhin du rjes su sbyor ba dang shin tu
T02D1659:379b-17: sbyor ba dang sbyor ba chen po'i bar du gsal
T02D1659:379b-18: bar sgom pa dag ni rjes su sgrub pa dang
T02D1659:379b-20: shin tu sgrub pa zhes pa'o //
T02D1659:379b-21: 'di ni bsnyen sgrub kyi yan lag kun gyi yang gnas su yang 'jug cing /
T02D1659:379b-22: khyad par du yang gang zag blo dman pa dang
T02D1659:379b-23: bsdus pa la dga' ba'i don du bstan pa yin
T02D1659:379b-24: no // de nyid rtsa ba'i rgyud las kyang rgyas par bshad cing /
T02D1659:379b-25: de dang rjes su mthun par dpal zla gsang thig le las kyang /
T02D1659:379b-26: sgrub pa lha yi sbyor ba ste //
T02D1659:379b-27: rjes su sgrub pa lha mo'i don //
T02D1659:379b-28: sgrub pa chen po gnyi ga'i rgya //
T02D1659:379b-29: mnyam par sbyor bar rdo rje'i mchog / nye bar sbyor ba gnyi ga'i gnas //
T02D1659:379b-30: shin tu sbyor ba bde dam pa //
T02D1659:379b-32: de dag gi 'bru'i don ni go sla'o //
T02D1659:379b-34: thams cad ldan pa kun 'gro ba //
T02D1659:379b-35: dngos grub dam pa rab tu bshad //
T02D1659:379b-36: ces pa la sogs pa tshigs su bcad pa gnyis gsungs te /
T02D1659:379b-37: bsnyen sgrub yan lag bzhi'i tshul gyis thun mong dang
T02D1659:379b-38: mchog gi dngos grub rnam pa gnyis la sbyor zhing
T02D1659:379b-39: rigs dang ye shes kyi snang ba gnas skabs so
T02D1659:379b-40: so'i tshul gyis dmigs pa'i las dag tshul rnam pa
T02D1659:379b-41: bzhi'i sgo nas 'grub par byed de /
T02D1659:379b-42: rang nyid la gnas pa'i yon tan gyi 'bras bu
T02D1659:379b-43: thams cad du rgyu tshogs pa las rkyen tshogs pas
T02D1659:380a-1: dag gi phan yon ni go sla ba'i phyir ma bshad do //
T02D1659:380a-2: da ni brda sna tshogs bstan pa las dang por mchod pa lnga ni /
T02D1659:380a-3: khrag ni me tog yin par bshad //
T02D1659:380a-4: mdangs ni bdug pa yin par bshad //
T02D1659:380a-5: sha chen dag ni mar me ste //
T02D1659:380a-6: thal ba dag ni spos su bshad //
T02D1659:380a-7: gang zhig chags pa'i mtshan mar gyur cing gsal bar byed pa ni me tog lta bu dang /
T02D1659:380a-8: yid tshim pa'i sgo nas bdug pa lta bu dang /
T02D1659:380a-9: skye ba bdun pa'i shas mar mer 'gyur ba dang /
T02D1659:380a-10: byug pa'i spos bzhin lus dag pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1659:380a-11: yang bza' btung gi brda ni //
T02D1659:380a-12: chang ni sgeg mo yin par bshad //
T02D1659:380a-13: rab tu myos pa sbrang rtsi'o //
T02D1659:380a-14: zhes pa la sogs pa la bdud rtsi'i lam gyi yan lag brgyad ni /
T02D1659:380a-15: bdud rtsi lnga dang zhag dang /
T02D1659:380a-16: khrag dang thal bas brgyan pa'o //
T02D1659:380a-17: de dag gi lus kyi bcud du gyur pas bdud rtsi lta bu'o //
T02D1659:380a-18: gzhan dag ni gong du bshad zin te go sla'o //
T02D1659:380a-19: yang 'bras bu lnga'i brda bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1659:380a-20: aa mra rgun 'brum pa na sa //
T02D1659:380a-21: na li ke ri aa ru ra //
T02D1659:380a-22: zhes pa la sogs pa ste de dag rang bzhin gyi mthu dang ldan pa dang /
T02D1659:380a-23: rdzas sbyor ba'i mthu dang ldan pa dang /
T02D1659:380a-24: byin gyis brlabs pa'i mthu dang ldan pa dang /
T02D1659:380a-25: de dag sgrub pa las byung ba'i khyad par mchog
T02D1659:380a-26: tu gyur ba'i 'bras bu chen po lnga'i brda bstan
T02D1659:380a-27: pa yin no // da ni lha rnams mnyes par byed pa'i brda las /
T02D1659:380a-33: rta mchog rnams kyi rim pa bzhin du bshad pa'i phyir /
T02D1659:380a-34: rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba'i //
T02D1659:380a-35: glu dang sil snyan gar byed pa //
T02D1659:380a-36: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1659:380a-37: dpal 'byor ba'i glu dang sil snyan dang rab tu zhi ba'i glu dang /
T02D1659:380a-39: mi'i dbang po'i glu dang sil snyan dang /
T02D1659:380a-44: rab tu dpa' ba'i glu dang sil snyan rnams kyis mchod pa mdzad pa'i brdar gyur ba'o //
T02D1659:380a-45: yang mkha' 'gro ma'i nges tshig dang /
T02D1659:380a-46: sgyu ma'i nges tshig gi sgo nas rang rang gi
T02D1659:380a-47: don ston par mtshon pa'i tshul gyis dpal rdo rje
T02D1659:380a-48: sems dpa' la sogs pa dkyil 'khor kun gyi brdar
T02D1659:380b-1: da ni mtshan sna tshogs kyi sgo nas brda'i don bstan pa las /
T02D1659:380b-2: dang por rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor lha mo dang bcas pa ni /
T02D1659:380b-3: sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor zhing //
T02D1659:380b-4: sgyu ma kun gyis gar byed pa //
T02D1659:380b-5: zhes pa la sogs pas gtso bo dang 'khor dag gi mtshan gyi rnam grangs dang /
T02D1659:380b-6: so so'i las kyi sngags rnams bstan pa yin no //
T02D1659:380b-7: de'i zhar la ni rigs bzhi'i sangs rgyas kun gyi mtshan nyid bshad de /
T02D1659:380b-8: shin tu brtan pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad dang /
T02D1659:380b-9: rab tu brtan pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa dang /
T02D1659:380b-10: kun du brtan pa'i 'jig rten dbang phyug dang /
T02D1659:380b-11: rgya cher brtan pa'i nam mkha'i snying po dag ni shes par 'gyur ba dang /
T02D1659:380b-14: zhugs shing dbang du mdzad pa'i tshul gyis brda'i mtshan mar gyur pa yin no //
T02D1659:380b-15: yang sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyi mtshan gyi bye brag ni /
T02D1659:380b-16: aam a'am aa a'a kun bshad pa //
T02D1659:380b-17: sangs rgyas brda yi phyag rgya yin //
T02D1659:380b-19: gtso bo'i sku gsung thugs kyi phyag rgya dang /
T02D1659:380b-20: 'khor gyi lha mo rnams kyi yon tan dang /
T02D1659:380b-21: phrin las kyi mtshan gyi bye brag bstan pa yin no //
T02D1659:380b-22: yang he ru ka'i mtshan gyi bye brag ni kro
T02D1659:380b-23: dha kro dha zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sgras
T02D1659:380b-24: dbang po lnga dang yul lnga'i sgo nas sgra'i dbyings
T02D1659:380b-25: du ma dang ldan pa'i brda ston par byed do
T02D1659:380b-26: // de yang gnod sbyin langka mgrin bcu la sogs
T02D1659:380b-27: pa dag gis kla klo'i skad du ming bcu dang
T02D1659:380b-29: pha rol tu phyin pa bcu dang /
T02D1659:380b-32: bstod pa bcu'i sgo nas rjod par byed pa'o //
T02D1659:380b-33: de yang ming bcu'i kro dha ksha zhes pa'i sgras rim pa bzhin du /
T02D1659:380b-34: khyod ni pha ltar slob pa ste //
T02D1659:380b-35: khyod ni ma ltar byams pa yin //
T02D1659:380b-36: khyod ni seng ge'i 'gying bag can //
T02D1659:380b-37: khyod ni glang po'i lta stangs can //
T02D1659:380b-38: khyod ni me ltar 'bar ba ste //
T02D1659:380b-39: khyod ni chu ltar sdud pa yin //
T02D1659:380b-40: khyod ni yon tan phreng bas mdzes //
T02D1659:380b-41: khyod ni phrin las kun gyi bdag / yon tan rin chen 'byung gnas khyod //
T02D1659:380b-42: khyod ni bden pa'i sgrin chen yin //
T02D1659:380b-43: zhes ye shes gsang ba'i rgyud las gsungs pa //
T02D1659:381a-0: phyag na rdo rje dbang bskur @381a * //
T02D1659:381a-2: rdo rje bkod pa'i rgyud las kyang rgya cher bshad pas 'dir ma spros pa'o //
T02D1659:381a-3: de dag gi phan yon ni go sla'o //
T02D1659:381a-4: phyag mtshan dang lha mo rnams kyi brda ni gong du bshad zin to //
T02D1659:381a-5: yang phrin las kyi sgo nas lha mo dag las la gzhug pa'i phyir /
T02D1659:381a-6: srungs shig myur du rnam rgyal dpal //
T02D1659:381a-7: tha la ba bzhin du rab tu rlogs //
T02D1659:381a-8: zhes pa ni rigs kyi lha mo bzhi'i khyad par gyi phrin las so //
T02D1659:381a-9: ham ham hra h'um zhes pa ni lha mo bzhi phrin las la gzhug pa'i sngags so //
T02D1659:381a-10: rol cig dgongs shig de bzhin du //
T02D1659:381a-11: rol du chug pa'i gsod du chug / ces pa
T02D1659:381a-12: ni phyi'i lha mo bzhi'i khyad par gyi phrin las
T02D1659:381a-13: so // ma ta ra ta phat phat ces pa ni las la gzhug pa'o //
T02D1659:381a-14: des ni dpal he ru ka'i brda'i mtshan ma bstan pa'o //
T02D1659:381a-15: yang padma gar gyi dbang phyug gi mtshan nyid dag brda'i sgo nas bshad pa ni /
T02D1659:381a-16: rgyal po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug /'jig rten dbang po zhes bya ste //
T02D1659:381a-17: zhes pa la sogs pa ni /
T02D1659:381a-18: gtso bo'i de kho na nyid ston pa'i brda dang 'khor gyi lha mo rnams kyi rang bzhin dang /
T02D1659:381a-19: mtshan dang phrin las dag gi don rnams brdas bshad pa'o //
T02D1659:381a-20: shuddha zhes pa la sogs pa lha mo brgyad kyi snying po'i sgo nas las la gzhug pa'i brda'o //
T02D1659:381a-21: gzhan yang rdo rje nyi ma'i brda'i don bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1659:381a-22: nam mkha'i snying po thams cad phyogs //
T02D1659:381a-23: re ba thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa //
T02D1659:381a-24: zhes pa la sogs pas gtso bo'i mtshan nyid dang phrin las dang /
T02D1659:381a-25: lha mo rnams kyi las la gzhug pa'i sngags dang /
T02D1659:381a-26: mtshan gyi brda dag bstan pa yin no //
T02D1659:381a-27: yang rta mchog rol pa'i don mtshon par byed pa'i brda ni /
T02D1659:381a-28: sna tshogs padmo thams cad spyan //
T02D1659:381a-29: de bzhin 'jig rten thams cad pa //
T02D1659:381a-30: zhes pas rigs rnam pa bzhi phrin las kyi sgo nas /
T02D1659:381a-31: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i las thams
T02D1659:381a-32: cad sgrub pa'i bdag nyid tshul rnam pa bzhi dang
T02D1659:381a-34: yon tan dang bcas par bstan pa'o //
T02D1659:381a-35: cho ga'i yan lag ni sgrub pa la sogs byed pa'i dus su brda dang /
T02D1659:381a-36: mtshan ma'i sgo nas 'dod par bya ba'i don mtha'
T02D1659:381a-37: dag shes par bya ba'i phyir bstan pa yin no
T02D1659:381b-0: // brda'i phyag rgya zhes pa'i don @381b rnam par bshad pa'o //
T02D1659:381b-1: da ni nyi shu pa ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i
T02D1659:381b-2: bye brag ces pa'i sgo nas 'jig rten 'di'i mngon
T02D1659:381b-4: phyi ma'i bla na med pa'i byang chub dag bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir gsungs te /
T02D1659:381b-5: rjes su chags par bya'o zhes //
T02D1659:381b-6: cha lugs shes pa bzhin byed cing //
T02D1659:381b-7: zhes pa la sogs pa la /
T02D1659:381b-8: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i sgo nas chos thams cad
T02D1659:381b-9: la stong pa chen po'i ye shes kyi rjes su
T02D1659:381b-10: chags shing / bdag dang gzhan gyi don du mtshan
T02D1659:381b-11: ma dang bcas pa'i dngos grub lha'i sku phyag rgya'i
T02D1659:381b-12: mtshan nyid ji lta ba'i sgo nas sgrub cing gnas
T02D1659:381b-13: chags shing / pas / de dang mthun pa'i 'bras
T02D1659:381b-14: bu phrin las dang bcas pas las thams cad la
T02D1659:381b-15: sbyor ba'i phan yon dang bcas pa'o //
T02D1659:381b-16: rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgo nas /
T02D1659:381b-17: 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos mtha'
T02D1659:381b-18: dag chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi ngo bor
T02D1659:381b-19: rjes su chud par byas nas /
T02D1659:381b-20: de las kun rdzob tu rang gi dkyil 'khor gsal bar bsgoms shing /
T02D1659:381b-21: bsgrubs pa'i mthus sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje'i sgo nas /
T02D1659:381b-22: de nyid dang tshul mthun pa'i phrin las la sbyor ba'o //
T02D1659:381b-23: dpal he ru ka'i sgo nas me long lta bu'i
T02D1659:381b-24: ye shes kyis chos thams cad rjes su sbyor bar
T02D1659:381b-25: byas shing ; kun rdzob tu de nyid sku gsung
T02D1659:381b-26: thugs kyi phyag rgya'i sgo nas dngos grub thams cad
T02D1659:381b-27: byas shing ; la sbyor ba'o // padma gar gyi
T02D1659:381b-28: dbang phyug gi sgo nas mnyam pa nyid kyi ye
T02D1659:381b-29: shes kyis chos thams cad la rjes su sbyor zhing
T02D1659:381b-30: byas shing ; la sbyor ba'o // / kun rdzob
T02D1659:381b-31: tu lha'i sku phyag rgya'i cha lugs kyis sgrib pa'i
T02D1659:381b-32: tshogs thams cad sbyang zhing dngos grub thams cad bsgrub
T02D1659:381b-33: byas shing ; la sbyor ba'o // / pa'o //
T02D1659:381b-34: rdo rje nyi ma'i sgo nas so sor kun du
T02D1659:381b-35: rtog pa'i ye shes kyis chos can gyi dngos po

T02D1659:381b-37: rnams rjes su yi rang bar byas la mchod pa
T02D1659:381b-38: la sogs pa'i las kun bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D1659:381b-39: rta mchog gi sgo nas bya ba grub pa'i ye
T02D1659:381b-40: shes kyis rtog pa la sogs pa'i dregs pa thams
T02D1659:381b-41: cad gzhom zhing / rang gi cha lugs kyis phrin las kyi las la sbyar ba'o //
T02D1659:381b-42: de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las /
T02D1659:381b-43: tshe 'di'i mngon shes la sogs pa //
T02D1659:382a-2: ye shes chen po'i tshul dag ni //
T02D1659:382a-3: chos rnams ma lus thams cad la //
T02D1659:382a-4: rjes chags la sogs tshul gyis ni //
T02D1659:382a-5: rigs kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par sbyong //
T02D1659:382a-8: rigs kyi dkyil 'khor drug rnams kyi //
T02D1659:382a-9: bsnyen rdzogs cho ga gsal ba'i mthus//
T02D1659:382a-10: phyag rgya chen po'i las mthun sku //
T02D1659:382a-11: so so'i rgyud la skye bar 'gyur //
T02D1659:382a-12: mngon par shes pa lnga sogs dag / rang gi rten la bsgrub bya ste //
T02D1659:382a-13: cha lugs shes pa sbyor ba'i mthus //
T02D1659:382a-14: dngos grub thams cad skye bar 'gyur //
T02D1659:382a-16: bsdus pa'i don ni 'di ltar yin te /
T02D1659:382a-17: bdag gzhan gyi don du tshad med pa bskyed pa'i
T02D1659:382a-18: rnal 'byor bas 'gro ba thams cad bsgral ba'i phyir
T02D1659:382a-19: / dang por bdag nyid sgrol bar dam bcas nas sbyor ba dang ldan pas dbang po bsam zhing /
T02D1659:382a-20: 'phags pa la tshogs bsags pa dang /
T02D1659:382a-21: sems can la tshogs bsags pa dang /
T02D1659:382a-22: srung ba'i 'khor lo bsgom pa dang /
T02D1659:382a-26: ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor la dmigs pa'i bya ba dang /
T02D1659:382a-27: mdun gyi dkyil 'khor la dmigs pa'i bya ba dang /
T02D1659:382a-28: gnyis su med pa'i dkyil 'khor la dmigs pa'i bya ba dang /
T02D1659:382a-29: rjes kyi rnal 'byor gang yang rung ba dag brtsams nas /
T02D1659:382a-30: rigs rnam pa drug gi so so'i phyag mtshan dag la brten te /
T02D1659:382a-31: chos kyi snying pos dngos grub kyi las la sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D1659:382a-32: de dag gi don ni rgya cher rtsa ba'i rgyud
T02D1659:382a-33: las bshad de 'dir ni bsdus pa tsam gyi dbang
T02D1659:382a-35: ye shes kyi phyag rgya shes pa'i don rnam par bshad pa'o //
T02D1659:382a-36: da ni nyi shu gcig pa rnam shes kyi phyag rgya shes pa'i sgo nas /
T02D1659:382a-39: ma grub pa la sogs pa'i ltas blta ba'i phyir
T02D1659:382a-40: dang por rdo rje sems dpa'i sgo nas phra sen
T02D1659:382a-41: dbab pa ni / rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba //
T02D1659:382a-42: gzugs dang dbyibs ni ci 'drar ldan //
T02D1659:382a-43: zhes pa la sogs pa ste dpal rdo rje sems
T02D1659:382a-44: dpa'i rnal 'byor la gnas pas rang nyid kyi phyag
T02D1659:382a-45: rgya la brten te snying po'i sngags dang chos kyi
T02D1659:382a-46: snying po dag 'bum du bzlas shing /
T02D1659:382a-47: dkyil 'khor lha dag spyan drangs shing mchod de /
T02D1659:382b-0: @382b bdag dang gnyis su med par bstim mo //
T02D1659:382b-1: de nas gnas rgyan gyis brgyan par mandala legs par
T02D1659:382b-2: byas la me tog gis brgyan cing khye'u dang bu
T02D1659:382b-3: mo gang yang rung ba khrus byas te /
T02D1659:382b-4: gos dang rgyan dang ldan pa byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D1659:382b-5: de nyid la rdo rje'i phyag rgya btang nas rigs kyi dkyil 'khor dbab cing /
T02D1659:382b-6: de nyid la bstims la mchod pas mnyes par bya'o //
T02D1659:382b-7: de nas gsang sngags 'bum du brjod nas /
T02D1659:382b-8: byis pa la mtshan ma'i ltas ji ltar snang ba dri bar bya'o //
T02D1659:382b-9: yang sangs rgyas rnam par snag mdzad kyi sgo nas //
T02D1659:382b-10: sa chu me rlung nam mkha' dang //
T02D1659:382b-11: khams gsum kun ni thams cad las //
T02D1659:382b-13: rigs kyi sbyor ba dang ldan pas snga ma'i tshul
T02D1659:382b-14: gis 'byung ba rnam par ldan las mtshan ma'i ltas
T02D1659:382b-15: blta bar bya'o // he ru ka'i ni /
T02D1659:382b-16: kun du thams cad kun gyi bdag //
T02D1659:382b-17: 'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad dang //
T02D1659:382b-18: zhes pas de nyid la brtag par bya'o //
T02D1659:382b-20: padmo chags pas rjes chags shing //
T02D1659:382b-22: zhes pa la sogs pa ste de nyid la brtag par bya'o //
T02D1659:382b-24: me tog bdug pa mar me mchog / spos dang mchod pa thams cad la //
T02D1659:382b-25: zhes pa la sogs pa ste de nyid la brtag par bya'o //
T02D1659:382b-27: reg dang ma reg rdo rje che //
T02D1659:382b-28: ral gri me long mda' gzhu dang /
T02D1659:382b-29: zhes pa la sogs pa ste de nyid la brtag par bya'o //
T02D1659:382b-30: 'o na gang zhig brtag ce na /
T02D1659:382b-31: bya ba dang ni mi bya dang /
T02D1659:382b-32: stor ba dang ni ma stor ba /
T02D1659:382b-33: zhes pa la sogs pa dag gi cho ga'i yan lag ni /
T02D1659:382b-34: las kha tshar ba dag gi gnas skabs gang yang rung ba dag tu'am /
T02D1659:382b-35: gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor du slob ma'i don du'am //
T02D1659:382b-36: sgrub pa dang phrin las kyi dngos grub blang ba'i dus dag tu 'ang sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D1659:382b-37: rnam par shes pa'i phyag rgya shes pa'i don rnam par bshad pa'o //

T02D1659:382b-39: kyi phyag rgya zhes pa las dang por rdo rje
T02D1659:382b-40: sems dpa'i sbyor ba bshad te /
T02D1659:382b-41: rdo rje sems dpa'i dpal sbyor ba /
T02D1659:382b-42: ji lta'i gzugs dang dbyibs ldan pas //

T02D1659:383a-0: de yang dpal rdo rje sems @383a * //
T02D1659:383a-1: dpa'i sbyor ba dang ldan pas /
T02D1659:383a-2: dur khrod dang lha'i gnas dang ma mo'i gnas gang yang rung ba'i thal ba blangs te /
T02D1659:383a-3: rang nyid kyi sngags kyis bzlas brjod dang ldan par byin gyi ba brlabs nas /
T02D1659:383a-4: gang bsrung bar 'dod pa de nyid la thig le'am sor ris gsum du bya'o //
T02D1659:383a-5: de ltar sbyor ba dang ldan pas chus bsrung ba dang /
T02D1659:383a-6: yungs kar gyis bsrung ba dang /
T02D1659:383a-7: lha dpal bo gcig pa'i skus bsrung ba dang /
T02D1659:383a-8: dkyil 'khor rgyas pa'i sbyor bas bsrung bar bya'o //
T02D1659:383a-9: de dag gi bsdus pa'i don ni gang gis gang bsrung ba'i phyir /
T02D1659:383a-10: sngon du tshogs bsags pa la sogs pa'i rim pa dang /
T02D1659:383a-11: srung ba'i 'khor lo dang ye shes kyi lha la sbyor bar byas nas /
T02D1659:383a-12: rten rnam pa gsum gang yang rung ba dag mdun du bzhag ste /
T02D1659:383a-13: rang gi gsang bsngags 'bum du brjod pas byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
T02D1659:383a-14: gang bsrung bar 'dod pa de nyid dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su gsol zhing //
T02D1659:383a-15: sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs nas de nyid la bsrung bar bya'o //
T02D1659:383a-16: gal te rdzas de dag dang mi ldan pa dang /
T02D1659:383a-17: rang gi ting nge 'dzin gsal bar gyur pa de dag gis ni bsdus pa dang /
T02D1659:383a-18: rgyas pa'i sbyor ba gnyis kyis bsrung bar bya'o //
T02D1659:383a-19: da ni sbyor ba gzhan gyis bsrung bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1659:383a-20: rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba //
T02D1659:383a-21: sangs rgyas kun bdag sbyor ldan pas //
T02D1659:383a-22: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1659:383a-23: rnam snang gi sbyor bas khor lo'i phyag rgyas bsrung ba dang /
T02D1659:383a-24: de bzhin du he ru ka'i phyag rgyas bsrung ba dang /
T02D1659:383a-25: padma gar dbang gi phyag rgyas bsrung ba dang /
T02D1659:383a-26: rdo rje ni ma'i phyag rgyas bsrung ba dang /
T02D1659:383a-27: rta mchog rol ba'i phyag rgyas bsrung ba'o //
T02D1659:383a-28: bsdus pa'i don ni rigs so so'i rnal 'byor la gnas pas /
T02D1659:383a-29: rang rang gi phyag rgya'i mtshan ma la bsgom pa
T02D1659:383a-30: dang bzlas pa'i cho gas gsal bar byas nas gang
T02D1659:383a-31: bsrung bar bya ba de nyid la gdags par bya'o
T02D1659:383a-32: // cho ga'i yan lag ni phrin las bzhi ni
T02D1659:383a-33: gnas skabs kyi rjes su sbyar zhing rigs kyi cho
T02D1659:383a-34: ga'i sgo nas bsrung bar bya'o //
T02D1659:383a-35: de dag gi phan yon ni go sla ba'i phyir ma bshad do //
T02D1659:383a-36: yang rta mchog gi sbyor ba la ni cho ga bzhin du bshad de /

T02D1659:383b-0: dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor bsdus @383b nas ;
T02D1659:383b-1: slar rigs kyi gtso bo'i sku gsal ba la bsrung ba dang /
T02D1659:383b-2: gang bsrung bar bya ba de nyid bdag nyid kyi sku'am /
T02D1659:383b-3: lha gang yang rung ba'i nang du zhugs te go cha dang go chings kyi tshul du bya zhing /
T02D1659:383b-4: rin po che'i dbu rgyan dang /

T02D1659:386b-35: lha mo kun dang 'dus pa ni //

T02D1659:387a-0: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' lha @387a * //
T02D1659:387a-2: longs spyod par mdzad pa ni /
T02D1659:387a-3: kun du sna tshogs skal ba bzang po yin te /
T02D1659:387a-4: sngon du dkyil 'khor bsgom pa'i don du bde ba'i dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur ba'o //
T02D1659:387a-5: yang tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis rjes su 'jug pa'o //
T02D1659:387a-6: de dag gi don du yang bstan pa ste /
T02D1659:387a-8: ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor spyan drangs shing gshegs su gsol ba dang /
T02D1659:387a-9: dkyil 'khor bsdu zhing phyag rgya dgrol ba dang /
T02D1659:387a-10: srung ba'i cho ga dag la yang sbyar te /
T02D1659:387a-11: rgyal ba'i bka'i don la ni dgongs pa du ma'i mtshan nyid can te /
T02D1659:387a-12: de dag nyams su blangs shing spyod pa'i mthu 'di dag 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
T02D1659:387a-13: de dag gi phan yon ni tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis bstan te go sla'o //
T02D1659:387a-14: yang 'bras bu'i ngo bo de dag ji ltar 'byung ba'i 'brel tshul bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1659:387a-15: sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor bas //
T02D1659:387a-16: sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam par 'gyur //
T02D1659:387a-17: zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gnyis su gsungs pa las /
T02D1659:387a-18: dang por lta ba'i mtshan nyid sangs rgyas gnyis dang
T02D1659:387a-19: mnyam par sbyor bas rtogs shing gsal bar byas te
T02D1659:387a-20: / de'i don sgrub pa'i thabs lam gyi chos dag
T02D1659:387a-21: nyams su blangs na de dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu
T02D1659:387a-23: de nyid ji lta bu zhe na /
T02D1659:387a-24: yon tan mdzad pa dang bcas pa'i tshul gyis snang ba ste /
T02D1659:387a-25: lta bas mi ngoms pa yi sku //
T02D1659:387a-26: thams cad bdag nyid ston par mdzad //
T02D1659:387a-27: ces pa la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gnyis gsungs te /
T02D1659:387a-28: bde bar gshegs pa'i sku drug rnam par bkod pa yon tan rin po che'i tshogs kyis brgyan cing /
T02D1659:387a-29: lta bas mi ngoms pa'i sku gdul bya'i rgyud ston
T02D1659:387a-30: par mdzad nas legs pa'i 'bras bu dang bde ba'i
T02D1659:387a-31: lam dang / sna tshogs kyi dngos grub dag sbyin
T02D1659:387a-32: zhing legs so zhes pa la sogs pa'i gsung brjod
T02D1659:387a-33: lam dang / de / dngos grub kyi mchog gi bar du thams cad stsol bar mdzad pa'o //
T02D1659:387a-35: rang nyid mchod pa'i cho ga ni //
T02D1659:387a-36: dbang po kun la byung ba yi //
T02D1659:387a-37: mchod pa'i sprin ni thams cad kyi //
T02D1659:387b-0: bkod @387b pa rab 'byam tshogs rnams kyis //
T02D1659:387b-1: thams cad bdag nyid mchod par mdzad //
T02D1659:387b-2: sku dang ye shes thams cad la mnga' brnyes shing /
T02D1659:387b-3: kun gyi bdag nyid du gyur pas /
T02D1659:387b-4: sangs rgyas kyi che ba'i yon tan brgyad cu dang /
T02D1659:387b-5: phrin las sum brgya drug cu dag rgyud la rdzogs
T02D1659:387b-6: par dbang po'i yul dus mtha' dag mchod pa'i sprin
T02D1659:387b-7: bkod pa rab 'byam sna tshogs par gyur te /
T02D1659:387b-8: bdag dang gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis longs spyod par mdzad pa'o //
T02D1659:387b-9: yang phyag rgyas gdab pa'i phyir /
T02D1659:387b-10: dpal ldan g-yon pa 'gying dang bcas //
T02D1659:387b-11: dpal ldan lag pa g-yas pa yi //
T02D1659:387b-12: zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gsum gyis phan yon dang bcas par bstan pa las /
T02D1659:387b-13: phyag rgya'i cha lugs gsal bar gnas shing dngos grub
T02D1659:387b-14: la sogs pa'i las mtha' dag la sbyor zhing rgyas
T02D1659:387b-16: g-yon pa dril bu'i phyag rgya dku'i gnas su 'jog
T02D1659:387b-17: cing g-yas pa padma'i khu tshur dpral bar 'jog cing
T02D1659:387b-18: mig gi lta ba gyen du bteg nas /
T02D1659:387b-19: dngos grub kyi gnas la 'jug par bya'o //
T02D1659:387b-20: 'di nyid 'bras bu'i gnas skabs su bstan pa ci'i phyir gsungs she na /
T02D1659:387b-21: mdzad pa ji bzhin gyi tshul gyis de'i gnas la 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1659:387b-23: zhes pa ni chos thams cad rnam par dag pa'i
T02D1659:387b-24: sgo nas dngos grub kyi las thams cad la gzigs
T02D1659:387b-25: pa'i tshul gyis phyag rgya dang phya rgya'i lan dag
T02D1659:387b-27: da ni phan yon las dang por nges par lung mi 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D1659:387b-28: sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa yis //
T02D1659:387b-29: rtag tu dpag med tshe dang ldan //
T02D1659:387b-30: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i //
T02D1659:387b-31: bden pa'i tshig ni rab tu smra //
T02D1659:387b-32: nges pa'i theg pa'i sgo nas sangs rgyas bde bar
T02D1659:387b-33: gshegs pa sras dang bcas pa rnams kyis stong gsum
T02D1659:387b-34: gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten 'di dag rgyas par
T02D1659:387b-35: bkang nas / rtag tu 'gyur ba med pa'i sku
T02D1659:387b-36: dang gsung dang thugs kyis theg pa chen po'i don
T02D1659:387b-37: 'bras bu rdo rje theg pa'i bden pa'i tshig rgyud
T02D1659:388a-2: yang rgyud dang dkyil 'khor gyi yon tan brjod pa las 'das pa'i don bstan pa /
T02D1659:388a-3: de'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa gcig gsungs te go sla'o //
T02D1659:388a-4: yang 'bras bu rang chas su gnas pa gsang ba'i mtshan nyid dang bcas pa bstan pa ni /
T02D1659:388a-5: mthu dang rang bzhin dag gis 'grub //
T02D1659:388a-6: ngo bo nyid kyis rtag tu 'grub //
T02D1659:388a-7: so sor rjes su 'grub bde ster //
T02D1659:388a-8: 'di ni gsang mchog mchog gi mchog / bsod nams
T02D1659:388a-9: dang ye shes kyi tshogs rnam pa gnyis bsags pa'i
T02D1659:388a-10: mthu dang / 'bras bu'i rang bzhin du chos thams
T02D1659:388a-11: cad yi nas gnas shing ngo bo nyid kyis de
T02D1659:388a-12: nyid gsal bar byas pa'i stobs las byung bas /
T02D1659:388a-13: las mthun pa'i 'bras bu so so'i rjes su gang sgrub pa dang /
T02D1659:388a-14: sgrub pa'i sgo nas bde ba'i ye shes mchog skye
T02D1659:388a-15: bar 'gyur bas gsang ba'i theg pa thams cad kyi
T02D1659:388a-16: don mchog gi mchog tu gyur ba'o //
T02D1659:388a-17: gzhan yang rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba'i rgyal ba ni mdzad pa ci yang mi mnga' ste /
T02D1659:388a-18: sna tshogs kyi rgyud dang rigs dang /
T02D1659:388a-19: phrin las dang dkyil 'khor ston par mdzad kyang der
T02D1659:388a-20: 'dzin gyi kun du rtog pa dang 'bral ba'i phyir
T02D1659:388a-21: ro // des sems can don phyir las rnams sbyong ba dang //
T02D1659:388a-22: rnam par sbyor ba rgyal ba yongs mi mdzad //
T02D1659:388a-23: ces pa la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa phyed dang gnyis gsungs pa yin no //
T02D1659:388a-24: gang zhig de lta bu'i don rtogs pa de nyid
T02D1659:388a-25: ni yon tan thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yin par
T02D1659:388a-26: bstan te / gang zhig rang gi bde bas bde bsgrub pa //
T02D1659:388a-27: dngos grub mchog gis da ni brtan par mdzad //
T02D1659:388a-28: rang nyid kyi rnam pa ci spyin par gsal ba'i mthus dngos grub kyi mchog brtan par 'gyur te /
T02D1659:388a-29: sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub rtag tu zhugs pa yin no //
T02D1659:388a-30: de dag gis ni phan yon gyi don rnam par bshad pa'o //
T02D1659:388a-31: da ni rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rtog pa tha ma
T02D1659:388a-32: las gsungs pa bzhin du bstan pas dang cing dgyes
T02D1659:388a-33: nas yi rang ba la gtso bo dgyes par mdzad
T02D1659:388a-34: pa'i phyir / kun du sna tshogs pas ni de skad gsungs //
T02D1659:388b-0: bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs pa rtag tu @388b dgyes ;
T02D1659:388b-1: ; rang nyid la rang nyid dam pa'i tshul gyis
T02D1659:388b-2: thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas dgongs pa'i don ji bzhin
T02D1659:388b-3: pa dpal gyi mgur nas phyung zhing /
T02D1659:388b-4: ljags kyi padma la bkram ste tshems bzang po bzhi
T02D1659:388b-5: bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bar nas tshangs pa'i gsung dbyangs
T02D1659:388b-7: rang nyid kyi thugs dam par gyur ba'o //
T02D1659:388b-8: de yang rtsa ba'i rgyud las bstan pa rnam pa
T02D1659:388b-9: gnyis kyi tshul du gtad pa mdzad nas ngo mtshar
T02D1659:388b-10: gyi 'dzum pa chen pos 'khor gyi mdangs phyung zhing
T02D1659:388b-11: / aa la la bstan pa'i snying po 'di mchog tu gyur pa'o //
T02D1659:388b-13: zab pa dang rgya che ba gnyis su med pa'i
T02D1659:388b-14: tshul du ston par mdzad cing zhes pa la sogs
T02D1659:388b-15: pa gsungs so // de'i rjes su 'khor gyi tshogs
T02D1659:388b-16: dag gis kyang mchod pa dang bskor ba la sogs
T02D1659:388b-17: pa dag byas shing mngon par bstod pa de'i phyir
T02D1659:388b-18: pa gsungs so // / rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyis legs gsungs la //
T02D1659:388b-19: mngon par bstod cing rab tu dgyes par 'gyur //
T02D1659:388b-21: kun du sna tshogs skal ba bzang po dam tshig
T02D1659:388b-22: gi rtog pa zhes pa ni sku drug ka lhun
T02D1659:388b-23: gyis grub pa'i rang bzhin sangs rgyas de nyid 'khor
T02D1659:388b-24: ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i bdag nyid chos
T02D1659:388b-25: thams cad kyi 'byung gnas dang rang bzhin du bzhugs
T02D1659:388b-26: pas / sna tshogs kyi skal ba bzang po yin la /
T02D1659:388b-27: shr'i'i sgras yon tan gyi tshogs thams cad dang bral ba med cing /
T02D1659:388b-28: de nyid dam tshig gi tshul gyis gzhan la yang ston par mdzad pa'o //
T02D1659:388b-29: le'u bcu pa'i don rnam par bshad pa'o /
T02D1659:388b-31: // / dpal ldan rgyal ba kun gyi bdag nyid sku //
T02D1659:388b-32: srid dngos thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' mchog / rigs mang dkyil 'khor sna tshogs 'byung ba'i gnas //
T02D1659:388b-33: mgon mchog thugs rje'i bdag po rmad du byung //
T02D1659:388b-34: dgongs pa'i bcud rdzogs gsang ba rgya mtsho'i rgyud //
T02D1659:388b-35: shin tu brtag dka' mun khams 'od kyi rin chen gzugs //
T02D1659:389a-0: du ma'i rtog bcom cho ga kun ston @389a * //
T02D1659:389a-2: ; bde chen phyag rgya ngo mtshar rmad du byung //
T02D1659:389a-3: skyabs mdzad thugs gnyis nyi zer rim shar 'dra //
T02D1659:389a-4: blo yi mun sel rin chen zur mang gsal //
T02D1659:389a-5: legs bshad tshul mang mkhas pa'i spyod yul yin //
T02D1659:389a-6: rnam par bshad las 'gal med rmad du byung ;
T02D1659:389a-7: ; phyi dus rtog mang blo gros mtha' yas rnams //
T02D1659:389a-8: legs bshad rgyal ba'i gsung la'ang mgu dka' ba //
T02D1659:389a-9: bdag la brten te sgro skur smod 'dzugs 'gyur //
T02D1659:389a-10: de dag sgrib bsags dri ma dag gyur cig / rdul bral gangs ri rin chen lhun po'i rgyan //
T02D1659:389a-11: skar tshogs zla rgyas nyi ma'i 'od mdangs kyis //
T02D1659:389a-12: mi mthun phyogs bral legs pa'i lam zhugs te //
T02D1659:389a-13: mtshungs med 'khor los sgyur rgyal gnas thob shog /
T02D1659:389a-14: dpal sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba
T02D1659:389a-15: mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i mchog gi don rnam par bshad
T02D1659:389a-17: dpal au rgyan gyi mkhas pa chen po 'dzam bu gling gi nyi ma dang 'dra ba /
T02D1659:389a-18: dngos grub thob pa'i slob dpon rgyal po chen po brgya byin sdong pos mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D1659:389a-20: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po bidy'a ka ra sim ha dang /
T02D1659:389a-21: zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba bande lha'i rin po ches bsgyur cing zhus te /
